[\[42a.6\]]snyems so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos de dag thams cad ni yang dag par bsgrubs nas spang bar bya'o/_/'di dag thams cad ni yongs su brtags pa las byung ba'o/_/de bas na gang yongs su rtog pa dang /_yongs su rtog pa las byung ba'i chos de dag ni spang bar bya'o/_/
[\[42a.7\]]de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni yongs su rtog pa dang yongs su rtog pa las byung ba'i chos rnams kyis dag go snyam du mi snyems te/_gzhan du na rnam par mi rtog pa spros pa med pa'i yul gyis ye shes thob nas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/smras pa rigs kyi bu 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]byang chub ces bya ba 'di chos gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas[,]bla dwags[}]/_byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni rnam par mi rtog pa/_spros pa med pa'i chos kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/de la ngar 'dzin pa'i spros pa ni byang chub ma yin te/_ngar 'dzin 
[\[42b.2\]]pa nye bar zhi zhing spros pa med pa ni byang chub bo/_/nga yir 'dzin pa'i spros pa ni byang chub ma yin te/_nga yir 'dzin pa nye bar zhi zhing spros pa med pa ni byang chub bo/_/rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_sdug bsngal gyi rgyun gyi spros pa ni byang chub ma yin te/_rga ba dang /_na ba 
[\[42b.3\]]dang /_'chi ba dang /_sdug bsngal gyi rgyun nye bar zhi zhing spros pa med pa ni byang chub bo/_/ser sna dang /_'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang /_gnod sems dang /_le lo dang /_rnam par g.yeng ba dang /_'chal ba'i shes rab kyi spros pa ni byang chub ma yin te/_sbyin pa dang /_
[\[42b.4\]]tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab spros pa med pa ni byang chub bo/_/lta ba dang rnam par rtog pa dang /_smon lam gyi spros pa ni byang chub ma yin te/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_
[\[42b.5\]]spros pa med pa ni byang chub bo/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni byang chub bo/_/chos thams cad ni byang chub ma yin no/_/smras pa rnam grangs gang gis na chos thams cad ni byang chub yin la/_chos thams cad byang chub kyang ma yin/_smras pa/_chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa 
[\[42b.6\]]nyid dang /_chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid khong du chud pa ni byang chub bo/_/chos thams cad la ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa la mngon par chags pa ni byang chub ma yin no/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub ces bya ba de ni nye bar zhi ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/nye bar zhi 
[\[42b.7\]]zhes bya ba de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid de bzhin nyid ces bya ba de gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas[,]bla dwags[}]/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid de bzhin nyid ces bya ba de ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]te/_stong pa de ni mi skye mi 'gag 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]go/_/smras pa/_gang bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du chos thams cad ni stong pa'o zhes gsungs te/_de bas na chos thams cad ni mi skye mi 'gag go/_/byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no/_/ji ltar khong du chud pa 
[\[43a.2\]]bzhin te/_chos thams cad ni mi skye mi 'gag go/_/smras pa/_gang 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad ni skye'o/_/'gag go zhes gsungs na/_de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ci las dgongs te gsungs/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gnas pa 
[\[43a.3\]]skye ba dang 'gag pa la mngon par chags pas de la de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen pos 'jig rten dang nga ba'i gnas bsal ba'i phyir tha snyad kyi dbang gis skye'o/_/'gag go zhes gsungs te/_'di la chos gang yang skye ba dang 'gag pa med do/_/de bas na rigs kyi bu byang chub 
[\[43a.4\]]sems dpas sangs rgyas shes par bya/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes par bya/_sems can rnams shes par bya/_sems can gyi chos rnams shes par bya/_bdag shes par bya/_bdag gi chos rnams shes par bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[43a.5\]]po rtsom pa med kyis de'i tshe don de nyid tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis smras pa/_byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pas/_/sangs rgyas 'byung dang sangs rgyas dang /_/sangs rgyas chos dang de dag ni/_/rang bzhin ci 'dra rab tu shes/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten mkhyen mchog ni/_/
[\[43a.6\]]zag med dge ba'i phung po ste/_/sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis 'byung /_/sngon gyi 'du byed rgyu las skye/_/gang gis sangs rgyas rnams rtogs pa/_/dpa' bo de ni pha rol phyin/_/des ni thams cad yongs su shes/_/des ni thams cad khong du chud/_/byang chub sus kyang ma 
[\[43a.7\]]byin te/_/gang gis kyang ni bzung ba med/_/bdag gi chos rnams yongs shes pas/_/sangs rgyas la ni sangs rgyas brjod/_/gang gis bdag ni rang bzhin gyis/_/'du shes tsam du rnam rig pa/_/de ni sangs rgyas ci 'dra dang /_/byang chub rang bzhin ci 'dra shes/_/'gro 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]ba thams cad 'du shes tsam/_/yongs su rtog pa rnams kyis brjod/_/rmi lam sgyu ma la sogs mtshan/_/byang chub sems dpas rnam par rig_/ji ltar tshul 'di shes 'gyur zhes/_/gang zhig de snyam sems 'gyur na/_/dbang po'i rta rnams rab btul ba/_/mnyam bzhag 
[\[43b.2\]]des ni rab tu shes/_/de la dgra dang zin med de/_/dgos pa dang ni mi dgos med/_/dor ba med cing gzung ba med/_/yang dag chos brjod 'di 'dra'o/_/chos rnams kun la yang dag tshig_/chos rnams yang dag brjod ces bya/_/de dag yang dag tshig min pa/_/
[\[43b.3\]]de ni skyon chags chos zhes brjod/_/'dod chags chos dang 'dod med ni/_/dag pa rnams kyis mnyam par mthong /_/de bzhin zhe sdang gti mug ste/_/'di ni chos rnams yang dag brjod/_/sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/snying rje'i bdag nyid go bgos pa/_/gang 
[\[43b.4\]]zhig rang bzhin stong min pa/_/sems can rab tu mi mthong ste/_/de ltar chos nyid gang shes shing /_/rtag tu kun tu dri med la/_/'jigs med thang la phyin de dag_/sangs rgyas khong du chud par 'gyur/_/dper na sgyu ma mkhan po zhig_/sprul pa thar par bya phyir brtson/_/
[\[43b.5\]]des ni snga nas de shes pas/_/sprul pa de la chags pa med/_/srid gsum sprul pa 'dra bar ni/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub mkhas pas shes/_/'gro ba'i ched du go bgos te/_/'gro ba de ltar snga nas shes/_/bdag ni yang dag ma yin zhing /_/sems can rang bzhin stong par 
[\[43b.6\]]mthong /_/kun tu song ba'i chos mthong nas/_/bzod pa thob ste thang la gnas/_/gang du'ang 'jug pa ma yin te/_/gang nas kyang ni ldog med pa/_/de ni 'jug med ldog med de/_/thang la gnas pa'i bram ze'o/_/nam zhig bsam pa mnyam pa yis/_/yang dag chos kyi dbyings 
[\[43b.7\]]la gnas/_/de tshe sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'di/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur lung ston/_/nam zhig bdag ni ji lta bar/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas lung bstan dag_/mthong ba'i dri ma bor ba ni/_/rgyal ba rnams kyis lung ston to/_/sgrib pa med pa'i dbyings gnas nas/_/
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]de nas mya ngan 'das la spyod/_/snying rje chen po'i bdag nyid ni/_/kun tu kha na ma tho med/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gang /_/chos rnams yang dag brjod 'dod cing /_/yang dag chos brjod don gnyer de/_/yang dag chos brjod 'di bgrod do/_/
[\[44a.2\]]sems can chen po des tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/lha'i bu brgyad stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag go/_//
[\[44a.3\]]bam po bzhi pa/_gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsom pa med kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rnam par gnon la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas ni bden pa gces su bya ste/_rigs kyi bu bden pa yang 
[\[44a.4\]]dag par brjod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos yang dag par brjod pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la bden pa gang zhe na/_gang byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas sems de srog gi phyir yang yongs su mi 'dor zhing /_
[\[44a.5\]]sems can rnams la log par yang mi sgrub pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa'o/_/gang byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/_phyis sems de 'dor zhing sems can thams cad la log par sgrub pa 'di ni byang chub 
[\[44a.6\]]sems dpa'i rab tu smad pa'i [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba'o/_/smras pa/_ji ltar na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/_sems de phyis yongs su mi 'dor zhing sems can thams cad la log par mi sgrub pa yin/_smras pa/_nam byang chub sems 
[\[44a.7\]]dpa' sdug bsngal gyi bden pa shes shing /_kun 'byung ba'i bden pa dang /_'gog pa'i bden pa dang /_lam gyi bden pa shes pa na de sems de yongs su mi 'dor zhing sems can thams cad la'ang log par mi sgrub pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]dpa' bden pa yongs su shes pa dang ldan pa ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las phyir mi ldog go/_/smras pa/_sdug bsngal ni gang shes pa ni ji lta bu/_smras pa/_len pa'i phung po lnga rnams la yid du 'ong ba dang /_yid du mi 'ong ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sdug bsngal te/_'di ni sdug bsngal 
[\[44b.2\]]zhes bya'o/_/nam sdug bsngal de rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_stong pa dang g.yo ba med pa dang /_bdag dang bdag gi dang bral ba shes pa 'di ni sdug bsngal shes pa zhes bya'o/_/nam sdug bsngal de kun 'byung ba tsam dang /_rdzas med pa dang rdzas ma yin pa dang /_snying 
[\[44b.3\]]po med pa dang bdag po med par mthong ba 'di ni kun 'byung ba shes pa zhes bya'o/_/nam sdug bsngal de sngon gyi mtha' nas kyang ma 'ongs/_phyi ma'i mthar yang mi 'pho/_da ltar byung ba la yang mi gnas te/_thog ma med pa can yin la/_rang bzhin gyis 'gags pa/_rang bzhin 
[\[44b.4\]]gyis stong pa/_rang bzhin gyis dben par shes pa 'di ni 'gog pa shes pa zhes bya'o/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu 'gog pa zhes bya ba 'di gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas[,]bla dwags[}]/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu 'gog pa ni cir yang brjod par bya ba ma yin no/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu gal te 'gog pa ni 
[\[44b.5\]]cir yang brjod par bya ba ma yin na/_de ci'i phyir 'gog pa zhes bya/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu 'gog pa zhes bya ba ni glo bur sgrib pa med pa/_yang dag pa ma yin pa yod pa ma yin pa/_kun brtags pa ste/_nam yang dag pa ma yin pa de la kun tu mi rtog pa de ni 'gog pa zhes bya'o/_/yang 
[\[44b.6\]]dag pa ma yin pa kun tu rtog pa 'gag pa na chos gang yang 'jig par mi 'gyur te/_de'i phyir chos thams cad ni shin tu 'gags pa zhes bya'o/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'gog pa mngon sum du mi byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[44b.7\]]gang 'gog pa mngon sum du byed pa de ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ngo zhes gsungs na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de ci las dgongs te gsungs/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu mngon sum du byed ces bya ba 'di ni bstan du med pa/_mngon sum du mthong ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'gog pa ni bstan du med pa'i chos so zhes gsungs so/_/chos gang bstan du med pa de ni mngon sum du bya bar mi nus so/_/de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'gog pa mngon sum du mi byed mi mthong ngo zhes gsungs te/_
[\[45a.2\]]de la dgongs nas byang chub sems dpa' ni 'gog pa mngon sum du byed do/_/nyan thos ni chos la mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i blos 'gog pa mngon sum du byed do/_/gnas so/_/kun shes so zhes gsungs so/_/dmigs pa dang yid la byed pa gang dag gis 'di ltar shes/_
[\[45a.3\]]'di ltar mthong /_'di ltar nges par byed pa 'di ni lam shes pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni ngar 'dzin pa'o/_/nga yir 'dzin pa de'i rgyu dang bcas par gang 'byung ba 'di ni kun 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/nam de'i 'byung ba'i chos gang yang so sor 
[\[45a.4\]]nges pa ma yin par mthong ba 'di ni 'gog pa shes pa zhes bya'o/_/gang de ltar rnam par mthong zhing tshol ba 'di ni lam shes pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu gang snyems pa de ni sdug bsngal ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das kyis snyems pa'i rang 
[\[45a.5\]]bzhin ni sdug bsngal lo zhes gsungs so/_/snyems pa ni thams cad du yang dag pa ma yin pa'o/_/de bas na snyems pa kun 'byung ba ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'o/_/sdug bsngal med pa ni 'gog pa'o/_/ye shes gang gis snyems pa de la mi snyems pa de ni lam mo/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[45a.6\]]bdag gis bskal pa'am/_bskal pa las lhag par byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa shes pa bstan pa 'di'i mtha' rtogs par mi nus so/_/bden pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' drug stong gis bden pa yongs su bsgoms pa phyir mi ldog pa'i sa khong du 
[\[45a.7\]]chud do/_/bar snang la gnas pa'i lha'i bu mo stong phrag bcu ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rnam par gnon gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsom pa med la 'di 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni gang /_dran pa ni gang /_dran pa'i gnas ni gang /_de skad ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsom pa med kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rnam 
[\[45b.2\]]par gnon la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chos thams cad la mi skye ba shes pa dran pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni mi skye ba shes pa'i smon lam can yin te/_de dag gi dran pa de yang mi skye ba shes pas yongs su sbyang ba byas pa/_
[\[45b.3\]]thams cad du mi bskyod pa/_drang ba/_mi g.yo ba/_gting dang 'gram mi rtogs pa/_'jig rten pa dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shes par dka' ba ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa gang gis sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa kun 'dzin pa'i dran pa de ni de 
[\[45b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mngon sum mo/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa de ni 'di 'dra'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa de'i gnas ni rnam pa bcu ste/_lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_
[\[45b.5\]]sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_chos rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_tshul khrims rjes su dran 
[\[45b.6\]]pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_gtong ba rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_lha rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ste/_'di dag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bcu'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang zhe na/_'di la 
[\[45b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar lus 'di ni sngon gyi mtha' nas ma 'ongs/_phyi ma'i mthar mi 'pho/_sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' la mi gnas te/_gzhan du na yang dag pa ma yin pa/_phyin ci log las byung ba/_byed pa po dang tshor ba po med pa/_thog ma dang tha ma 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]dang dbus med pa/_rtsa ba gnas pa med pa/_bdag po med pa/_nga yi ba med pa/_yongs su 'dzin pa med pa ste/_tshogs zhes bya ba dang /_lus zhes bya ba dang /_longs spyod ces bya ba dang /_gnas zhes bya ba dang /_ro zhes bya ba dang /_skye mched ces 
[\[46a.2\]]bya ba ni glo bur gyi tha snyad rnams kyis tha snyad du btags pa'o/_/lus 'di ni snying po med pa ste/_pha ma'i khu ba dang khrag las byung ba/_mi gtsang ba/_rul pa/_rang bzhin gyis dri mi zhim pa/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_'jigs pa dang /_sgyid lug 
[\[46a.3\]]pa'i rkun pos dkrugs pa/_rtag tu 'jig pa/_'brul ba/_'bral ba/_rnam par 'thor ba/_rnam par 'joms pa'i chos can/_nad tha dad pa brgya stong gi tshang ngo snyam du lus la dran pa nye bar 'jog go/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di ltar lus 'di ni rkang pa dang /_
[\[46a.4\]]rkang sor dang /_byin pa dang /_brla dang /_gru do dang /_lto ba dang /_lte ba dang /_sgal tshigs dang /_snying dang /_rtsib logs dang /_rtsib ma dang /_lag pa'i thal mo dang /_dpung pa dang /_thal gong dang /_mgrin pa dang /_'gram pa dang /_dpral ba dang /_mgo'i thod pa 'dus pa tsam ste/_
[\[46a.5\]]las 'byung ba'i byed pas bsags pa/_nyon mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang /_kun tu rtog pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa tha dad pa brgya stong gi gnas so/_/'di ni rdzas mang po 'dus pa 'di lta ste/_skra dang /_spu dang /_sen mo dang /_so dang /_rus pa dang /_pags pa dang /_
[\[46a.6\]]sha dang /_lus dang /_rgyus pa dang /_tshil dang /_zhag dang /_chu ser dang /_mcher pa dang /_gcin dang /_phyi sa dang /_pho ba dang /_long ka dang /_khrag dang /_ngar snabs dang /_mkhris pa dang /_rnag dang /_mchil ma dang /_klad pa dang /_klad rgyas rnams te/_de de 
[\[46a.7\]]ltar rdzas mang po 'dus pa yin no/_/de la lus zhes ji skad du bya snyam du lus la dran pa nye bar 'jog go/_/de la so sor rtog pa na 'di snyam du sems te/_lus 'di ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs so snyam nas de lus la nam mkha' ltar dran pa nye bar 'jog go/_/de thams cad nam mkha' 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]ltar mthong ngo /_/de lus yongs su shes par bya ba las gang la yang dran pa mi 'jug go/_/mi ldog go/_/mi 'jug mi ldog pas dran pa la gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/de ltar dran pa la gnas pa ni 'di ltar lus ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin du shes te/_'di la thogs par bya ba 
[\[46b.2\]]med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang du thogs pa de thams cad ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam 
[\[46b.3\]]du sems te/_tshor ba zhes bya ba ni khong du chud pa ste/_reg pa de yang phyin ci log pa dang /_phyin ci ma log pa dang /_de gnyi ga las rnam par grol ba'o snyam mo/_/de la byis pa so so'i skye bo sems g.yengs pa phyin ci log tu gyur pa rnams kyi tshor ba ni phyin ci log ste/_de dag 
[\[46b.4\]]ni mi rtag pa la rtag par tshor ro/_/sdug bsngal ba la bde bar tshor ro/_/bdag med pa la bdag tu tshor ro/_/mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar tshor te/_'di ni phyin ci log gi tshor ba'o/_/gang mi rtag pa la mi rtag par tshor ba dang /_sdug bsngal la sdug bsngal du tshor ba dang /_
[\[46b.5\]]bdag med pa la bdag med par tshor ba dang /_mi gtsang ba la mi gtsang bar tshor ba 'di ni nyan thos rnams kyi tshor ba'o/_/gang mi rtag pa la mi rtag pa dang mi rtag pa yang ma yin par tshor ba dang /_sdug bsngal la sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin par tshor ba dang /_
[\[46b.6\]]bdag med pa la bdag med pa dang bdag med pa yang ma yin par tshor ba dang /_mi gtsang ba la mi gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba yang ma yin par tshor ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshor ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' de ltar tshor ba ni tshor ba po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/
[\[46b.7\]]de mi mthong bas tshor ba yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'dus byas thams cad ni tshor ba'o zhes gsungs so/_/gal te 'dus byas thams cad tshor ba ma yin na ni 'di la tshor ba po zhes bya ba ci zhig yod/_tshor ba ni tshor bar 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]byed pa ma yin/_tshor bar bya ba dang /_tshor ba dang /_tshor bar byed pa ma yin/_'dus ma byas kyang 'dus byas tshor bar byed pa ma yin/_'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas las rnam par grol ba'i tshor bar byed pa gang yang med de/_de ltar tshor ba de dag tshor ba med par yang 
[\[47a.2\]]dag par rjes su mthong ngo /_/'di la tshor bas rtsol ba gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_byang chub ji lta bar tshor ba yang de bzhin du yang dag par rjes su mthong ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i sems 
[\[47a.3\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_gang tshor ba de ni sems tsam mo/_/sems de yang gnas pa med pa/_gzung ba med pa/_lus med pa'o/_/gang gnas med pa/_gzung ba med pa/_lus med pa de'i gnas ji 
[\[47a.4\]]lta bu zhig yod snyam mo/_/sems kyis sems mi shes so/_/sems kyis sems mi mthong ngo /_/gang la brten nas byung ba'i sems de yang gzhan la rag las pa/_rang dbang med par mthong ngo /_/sems ma rtogs par byang chub kyang mi shes so/_/de la byang chub 
[\[47a.5\]]sems tsam du shes pas sems la dbang thob bo/_/de sems la dbang bas theg pa chen po la dbang byed pa dang /_sems can thams cad la'ang sems snyoms pa dang /_theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa yin te/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems dran pa nye bar 
[\[47a.6\]]gzhag pa zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'am/_mi dge ba'am/_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'am/_kha na ma tho ba med pa'am/_zag pa dang bcas pa'am/_zag pa med pa'am/_'jig rten pa'am/_'jig 
[\[47a.7\]]rten las 'das pa'am/_nyan thos kyi chos sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/_so so'i skye bo'i chos sam/_chos gang dang gang la dran pa nye bar 'jog pa'i chos de shin tu bzung ba/_shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byas pa/_shin tu bsags pa'am/_shin tu chub pa rang gi kha na las pa/_shin tu 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]dbang byed pa'i dran pa des skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa mnyam par byed de/_gang skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa las rnam par grol ba dang /_gang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba las rnam par grol ba dang /_gang stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa 
[\[47b.2\]]las rnam par grol ba'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_chos thams cad ni bdag po med pa ste/_dben pa'i rang bzhin can/_chos thams cad ni bdag med pa ste/_gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin can/_chos thams cad ni sgrib pa med pa ste/_nam 
[\[47b.3\]]mkha'i rang bzhin can/_chos thams cad ni rnam par mi rtog pa ste/_sems dang /_yid dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang bral ba/_chos thams cad ni rnam par grol ba'i ngo bo nyid de/_nyon mongs pa med pa'i rang bzhin can/_chos thams cad ni smra ba med pa ste/_brjod du med pa'i 
[\[47b.4\]]rang bzhin can/_chos thams cad ni yi ge med pa ste/_'dus ma byas pa'i rang bzhin can/_chos thams cad ni grangs med pa ste/_grangs thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/_chos thams cad ni drang ba ste/_spros pa thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/_chos thams cad ni sa bon med pa'i 
[\[47b.5\]]phyir rtsa ba med pa/_chos thams cad ni rtsa ba rnam par byang ba'i phyir skyon med pa/_chos thams cad ni lus med pa'i phyir 'ong ba med pa/_chos thams cad ni gnas pa med pa'i phyir song ba med pa/_chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir chags pa med pa/_chos thams cad ni rten 
[\[47b.6\]]cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir stong pa/_chos thams cad ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir nges par 'byung ba/_chos thams cad ni ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin khong du chud pa'i phyir rang gi kha na las pa/_chos thams cad ni shes bya'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir byang chub pa/_chos thams cad ni rdzas med pa'i 
[\[47b.7\]]phyir ming tsam pa/_chos thams cad ni bstan du med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir lta ba dang bral ba/_chos thams cad ni lus med pa'i phyir bcings pa med pa/_chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir grol ba med pa/_chos thams cad ni de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir thibs po med pa/_
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i phyir dbyings gcig pa/_chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir tha mi dad do snyam du de ltar chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so/_/de ltar chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa'i byang chub 
[\[48a.2\]]sems dpa' ni sems can tha dad du mi byed/_chos tha dad du mi byed/_theg pa tha dad du mi byed/_sangs rgyas tha dad du mi byed/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad du mi byed/_tha ma dang /_mchog dang /_bcings pa dang /_thar pa dang /_'khor ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa yang dag 
[\[48a.3\]]par rjes su mi mthong /_spong ba med/_'dzin pa med/_'jug pa med/_ldog pa med/_len pa med/_'dor ba med de/_mi g.yo ba thob cing gnas pa yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba la gnas pa de sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa na gnas pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[48a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gzigs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston te/_de ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang zhe na/_'di la 
[\[48a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom ste/_sems can thams cad mngon sum du byas nas bdag kyang sems can thams cad kyi ched du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrub bo/_/'di ltar gang de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[48a.6\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad po de dag bdag gis bsgrub par bya'o snyam du dran pa nye bar 'jog go/_/dran pa des gang sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[48a.7\]]ldan 'das rnams kyi dran pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_dri ma med pa/_rnam par dag pa/_'od gsal ba/_bag la nyal med pa/_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par chad pa/_ye shes sngon du 'gro ba/_ye shes kyi dbang du gyur pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]dbang du gyur pa/_chos kyi dbang du gyur pa/_lha'i dbang du gyur pa/_nges par gyur pa thams cad thob pa/_shes bya'i sgrib pa'i dri ma med pa/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi rtog pa/_rang bzhin gyis rnam par mi rtog pa/_lhun gyis grub pa/_mthu sgrib pa 
[\[48b.2\]]med pa/_thogs pa med par gnas pa/_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa rgyas par byed pa/_nam mkha' ltar 'gyur ba med pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de dag rjes su dran no/_/dran pa rin po che sangs rgyas rnams kyi nor/_sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzod de dag rjes su 
[\[48b.3\]]dran te/_de'i phyir sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o/_/sangs rgyas dran pa yang ma yin/_mi dran pa yang ma yin par thams cad du lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog pa'i dran pa de dag rjes su dran te/_de'i phyir sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o/_/sangs rgyas ni sems 
[\[48b.4\]]can dang chos la tha dad pa'i 'du shes mi mnga' ba ste/_de dag gi dran pa rjes su dran pas de'i phyir sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o/_/sangs rgyas ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog_/mi len mi 'dor mi 'khor yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'/_mi skye mi 'gag pa ste/_de dag rjes su 
[\[48b.5\]]dran nas/_de'i phyir sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po mnga' ba/_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po'i spyod yul can/_sems can gyi phung po chen po'i skyabs su gyur pa/_
[\[48b.6\]]mgon du gyur pa/_sman pa chen po zug rngu 'byin pa/_sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa/_rtag tu ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul ba/_'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa las rnam par grol ba/_nyon mongs pa dang /_shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/_
[\[48b.7\]]sems can chen po'i gnas sems can chen po'i rten/_rnam par 'dren pa/_chos kyi sku spyod yul ba/_thams cad du khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_rtag tu sems can gyi don la dgyes pa/_sku dang /_gsung dang /_thugs rgya che ba/_phyad par lung ston pa/_
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]sku dang /_gsung dang /_thugs kyi phrin las kyi mtha' kha na ma tho ba med pa/_bag chags dang bcas pa'i 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dkrugs pa/_bdud dang phyir rgol ba thams cad bcom pa/_rtsod pa med pa'i chos kyi mchog dang ldan pa/_
[\[49a.2\]]rgya mtsho thams cad pas ches zab pa/_ri rab thams cad pas ches mtho ba/_sa bas ches brtan pa/_chu bas ches mnyen pa/_me bas ches 'bar ba/_rlung bas ches chags pa med pa/_nam mkha' bas ches dri ma med pa/_yid kyi 'gro ba bas ches mgyogs pa/_yid bzhin 
[\[49a.3\]]gyi nor bu bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa/_sems can thams cad la mtshungs par sbyor ba/_chags pa thams cad dang bral ba/_sems can thams cad la phan par brtson pa'i rgyun ma bcad pa/_gzugs tshad med pa/_sgra tshad med pa/_yon tan 
[\[49a.4\]]tshad med pa/_yul tshad med pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa/_sems dang /_yid dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i yul las yang dag par 'das pa/_rig pa dang zhabs kyi sems dang ldan pa/_lam 
[\[49a.5\]]gsum gyi sdig pa rnams yang dag par chad pa/_snying rje chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa can/_sems can thams cad dang thun mong ba'i yon tan can/_sems can thams cad kyi pha ma lta bur gyur pa/_dgra zin la sems snyoms pa/_ste'u dang tsan dan du mtshungs pa/_sems 
[\[49a.6\]]can tha ma dang /_'bring dang /_mchog thams cad la thams cad du rtag tu gsal bar byed pa'i chos can/_pha rol dpag par dka' ba sems can chen po/_longs spyod chen po/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa chen po/_chos gsung ba chen po/_'dul ba gsung ba chen po/_
[\[49a.7\]]skyes bu chen po/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang ldan pa/_'jig rten thams cad zil gyis gnon pa/_'jig rten thams cad kyi snang bar gyur pa/_rnal 'byor chen po la rnal 'byor pa/_bsam gtan chen po spyod yul ba/_rnam par grol ba chen po phun sum tshogs pa/_
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]bdag nyid che ba/_skye bo chen po'i zham ring ba dang ldan pa/_skye bo khyad par can gyi zham ring ba dang ldan pa/_lta ba dang /_nyan pa dang /_sten pa dang /_bsnyen bkur byed pa mi ldog pa/_bdag bde ba la mi lta ba/_gzhan gyi sdug bsngal zhi bar byed pa la dgyes pa/_chos la gzhol 
[\[49b.2\]]ba/_chos kyi nor can/_chos kyi zas can/_chos kyi sman can/_chos kyi gter can/_chos kyi dbang phyug_/chos kyi bdag po/_chos kyi sbyin bdag rtag tu gtong ba la mngon par dgyes pa/_rtag tu bag yod pa/_rtag tu dben pa la mngon par dgyes pa/_thams cad du 
[\[49b.3\]]stegs dang /_zam par gyur pa/_rgyal po'i lam chen po dang 'dra ba/_nyi ma chen po dang 'dra ba/_tshangs pa chen po 'dra ba dang /_ye shes chen po'i rdo rje 'chang ba/_chos chen pos dbugs 'byin pa/_gzugs lta bas mi ngoms pa/_mthong bas mi ngoms pa ste/_sangs rgyas 
[\[49b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das de dag de ltar rjes su dran no/_/de ltar de dag rjes su dran pas de dag gi yon tan yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir sbyor ro/_/dran pa nye bar 'jog go/_/brtson 'grus brtsam mo/_/de'i phyir sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[49b.5\]]sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i chos rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni yon tan mtha' yas 
[\[49b.6\]]mu med pa ste/_de dag ni chos las skyes pa chos kyi bgo skal la spyod pa/_chos kyis sprul pa/_chos bdag por gyur pa/_chos las byung ba/_chos kyi spyod yul/_chos la rton pa/_chos kyis grub pa ste/_gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan dang dpe 
[\[49b.7\]]byad bzang po de dag kyang chos las skyes pa/_chos kyis rnyed pa/_chos kyis grub pa'o/_/gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi po de dag kyang chos las skyes pa/_chos kyis rnyed pa/_chos kyis grub pa'o/_/
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad po de dag kyang chos las skyes pa/_chos kyis rnyed pa/_chos kyis grub pa'o/_/gang 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba yod pa de dag kyang chos las skyes pa/_
[\[50a.2\]]chos kyis rnyed pa/_chos kyis grub pa'o/_/de lta bas na bdag sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tshol bas chos gtso bor bya'o/_/chos spyod yul ba dang /_chos la rton pa dang /_chos la gzhol ba dang /_chos snying por byed pa dang /_chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos bsgrub par 
[\[50a.3\]]bya'o snyam pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_chos ni sems can thams cad la mnyam par 'jug pas chos ni tha ma dang /_'bring dang /_rab mthong nas 
[\[50a.4\]]'jug pa ma yin te/_de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/_/gnas ni phyogs su ma lhung bas chos ni ngo bor lta zhing 'jug pa ma yin te/_de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/_/chos ni dus chad pa med pa 'di mthong ba la don 
[\[50a.5\]]yod pa rang gis rig pas chos ni dus la lta zhing 'jug pa ma yin te/_de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/_/chos ni mthon dman med pas chos ni rgya chen po la 'jug pa ma yin/_dman pa la 'jug pa ma yin te/_de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 
[\[50a.6\]]'thun pa'i sems su bya'o/_/chos ni mchog dang tha ma dang bral bas chos ni rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa yang ma yin/_nyams pa la 'jug pa yang ma yin te/_de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/_/chos ni zhing dang zhing ma yin pa'i lta ba dang bral 
[\[50a.7\]]bas chos ni 'phags pa la 'jug pa yang ma yin so so'i skye bo la 'jug pa yang ma yin te/_de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/_/chos ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par 'jug pas chos ni nyin mo 'jug la mtshan mo mi 'jug pa ma yin/_mtshan mo 'jug 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]la nyin mo mi 'jug pa ma yin te/_de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/_/chos ni gang la yang nam yang sdod pa ma yin pas chos ni 'dul ba'i dus las kyang mi 'da' ste/_de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/_/chos 
[\[50b.2\]]ni thams cad du 'dod pa med pas chos ni sdang ba rnams la zhe 'gras pa yang med dad pa rnams la rjes su chags pa yang med de/_de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/_/chos ni bri ba yang ma yin/_gang ba yang ma yin te/_dpag tu med/_
[\[50b.3\]]grangs med pas nam mkha' ltar 'bri ba yang ma yin/_'phel ba yang ma yin te/_de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/_/chos ni sems can rnams kyis srung ba ma yin gyi chos kyis sems can rnams srung ba ste/_de ltar bdag gis kyang 
[\[50b.4\]]chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/_/chos ni skyabs yongs su tshol ba ma yin pas chos ni 'jig rten thams cad kyi skyabs yin te/_de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/_/chos ni thogs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid pas chos ni gang la yang 
[\[50b.5\]]thogs pa med de/_de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/_/chos ni bag la nyal med pas bag la nyal la mi 'jug ste/_de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/_/chos ni rtag tu rnam par mi rtog pas chos ni 'khor bas 
[\[50b.6\]]'jigs skrag pa yang ma yin/_mya ngan las 'das pa la rjes su chags pa yang ma yin te/_de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o snyam mo/_/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos la chos ltar dran pa nye bar 'jog pas de'i phyir chos rjes su 
[\[50b.7\]]dran pa zhes bya ste/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]sems te/_dge 'dun ni chos smra ba/_chos spyod pa/_chos sems pa/_chos kyi zhing /_chos 'dzin pa/_chos la rton pa/_chos la mchod pa/_chos kyi bya ba byed pa/_chos spyod yul ba/_chos spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa/_rang bzhin gyis 
[\[51a.2\]]drang ba/_rang bzhin gyis dang ba/_snying rje ba'i chos can/_snying rje dang ldan pa/_rtag tu dben pa spyod yul ba/_rtag tu chos la gzhol ba/_rtag tu dkar po spyod pa'o snyam mo/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[51a.3\]]kyis dge 'dun rnam pa du mar gsungs pa ni 'di lta ste/_kun rdzob kyi dge 'dun dang /_don dam pa'i dge 'dun dang /_ngo tsha shes pa'i dge 'dun dang /_ngo tsha med pa'i dge 'dun dang /_'phags pa'i dge 'dun dang /_cang shes kyi dge 'dun dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i 
[\[51a.4\]]dge 'dun no snyam mo/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' ni kun rdzob kyi dge 'dun bsdu ba'i phyir nan tan byed do/_/don dam pa'i dge 'dun la bsten pa'i phyir nan tan byed do/_/ngo tsha shes pa'i dge 'dun rnam par thar bar bya ba'i phyir nan tan byed do/_/ngo tsha med pa'i dge 
[\[51a.5\]]'dun yongs su gdul ba'i phyir nan tan byed do/_/'phags pa'i dge 'dun la mchod cing bsti stang bya ba'i phyir nan tan byed do/_/cang shes kyi dge 'dun la sangs rgyas bzhin du nan tan byed do/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun la chos kyi gtam gyi phyir nan tan byed do/_/gzhan 
[\[51a.6\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_rigs 'dzin pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi sras rnams kyi dge 'dun no/_/yid du 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rab tu sbyin pa'i phyir zhing bzang po rnams kyi dge 'dun no/_/gnas ngan len dang bral ba'i phyir 'jigs pa med pa 
[\[51a.7\]]rnams kyi dge 'dun no/_/yongs su 'dzin pa gtong zhing 'dor ba'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba rnams kyi dge 'dun no/_/shin tu dul ba'i phyir cang shes pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no/_/ma 'dres pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa med pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no/_/sdig pa dang 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]bral ba'i phyir ngo tsha shes pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no/_/bka' blo bde ba'i phyir slob ma rnams kyi dge 'dun no/_/bdag yongs su shes pa dang ldan pa'i phyir bdag gi ba med pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no/_/zhi ba'i phyir rgyags pa med pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no/_/'dod pa 
[\[51b.2\]]nyung ba'i phyir phyin ci ma log pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no/_/rnam par rtog pa yang dag par chad pa'i phyir nad med pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no/_/pha rol tu son pa'i phyir thang la gnas pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no/_/thang la gnas pa'i phyir bde ba thob pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no/_/
[\[51b.3\]]de kho na mthong ba'i phyir bag yod pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no/_/skyon ma chags pa'i phyir dgon pa pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no/_/rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub la gzhol ba rnams kyi dge 'dun no/_/bslab pa gsum gyi bya ba shes par bya ba'i phyir bslab pa 'dod pa rnams kyi dge 
[\[51b.4\]]'dun no/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa spyod yul ba'i phyir dran pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no/_/yang dag par spong ba spyod yul ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa spyod yul ba'i phyir ngal ba med pa rnams kyi dge 'dun 
[\[51b.5\]]no/_/dbang po spyod yul ba'i phyir mi phyed pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no/_/stobs spyod yul ba'i phyir tsher ma dkrugs pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no/_/byang chub kyi yan lag spyod yul ba'i phyir bsgribs pa med pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no/_/lam spyod yul ba'i phyir yang dag par 
[\[51b.6\]]lta ba rnams kyi dge 'dun no/_/bden pa spyod yul ba'i phyir 'phags pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no/_/bsam gtan spyod yul ba'i phyir mnyam par gzhag pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba spyod yul ba'i phyir chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba 
[\[51b.7\]]rnams kyi dge 'dun no/_/snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no/_/bsod nams thams cad kyi tshogs bsags pa'i phyir skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no snyam mo/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar dge 'dun 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]rjes su dran pas 'di snyam du sems te/_gang dge 'dun gyi yang dag pa'i yon tan de dag ni bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis kyang bsgrub par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[52a.2\]]de la byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_gang 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni 
[\[52a.3\]]tshul khrims las byung bar blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshul khrims ni phun sum tshogs pa de dag thams cad kyi gnas yin no/_/'di lta ste dper na/_sa ni sman dang /_rtswa dang /_nags tshal thams cad kyi gnas yin no/_/de bzhin du tshul khrims kyang phun sum 
[\[52a.4\]]tshogs pa de dag thams cad kyi gnas yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi gnas la rab tu gnas pa ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas yin no/_/sbyin pa'i chos yongs su rdzogs par yang byed do/_/tshul khrims kyi gnas la rab tu gnas 
[\[52a.5\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dga' ba skye'o/_/yid dga' bas 'gyod pa med do/_/'gyod pa med pas mchog tu dga' ba 'thob bo/_/mchog tu dga' bas lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs par 'gyur ro/_/lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pas bde ste ting nge 'dzin thob bo/_/
[\[52a.6\]]yid mnyam par bzhag pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba yin no/_/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can rnams la snying rje chen po 'jug go snyam mo/_/de yang 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis sems can thams 
[\[52a.7\]]cad la ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'di dang /_chos rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba bsgrub par bya'o snyam mo/_/de snying rje chen po des bskul bas lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang /_lhag pa'i sems dang /_lhag pa'i shes rab la bslab pa yongs su rdzogs nas bla na 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/de bas na bdag gis kyang tshul khrims la gnas pa mi bskyod pa mi lhod par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad mngon du byas nas tshul khrims bsrung bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[52b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims de ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde ba'i gnas la mi gnas pa ma yin no/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par 'byung ba'i tshul khrims ni gnod sems med pa yongs 
[\[52b.3\]]su rdzogs par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu byung ba'i tshul khrims ni bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba rdzogs par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa dang sdom pa yang dag par 'dzin pa'i tshul khrims ni lus dang /_ngag dang /_sems yongs su dag 
[\[52b.4\]]pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i nges par sems pa'i tshul khrims ni mngon par shes pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i nang du yang dag 'jog pa'i tshul khrims ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs 
[\[52b.5\]]par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyan pa'i tshul khrims ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i thos pa yongs su tshol ba'i tshul khrims ni nga rgyal med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[52b.6\]]dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur byed pa'i tshul khrims ni yon tan gyi chos thams cad chud mi za ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul khrims ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[52b.7\]]ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams ston pa'i tshul khrims ni chos smra ba nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams sems pa'i tshul khrims ni gzungs dang spobs pa thob pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]sems kyi tshul khrims ni skye ba thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i tshul khrims ni byang chub kyi sems chud mi za bar yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/
[\[53a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems chud mi za ba'i tshul khrims ni dkon mchog gsum chud mi za ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do snyam mo/_/de yang 'di snyam du sems te/_tshul khrims bsrungs pas bsrungs pa thams cad bsrungs pa yin no snyam pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu 
[\[53a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i gtong ba rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_gang ci gtong ba de thams cad ni 'di lta ste 
[\[53a.4\]]zang zing gi gtong ba dang /_chos kyi gtong ba dang /_gtong ba rnam pa gnyis kyi nang du 'dus so snyam mo/_/de la zang zing gi gtong bas ni byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su skong ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can 
[\[53a.5\]]yongs su smin par byed pa rnam par dag pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/chos kyi gtong bas ni stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/bag chags kyang yang dag par 'joms par 
[\[53a.6\]]byed do/_/gzhan yang zang zing gi gtong bas ni phung po thams cad nges par 'dor bar byed do/_/chos kyi gtong bas ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis las yang dag par 'da'o/_/gzhan yang zang zing gi gtong bas ni skye ba'i lus yongs su sbyong bar 
[\[53a.7\]]byed do/_/chos kyi gtong bas ni chos kyi skur yongs su sbyong bar byed do/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zang zing gi gtong bas ni pha ma las byung ba'i stobs sgrub par byed de/_stobs de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_sa bcu la 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma gtogs par su la yang med do/_/chos kyi gtong bas ni rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs sgrub par byed de/_stobs de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma gtogs par su la yang med do/_/
[\[53b.2\]]gzhan yang zang zing gi gtong bas ni yongs su smin par byed do/_/chos kyi gtong bas ni rnam par thar bar byed do/_/gzhan yang zang zing gi gtong bas ni tshogs sogs so/_/chos kyi gtong bas ni sgrol lo/_/gzhan yang zang zing gi gtong bas ni nor yongs su gtong ngo /_/chos 
[\[53b.3\]]kyi gtong bas ni thams cad gtong ngo /_/gzhan yang zang zing gi gtong bas ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa las rnam par grol ba sgrub par byed do/_/chos kyi gtong bas ni shes bya'i sgrib pa las rnam par grol ba sgrub par byed do/_/gzhan yang gtong ba gtong ba zhes bya ba 'di ni yongs 
[\[53b.4\]]su rtog pa gtong ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/'di lta ste yongs su rtog pa gtong ba de ni gtong ba rnams kyi dam pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_yongs su rtog pa btang bas byang chub sems dpa' dag pa zhes bya'o/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu yongs su rtog pa zhes bya ba 'di gang gi tshig 
[\[53b.5\]{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]smras pa/_rigs kyi bu yongs su rtog pa zhes bya ba 'di ni yang dag pa ma yin zhing med pa las sgro btags pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/smras pa/_ji ltar na yang dag pa ma yin zhing med pa las sgro btags pa yin/_smras pa/_nam 'di ltar bdag ni chags pa/_bdag ni zhe sdang 
[\[53b.6\]]ba/_bdag ni gti mug pa/_bdag ni nyon mongs pa/_bdag ni rnam par dag pa/_bdag ni bcings pa/_bdag ni grol ba/_bdag ni 'khor ba/_bdag ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o snyam pa la sogs par sgro btags pa thams cad ni yang dag pa ma yin zhing med pa las 
[\[53b.7\]]yongs su brtags pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di dag thams cad ni rgyu dang rkyen tsam ste/_'di la bdag dang bdag gi med/_sems can med/_srog med/_gang zag med/_shed las skyes med/_shed bu med do/_/rgyu dang rkyen de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa/_rang bzhin gyis 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]dben pa/_sems dang yid dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang bral ba/_mi sems pa/_yongs su mi rtog pa/_kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin pa/_rnam par byang ba ma yin pa/_'khor ba ma yin pa/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa'o/_/de la byang chub 
[\[54a.2\]]sems dpa' yod pa ma yin pa la sgro mi 'dogs shing /_de sgro 'dogs pa btang bas gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya'o/_/nam chos de dag rjes su dran pa de ni de'i gtong ba rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gtong ba rnam pa 
[\[54a.3\]]gsum ste/_gtong ba dang gtong ba chen po dang /_shin tu gtong ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gtong ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bza' ba 'dod pa rnams la bza' ba sbyin pa dang /_btung ba dang /_bzhon pa dang /_gos dang /_mar me dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_phreng 
[\[54a.4\]]ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_shing rta dang rgyan la sogs pa sbyin pa ste/_sbyin pa gang sems can rnams la gnod pa dang /_phongs par 'gyur ba de ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' dag sems can rnams la mi sbyin 
[\[54a.5\]]pa gang yang med de/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gtong ba zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gtong ba chen po gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' gtong ba phun sum tshogs nas gtong ba chen po byed de/_'di lta ste chung ma dang /_bu dang /_bu mo dang /_
[\[54a.6\]]yid du 'ong ba'i bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba dang /_khyim dang /_rgyal srid rnams yongs su gtong ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i gtong ba chen po zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shin tu gtong ba gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub 
[\[54a.7\]]sems dpa' gtong ba dang gtong ba chen po phun sum tshogs nas shin tu gtong ba byed de/_'di lta ste/_lag pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_sha dang /_rus pa dang /_pags pa dang /_mig dang /_lce dang /_mgo rus dang /_rkang la sogs pa yongs su gtong ba ste/_'di ni byang chub 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]sems dpa'i shin tu gtong ba zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' des gtong ba dang /_gtong ba chen po dang shin tu gtong ba de dag rjes su dran nas/_bdag gis kyang dran pa de dag yongs su rdzogs par bya'o snyam pa de ni de'i gtong ba rjes su dran pa zhes bya ste/_'di ni byang chub 
[\[54b.2\]]sems dpa'i gtong ba rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i lha rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni gang rnam par dag pa'i lha/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[54b.3\]]dpa' dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag rjes su dran no/_/'di ltar de dag rjes su dran te/_bsgrub pa dang yon tan dang /_skye ba dang longs spyod dang /_kun dpyod pa dang /_rtsom pa dang /_rab tu 'thob pa dang /_yongs su 'grub pas kyang rjes su dran pa 'di ni lha rjes su 
[\[54b.4\]]dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o/_/gang lha gzhan de dag kyang rjes su dran no/_/'di ltar de dag rjes su dran te lha 'di dag ni las dge ba'i 'bras bu las byung ba'o/_/dge ba'i las de dag ni 'di lta ste/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mi dge ba las bzlog pa rnams so/_/
[\[54b.5\]]de las lha gang rnams kha dog dang ldan pa/_bde ba mang ba/_dbang po tshim pa/_de dag thams cad ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi rnam par smin pa'o snyam ste/_de la byang chub sems dpa' lha'i bde ba de la rjes su yi rang nas sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir bla na med pa 
[\[54b.6\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/_/lha'i bde ba de yang sems can thams cad kyir 'dod do/_/bde ba de sems can thams cad kyir 'dod pas dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su grub par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus chen po rtsom mo/_/ngan song rnams su skyes 
[\[54b.7\]]pa'i sems can dag la snying rje chen po rnyed de/_de 'di snyam du bdag gis 'di ltar sems can thams cad lha'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba'i las byed du gzud do/_/sems can gang dag lhar gyur pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/_/gang gis sems can rnams lha'i bde ba thob nas phyis nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /_bde bar gyur nas 'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba'i bde ba thob par 'gyur ba'i las de dag sems can rnams byed 
[\[55a.2\]]du gzhug go snyam du sems pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i lha rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya ste/_rigs kyi bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bcu'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsom pa med kyis de'i 
[\[55a.3\]]tshe don de nyid tshigs su bcad pa dag gis smras pa/_gang phyir sdug bsngal ma gtogs par/_/stong pa nyid ni mi dmigs pas/_/sdug bsngal sdug bsngal mi lta ste/_/sdug bsngal stong par blta bar bya/_/stong pa nyid ni lta 'dod pas/_/sdug bsngal yang dag blta bar 
[\[55a.4\]]bya/_/sdug bsngal stong pa nyid kyi don/_/stong pa de ni 'dus ma byas/_/sdug bsngal byas pa ma yin pas/_/sdug bsngal la ni byed pa med/_/sdug bsngal bral ba'i byed pa po/_/ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te sdug bsngal yang dag tu/_/kun nas sgrib pa med 
[\[55a.5\]]gyur te/_/gal te sdug bsngal byas min na/_/'di la kun 'byung ga la yod/_/sdug bsngal la ni 'ong med de/_/gang du yang ni 'gro min na/_/gang gis de yi chags 'byung ba/_/sdug bsngal med na ga la yod/_/gal te sdug bsngal kun 'byung ste/_/sred pa kun 'byung bshad 
[\[55a.6\]]na ni/_/sred can sred yod ma yin na/_/med na kun 'byung ji ltar 'gyur/_/sdug bsngal la ni 'ong med de/_/'ong ba med na ci zhig 'gro/_/'ong dang 'gro ba med par ni/_/'gog pa zhi ba zhes bstan to/_/chos rnams ngo bo nyid kyis zhi/_/rtsa ba dag cing 'od kyang gsal/_/'gog 
[\[55a.7\]]po dang ni chos rnams mtshungs/_/thams cad mtha' gnyis rab tu spangs/_/sngon du skyes pa'i chos rnams kyang /_/de ma thag tu 'gag par 'gyur/_/'gag pa med par skye ba med/_/skye ba med par zad pa med/_/de ltar gang gi blo tshol ba/_/de ni chags med zad med lam/_/
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]lam ni gzings dang 'dra bar bstan/_/mdor na gzings ni spang bar bya/_/gang bsags spang bar bya ba yi/_/chos de la ni ci zhig dga'/_/lam spangs thang la gnas pa de/_/rnal 'byor pa ni grol zhes brjod/_/des ni lam gyi ye shes kyis/_/gang phyir chos kun bsgoms 
[\[55b.2\]]pas na/_/grol ba'i mtshan nyid rab bstan pa/_/de ni gang du'ang rtsod pa med/_/skra dang ba spu sen mo so/_/sha dang rus pa khrag dang zhag_/tshil dang shas rgyas phyi sa dang /_/mkhris pa bad kan klad pa dang /_/mtsher pa rgyus pa gnye ma dang /_/gcin gyi phung po lus zhes brjod/_/rnal 
[\[55b.3\]]'byor pas ni lus rnams la/_/yod min kun brtags tsam du mthong /_/'di la byed dang tshor ba dang /_/mthong ba po ni gang yang med/_/lus zhes bya bar rang bzhin gyis/_/grong stong dang ni 'dra ba'o/_/tshor ba myong bar rab bstan pa/_/tshor ba po las tshor ba gzhan/_/gud na 
[\[55b.4\]]yod pa ma yin na/_/gang gis de ni myong bar 'gyur/_/byang chub ci 'dra de bzhin du/_/zhi zhing dag la 'od gsal bar/_/tshor ba 'di la mkhas rnams kyis/_/dran pa de la nye bar gzhag_/lus las sems ni mi mthong ste/_/sems la yang ni sems de bzhin/_/de ltar shes nas 
[\[55b.5\]]'khrug pa med/_/grol ba po ni dga' ba'ang med/_/sems tsam du ni rab mthong ste/_/kun tu rtog pa kun spangs kyang /_/sgrib pa med pa'i spyod yul can/_/rnal 'byor gtong ba'ang ma yin no/_/chos rnams rang 'byung ma yin te/_/gang gis kyang ni bsgrubs pa med/_/grangs med 
[\[55b.6\]]cing ni yi ge med/_/de ni nam mkha' 'dra ba'i mtshan/_/chos 'di rtogs par khong chud nas/_/chos shes pa yi rnal 'byor can/_/mnyam pa nyid la rab gnas pa/_/'jug pa med cing ldog pa'ang med/_/gang gis chos dran 'di 'dra ste/_/thams cad chos las mi g.yo ba/_/de dag 
[\[55b.7\]]pha rol phyin pa brtan/_/sangs rgyas bstan la sbyin pa sbyong /_/sangs rgyas don rnams kun la mkhas/_/sgrib pa kun gyi dri ma med/_/dkar po thams cad yang dag spyod/_/sems can kun la phan par bzhed/_/rigs dang gzugs dang yon tan las/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]mkhas pa gang /_/yang dag dran pa de dag ni/_/dkar po'i chos kyis rab tu rgyas/_/gang zhig rtag tu mnyam gzhag cing /_/chos la dran pa mi g.yeng ba/_/des ni 'das dang ma 'ongs pa'i/_/sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byas/_/dam pa'i chos la brten 
[\[56a.2\]]chos can/_/chos rjes dran pa spyod yul ba/_/byang chub sems dpa' brtul zhugs brtan/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub rtogs par 'gyur/_/chos rnams ci 'dra de bzhin du/_/bdag 'gyur snyam du gang dran pa/_/byang chub sems dpa' mnyam gzhag des/_/chos dran pa 'di shes 
[\[56a.3\]]par bya/_/nga yi med cing ngar 'dzin med/_/chos rnams ci 'dra de ltar bdag_/'gyur ro snyam du dran pa ni/_/chos rjes dran pa 'di bsgom yin/_/bla na med pa bsod nams zhing /_/dge 'dun sangs rgyas slob ma rnams/_/sangs rgyas byang chub 'gyur ba dag_/rtag tu yang dag 
[\[56a.4\]]rjes su dran/_/rgya mtsho lta bur dpag dka' rnams/_/bdag gis rjes su dran pa yi/_/bsod nams rab tu gang bsags des/_/sems can de bzhin gshegs gyur cig_/mi ldog ngang tshul can rnams kyi/_/tshul khrims yang dag rjes dran pa/_/sems can kun la 
[\[56a.5\]]phan sems pa/_/mchog gi bsod nams gang bskyed pa/_/sems can rnams la phan 'dod phyir/_/de dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsngo/_/sems can kun la phan byed pa/_/de ni tshul khrims dran zhes bya/_/zang zing med pas chos btang dang /_/nyon mongs spangs pa'i gang dge 
[\[56a.6\]]ba/_/sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/snying rje'i bdag nyid sngo bar byed/_/gtong ba rjes dran phun sum tshogs/_/zhing dang skye la rab gnas pa/_/mtshan ma med cing rtsol med par/_/nyi ma bzhin du kun du shar/_/lha rnams kun gyi dge ba gang /_/dge ba'i las las rab byung 
[\[56a.7\]]ba/_/bde der sems can thams cad phyir/_/snying rje'i bdag nyid de ltar 'dod/_/gang gis 'jig rten lhar gyur nas/_/sangs rgyas bla na med gyur pa/_/bde ba de dag rtag tu bya/_/bdag gis de lta de ltar bsgrub//_//bam po lnga pa/_de nas byang chub sems 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsom pa med dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rnam par gnon dang gnyi ga g.yog dang bcas te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas lhags pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_lan 
[\[56b.2\]]du ma bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/_g.yog dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/_skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gnyis 'dir gcig tu 
[\[56b.3\]]'dus nas chos yang dag par brjod pa bgyis na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mkhyen pa'am/_mi rig pa'am/_rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' ba lags na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gnyis kyis chos yang dag par brjod pa dang 'thun 
[\[56b.4\]]pa bgyis pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag de de bzhin te/_ji skad smras pa de lta'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mkhyen pa'am/_mi rig pa'am/_rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad tsam yang mi mnga' ste/_sangs rgyas 
[\[56b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thams cad du sgrib pa mi mnga' ba'i ye shes can te/_rigs kyi bu khyed gnyis kyis chos yang dag par brjod pa dang 'thun par byas so/_/rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gang ci smra ba dang /_kun smra ba de thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs 
[\[56b.6\]]pa'i byin gyis brlabs su rig par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu dag legs so legs so/_/ji ltar khyod gnyis kyis byas pa de bzhin du chos yang dag par brjod par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu khyed gnyis kyis chos yang dag par brjod pa 'dis sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas so/_/de bzhin 
[\[56b.7\]]gshegs pa yang khyed gnyis kyis chos yang dag par brjod pa la rjes su yi rang ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod ci'i phyir rtsom pa med ces bya/_byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]smras pa/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi las kyi mtha' ni shin tu byang ba/_bya ba thams cad la mi chags pa/_gang yang mi tshol ba/_cung zad kyang spang bar mi 'dod pa/_thob par mi 'dod pa/_
[\[57a.2\]]'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba de bzhin nyid du mnyam par mthong ba/_tha ma dang /_'bring dang /_rab kyi chos cung zad kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ni rtsom pa med ces bya'o/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni gzod ma nas med 
[\[57a.3\]]par gyur na rtsom pa med pa'o/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te chos 'ga' zhig gzod ma nas yod par gyur na ni de brtsam par bya na chos gang yang gzod ma nas yod pa ma yin te/_gzod ma nas med pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni brtsams pa med pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[57a.4\]]shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/_de lta yin na khyod kyis chos yang dag par brjod pa de ji ltar byas/_byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu brtsams pa med pa nyid bdag gis chos yang dag par brjod pa byas pa'o/_/btsun pa shA ra dwa 
[\[57a.5\]]ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_gang khyod kyis dri ba dris pa 'di ci khyod kyis 'di brtsams te dris sam/_'on te ma brtsams par dris/_de gal te khyod kyis brtsams te dris na ni ci la rten te brtsams/_gang rtsom pa dang bcas pa de ni 'dri ba ma yin no/_/rtsom pa 
[\[57a.6\]]yang gzhan la 'dri ba yang gzhan zhes ni bya bar mi 'thad do/_/ci ste ma brtsams par dris na ni khyod gtam 'di la zhugs pa yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/_rigs kyi bu gang bdag dang khyod kyi brjod pa de ji ltar blta bar bya/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[57a.7\]]rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/_dper na sgyu ma sprul pa'i brjod pa ji lta bar de bzhin nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i brjod pa yang de ltar blta bar bya'o/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sgyu ma sprul pa la ni sems dang 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]sems las byung ba'i chos rnams med do/_/gang la sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams med pa de ci zhig rtsom par 'gyur/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sgyu ma mkhan gyi 'phen pa'i dbang gis sgyu ma sprul pa'i brjod pa 'byung ba ji lta bar de bzhin nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings la gnas 
[\[57b.2\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i brjod pa yang de ltar blta bar bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/_rigs kyi bu sgyu ma sprul pa ni byung ba yang ma yin/_ma byung ba yang ma yin na/_ci khyod kyang byung ba yang ma yin/_ma byung ba yang ma yin nam/_byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa 
[\[57b.3\]]med kyis smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas rab tu ma bshad dam/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/_de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[57b.4\]]sangs rgyas nas rab tu bshad do/_/byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu ji ltar sgyu ma byung ba yang ma yin/_ma byung ba yang ma yin pa de bzhin du sgyu ma lta bu'i chos de dag thams cad kyang byung ba yang ma yin/_ma byung ba yang ma yin par blta 
[\[57b.5\]]bar mi bya'am/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu gal te byung ba'am/_ma byung ba zhig yod na ni sgyu ma lta bur yang bstan par mi 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod su'i ched du spyod/_byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni don 
[\[57b.6\]]nam don ma yin pa'i ched la yang mi spyod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang don gyi ched la spyod pa de ni dmigs pa la spyod pa'o/_/dmigs pa la spyod pa de ni sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dmigs pa la spyod pa de ni rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa yang mi 
[\[57b.7\]]'thob ste/_bzod pa med na sangs rgyas mnyes par byed pa ma yin no/_/'on te don ma yin pa'i ched la spyod na ni log par lta ba la spyod pa'o/_/log par lta ba ni don med pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/_rigs kyi bu gang dag don dang don ma yin pa'i ched la mi 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]spyod pa de dag gang du spyod/_byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la spyod pa de nyid la de dag spyod do/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la spyod/_byang chub 
[\[58a.2\]]sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams gang la spyod pa de nyid la byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang spyod mod kyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[58a.3\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rnams gang la spyod pa de nyid la bdag cag kyang spyod do snyam du mi sems so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/_rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi yul la ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi go skabs med pa ni/_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[58a.4\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams gang la spyod pa de nyid la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyang spyod de 'di ni 'gal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi yul shes sam/_shA ri'i bus smras pa/_sbrang bu 'dra ba bdag lta bus 
[\[58a.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi yul shes par ga la nus mod kyi/_'on kyang rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa las thos nas ni nyan thos rnams kyis kyang shes te/_rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi yul ni mtha' yas mu med do/_/sangs rgyas kyi yul las rnam par grol ba'i yul ni gang yang med 
[\[58a.6\]]do/_/byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu gal te sangs rgyas kyi yul las rnam par grol ba'i yul med na ci'i phyir khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi go skabs med ces smras/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/_
[\[58a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni 'jig rten gyi yul las yang dag par 'das pa'o/_/byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni 'jig rten nyid ni spyod pa'o/_/de bas na sangs rgyas kyi yul la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi go skabs med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_de bzhin gshegs pas ci zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas gang du bzhugs nas su'i don mdzad/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu gang de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa'i chos gang yang med de/_
[\[58b.2\]]chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams kyi don mdzad cing 'dus byas nyid la spyod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/_gal te de ltar shes na ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi yul las yang dag par 'das 
[\[58b.3\]]zhes smras/_de ni gnas brtan shA ri'i bus khong du ma chud do/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu gal te de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten gyi yul las yang dag par 'das su zin na de bzhin gshegs pas ci zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing /_gang du bzhugs nas 
[\[58b.4\]]su'i don mdzad par 'gyur te/_'di la gnas brtan shA ri'i bus smras pa ni shin tu nyams so/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsom pa med la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu bdag ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi 
[\[58b.5\]]sems dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes las shin tu nyams shing /_nyan thos kyi sa la yang shin tu gnas pas bdag ni sngon nas kyang nyams so/_/rigs kyi bu bdag ni khyod kyi spobs pa 'di la rjes su yi rang ngo /_/sems can thams cad kyang khyod kyi spobs pa 'di 
[\[58b.6\]]lta bu thob par gyur cig_/gtam brjod pa 'di bstan pa na byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/lha'i bu drug stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med par rnam par dag go/_/dge slong lnga stong ni nyan thos kyi 
[\[58b.7\]]sems las log nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa rnams su byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes lung bstan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsom pa med kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar na gzung ba dang 'dzin pa la mkhas pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang gi tshe byang 
[\[59a.2\]]chub sems dpa' rnams kyis thams cad yang dag par shes pa de'i tshe gzung ba dang 'dzin pa la mkhas pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das thams cad ji ltar shes par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi 
[\[59a.3\]]bu rmi lam dang /_sgyu ma dang /_dri za'i grong khyer dang /_smig rgyu dang /_mgal me bskor ba dang /_skra shad 'dzings pa dang /_sprul pa dang /_brag ca dang /_gzugs brnyan lta bur thams cad blta bar bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[59a.4\]]gang rmi lam dang /_sgyu ma dang /_dri za'i grong khyer dang /_smig rgyu dang /_mgal me bskor ba dang /_skra shad 'dzings pa dang /_sprul pa dang /_brag ca dang /_gzugs brnyan lta bur blta ba thams cad gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu thams cad 
[\[59a.5\]]ces bya ba ni mig dang /_gzugs dang /_rna ba dang sgra dang /_sna dang dri dang /_lce dang ro dang /_lus dang reg bya dang /_yid dang chos rnams te/_rigs kyi bu de dag ni gang rmi lam dang /_sgyu ma dang /_dri za'i grong khyer dang /_smig rgyu dang /_mgal me bskor ba dang /_skra shad 'dzings pa lta 
[\[59a.6\]]bu dang /_sprul pa dang /_brag ca dang /_gzugs brnyan lta bur blta bar bya ba'i shes pa thams cad do/_/de la 'dzin pa ni mig dang /_rna ba dang sna dang /_lce dang lus dang /_yid rnams so/_/gzung ba ni gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang ro dang /_reg bya dang chos rnams te/_gzung ba dang 
[\[59a.7\]]'dzin pa'i chos 'di dag rnam pa dang /_tshul thams cad kyis shes pa dang /_khong du chud pa dang /_ston nus pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa gang yin pa de ni bag la nyal ba med pa nyon mongs pa med pa/_ngar 'dzin pa med pa/_nga yir 'dzin pa 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]med pa/_nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/_mi 'gyur ba/_sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa/_sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_thams cad du dben pa'i sems dang ldan pa thams cad du lhun gyis grub pa/_lhun gyis grub pa'i chos can sems can 
[\[59b.2\]]gyi snying po sems can thams cad kyi don la sgrib pa med pa'i chos can/_snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/_mi bskyod pa'i chos can/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sangs 
[\[59b.3\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid 'di khong du chud par 'tshal bas ji lta bur bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid 'di khong du chud par 'dod pas sems can thams cad kyis ngan du byas pa dang /_
[\[59b.4\]]mi snyan pa thams cad bzod par bya ba'i phyir sems sa dang mtshungs par bya'o/_/bdag dang sems can gzhan rnams kyi rtog pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa'i nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad bkru ba'i phyir sems chu dang mtshungs par bya'o/_/shes rab kyis bdag dang sems can gzhan rnams 
[\[59b.5\]]kyi las dang /_nyon mongs pa'i rtsi shing bsreg pa'i phyir sems me dang mtshungs par bya'o/_/chags pa thams cad dang dbral ba'i phyir sems rlung dang mtshungs par bya'o/_/thams cad du sgrib pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs par bya'o/_/thams cad du 
[\[59b.6\]]'jigs pa med cing skrag pa med pas byang chub sems dpas seng ge dang mtshungs par bya'o/_/shin tu dul ba'i sems kyis sems can thams cad kyi khur khyer ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpas glang po che dang mtshungs par bya'o/_/dam pa'i chos kyi char 'bebs pa'i phyir byang chub 
[\[59b.7\]]sems dpas sprin lta bur bya'o/_/sems can thams cad la ye shes kyis snang bar byed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas nyi ma lta bur bya'o/_/thams cad du sems can thams cad la rtag tu bde bar snang ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpas zla ba lta bur bya'o/_/thams cad mkhyen 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]pa'i ye shes kyis rin po che'i gling chen por phyogs pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas ded dpon lta bur bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad gso ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpas sman pa lta bur bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi chos la the 
[\[60a.2\]]tshom za ba'i zug rngu 'don pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas zug rngu 'byin pa lta bur bya'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phyogs la mkhas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas gdos pa 'dzin pa lta bur bya'o/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las sems can sgrol ba la mkhas pa'i phyir byang chub 
[\[60a.3\]]sems dpas gru lta bur bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas stegs lta bur bya'o/_/sems can thams cad mtshungs par 'jug pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas lam po che lta bur bya'o/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rin po che thams cad 
[\[60a.4\]]phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas rin po che'i gling lta bur bya'o/_/yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'dra bar bsam pa thams cad yongs su skong ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpas yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bur bya'o/_/legs par byas pa'i las byed pa'i phyir byang chub 
[\[60a.5\]]sems dpas cang shes su bya'o/_/shes rab zab cing gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpas rgya mtsho lta bur bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las bsam pa mi g.yo ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpas ri rab dang mtshungs par bya'o/_/kun nas mdzes pa'i phyir byang chub sems 
[\[60a.6\]]dpas dpag bsam gyi shing lta bur bya'o/_/mthong bar dka' ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpas 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser 'dra bar bya'o/_/chos la dbang thob pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas brgya byin lta bur bya'o/_/rab tu zhi ba'i spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir byang chub 
[\[60a.7\]]sems dpas tshangs pa lta bur bya'o/_/dam pa'i chos yongs su skyong ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpas 'jig rten skyong ba lta bur bya'o/_/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bsten pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas 'khor los sgyur ba lta bur bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]rnams kyi gsang ba 'dzin pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas blon po chen po lta bur bya'o/_/dge sbyong la gnas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas mngon par 'byung ba la dga' bar bya'o/_/lus dang ngag dang sems zhi ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpas dge sbyong du bya'o/_/bsam gtan 
[\[60b.2\]]dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang mngon par shes pa dang rig pa dang rnam par grol ba phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas dgon pa par bya'o/_/stong pa nyid rtogs pa khong du chud pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas bsam gtan par bya'o/_/mi'am ci dang lto 
[\[60b.3\]]'phye chen po dang rig sngags 'chang grub pa 'dul ba la mkhas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas dben pa la mngon par dga' bar bya'o/_/rig pa gsum rtogs par khong du chud pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas rig sngags 'chang du bya'o/_/mngon par shes pa drug thob pa'i phyir byang chub 
[\[60b.4\]]sems dpas mngon par shes pa'i ye shes su bya'o/_/phung po dang khams dang skye mched la mkhas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas mang du thos par bya'o/_/bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas slob dpon du bya'o/_/zang zing med par chos ston pa'i 
[\[60b.5\]]phyir byang chub sems dpas chos smra bar bya'o/_/'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug btul ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpas 'dul ba 'dzin par bya'o/_/thams cad du rung ba la tshod shes pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas ma mo 'dzin par bya'o/_/tshol ba thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir 
[\[60b.6\]]byang chub sems dpas dul bar bya'o/_/'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpas mi rgod par bya'o/_/zhe sdang dang bral ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpas ma khengs par bya'o/_/gti mug dang bral ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpas mu cor mi smra bar bya'o/_/ngag bsdams 
[\[60b.7\]]pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas tshig 'chol bar mi smra bar bya'o/_/theg pa chen po la 'dzud pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas ded dpon du bya'o/_/byang chub tu dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas khur rtsa ba 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]lta bur bya'o/_/sems can thams cad brten pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas skyed mos tshal 'dra bar bya'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi zong yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas grong khyer lta bur bya'o/_/sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du byams pa dang ldan pa'i phyir 
[\[61a.2\]]byang chub sems dpas phan pa 'dod par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyis ci bya ba yongs su thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpas bran lta bur bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rmu rgod dag la drang ba rnams yin no/_/khengs pa dag 
[\[61a.3\]]la nga rgyal med pa rnams yin no/_/g.yo can dag la g.yo med pa rnams yin no/_/thibs po spyod pa dag la sgyu med pa dang ldan pa rnams yin no/_/log par zhugs pa dag la snying rje dang ldan pa rnams yin no/_/ngo tsha med pa dag la ngo tsha dang ldan pa rnams yin no/_/mu 
[\[61a.4\]]cor smra ba dag la khrel yod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/_/phas kyi rgol ba thams cad la sems spa ma gong ba rnams yin no/_/'khor thams cad la bag tsha ba med pa rnams yin no/_/'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis mi gos pa rnams yin no/_/bdud thams cad 
[\[61a.5\]]kyis mi 'phrog pa rnams yin no/_/phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi thul ba rnams yin no/_/bla ma dag la gus pa dang bcas pa rnams yin no/_/'phags pa dag la zhe sa dang bcas pa rnams yin no/_/mang du thos pa dag la ri mor byed pa rnams yin no/_/bsam gtan 
[\[61a.6\]]pa dag la ngo mtshar thob pa rnams yin no/_/mkhas pa dag la lhag pa'i bsam pa 'jug pa rnams yin no/_/chos smra ba dag la sangs rgyas tsam du phangs par sems pa dang ldan pa rnams yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' dag la skyabs su song ba rnams yin no/_/sangs 
[\[61a.7\]]rgyas dag la bsam pa thams cad kyis zhugs pa rnams yin no/_/nan tan dag la snying por 'du shes pa rnams yin no/_/nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi 'jigs pa rnams yin no/_/snying rje chen po la phyogs pas mya ngan las 'das pa la mi lta ba rnams yin no/_/sems 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa la mngon par dga' bas 'khor ba la phyogs pa rnams yin no/_/rnyed pa dang bkur sti thams cad la mi lta bas zang zing med par chos ston pa rnams yin no/_/mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang bdag med pa dang mi gtsang ba yongs 
[\[61b.2\]]su shes pas sems phyin ci ma log pa rnams yin no/_/yul thams cad la mi lta bas sems rnam par grol ba rnams yin no/_/'phags pa'i rigs su skyes pas rigs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/_/rab tu byung ba mang bas blo phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/_/sdug 
[\[61b.3\]]bsngal dang kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang /_lam shes pas 'phags pa rnams yin no/_/tshul khrims dang /_thos pa dang /_bag yod pa la gnas pas skyes bu dam pa rnams yin no/_/'du byed bdag med par yongs su shes pa dang ldan pas sems can thams cad la 
[\[61b.4\]]sems mnyam pa rnams yin no/_/'phags pa'i phyag rgyas btab pas log par mi ltung ba'i chos can rnams yin no/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgyas btab pas byang chub kyi snying por gzhol ba rnams yin no/_/spyod lam mdzes pa phun sum tshogs pas byang chub sems 
[\[61b.5\]]dpa' rtag tu gtsang ma yang dag par spyod pa rnams yin no/_/'jig rten gyi gsang tshig la mngon par dga' ba ma yin no/_/sdig pa'i grogs po la mngon par dga' ba ma yin no/_/rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa la mngon par dga' ba ma yin no/_/'du 'dzi 
[\[61b.6\]]dag la chags pa ma yin no/_/yul rgyus kyi gtam dang /_rgyal po'i gtam dang /_chom rkun gyi gtam dang /_bud med kyi gtam dang /_bzhad gad kyi gtam dang /_dmag gi gtam dang /_'thab cing rtsod pa'i gtam la chags pa ma yin no/_/yul ngan pa dang /_ljongs ngan pa dang /_
[\[61b.7\]]yul 'khor ngan pa dang /_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_tshong 'dus dang /_ri brags ngan pa rnams la chags pa ma yin no/_/gar dang /_bro dang /_bzhad gad dang /_glu la chags pa ma yin no/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can ser sna can rnams la chags pa 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]ma yin no/_/tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams dang /_mtshams so sor bcad pa rnams dang /_rgyun sman du gyur pa rnams la chags pa ma yin no/_/gnod sems kyi tha ba dang /_zhe sdang mang ba rnams la chags pa ma yin no/_/le lo can rnams dang /_brtson 
[\[62a.2\]]'grus chung zhing brtson 'grus btang ba rnams la chags pa ma yin no/_/g.yeng zhing phyin ci log tu gyur la rnam par 'phro ba'i sems la chags pa ma yin no/_/shes rab 'chal pa rnams dang /_blun pa lkugs pa'i rang bzhin can rnams la chags pa ma yin no/_/byang chub 
[\[62a.3\]]sems dpa' rnams ni chos dang /_zang zing dang /_mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba yin no/_/'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug yang dag par chad pa'o/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/_sgra bsnyungs pa la dga' ba'o/_/tshig mi mang zhing 
[\[62a.4\]]dul ba'o/_/zhi zhing nye bar zhi ba la dben pa dang /_nags tshal thibs po dang /_rtswa dang /_shing dang /_ldam ldum yod pa dang /_sa khyon chung ngu dang /_chu ngogs dang /_ri khrod dang /_phug sna tshogs dang /_ri dang /_rdo dang /_rtse mo dang /_g.ye'i phyogs rnams la mngon par dga' ba yin 
[\[62a.5\]]no/_/zhi ba dang /_rab tu zhi ba dang /_nye bar zhi ba'i phyogs de dag la rab tu dga' ba yin te/_gnas bcas pa'i phyogs de dang de dag tu nam gyi cha stod dang /_nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar rnal 'byor la brtson par gnas pa dang /_thos pa dang /_sems pa dang /_sgom pa stug 
[\[62a.6\]]po'i mthong na gnas pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs dang /_dbang dang /_bzod pa'i sgo brgya stong la rnam par rgyu ba dang /_chos kyi sgo brgya stong dpag tu med pa dag rab tu rnam par 'byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas brgya stong yang mthong ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi 
[\[62a.7\]]sgo brgya stong yang thob pa dang /_gzungs kyi sgo brgya stong yang mngon du byed pa dang /_sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yang yongs su smin par byed pa de lta bu de dag la mngon par dga' ba yin te/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas de 'dra bar bya'o/_/de lta bus ni sangs 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid khong du chud par nus so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsom pa med kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po ni bag mchis par gnas shing sgrub pa nyid snying por bgyid pa 
[\[62b.2\]]rnams kyi lags so/_/de la sgrub pa ni byang chub tu smon pa'o/_/bag mchis pa ni smon lam yongs su skong ba'o/_/gzhan yang sgrub pa ni sbyin pa la sbyor ba'o/_/bag mchis pa ni rnam par smin pa la mi re ba'o/_/sgrub pa ni tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa ma nyams pa'o/_/
