[\[83b.3\]]bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_gang na nyon mongs pa mchis pa de na byang chub mchis shing nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa la byang chub kyang ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/stong pa nyid dang nyon mongs pa ni mi gnyis te gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub dang 
[\[83b.4\]]nyon mongs pa ni mi gnyis te gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so/_/gzhan du na phyin ci log tu lhung ba'i sems kyi rgyun gyis byis pa so so'i skya bo rnams bdag ni nyon mongs so/_/rnam par dag go snyam du 'tshal ba ni ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das yang 
[\[83b.5\]]dag par bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni nyon mongs pa yang mi sel nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa yang mi sgrub bo/_/byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i sgo la so sor rtog pa ni ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo 'thob bo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bas na nyon mongs 
[\[83b.6\]]pa nyid byang chub sems dpa' dag gi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi rigs lags so/_/nyon mongs pa de dag la g.yengs shing phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i blo can byis pa de dag ni ngan song du gzhol ba sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni yang dag par 
[\[83b.7\]]so sor rtog pas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub khong du chud do/_/bcom ldan 'das de bas na byang chub sems dpas rgyun las bzlog ste/_'jug par bgyi rgyun gyi rjes su 'jug par mi bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ni mya ngan las 'das pa las rnam 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]par grol gyi/_'khor ba las ni ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan las 'das pa la 'jigs par bgyi'o/_/'khor ba la ni ma lags so/_/'khor ba la so sor brtags na sems can rnams la snying rje chen po 'thob bo/_/
[\[84a.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang 'thob bo/_/mya ngan las 'das pa la yongs su brtags na 'khor ba la zhe 'gras par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba la zhe 'gras pa ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las yongs su nyams so/_/'khor ba na gnas pa rnams la byang chub sems 
[\[84a.3\]]dpa'i byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po skye'i/_mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa rnams la ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba ni yang dag pa ma lags pa yongs su rtog pa rab tu zhi ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags so/_/
[\[84a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das de bas na mya ngan las 'das pa tshol ba'i byang chub sems dpas yongs su rtog pa nye bar zhi ba btsal bar bgyi ste/_de las mya ngan las 'da' ba 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni chos yang dag par brjod pa lags so//_//bam po 
[\[84a.5\]]bdun pa ste tha ma/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos shin tu mang po la bslab par mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas chos 
[\[84a.6\]]gcig rab tu bzung zhing rab tu rtogs par bgyis na/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de'i lag mthil du mchis pa lags so/_/chos gcig po gang zhe na/_'di lta ste snying rje chen po'o/_/bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen pos ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams 
[\[84a.7\]]cad byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lag mthil du mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i 'khor lo rin po che gang du mchi ba der dpung gi tshogs thams cad mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]sems dpa'i snying rje chen po gang du mchi ba der sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper na gdugs shar na sems can rnams kyi bgyi ba thams cad shin du mang bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du snying rje chen po gang du shar bar 
[\[84b.2\]]gyur pa der byang chub bgyid pa'i chos kyi bgyi ba gzhan rnams kyang shin du mang bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper na srog gi dbang po mchis na dbang po gzhan rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du snying rje chen po mchis na byang chub bgyid 
[\[84b.3\]]pa'i chos gzhan rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni chos yang dag par brjod pa lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa ni chos rnams kyi rtsa ba ste/_gang la bsam pa ma 
[\[84b.4\]]mchis pa de la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ring ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa la ni gal te sangs rgyas mi bzhugs na yang nam mkha'i dkyil dang /_rtsig pa dang /_shing rnams las chos 'byung ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dag pa ni 
[\[84b.5\]]rang gi yid kyi dpyod pa nyid las gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa thams cad 'byung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das de bas na byang chub sems dpas bsam pa phun sum tshogs par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper na gang la rkang pa mchis pa de la 'gro ba mchis so/_/
[\[84b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang la bsam pa mchis pa de la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper na yan lag gi dam pa mgo gang la mchis pa de la 'tsho ba mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bsam pa gang la mchis pa de 
[\[84b.7\]]la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper na gang la 'tsho ba mchis pa de la rnyed pa mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang la bsam pa mchis pa de la sangs rgyas rnyed pa mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper na zhugs 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]shing mchis na zhugs 'bar gyi zhugs shing ma mchis na zhugs mi 'bar ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bsam pa mchis pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'bar gyi bsam pa ma mchis pa la mi 'bar ro/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di 
[\[85a.2\]]lta ste/_dper na sprin chags na char 'bab kyi/_sprin ma chags na char mi 'bab po/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bsam pa mchis na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'byung gi bsam pa ma mchis na mi 'byung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper na zhugs shing gang rtsa 
[\[85a.3\]]ba nyams pa de la me tog dang 'bras bu rnams mi 'khrung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang bsam pa log par zhugs pa de dag la dge ba'i chos thams cad mi 'byung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tshol bas rang gi 
[\[85a.4\]]bsam pa shin tu gzung ba dang /_shin tu bsrung ba dang /_shin tu sbyang bar bgyi ste/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni chos yang dag par brjod pa lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzang gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas chos gang yang 'khrugs 
[\[85a.5\]]par mi bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas rang gi sems shin tu gzung bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni rang gi sems la rag las pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang chos 
[\[85a.6\]]'ga' zhig 'khrugs par bgyid na/_de tshegs chen pos mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gang yang 'khrugs par mi bgyid pa dang /_bsam gtan du bgyid pa de ma nyams par gnas pa ste/_de bzhin 
[\[85a.7\]]gshegs pa rnams la nongs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/rang gi sems las sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu rtogs te/_sems de yang 'khrugs par mi bgyid do/_/ji ltar sems de rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang rten cing 'brel 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]bar 'byung bar mthong ngo /_/ji ltar sems de sgyu ma lta bur mthong ba de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang sgyu ma lta bur mthong ngo /_/ji ltar sems de nang dang /_phyi rol dang /_gnyi ga ma mchis par yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de bzhin du chos thams cad yang dag par rjes 
[\[85b.2\]]su mi mthong ngo /_/ji ltar sems de gzugs ma mchis/_bstan du ma mchis/_thogs pa ma mchis/_snang ba ma mchis/_rnam par rig pa ma mchis/_rten pa ma mchis/_gnas ma mchis par mthong ba de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang mthong ngo /_/de ltar mthong ba'i byang 
[\[85b.3\]]chub sems dpa' ni sems snyoms pa nyid thob bo/_/de sems snyoms pa nyid thob pas yang mi rtog_/mi ldog mi 'dor/_mi 'dzin mi smon to/_/gang mi smon pa de mi 'dzin to/_/gang mi 'dzin pa de yongs su mi 'dzin te/_yang nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro/_/nyon mongs pa 
[\[85b.4\]]ma mchis pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis ston te/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni chos yang dag par brjod pa lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas gang gis sems 
[\[85b.5\]]can rnams la gnod par 'gyur ba'i tshig de smra bar mi bgyi'o/_/gang gis gzhan la gdung bar 'gyur ba'i tshig de smra bar mi bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang gzhan gyis 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ba'i tshig de smra bar mi bgyi'o/_/gang gzhan gyi don ma lags pa dang /_don ma mchis 
[\[85b.6\]]pa'i tshig de smra bar mi bgyi'o/_/gang gis rig pa mi skyed pa'i tshig de smra bar mi bgyi'o/_/gang sems can rnams kyi snying la mi 'bab pa dang /_'khor go ba ma lags pa dang /_rnar mi snyan pa'i tshig de smra bar mi bgyi'o/_/gang gnyis la spyod par 'gyur ba'i tshig de smra bar mi 
[\[85b.7\]]bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas gang stong pa nyid khong du chud par mi 'gyur ba'i tshig de smra bar mi bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_gang stong pa nyid khong du chud par bgyid pa'i tshig de ni tshig thams cad kyi mchog go/_/bcom ldan 'das gang chos thams cad 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]stong pa dang /_g.yo ba ma mchis pa dang /_mi gnyis pa dang /_gnyis dang bral bar mthong yang sems can gyi bgyi ba thams cad kyang mi 'dor ba 'di ni de'i sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i snying rje chen po lags so/_/yang sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i snying rje chen pos spyod 
[\[86a.2\]]pa de sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa rnams la slob bo/_/gang sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa rnams la slob pa de ni nam mkha'i mdzod 'thob bo/_/de nas nam mkha'i mdzod thob pas ci 'tshal ba rnams yongs su gtong bar bgyid kyang gtong ba dang ser sna la gnyis su 'du shes pa ma 
[\[86a.3\]]lags/_tshul khrims la ma lags/_'chal ba'i tshul khrims la ma lags/_bzod pa la ma lags/_gnod sems la ma lags/_brtson 'grus la ma lags/_le lo la ma lags/_bsam gtan la ma lags/_rnam par g.yeng ba la ma lags/_shes rab 
[\[86a.4\]]la ma lags/_'chal ba'i shes rab la ma lags te/_de sangs rgyas kyi chos la yang mi smon/_so so'i skye bo'i chos kyang yongs su mi 'dor ro/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper na rgya mtsho chen por chab 'bab po 'tshal ba ni 'di lta ste/_lan tshwa'i ror ro gcig 
[\[86a.5\]]go/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' don dam pa la mkhas pa la chos gang dag snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni 'di lta ste/_rnam par grol ba'i ror ro gcig par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper na gdugs ni dngos po thams cad snang bar 
[\[86a.6\]]bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang shes rab kyis chos thams cad snang bar bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid du 'gal ba ma mchis te/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang de ltar 'tshal ba de 
[\[86a.7\]]chos thams cad byang chub tu yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo /_/gang chos thams cad byang chub tu yang dag par rjes su mthong ba de gang cung zad smra ba de thams cad sangs rgyas kyi gsung du 'tshal to/_/gang de ltar 'tshal ba de chags pa ma mchis par ston to/_/gang chags 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]pa ma mchis par ston pa de spobs pa thogs pa ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ste/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni chos yang dag par brjod pa lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas 
[\[86b.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu phye ba lags na/_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten log par 'dzin pa ni 'di skad du pha rol tu phyin pas byang chub sems dpa' rab tu phye'o zhes mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te pha rol tu phyin pas byang chub sems dpa' rab tu phye ba lags na ni sems 
[\[86b.3\]]can thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ni pha rol tu phyin pa skyed pa dang khong du chud pa lags te/_bskyed nas kyang gzhan dag la yang yang dag par rab tu ston te/_de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems 
[\[86b.4\]]dpa' ni ma skyes pa'i lam skyed pa/_ma byung ba'i lam 'byin pa/_ma brjod pa rjod pa'o zhes bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyis bsrung ba ma lags kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa srung ba bgyid de/_
[\[86b.5\]]de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' rnams dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa zhes bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyis kun du bzung ba ma lags kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa kun tu 'dzin par bgyid de/_de'i slad 
[\[86b.6\]]du chos 'dzin pa zhes bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis dri ma ma mchis pas skyon ma mchis pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni sems can dang bdag dben pas gnas pa ma mchis pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni blang ba dang 
[\[86b.7\]]dor ba ma mchis pas sems ma mchis pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni brtsams pa ma mchis pas yid ma mchis pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni brtsams pa dang bral bas rnying pa ma lags pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mi 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]g.yo zhing g.yo ba ma mchis pas 'gro ba dang bral ba'o/_/chos thams cad ni srog ma mchis pas mi 'chi ba'o/_/chos thams cad ni zas ma mchis pas gso ba ma mchis pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni 'dus nas 'grub pas rdzas ma mchis pa'o/_/chos 
[\[87a.2\]]thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings dang dbyer ma mchis pas dman pa ma lags so/_/chos thams cad ni lus ma mchis pas dbyer ma mchis pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dang mtshungs pas rdo rje lta bu'o/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang 
[\[87a.3\]]'di ltar 'tshal ba de chos thams cad kyi chos nyid 'tshal to/_/gang chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'tshal ba de stong pa nyid 'tshal ba'o/_/gang stong pa nyid 'tshal ba de su dang yang mi rtsod do/_/gang su dang yang mi rtsod pa de dge sbyong gi chos la gnas pa'o/_/gang dge sbyong gi 
[\[87a.4\]]chos la gnas pa de gnas pa ma mchis pa'i gang gnas pa ma mchis pa de yul rnams la mi zag go/_/gang yul rnams la mi zag pa de skyon ma mchis pa'o/_/gang skyon ma mchis pa de chos kyi sku'o/_/chos kyi sku gang lags pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'o/_/de bzhin 
[\[87a.5\]]gshegs pa gang lags pa de mi gnyis pa gsung ba'o/_/gang mi gnyis pa gsung ba de 'khor ba yang mi spong /_mya ngan las 'das pa yang mi sgrub ste/_gzhan du na yongs su rtog pa thams cad spang ba ston te/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni chos yang dag par brjod 
[\[87a.6\]]pa'o/_/phyin ci ma log pa yang dag par brjod pa'o/_/stong pa nyid yang dag par brjod pa'o/_/mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_smon pa ma mchis pa dang /_mngon par 'du mi bgyid pa dang /_ma skyes pa dang /_ma byung ba yang dag par brjod pa'o/_/skye ba ma mchis 
[\[87a.7\]]pa yang dag par brjod pa'o/_/theg pa chen po yang dag par brjod pa'o/_/chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba chen po yang dag par brjod pa'o/_/pha rol tu phyin pa chen po yang dag par brjod pa'o/_/sa chen po yang dag par brjod pa'o/_/chos thams cad phyin ci ma 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]log pa yang dag par brjod pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das chos yang dag par brjod pa 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gang du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu 'god pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad dge bar bgyid pa'i tshong 
[\[87b.2\]]dpon du 'gyur ro/_/khyim gyi skyon rnam par brjod pa'i khyim bdag chen por 'gyur ro/_/lha rnams bag mchis pa la rab tu sbyor ba'i lha'i rgyal po brgya byin du 'gyur ro/_/bsam gtan dang tshad ma mchis pa rnams la rab tu 'god pa'i tshangs par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[87b.3\]]'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis yid mi gos pa'i 'jig rten skyong bar 'gyur ro/_/mchog tu rtsod pa ma mchis pa'i dge sbyong du 'gyur ro/_/tshangs pa'i yul la mkhas pa'i bram zer 'gyur ro/_/dul zhing g.yog kyang dul bar 'gyur ro/_/zhi zhing g.yog kyang zhi bar 'gyur 
[\[87b.4\]]ro/_/cang shes shing g.yog kyang cang shes par 'gyur ro/_/dbang chen po thob pa'i thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/the tshom thams cad gcod pa'i chos smra ba chen por 'gyur ro/_/nyon mongs pa zad pas mi 'jigs par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni chos 
[\[87b.5\]]yang dag par brjod pa lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal khyod dang byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag dang nyan thos chen po rnams kyis smras pa 'di sems can gang dag gis khong du chud pa de dag 
[\[87b.6\]]ni dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan pa ma yin no/_/sangs rgyas gcig la bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin no/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig gi rgyu las byung ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub ni zab ste/_brtags pa'i mkhas 
[\[87b.7\]]pa dang mdzangs pas rig pa'o/_/'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu rnams kyis thos par mi 'gyur te/_gang dag gis thos kyang dad par mi 'gyur ro/_/'di la gang lus mngon sum du 'gyur ba dang /_gang dge ba'i bshes gnyen 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]gyis yongs su zin pa de dag gis thos par 'gyur/_'dzin par 'gyur te/_bzod pa yang thob par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal chos kyi tshul 'di la ma brten par sangs rgyas pa gang yang med do/_/'jam dpal sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang 
[\[88a.2\]]dag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag thams cad kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la brten nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/'jam dpal gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ma brten par byang chub 'dod pa de dag ni nam 
[\[88a.3\]]mkha' la rnyeb pas rnyeb par rig par bya'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ma brten par rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa yang thob par mi nus na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta smos kyang ci dgos/_nga'i nyan thos gang gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba/_rnam 
[\[88a.4\]]par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa de dag kyang chos kyi tshul 'di la brten nas so/_/'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas ngan du bsams te ngan song du skye ba ni sla'i gtam gzhan rnams la dad par byas te mtho ris su skye ba 
[\[88a.5\]]ni de lta ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal gang tshul 'di thos nas sems can dmyal bar skyes pa de dag ni rab tu myur ba de rnam par thar bar 'gyur te/_mtho ris su skyes pa de dag ni de lta ma yin no/_/'jam dpal chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems 
[\[88a.6\]]dpas tshul 'di thos par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_des sngon yang tshul 'di thos par gyur la/_thos nas kyang rjes su yi rang ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba chen pos brten par 'gyur ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin par 'gyur ba dang /_thos pa dang tshul 
[\[88a.7\]]khrims phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba ste/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na tshul 'di thos par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na tshul 'di thos par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_tshul 'di 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]ni yid la byed pa la rab tu brtson par 'gyur ba dang /_las kyis 'jigs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_smon lam btab par 'gyur ba dang /_rang bzhin gyis drang zhing mnyen la 'grogs na bde bar 'gyur ba ste/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag 
[\[88b.2\]]dang ldan na tshul 'di thos par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal chos bzhi dang ldan na tshul 'di thos nas spong bar mi 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_byang chub tu smon lam btab pa yin/_bzod pa thob pa yin/_lta ba yang dag par zhugs pa yin/_bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[88b.3\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin te/_chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/_tshul 'di thos nas spong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal chos bzhi dang ldan na tshul 'di thos nas dad par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_thos pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/_shes 
[\[88b.4\]]rab phun sum tshogs pa yin/_stong pa nyid kyi bsam gtan pa yin/_gzungs thob pa yin te/_chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na tshul 'di thos nas dad par 'gyur ro/_/chos bzhi dang ldan na tshul 'di thos nas rab tu rtogs par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_bsod 
[\[88b.5\]]nams kyi tshogs bsags pa yin/_thos pa'i tshogs bsags pa yin/_ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa yin/_bsam gtan rnams kyis sems las su rung ba yin te/_chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na tshul 'di thos nas rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[88b.6\]]chos bzhi dang ldan na tshul 'di thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob ste/_bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_gzugs thams cad sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su yang dag par rjes su mthong ba dang /_tshul thams cad sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[88b.7\]]tshul du thos pa dang /_'dod pa thams cad dang bral te chad na sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'dod par 'gyur ba yang med pa dang /_snying rje chen po las kyang rnam par mi ldog pa ste/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to/_/'jam dpal de bas na byang chub sems dpas tshul 'di rgyun mi 'chad par mnyan par bya'o/_/myur du nges par 'byung bar 'dod pas kyang tshul 'di mnyan par bya'o/_/lung bstan pa'i sa 'dod pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[89a.2\]]dpas kyang tshul 'di mnyan par bya'o/_/las kyi sgrib pa byang bar 'dod pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /_shes bya'i sgrib pa dang /_'gro ba'i sgrib pa byang bar 'dod pas kyang tshul 'di mnyan par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la bla na med pa'i mchod pa byed par 'dod pas kyang 
[\[89a.3\]]tshul 'di mnyan par bya'o/_/dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar 'dod pas kyang tshul 'di nyid mnyan par bya'o/_/'jam dpal gang chos kyi tshul 'di thos nas 'jug pa dang /_mi spong ba dang /_mi smod par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[89a.4\]]byang chub tu lung bstan par bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsom pa med kyis de'i tshe mu tig gi do shal brgya stong ri ba mgul nas bkrol te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su gtor nas tshig 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i chos 'dis 
[\[89a.5\]]sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar gyur cig ces smras so/_/de nas mu tig gi do shal de bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad na khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par bkra ba/_gru bzhi lha ma pa/_
[\[89a.6\]]lha dang mis lta bar byed pa/_nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis sngon ma mthong ma thos pa 'dug par gyur te/_de bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa'i rjes su 'gro zhing bzhugs pa'i rjes 
[\[89a.7\]]su gnas so/_/de'i tshe lha dang mi phal cher ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du byung bar gyur te/_ya mtshan du bya ba skyes nas spyi bor thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas mig mi 'dzums par gnas par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsom 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]pa med ngo mtshar du gyur nas dga' ba skyes te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[89b.2\]]la mngon sum du tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/yon tan mang po kun gyi snod gyur pa/_/sa dang lha yul 'gro ba'i mgon gcig pu/_/bde gshegs zhi zhing rab tu zhi la dgyes/_/khyod mtshungs 'jig rten ma mchis ga la lhag_/blo gros mnyam 
[\[89b.3\]]zhing g.yo med mtshungs par sbyor/_/bdag po thugs rjes rab tu zin pa'i thugs/_/nam mkha'i dkyil ltar thugs ni ma gos te/_/phan ran yang dag bka' mchid gsung zhing spyod/_/khyod la dgra dang zin ni mi mnga' ste/_/bdag po dgyes dang mi dgyes yong mi mnga'/_/
[\[89b.4\]]sman pa bzhin du 'gro ba gso mdzad cing /_/thugs rje bskyed nas rnam par mi rtog spyod/_/lha min lha dang klu dang nam mkha' lding /_/gnod sbyin khyod la skyabs mchis zhi ba thob/_/mgon po srid pa gsum na phan mdzad pa/_/thub pa khyod la bdag ni skyabs su mchi/_/
[\[89b.5\]]bde gshegs khyod ni 'dus ma bgyis mi gzigs/_/zhi thugs zhi la'ang yon tan mi gzigs te/_/gnyi ga'i tshul spangs rnam rtog mi mnga' bar/_/bdag po mya ngan 'das nas 'jig rten spyod/_/rab zhi'i yon tan rgya mtsho gting tshod yas/_/stobs bcu nyid du 
[\[89b.6\]]yon tan mkhyen par gyur/_/sa dang nam mkha' lta bur tshad med chos/_/mgon la thal mo sbyar te mgos phyag 'tshal/_/srid pa'i chu bor mi rkyal mi nub cing /_/sems can mchog ni me khyer mi bzhugs so/_/khyod mi gcig pu srid mtsho'i pha rol gshegs/_/
[\[89b.7\]]dpe med rgya mtsho'i blo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/pad ma bzhin du chu yis mi gos pa/_/sa la 'jig rten chos grol rab tu gsung /_/khyod kyi mkhyen pa su dang mi mtshungs te/_/mtshungs med blo gros khyod la bdag skyabs mchi/_/khyod ni mi mkhyen cung zad 'dir mi mnga'/_/
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]stobs bcu ldan pas kun du yong mi bsnyengs/_/'khor la nga 'dra su yang med ces gsung /_/de slad khyod ni dpa' bo gcig pu rgyu/_/mi gang khyod bka' bdud rtsi snod gyur pa/_/de dag mdor na srid pa'i 'jigs dang bral/_/sman pa dam pa mchod 'os 'jig 
[\[90a.2\]]rten mgon/_/thugs rje ldan pa khyod la bdag skyabs mchi/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi bsam pa mkhyen te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bdag gi slad du mchod pa mi 
[\[90a.3\]]bgyid kyi/_gang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mu tig gi do shal phul zhing bstod pa dang /_mchod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad sangs rgyas nyid thob par gyur cig_/bcom ldan 
[\[90a.4\]]'das 'di ni bdag gi bsam pa lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa de ni/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer 
[\[90a.5\]]kha dog tha dad pa kha dog du ma 'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_btsod kha dang /_shel gyi kha dog lta bu byung ste/_de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa 'od kyis snang bar byas nas ngan song du skyes pa'i sems can rnams 
[\[90a.6\]]kyi gdung ba yang rab tu zhi bar byas/_lha dang mi rnams kyang sim par byas nas slar log ste/_bcom ldan 'das la lan du mar bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to/_/'od zer de dag mthong ba'i 'khor de thams cad kyang yid 'dun cing rab tu 
[\[90a.7\]]dga' ba dang /_bde ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su lus btud nas 'dug ste/_/bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ci yin snyam mo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don zhus pa/_dpa' chen khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad pas/_/lha 
[\[90b.2\]]dang mir bcas 'jig rten 'di/_/khyod kyis 'dzum pa mdzad pa la/_/the tshom 'tshal nas lta zhing mchis/_/'dod chags bral ba dpa' bo khyod/_/thams cad mkhyen pa rnam par 'dren/_/rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum mi mdzad/_/skyon mi mnga' ba 'dzum don gsungs/_/thub pa'i 
[\[90b.3\]]zhal nas 'od btang ba/_/gsal zhing dag la yid du mchi/_/lha mi ngan song mchis pa rnams/_/de yis reg pas bde bar gyur/_/sems can chen po khyod zhal nas/_/'od zer dag ni rab/_/btang ba/_/de ni ci zhig don du bstan/_/thugs rje can gyis lung bstan gsol/_/
[\[90b.4\]]'od zer kha dog dkar po dag_/tshems kyi phrag nas mdzes byung ba/_/de dag gis ni nyi ma'i zer/_/shin tu mdzes par shar ba dag_/gang slad 'jig rten dgar 'gyur bar/_/deng du snag tsha'i mdog bzhin bgyis/_/mgon khyod gang la thugs rje zhing /_/su yi bskal 
[\[90b.5\]]pa nye bar gnas/_/rgyu dang don ni ma mchis par/_/'dod chags bral ba 'dzum mi mdzad/_/thugs rje thugs kyis lung ston te/_/the tshom rnam par bsal bar mdzod/_/ji ltar khyod kyi zhal nas su/_/'od zer byung nas slar log ste/_/'od ni 'jig rten mgon po yi/_/
[\[90b.6\]]dbu yi gtsug tu nub gyur pa/_/glog ris bzhin du nam mkha' la/_/dge ba dpag med bkra bgyid pa/_/rnam par 'dren pa de dag gis/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod pa ston/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' 
[\[90b.7\]]bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsom pa med pa 'di bskal pa bcu gnyis na/_lhas mngon par bstod pa'i bskal pa la dga' ba chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'od chen po zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa 'od chen po'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa gcig thub par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub 
[\[91a.2\]]sems dpa' de dag gi tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa bcu gnyis thub par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/_dper na gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang kun spyod pa ltar/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang kun spyod pa yang 
[\[91a.3\]]de 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsom pa med la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa ni khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/_/byang chub 
[\[91a.4\]]sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor 'di la su zhig sangs rgyas su 'gyur shes sam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu kho bos ni gang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor gal 
[\[91a.5\]]te gang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na khyod sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar lung bstan to zhes bya bar de mi bsting ngam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung ma bstan tam/_smras pa/_
[\[91a.6\]]btsun pa rab 'byor don yongs su mkhyen pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i don yongs su mkhyen pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub tu smon pa de de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis lung 
[\[91a.7\]]mi ston to/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub tu mi smon pa de de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis lung ston to/_/de bas na don yongs su mkhyen pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ni sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir 'di skad du sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]gsungs na/_khyod ci zhig la ltos bsams nas 'di skad du sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes smra/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi tha snyad 'di ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad do/_/smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor 'phags pa rnams la 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis 
[\[91b.2\]]gdags su med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'phags pa tha snyad 'dogs pa ni bden pa'o/_/'jig rten tha snyad 'dogs pa ni log pa'o/_/btsun pa rab 'byor de bas na 'jig rten gyi tha snyad log pa 'phags pa rnams la rjod par mi 'os so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor 'jig 
[\[91b.3\]]rten ni bsrung bar bya ba yin te/_don dam pas dngangs su 'ong zhes de la 'phags pa rnams snying rje chen pos bden pa yang dag pa btang nas byis pa rnams la log par tha snyad 'dogs kyi/_'phags pa rnams la ma yin te/_'phags pa rnams ni bden pa yang dag pa la 
[\[91b.4\]]dga' ba'o zhes 'phags pa rnams la bden pa brjod do/_/'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa gang zhe na/_btsun pa rab 'byor shin tu mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni byang chub kyi rang bzhin te/_'di ni 'phags pa 
[\[91b.5\]]rnams kyi bden pa'o/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_'gog pa'i bden pa dang /_lam gyi bden pa dang /_bden pa bzhi med dam/_byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/_btsun pa 
[\[91b.6\]]rab 'byor sdug bsngal 'dus byas ma yin nam/_smras pa/_de de bzhin te sdug bsngal ni 'dus byas so/_/byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus byas thams cad [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa slu ba'i chos so zhes ma gsungs sam/_
[\[91b.7\]]smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de lta bu'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/_gal te sdug bsngal ni 'dus byas te de [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa yin na/_khyod 'di ltar ci zhig las sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o snyam du sems/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu sdug 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]bsngal ni 'dus byas te [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o/_/sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa ni bden pa'o/_/smras pa/_gal te sdug bsngal ni 'dus byas [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa slu ba'i chos can te yang dag pa ma yin na de yongs su shes pa yang bden par rung ngam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_
[\[92a.2\]]rigs kyi bu de lta'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor khyod kyi sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa 'phags pa'i bden par ga la 'gyur/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu 'gog pa ni 'dus ma byas pa yin na/_de ci'i phyir 'phags 
[\[92a.3\]]pa'i bden par mi 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor ci 'gog pa de nyid 'gog pa'i bden pa'am 'on te chos gzhan 'ga' zhig 'gags pa lags sam/_ci zhig 'gags pas 'gog pa'i bden par yid ches/_rab 'byor 
[\[92a.4\]]gyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu sdug bsngal 'gog pas 'gog pa'i bden pa zhes brjod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/_gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis sdug bsngal ni 'dus byas te/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa slu ba'i chos so zhes ma smras sam/_rab 'byor gyis smras 
[\[92a.5\]]pa/_rigs kyi bu de lta'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor chos gang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa yang dag par ma yin pa de la ni 'gog pa med na khyod kyi sdug bsngal de 'gog par ga la 'gyur/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 
[\[92a.6\]]'byor gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsom pa med la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyi spobs pa la bdag rjes su yi rang ngo /_/sems can thams cad kyis kyang khyod kyi spobs pa thob par gyur cig_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[92a.7\]]rnams kyi bden pa ni gang /_bden pa mngon par rtogs pa ni gang /_byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bden pa'i tshul dang 'gal ba ma yin no/_/de bas na chos thams cad mngon par rtogs pa ni bden pa mngon par rtogs 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]pa'o/_btsun pa rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ste/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mngon par rtogs pa ni bden pa mngon par rtogs pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/_stong pa nyid khong du chud pa ni bden pa'o/_/stong pa nyid mngon par rtogs pa ni bden pa 
[\[92b.2\]]mngon par rtogs pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa ste mi skye ba khong du chud pa ni bden pa'o/_/mi skye ba mngon par rtogs pa ni bden pa mngon par rtogs pa'o/_/btsun pa rab 'byor gang du bden pa mngon par rtogs pa de la chos gang yang sgrub pa'am spang ba med do/_/btsun 
[\[92b.3\]]pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa mngon par rtogs pa ni chos gang yang mngon par mi sgrub ste/_btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa mngon par rtogs pa'o/_/btsun pa rab 'byor bden pa bden pa zhes bya ba 'di ni 'gyur ba med 
[\[92b.4\]]pa'i chos kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor ci tsam du rtog pa de tsam du log pa ste/_rtog pa dang bral ba ni thar pa'o/_/btsun pa rab 'byor gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pas khyod rnyed pa legs par rnyed do zhes smras pa ni 
[\[92b.5\]]btsun pa rab 'byor gang dag rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa de dag la ni lung mi ston to/_/gang dag rnyed pa legs par ma rnyed cing rnyed pa med pa de dag la ni lung ston to/_/gang dag rnyed pas dga' bar mi sems shing ma rnyed pas sro shi bar mi 'gyur ba de dag la lung ston to/_/
[\[92b.6\]]gang dag 'khor ba las kyang mi g.yo la mya ngan las 'das pa yang thob par 'gyur ba de dag la lung ston to/_/gang dag so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams las kyang mi g.yo la nges par gyur pa yang thob par 'gyur ba de dag la lung ston to/_/gang dag lung bstan pa thos na dga' 
[\[92b.7\]]bar mi sems pa de dag la lung ston to/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis khong du chud pa 'di zab po/_/smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor gang dag rtogs pas khong du chud pa mthong ba de dag gi khong du chud pa zab po/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_khong du chud 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]pa 'di blta dka'o/_/smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor lta 'dod pa rnams kyis so/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_khong du chud pa 'di rtogs par dka'o/_/smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor mi brtson pa rnams kyis so/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu tshul 'di la su zhig 
[\[93a.2\]]'jug par 'gyur/_smras pa/_gang dag sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa ma yin pa dang sangs rgyas byung ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa rnams kyi rna lam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grag par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_
[\[93a.3\]]rigs kyi bu ji ltar na sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin/_smras pa gang sgrub pa sten pa'o/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu sgrub pa la gnas pa ji ltar rig par bya/_smras pa/_gang sems can rnams la log par mi sgrub pa'o/_/smras pa/_sems can rnams la log 
[\[93a.4\]]par mi sgrub pa ji lta bu/_smras pa/_gang byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po mi 'dor ba'o/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa chen po gang /_smras pa/_gang lus dang srog dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad la 
[\[93a.5\]]byin yang lan du phan 'dogs pa la mi re ba'o/_/smras pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje chen po gang /_smras pa/_gang thog ma kho nar sems can rnams byang chub par 'dod kyi bdag ni ma yin no/_/bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags bdun khri drug stong ni/_bla na 
[\[93a.6\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/dge slong nyis brgya ni len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo/_/yang de'i tshe lha'i bu bzang sems zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa des/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad 
[\[93a.7\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi rtsa ba'i rten gyi gnas gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi rtsa ba'i rten gyi gnas ni bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i sems bskyed pa'o//_
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]lha'i bu bzang sems kyis gsol pa/_de ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i spyod yul gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang sbyin pa yang spyod yul la rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/_tshul khrims ma nyams pa 
[\[93b.2\]]yang spyod yul la rnam par mi rtog pa'i tshul khrims la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/_bzod pa yang spyod yul la mi gnyis pa'i chos la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/_brtson 'grus kyang spyod yul la brtsam pa med pa la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/_bsam 
[\[93b.3\]]gtan yang spyod yul la shin tu snyoms par zhugs pa'i chos thams cad la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/_shes rab kyang spyod yul la spros pa med pa la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/_thos pa yongs su tshol ba la yang spyod yul la brjod du med pa yang mngon du phyogs 
[\[93b.4\]]pa yin/_zhi gnas kyang spyod yul la shin tu zhi ba dang /_rab tu zhi ba la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/_lhag mthong yang spyod yul la chos thams cad bstan du med pa la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yang spyod yul la dran pa med cing yid la 
[\[93b.5\]]byed pa med pa la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/_yang dag par spong ba yang spyod yul la mngon par 'du mi byed pa la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa yang spyod yul la smon pa thams cad yang dag par chad pa la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/_dbang po 
[\[93b.6\]]yang spyod yul la dbang po las 'das pa'i chos rnams la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/_stobs kyang spyod yul la dbyer med pa'i chos la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/_byang chub kyi yan lag kyang spyod yul la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/_
[\[93b.7\]]lam yang spyod yul la lam ngan par zhugs pa'i sems can yongs su bskyab pa la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba yang spyod yul la chos thams cad la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/_'dul ba yang spyod yul la chos thams cad 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]shin tu dul bar bsgom pa la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/_pha rol tu phyin pa yang spyod yul la pha rol dang tshu rol la mi chags pa la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/_'khor ba yang spyod yul la mya ngan las 'das pa la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin 
[\[94a.2\]]mya ngan las 'das pa yang spyod yul la mngon par 'du byed pa la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/_skye ba yang spyod yul la ma skyes pa dang ma byung ba yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/_phung po yang spyod yul la nyon mongs pa med pa la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/_khams 
[\[94a.3\]]kyang spyod yul la dbyer med pa la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/_skye mched kyang spyod yul la 'phags pa'i skye mched la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/_chos nyan pa yang spyod yul la nges par sems pa la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/_chos ston pa yang spyod yul la brjod du 
[\[94a.4\]]med pa la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/_gzugs kyi sku rnam par sgrub pa yang spyod yul la chos kyi sku la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/_chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ba yang spyod yul la 'jug pa med pa dang /_ldog pa med pa la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/_nyan thos 
[\[94a.5\]]kyang spyod yul la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/_rang sangs rgyas kyang spyod yul la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mngon du phyogs pa yin te/_lha'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu bzang sems 
[\[94a.6\]]kyis gsol pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i cho ga gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bdag bde ba la mi lta ba dang /_sems can gzhan bde ba la gtong ba dang /_'khor ba na gnas shing tshul khrims dang /_thos pa dang /_bag yod pa dang /_mya ngan las 
[\[94a.7\]]'das pa la gnas shing snying rje chen po las phyir mi ldog pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa lag mthil du 'ongs kyang thob par mi byed pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'khor ba nyid kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_sems can thams cad rjes su srung ba dang /_sems 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]can thams cad la dang ba mtshungs pa dang /_sems can thams cad mtshungs par dad par byed pa dang /_sems can thams cad la bsam pa mtshungs pa dang /_bged pa'i rang bzhin can dang /_zang zing med pa'i chos ston pa dang /_rung ba la tshod shes pa dang /_dben pa la mngon 
[\[94b.2\]]par dga' zhing tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang /_skye bo mang po'i drung du gnas shing chos yang dag par ston pa la snyom las med pa dang /_grong dang /_grong khyer du zhugs nas byams pa la mngon par phyogs pa dang /_rnyed pa dang bkur sti la mngon par mi dga' ba dang /_'jig rten 
[\[94b.3\]]pa'i 'du 'dzi las 'byol ba dang /_rigs pa dang bcas shing snyan pa dang /_'jam por smra ba dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun rnams la dngos po thams cad kyis phyag 'tshal ba dang /_gsong por smra ba dang /_khro gnyer med pa dang /_rtag tu gzhan gyi don la dga' ba 
[\[94b.4\]]dang /_thams cad du sems chags pa med pa dang /_yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba dang /_'phags pa'i skye bo dang 'grogs pa dang /_'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye bo rnam par spong ba dang /_sangs rgyas la bdag nyid tsam du phangs par sems 
[\[94b.5\]]pa dang /_chos la srog tsam du gces par 'dzin pa dang /_sgrub pa la yan lag gi dam pa mgo tsam du gces par sems pa dang /_chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal cha dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad ngan ngon gyis chog par sems pa dang /_slob dpon 
[\[94b.6\]]dang mkhan po rnams la ston pa tsam du phangs par sems shing srog gi phyir yang yongs su mi gtong ba dang /_lung nod pa dang /_kha don la brtson pa dang /_nam gyi cha stod dang /_nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar rnal 'byor la brtson pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[94b.7\]]snyoms par 'jug pa mngon du byed pa dang /_ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams tshul bzhin so sor rtog pa dang /_shes rab kyis rab tu rtogs par byed pa dang /_sems la rnyog pa med pa dang /_bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang /_nang du so sor rtog pa dang /_phyi rol du 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]mi rgyug pa dang /_lus yongs su gtong ba dang /_zhe sdang rnam par spong ba dang /_gti mug rnam par 'joms pa dang /_shes rab 'bar bar byed pa dang /_so sor thar pa'i sdom pa dang /_'dul ba las phyir mi 'da' ba dang /_thams cad du sems cang shes pa 
[\[95a.2\]]dang /_thams cad du shes bzhin dang ldan pa dang /_sems phyin ci ma log pa dang /_sems dri ma med cing 'od gsal ba dang /_rtag tu pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la rab tu brtson pa dang /_brtson pa mi 'dor ba dang /_rtag tu dge ba gang yin tshol zhing ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams 
[\[95a.3\]]chud mi gzon pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang /_sems zang zing med pa dang /_rtag tu dbang po bsdams pa dang /_rtag tu sems mnyam par bzhag pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhol ba dang /_'khor ba mi gtong ba dang /_rnyed pa dang ma 
[\[95a.4\]]rnyed pa dang /_grags pa dang /_ma grags pa dang /_bstod pa dang /_smad pa dang /_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal gyis mi sgul ba dang /_thams cad du tshod shes pa dang /_thams cad du dran pa nye bar gzhog pa dang /_sbyin pas longs spyod che ba dang /_tshul khrims kyis lha dang mir skye 
[\[95a.5\]]ba dang /_bzod pas mdzes pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyis nyon mongs pa yongs su 'dor ba dang /_bsam gtan rnams kyis sems las su rung ba dang /_shes rab kyis 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams rab tu rtog pa dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po 
[\[95a.6\]]rnams kyis kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /_tshangs pa'i gnas pa rnams kyis dul ba dang /_bden pa dang /_gtong ba dang /_nye bar zhi ba dang /_shes rab kyi byin gyi rlabs rnams kyis sems shin tu dul ba dang /_bsam gtan rnams kyis sems yid du 'ong ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[95a.7\]]rnams kyis zab pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa dang /_stong pa nyid sgom pas lta ba dang bral ba dang /_mtshan ma med pa sgom pas rnam par mi rtog pa dang /_smon pa med pa sgom pas yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang /_
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pas theg pa chen po rtogs par khong du chud pa dang /_thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la gtod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su skong ba dang /_dge 
[\[95b.2\]]ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su tshol bas yon tan thams cad skye ba'i sgo dang /_slob dpon dang /_mkhan po dang /_bla ma la sri zhu byed pas sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed pa dang /_rang gi lus dang sems yongs su shes pas thams cad shes pa nyid dang /_nga 
[\[95b.3\]]rgyal med pas gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang /_sems can thams cad la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal bas spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba dang /_cho ma cho dgu byin pas mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_sems can thams cad dang 'thun par 'jug pas dpe byad bzang po yongs 
[\[95b.4\]]su rdzogs pa dang /_theg pa chen po yang dag par rab tu ston pas cang shes pa'i sa dang /_byang chub kyi sems yang dag par rab tu ston pas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa dang /_stong pa nyid rab tu ston pas bag chags yang dag par 'joms pa dang /_chos byin pas so so yang dag 
[\[95b.5\]]par rig pa thob pa dang /_dran pa rab tu byin pas gzungs thob pa dang /_chos khong du chud pas spobs pa thob pa dang /_spobs pa nye bar sgrub pas phyad par lung ston pa dang /_nyam chung ba rnams la bzod pas sred med kyi bu'i lus thob pa dang /_tshul khrims 'chal 
[\[95b.6\]]ba rnams la bzod pas mthong ma thag tu sems can thams cad dang bar 'gyur ba dang /_gzhan dag gis gnod sems rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang /_rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa dang /_brtson 'grus brtsams pa mngon par shes par 'gyur ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin rab 
[\[95b.7\]]tu 'byin pas mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa dang /_spyod lam yang dag par rab tu byin pas kun du mdzes pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sbyor bas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang 'grogs pa dang /_'dod pa 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]yongs su gtong bas 'jig rten thams cad yid ches pa dang /_khro ba yongs su 'dor bas 'jig rten thams cad dga' ba dang /_phrag dog yongs su 'dor bas rnyed pa thams cad kyi mchog dang grags pa'i mchog dang /_gnas byin pas 'jig rten 
[\[96a.2\]]thams cad rton pa dang /_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa rab tu byin pas chos la rab tu dga' ba dang /_grags pa'i sgra dang /_gsong por smra bas ngag yongs su dag pa dang /_snyan par smra bas tshangs pa'i sgra dang /_'jam por smra bas bya ka la ping 
[\[96a.3\]]ka'i sgra skad dang /_khong khro ba med pa'i sems kyis 'jig rten thams cad du grags pa dang /_sems can thams cad la mi slu bas dpang gcig por 'gyur ba dang /_ltung ba mi gleng bas mngal gyi gnas las yang dag par 'da' ba dang /_srog gcod pa spong bas tshe dpag 
[\[96a.4\]]tu med pa dang /_rkun po yongs su spong bas nam mkha'i mdzod dang /_sdug pa'i dngos po yongs su gtong bas lag na rin po che dang /_byang chub tu yongs su sngo bas longs spyod mi zad pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa yongs su spong bas skyes bu chen po dang /_
[\[96a.5\]{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba yongs su spong bas ngag gi gsang ba thob pa dang /_phra ma yongs su spong bas 'jig rten thams cad kyi ston pa dang /_ngag rtsub po yongs su spong bas 'jig rten gyis bstod pa'i snod dang /_tshig kyal pa mi smra bas g.yog mi phyed pa dang /_brnab sems 
[\[96a.6\]]yongs su spong bas gter chen po rnyed pa dang /_gnod sems yongs su spong bas stegs su gyur pa dang /_log par lta ba yongs su spong bas 'jig rten thams cad rton pa dang /_chos rgya chen po la spyod pas stobs bcu nyid dang /_sbyin pa thams cad kyi rnam par smin 
[\[96a.7\]]pa la mi re bas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos phyir mi ldog pa thob pa dang /_kun du 'dzin pa thams cad yongs su gtong bas/_mi 'jigs pa thob pa ste/_rigs kyi bu ngas bskal pa'am/_bskal pa las lhag par byang chub sems dpa'i cho ga bstan kyang mthar 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]phyin par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi cho ga tshad med de/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i cho ga zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na cho ga dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/de ltar cho ga dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[96b.2\]]dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rnyed par dka' ba'i 'du shes can ma yin no/_/lha'i bu bzang sems kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' shes bzhin dang ldan pa zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu gang byang chub sems 
[\[96b.3\]]dpa' rtag tu ting nge 'dzin mi 'dor la/_ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang gis kyang mi skye ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin las log nas/_gang du sems can gyi don bya ba der skye ba ste/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes bzhin dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu bzang sems kyis gsol 
[\[96b.4\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dben pa zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang thams cad de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_chos kyi dbyings su mthong ba de skye bo mang po'i nang du 
[\[96b.5\]]song yang dben par shes par bya ste/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dben pa zhes bya'o/_/gang gnyis la blo mi 'jug pa de ni shin tu dben pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu bzang sems kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[96b.6\]]mnyam par bzhag pa zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa'i yid kyis smon pa thams cad bral zhing /_chos gang yang gzung bar ram/_spang bar yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/_de gang dang gang yang 
[\[96b.7\]]dag par rjes su mthong ba de dang de stong pa dang /_yang dag pa ma yin par mthong ba ste/_lha'i bu de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par bzhag pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu bzang sems kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/_byang chub 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]sems dpa' thams cad du 'gro ba zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpas gang bdag dang sems can thams cad stong pa nyid du mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba'o/_/lha'i bu 
[\[97a.2\]]de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad du 'gro ba zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu bzang sems kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' dul ba zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang rnam par rtog pa 
[\[97a.3\]]rnams kyis mi 'phrogs pa'o/_/lha'i bu bzang sems kyis gsol pa/_ji ltar na zhi ba zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur/_rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba de zhi ba zhes bya'o/_/lha'i 
[\[97a.4\]]bu bzang sems kyis gsol pa/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub ni rang gi kha na las pa lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni ji lta ji ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa yongs 
[\[97a.5\]]su spong ba de lta de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su 'dzin to/_/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/_gang nas kyang blang ba ma lags/_gang du yang bskur ba ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la ye shes rnam par dag 
[\[97a.6\]]pa ni byang chub ste/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar bzod pa'i rjes su zhugs pa ni byang chub kyi spyod pa lags so/_/gang 'di ltar 'tshal ba de ni/_thams cad mkhyen pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang dag mnyam pa nyid 'di la zhugs pa de dang de dag ni/_bcom ldan 
[\[97a.7\]]'das sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa lags so/_/gang dag chos mnyam pa nyid 'di la sten pa de dang de dag ni/_tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa lags so/_/gang dag chos mnyam pa nyid 'di nyid la bzod pa de dang de dag ni/_bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa lags 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]so/_/gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la thos pa dang /_sems pa dang /_sgom pa la brtson pa de dang de dag ni/_brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa lags so/_/gang dag chos mnyam pa nyid 'di la nges par rtog pa de dang de dag ni/_bsam gtan phun 
[\[97b.2\]]sum tshogs pa lags so/_/gang dag chos mnyam pa nyid 'di rnam par dpyod pa de dang de dag ni/_shes rab dang ldan pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gang dad pa rnyed pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo /_/de dag gis 
[\[97b.3\]]chos mngon sum du bgyis so/_/bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bdud btul to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu ston pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang 
[\[97b.4\]]dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khong du chud pa de dag chos rtogs pa lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu bzang sems la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_bzang sems legs so legs so/_/de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_
[\[97b.5\]]bzang sems gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub ni/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las rab tu bstan to/_/gang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa de thams cad kyang /_chos kyi rnam 
[\[97b.6\]]grangs 'di las bshad do/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par 'gyur ba de dag ni/_rnyed pa chen po 'byor par 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gi lag tu song ba de dag ni/_chos kyi gter chen po thob par 'gyur 
[\[97b.7\]]ro/_/gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su 'dzin pa de dang de dag ni/_de bzhin gshegs pas yid brtan pa'o/_/de dang de dag ni gsang ba 'dzin pa'o/_/de dang de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bla na med pa'i mchod pas mchod par byed pa'o/_/
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]de dag ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/_/gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos shing thos nas kyang mos pa de dang de dag ni lha'i bu nga la lan du phan 'dogs pa'o/_/lha'i bu de dag ni phyogs thams cad du mun pa med par byed par 
[\[98a.2\]]'gyur ba'o/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor thams cad la bka' stsal pa/_khyed las su dag phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus/_lnga brgya pa tha ma la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par rab tu ston par su spro/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' rtsom 
[\[98a.3\]]pa med stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni slad ma'i dus na/_chos kyi 
[\[98a.4\]]rnam grangs 'di yang dag par rab tu bshad par spro'o/_/bcom ldan 'das rtsom pa mang pos ni/_dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par rngo mi thogs so/_/bdag ni sems 'dzin pa ma mchis/_rtsom pa ma mchis shing /_sems can thams cad la sems 
[\[98a.5\]]snyoms pa ste/_zang zing ma mchis pa'i sems dang /_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa thams cad la re ba ma mchis pas/_chos zab mo la bzod pa 'di yang dag par bshad par bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[98a.6\]]rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti la gnas pas ni/_dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par rngo mi thogs pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das/_sems can gang dag bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang /_'dzin 
[\[98a.7\]]pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_yi ger 'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang /_bris te glegs bam du bgyis nas 'chang bar 'gyur ba de dag ni/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyi byin gyi brlabs su rig par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med la legs sa zhes bya ba byin te/_rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/sems de 'dra bas dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[98b.2\]]ldan 'das gang snying rje chen po dang /_ma bral ba des/_dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par rngo thogs so/_/bdag ni snying rje chen po la dmigs nas/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad par bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' byams pas gsol pa/_
[\[98b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das byams pa'i sems kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par rngo thogs so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_gnod sems mang po la dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni byams pa'i 
[\[98b.4\]]sems kyis/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad par bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' mthong na dgas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang sems can rnams kyis mthong na ngoms par mi 'gyur ba des/_dam pa'i chos yongs su 
[\[98b.5\]]'dzin par rngo thogs te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can thams cad la khong khro ba ma mchis pa'i sems kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[98b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' gang sems can rnams kyi don du sdug bsngal thams cad la spro ba dang /_gang yang sems can rnams sangs rgyas nyid yang dag par bsgrub par 'tshal zhing /_sems can thams cad bsgral nas slad kyis bdag rgal bar 'tshal 
[\[98b.7\]]ba de chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par 'gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi don du sangs rgyas nyid yang dag par bsgrub par 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can thams cad bsgral nas/_slad kyis 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]bdag rgal bar 'tshal lo/_/bsgral bar bgyi ba dang /_sgrol ba po dang /_bsgral ba yang mi dmigs par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de lta bu'i sems dang ldan pas/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[99a.2\]]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang 'di ltar bdag gis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ngo snyam pa 'di ni/_'jig rten gyi phyin ci log go/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas ni/_re zhig bdag nyid dul bar 
[\[99a.3\]]bgyi/_bdag nyid zhi bar bgyi'o/_/de bdag nyid dul zhing zhi la nye bar zhi nas/_chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar rngo thogs te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bdag nyid dul zhing zhi la nye bar zhi nas/_chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyis 
[\[99a.4\]]dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/_byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos yongs su zin pa de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_skyes bu dam pa dag 'di ltar khyod cag sems can thams cad la 
[\[99a.5\]]phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/_dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar spro ba ni/_legs so legs so/_/'di ni khyod dang 'tsham mo/_/dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag phul gyi chos so/_/
[\[99a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la brtson par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu dag_/chos yang dag par brjod pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ba dang /_bklags pa dang /_kun chub 
[\[99a.7\]]par byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni skye ba med pa/_'gag pa med pa'i sku ni chos kyi sku'o/_/chos kyi sku ni sangs rgyas kyi sku'o zhes/_sangs rgyas la snang ba chen po thob par 'gyur ro/_/chos thams 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]cad ni ma byas pa 'dus ma byas pa'o zhes chos la snang ba chen po thob par 'gyur ro/_/nga'i ba med pa dang /_yongs su 'dzin pa med pa ni/_bcom ldan 'das kyi slob ma'i dge 'dun no zhes dge 'dun la snang ba chen po thob par 'gyur ro/_/snying rje 
[\[99b.2\]]chen po ni/_byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i rtsa ba'o zhes/_byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa rnams la snang ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/nges pa'i tshig thams cad ni skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhes spobs pa'i snang ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[99b.3\]]dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/_klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas dang /_brgya byin gyi gnas dang /_klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa'i gnas su spyod par 'gyur/_de'i 'og tu 'dzam bu'i gling du spyod par 'gyur te/_sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyis yongs 
[\[99b.4\]]su bzung ba dang /_byang chub sems dpas yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ba/_drang ba/_g.yo med pa/_des pa/_chos zab mo la mos pa/_de dag gi lag tu 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med dang /_byang chub 
[\[99b.5\]]sems dpa' blo gros rnam par gnon dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom 
[\[99b.6\]]ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa chos thams cad yang dag par sdud pa stong phrag brgya pa'i mdo las rtsom pa med kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po many+dzu shrI 
[\[99b.7\]]gar+b+ha dang /_bi dza ya shI la dang /_shI len dra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/_skad gsar [(]chad [,]cad [)]kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]{D239}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_da sha tsakra k+Shi ti gar b+ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'dus pa chen po las sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 
[\[100a.2\]]'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das ri kha la de ya zhes bya ba drang srong thub pa mang po'i spyod yul gyi gnas na/_dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po tshad med grangs med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_thams cad kyang nyan thos kyi 
[\[100a.3\]]dge 'dun chen po sha stag go/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa dang thabs cig pa thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po sha stag ste/_zla ba'i snying po zhes bya ba bshad ma thag tu/_de'i tshe lho phyogs nas bsung 
[\[100a.4\]]gi sprin chen po 'dus pa las bsung gi char chen po rab tu 'bab bo/_/me tog gi sprin chen po 'dus pa las me tog gi char chen po rab tu 'bab bo/_/rin po che'i lha rdzas kyi rgyan gyi sprin chen po 'dus pa las/_rin po che'i lha rdzas kyi rgyan gyi char chen po rab tu 'bab 
[\[100a.5\]]bo/_/lha rdzas kyi gos kyi sprin chen po 'dus pa las lha rdzas kyi gos kyi char chen po rab tu 'bab bo/_/de lta bu'i sprin dang char chen pos drang srong thub pa mang po'i spyod yul gyi gnas kyi ri de la khyab par gyur to/_/bsung dang /_me tog dang /_rin po che'i 
[\[100a.6\]]rgyan dang /_gos de dag las chos chen po'i sgra dbyangs rnam pa sna tshogs brgya stong snyed grags par gyur pa ni 'di lta ste/_dkon mchog la skyabs su 'gro ba'i sgra dang /_bslab pa'i gnas 'dzin pa'i sgra dang /_ngang des shing bzod pa can gyi sgra dang /_brtson 'grus 
[\[100a.7\]]rtsom pa'i sgra dang /_bdud bzhi btul ba'i sgra dang /_shes rab la gzhol zhing 'jug pa'i sgra dang /_grags pa chen pos 'jig rten gsum du rgya cher grags pa'i sgra dang /_dran pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi khyad par la nan tan bya ba'i sgra dang /_stong 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i sgra dang /_'dod chags kyis yongs su skyo ba'i sgra dang /_gzugs ni chu'i lbu ba lta bu'o zhes pa'i sgra dang /_tshor ba ni chu'i chu bur lta bu'o zhes pa'i sgra dang /_'du shes ni smig rgyu lta bu'o zhes pa'i sgra dang /_'du byed ni chu 
[\[100b.2\]]shing lta bu'o zhes pa'i sgra dang /_rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'o zhes pa'i sgra dang /_mi rtag pa'i sgra dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i sgra dang /_bdag med pa'i sgra dang /_stong pa'i sgra dang /_'dzem pa dang /_ngo tsha bar ldan pa'i sgra dang /_kun spong ba'i sgra dang /_dran pa nye bar 
[\[100b.3\]]gzhag pa'i sgra dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms kyi sgra dang /_chos kun chub pa'i sgra dang /_mtho ris su skye ba dang /_mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sgra dang /_theg pa gsum la 'bab pa'i sgra dang /_chos chen po'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i sgra dang /_
[\[100b.4\]]chos chen po'i char rab tu 'bebs pa'i sgra dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i sgra dang /_ngan song gsum las yongs su sgrol ba'i sgra dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par nan tan bya ba'i sgra dang /_thabs mkhas pa'i sgra dang /_sa bcu la 
[\[100b.5\]]'bab pa'i sgra dang /_mngon par shes pas rnam par rol pa'i sgra dang /_bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po rnam par dag pa la rnam par rol pa'i sgra dang /_sa las phyir mi ldog pa'i sgra dang /_mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa'i sgra dang /_spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i sgra dang /_sangs 
[\[100b.6\]]rgyas thams cad kyi rgya mtsho chen po la 'jug pa'i sgra'i nga ro grags par gyur to/_/de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po de dag thams cad kyis de lta bu'i sprin dang char rnam pa sna tshogs mthong zhing de ltar chos kyi sgra'i nga ro yang thos par gyur nas de dag gi so so'i yid ci la 
[\[100b.7\]]mos pa bzhin du so so'i lus la rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bsung dang /_me tog dang /_rin po che'i rgyan dang /_lha rdzas kyi gos dam pas yongs su brgyan par mthong ngo /_/yang so so'i lag mthil gnyis na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che thogs shing yid bzhin gyi nor 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]bu rin po che de dag re re las kyang rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs char bzhin du 'bab par mthong ngo /_/gzhan yang nor bu rin po che de dag las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs su byung ste/_'od zer de dag gi dbang gis sems can de dag so so nas phyogs bcu'i 
[\[101a.2\]]chu klung gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang mthong ngo /_/yang 'od zer de dag gi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa de re re la yang 'khor mang po tshad med pas bsti stang dang bcas te yongs su bskor bar mthong ngo /_/gzhan 
[\[101a.3\]]yang 'od zer de'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sems can gang nad kyis gzir ba thams cad kyang 'od zer de dag gis reg ma thag tu nad kyi sdug bsngal dang bral bar gyur to/_/gang bsad pa la thug pa dang /_btson du bzung zhing bcings pa dag kyang 'od 
[\[101a.4\]]zer de dag gis reg ma thag tu de dag las yongs su thar bar gyur to/_/gang lus dang ngag dang yid mi bde bar spyod pa'i gnas ngan len lci ba dag kyang 'od de'i dbang gis shin tu yang zhing rnam par dag par gyur to/_/gang bkres shing skom pa dag kyang 'grangs 
[\[101a.5\]]shing ngoms par gyur to/_/gang bsad pa dang /_chad pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nyon mongs par gyur pa dag kyang 'od zer de dag gis reg ma thag tu sdug bsngal ba dang bral bar gyur to/_/gang bgo ba dang /_rin po che'i rgyan dang /_dbyig dang /_nor rdzas kyis brel cing 
[\[101a.6\]]phongs pa dag kyang bsams pa bzhin du 'byor cing ldan par gyur to/_/sems can gang srog gcod pa la dga' zhing mos pa nas log par lta ba'i bar du dga' zhing mos pa dag kyang 'od zer des reg ma thag tu srog gcod pa yongs su spong ba la dga' zhing mos 
[\[101a.7\]]pa nas log par lta ba'i bar du yongs su spong ba la dga' zhing mos par gyur to/_/sems can gang 'dod pa mi rnyed pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sdug bsngal bar gyur pa dag kyang 'od zer des reg ma thag tu ji ltar re ba bzhin du rnyed par gyur to/_/gzhan yang 'od 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]zer de'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sems can gang sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa dag thams cad zhi nas rab tu bde ba dang ldan par mthong ngo /_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad du 'od kyis snang bar byas pas sprin dang /_rdul dang /_na bun dang /_
[\[101b.2\]]rlung dang /_rdzi char dang /_bkra mi shis pa'i sgra dang /_dri mi zhim pa dang /_kha ba dang tsha ba la sogs pa'i ro ngan pa dang /_yid du mi 'ong ba'i reg bya dang /_'jigs skrag pa dang /_gnod pa mang po rnams med par gyur to/_/gzhan yang las ngan pa dang /_log pa'i 
[\[101b.3\]]ngag dang /_log pa'i bsam pa dang /_log par phyogs pa dang yongs su bral te lhag par mi grang ba dang /_lhag par mi tsha ba dang /_rab tu zhi zhing bde ba dang /_sa gzhi lag mthil ltar mnyam pa dang /_bde ba'i yo byad dam pa thams cad kyis yongs su gang bar 
[\[101b.4\]]gyur to/_/de'i tshe na 'khor mang po rnams kyi so so'i lus kyi sa'i khams lhag par lci zhing mi theg pa tsam du gyur to/_/ltas 'di lta bur gyur pa mthong nas thams cad kyang dngangs te/_de ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis ltas 'di lta bur gyur snyam du rtog pa skyes so/_/de'i tshe 'khor 
[\[101b.5\]]gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na brgya byin lha'i dbang po dri ma med par skyes zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na 'dug pa las langs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar 
[\[101b.6\]]nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bden par gsung zhing bden gzigs pa/_/bden la rab gnas thub pa khyod/_/'dus pa'i 'khor mang thams cad la/_/mthar phyin bden pa'i chos gsungs shig_/so so'i skye bo mang po dag_/sdug bsngal 
[\[101b.7\]]rgyu dang sdug bsngal sel/_/ci yi slad du 'khor 'dir ni/_/sprin dang char rnams gda' bar gyur/_/'khor rnams rab tu dga' rangs nas/_/shin tu dad pa'i bsam pa skyes/_/theg pa chen por thams cad gzhol/_/yang dag lta skye som nyi rgal/_/'khor mang 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]lha dang mi yi lus/_/lhag par sa yi khams lci bas/_/rang gis mi theg gyur pa 'di/_/ci yi rkyen gyis ltas 'di byung /_/lag mthil gnyis na nor bu'i las/_/rin chen char 'bab 'od kyang 'gyed/_/phyogs bcur snang byas sdig pa bsal/_/
[\[102a.2\]]sdug bsngal zhi nas bde ba thob/_/'dren pas gsungs shig ci yi rkyen/_/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la/_/spos dang phreng ba sna tshogs kyis/_/so so'i lus la brgyan pa gda'/_/lha dang mi kun the tsom skyes/_/ci yi rgyu dang ci yi rkyen/_/su zhig 
[\[102a.3\]]gang nas 'dir mchi na/_/rdzu 'phrul mthu 'di ston par gyur/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' 'am/_/'on te tshangs pa'am bdud lags sam/_/brgya byin lags sam su mchi ba/_/'dren pa chen pos bshad du gsol/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 
[\[102a.4\]]kyis brgya byin dri ma med par skyes pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyed kyis 'di ltar shes par byos shig_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/_sngon bskal pa chen po tshad med grangs med pa'i bar du rnyog pa lnga'i tshe/_
[\[102a.5\]]sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sems can yongs su smin par byed pa de/_da ltar 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgyad cu dang bcas te 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir nga la phyag 'tshal ba dang /_bsnyen bkur dang mchod 
[\[102a.6\]]pa bya ba dang /_gzhan yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams la blta ba dang /_rjes su yi rang ba bskyed pa'i phyir 'khor dang bcas te dge sbyong gi gzugs kyis 'dir 'ong bas mngon par shes pa'i mthus cho 'phrul 'di dag bstan to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[102a.7\]]dpa' chen po sa'i snying po zhes bya ba de tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par gyis yongs su brgyan pas nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_'jig rten du bcas pa thams cad kyis dpog nus pa med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]de ni yon tan phul du gyur pa thams cad kyi gter du gyur pa'o/_/rnam par grol ba'i rin po che'i 'byung gnas yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mig yongs su dag par byed pa'o/_/mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro ba'i ded dpon du gyur pa'o/_/yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po 
[\[102b.2\]]che ltar rin po che thams cad char bzhin du 'bab pas ji ltar re zhing 'dod pa thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa'o/_/tshong pa mang po'i rin po che'i gling lta bu'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel zhing skye ba'i phyir zhing gshin pa lta bu'o/_/rnam par grol ba'i bde ba la 'jog pa'i 
[\[102b.3\]]phyir snod lta bu'o/_/rin po che dam pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i phyir yon tan gyi bum pa bzang po lta bu'o/_/dge ba'i nan tan can la snang bar byed pa'i phyir nyi ma gsal ba lta bu'o/_/lam stor ba rnams la snang bar byed pa'i phyir sgron ma lta bu'o/_/nyon mongs pa'i 
[\[102b.4\]]gdung ba sel ba'i phyir zla ba ltar sim pa lta bu'o/_/rkang med pa la theg par gyur pa lta bu'o/_/lam ring por 'gro ba la tshogs kyi stegs bu lta bu'o/_/'brog bslad pa la lam ston pa lta bu'o/_/smyos shing 'khrugs pa la sman dam pa lta bu'o/_/nad kyis gzir 
[\[102b.5\]]ba la sman pa mkhas pa dang phrad pa lta bu'o/_/rgas shing 'khogs pa la rten dang khar ba lta bu'o/_/ngal ba dang dub pa la khri dang stan lta bu'o/_/chu bo bzhi rgal ba la zam pa lta bu'o/_/pha rol du 'gro ba la gru dang gzings lta bu'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam gsum 
[\[102b.6\]]gyi 'bras bu khyad par can smin par byed pa'o/_/dge ba rnam gsum gyi gzhi 'dren cing rgyun du 'bebs pa'o/_/sbyin pa gtong ba'i rgyun mi 'chad pa 'khor lo ltar 'jug pa'o/_/tshul khrims srung ba brtan pas ri rab lhun po lta bu'o/_/brtson 'grus gzhig par dka' 
[\[102b.7\]]ba ni rdo rje rin po che lta bu'o/_/bzod pa mi g.yo ba ni sa chen po lta bu'o/_/bsam gtan zab pa ni gter gsang ba lta bu'o/_/mnyam par 'jog pas mdzes pa ni me tog gi phreng ba dam pa lta bu'o/_/shes rab zab cing yangs pa ni rgya mtsho chen po lta bu'o/_/cis kyang 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]mi chags pa ni nam mkha' lta bu'o/_/'bras bu dam pa'i rgyu dang nye ba ni me tog rgyas pa lta bu'o/_/mu stegs can 'dul ba la seng ge'i rgyal po lta bu'o/_/lha'i bdud yongs su 'joms pa ni klu'am glang po che lta bu'o/_/nyon mongs pa'i dgra 
[\[103a.2\]]thams cad gcod pa ni lha'i ral gri lta bu'o/_/'du 'dzi mang pos skyo ba ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa lta bu'o/_/nyon mongs pa'i dri ma 'khru ba ni chu dang ba lta bu'o/_/mi gtsang ba'i nyal nyil sel ba ni rlung drag po lta bu'o/_/kun nas nyon mongs pas glags pa 
[\[103a.3\]]gcod pa ni mtshon rnon po lta bu'o/_/'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba kun las srung ba ni gnyen nam mdza' bo lta bu'o/_/phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra las skyob pa ni 'obs sam mkhar lta bu'o/_/nyam nga ba thams cad las grol bar byed pas pha ma lta bu'o/_/zhan cing nyam chung ba 
[\[103a.4\]]rnams sbed pa ni nags stug po lta bu'o/_/dbyar lam ring por 'gro ba la bsil grib kyi shing chen po lta bu'o/_/tsha ba dang skom gyis gdungs pa rnams la chu grang lta bu'o/_/bkres pa rnams la 'bras bu zhim po lta bu'o/_/gcer bu rnams la bgo ba'i gos byed 
[\[103a.5\]]pa'o/_/tsha bas nyen pa rnams la sprin stug por gyur pa'o/_/dbul phongs pa la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po cher gyur pa'o/_/'jigs skrag pa dag la skyabs dang gnas su gyur pa'o/_/lo tog rnams la char par gyur pa'o/_/chu rnyog ma can rnams la nor 
[\[103a.6\]]bu chu 'dang du gyur pa'o/_/sems can mang po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mi 'gong bar byed pas spyod yul dam pa ston cing 'khor spro ba dang tshim par byed pa'o/_/sems can rnams lhag pa'i 'dzem pa dang ngo tsha ba la skul zhing 'dzud pa'o/_/bsod nams dang ye shes kyi 
[\[103a.7\]]tshogs sogs pa la de'i rgyan dang ldan par byed pa'o/_/nyon mongs pa yongs su sel ba la skyug pa dang 'khru ba'i sman lta bur gyur pa'o/_/sems 'khrugs pa sdud pa ni mnyam par 'jog pa'i spyod yul lta bur gyur pa'o/_/spobs pa thogs pa med pa ni zo chun rgyud 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]pa'i 'khor lo lta bu'o/_/dmigs pa la sems sdud pa ni gzugs bzang po la rtog pa lta bu'o/_/bzod pa brtan pa ni ri rab lhun po lta bu'o/_/gzugs zab cing rgya che ba ni rgya mtsho chen po lta bu'o/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa thogs pa med pa ni nam mkha' lta bu'o/_/sgrib 
[\[103b.2\]]pa'i bag chags thams cad yongs su sel ba ni ji ltar nyi ma tsha bas 'khyag pa cham chom bzhu ba lta bu'o/_/rtag tu bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa dang /_yang dag pa'i lam la rol cing thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rin po che dam pa'i gling lta bur gyur pas ched du 
[\[103b.3\]]ma brtsams kyang chos chen po'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po de ni de lta bu'i yon tan gyi khyad par tshad med grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa de 'khor dang bcas te gnas 'dir phyin 
[\[103b.4\]]du nye bas 'od las 'di lta bu'i cho 'phrul dang ltas sngar bstan pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po'i yon tan mang po bshad ma thag tu/_de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bye 
[\[103b.5\]]ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu dang bcas te/_rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus dge sbyong gi gzugs su ston cing lho phyogs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags te/_'khor mang po dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum 
[\[103b.6\]]bskor ba byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas/_'greng bzhin du tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/rnam par 'dren pa rkang gnyis mchog_/byams pa'i thugs kyis kun la skyob/_/sa chen ltar ni shin tu bzod/_/zhe sdang 
[\[103b.7\]]khro ba'i sems kun bsal/_/mtshan dang dpe byad mchog ldan pas/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing rab brgyan/_/bden pa'i byams dang snying rje yis/_/rgyal ba'i zhing kun rab tu 'gengs/_/sred pa'i dra ba kun bcad nas/_/yang dag ci bzhin bde bar gnas/_/yongs 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]su dag pa'i zhing spangs nas/_/rnyog pa can gyi sems can dgrol/_/rnyog pa'i zhing 'dir dam bcas te/_/ngan 'gro sems can smin par mdzad/_/yang dag brtan pa'i rtsol ba yis/_/ring mo zhig nas dka' thub spyad/_/yun [{]rings [,]ring [}]dka' thub 
[\[104a.2\]]spyad pa dag_/thos nas 'jigs pa'i sems kyang skye/_/sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod pa dang /_/brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab bskyed/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/tshad med nyan thos bsnyen bkur mchog_/gzhan yang skye bo mang po dag_/
[\[104a.3\]]bkres skom na 'chi kun las bsgral/_/so so'i skye bo gzhan gyi phyir/_/lus srog ma chags mang du btang /_/yang dag dam pa'i chos tshol phyir/_/sha dang rus pa'ang mang du btang /_/bdag gi bde ba kun btang nas/_/skye bo rnams la thugs brtser dgongs/_/
[\[104a.4\]]so so'i skye bo mang po'i phyir/_/the tsom dra ba gcod la brtson/_/dbang po drug rnams rab bsdams nas/_/'dod pa thams cad ring du spangs/_/'dus byas mi rtag sdug bsngal te/_/bdag med stong pa nyid du rtogs/_/sdug bsngal las kun skye ba yi/_/rgyu ni 'dod 
[\[104a.5\]]chags sred pa'o/_/de phyir dbang po drug pas sngar/_/'dod chags yongs su gcad par bya/_/sems can gnas pa'i khams kun du/_/rtag par thugs rje chen pos gnas/_/byang chub mchog tu sangs rgyas kyang /_/sngon gyi smon lam kun mi gtong /_/sems 
[\[104a.6\]]can gang zhig sdug bsngal gyis/_/rnam par gzir ba dag gzigs nas/_/shin tu 'bab pa'i brtson 'grus kyis/_/de las sgrol phyir rab tu brtson/_/sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus/_/bsam gtan shes rab kun bsgoms nas/_/ji ltar ma ni bu 
[\[104a.7\]]gcig la/_/byams pa'i sems kyis gso bzhin du/_/sngon yang sems can ris kun la/_/rtag tu byams pa'i thugs bskyed pas/_/de phyir myur du sangs rgyas nas/_/tshad med pa yi 'khor rnams sgrol/_/ji tsam byang chub spyod bsgoms pa/_/sems can don du 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]ma bsngos med/_/de bas sems can thams cad la/_/pha rol phyin pa drug mi gtong /_/rtag tu dus ngan tha ma'i tshe/_/bla med byang chub bsgrubs pas na/_/da yang dus ngan tha ma'i tshe/_/bla med byang chub mngon sangs rgyas/_/ngan par lta ba'i lha klu mi/_/gnod 
[\[104b.2\]]sbyin dag ni kun btul te/_/the tsom gcod cing bder bkod pa/_/rdo rje lta bu'i lam la'o/_/tshad med pa yi skye bo dag_/byang chub mchog tu lung yang ston/_/mchod 'os 'dren pa'i gtsor gyur te/_/mchog gi bsod nams zhing du gyur/_/dpe zla med pa'i 
[\[104b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das/_/byams pas 'gro ba kun la skyob/_/tshad med grags pa chen po yis/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten yongs su khyab/_/de bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/_/bdag gi don du bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/kun nas lhan cig 'dir 'dus nas/_/thub 
[\[104b.4\]]pa chen po spyan sngar lhags/_/dam pa'i chos rnams thos nas ni/_/rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te/_/lhag par yang dag brtson bskyed nas/_/byang chub spyod la nan tan bgyid/_/rnam par 'dren pa'i chos kyi mthus/_/thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya bas/_/
[\[104b.5\]]de bas deng 'dir 'dren khyod kyis/_/bsdus pa'i 'khor ni sngon ma byung /_/gnod sbyin khri phrag bcu gsum snyed/_/rtag tu sha za khrag 'thung ba/_/thams cad sdig pa'i las btang nas/_/byang chub chen por 'bab cing gzhol/_/kha cig khyad par gzugs mchog
