[\[104b.6\]]dang /_/bzod pa ting nge 'dzin yang thob/_/kha cig zag pa kun zad nas/_/'jig rten mchog gi dgra bcom gyur/_/kha cig tshad med bzhi bsgoms shing /_/kha cig bsdu ba bzhi la gnas/_/kha cig yang dag rig bzhi thob/_/kha cig 'thun pa'i bzod la gnas/_/kha cig 
[\[104b.7\]]dpa' 'gro'i ting 'dzin thob/_/kha cig shes rab mig dang ldan/_/kha cig mi skye bzod la gnas/_/de kun 'dren pas byin gyis brlabs/_/bcom ldan gzi brjid chen po'i mthus/_/bdud kyi 'khor rnams bcom nas su/_/rnam pa dgu bcu rtsa lnga yi/_/mu stegs 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]can gyi ris kun btul/_/sems can dmyal ba byol song dang /_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lha min rgyud kun bcom/_/bde bas sems can bden pa rnams/_/thams cad rgyal ba'i spyan sngar lhags/_/nad dang mtshon gyis 'jigs pa dang /_/mu ges 'jigs pa'ang deng 
[\[105a.2\]]'dir bcil/_/sems can mdongs shing 'thom pa dang /_/yang dag lam ni stor ba bsgral/_/nyon mongs myos shing 'khrugs pa dag_/thams cad zhi ba'i lam la bkod/_/bdag gis bya ba kun spangs te/_/lhags nas bcom ldan zhabs la thug_/dpag tu med 
[\[105a.3\]]pa'i zhing rnams na/_/bcom ldan da ltar bzhugs pa'i rnams/_/thams cad khyod la kun bsngags pas/_/thos nas thams cad 'di ru lhags/_/thams cad mkhyen pa rgya mtsho yi/_/yang dag yon tan tshad ma mchis/_/sems can mang po'i don mdzad pa/_/mos 
[\[105a.4\]]pa'i sems kyis phyag 'tshal lo/_/tshad med bsod nams rdzogs bgyis pas/_/bcom ldan zhabs la phyag 'tshal gyur/_/tshad med bskal pa'i bar du yang /_/mchod pa mang pos mchod par shog_/bdag kyang bcom ldan ji bzhin du/_/de lta bu yi dam bcas/_/
[\[105a.5\]]rnyog pa can gyi 'jig rten 'dir/_/bla med byang chub thob par shog_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos tshigs su bcad pa dam pa 'di dag gis/_bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas 'khor dang bcas te gzhan yang lha rdzas kyi bsung 
[\[105a.6\]]dang me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rin po che'i rgyan tshad med pa snyed kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor nas steng gi bar snang la rin po che'i gdugs su gyur te/_dam pa'i chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ci yang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/de'i tshe 'khor 
[\[105a.7\]]gyi dkyil 'khor der 'dus pa'i 'khor thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po mthong nas ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te/_so so nas rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lha rdzas kyi spos dang /_me tog rin po che'i rgyan dang /_na bza' dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]dang /_gdugs la sogs pa phul te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag cag gis rnyed pa rab tu rnyed do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis mngon sum du skyes bu chen po khyod mthong nas 
[\[105b.2\]]bsti stang dang bcas te mchod pa byas par gyur to zhes smra'o/_/de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs par the tsom 'dri zhes bya ba zhig 'dug pa stan las langs nas gos tshags bcos te phrag pa g.yas pa phyung nas/_bcom 
[\[105b.3\]]ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'di gang nas mchis/_gnas pa'i 
[\[105b.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas ji srid cig na mchis/_yon tan dang dge ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam zhig dang ldan na bcom ldan 'das kyis bstod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bsngags la phyir yang bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan gyi rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par bstod 
[\[105b.5\]]par gyur/_bdag cag gis sngon ma mthong bas ngo mtshar du gyur na bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu thong shig_/skyes bu chen po 'di'i yon tan dang dge ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam pa de 'jig rten du 
[\[105b.6\]]bcas pa lha dang mi'i 'khor thams cad kyis rtogs par nus pa ma yin no/_/gal te de bzhin gshegs pas skyes bu chen po de'i yon tan dang dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyas par bshad na 'jig rten du bcas pa lha dang mi thams cad kyi mgo rmongs te yid mi ches par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 
[\[105b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' rigs par the tsom 'dri bas yang /_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_legs par shin tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_ngas khyod la phyogs tsam 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]zhig bshad par bya'o/_/ji ltar skyes bu chen po de'i yon tan gyi khyad par tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no/_/'di lta ste/_dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par la bde bar gnas pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul yang shin 
[\[106a.2\]]tu rtogs par 'jug pa'o/_/mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa'i khyad par yang thob pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang du gyur pa'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis la bzod pa thob pa'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/
[\[106a.3\]]seng ge rab tu bsgyings pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi ting nge 'dzin la yang shin tu gnas pa'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi ri la yang rab tu 'dzegs pa'o/_/mu stegs can dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu choms pa ste/_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par 
[\[106a.4\]]bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed pa thams cad du de gnas par byed do/_/skyes bu chen po de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du gnas te/_gang ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis tshad med pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par skyed par gyur pas gdul ba'i sems 
[\[106a.5\]]can tshad med pa dag yongs su smin par byed do/_/skyes bu chen po de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/_gal te ye shes mngon par skyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[106a.6\]]de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad 'thun par ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi spyod yul kun mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/_gal te dpag tu med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms 
[\[106a.7\]]par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad ci nus pa bzhin du tshad med pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad dam pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod par 'gyur ro/_/de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/_gal te rnam par dag pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyis 'thun par 'dod pa'i spyod yul gyi 
[\[106b.2\]]nyes pa'i skyon tshad med pa mthong nas sems rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/_gal te khrel ba dang ngo tsha ba dang ldan pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i 
[\[106b.3\]]mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad lhag pa'i 'dzem pa dang ngo tsha ba dang ldan zhing sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos dang yongs su bral nas bsam pa mi nyams par 'gyur ro/_/de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur 
[\[106b.4\]]te/_gal te theg pa thams cad dang ldan pa gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad thabs mkhas pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mig gi mngon par shes pa dang /_sngon gyi gnas dran pa'i mngon par shes 
[\[106b.5\]]pa dang /_'chi 'pho dang skye ba mngon par shes pa dang /_'jig rten 'di dang 'jig rten pha rol gyi rgyu dang 'bras bu mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/_gal te mya ngan med pa'i mngon par shes pas 
[\[106b.6\]]rig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad mya ngan dang /_yi mug pa dang /_rmugs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[106b.7\]]rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/_gal te mngon par shes pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad thabs mkhas pa'i mngon par shes pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de ji 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/_gal te 'jig rten kun du snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mun pa dang bral te/_sangs 
[\[107a.2\]]rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa thams cad kyang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/_gal te sangs rgyas kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs 
[\[107a.3\]]na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad log par lta ba yongs su spangs nas/_dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du gyur te/_
[\[107a.4\]]gal te rdo rje'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi ri khor yug dang /_khor yug chen po dang /_ri rab lhun po dang /_de ma yin pa'i ri gzhan dang /_lung pa dang /_lung phran dang /_gcong rong dang /_
[\[107a.5\]]gseg ma dang /_gyo mo dang /_tsher ma dang /_rtswa dang /_shing ngan pa thams cad mi snang ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na ji tsam du ngan par gdags pa dug dang /_byad stems dang /_gcan gzan ma rungs pa dang /_ye 'drog dang /_glo bur dang /_rims nad dang /_yul 
[\[107a.6\]]ngan dang /_nam rmus pa dang /_rdul dang /_dri ma dang /_mi gtsang ba'i nyal nyil thams cad kyang zhi zhing med par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sa gzhi yang lag mthil bzhin du mnyam zhing bkra shis pa rnam pa sna tshogs rang 'byung ba dang /_rnam par dag par 'gyur 
[\[107a.7\]]ba dang /_phul du 'gyur ba dang /_dam par 'gyur ba dang /_mtshan ma bzang po du mas yongs su brgyan par 'gyur ro/_/de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/_gal te ye shes kyi stobs gdul dka' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i bdud kyi rgyal po 'khor dang bcas te thams cad 'jigs skrag nas/_dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang 
[\[107b.2\]]de bzhin du 'gyur te/_gal te glog gi 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'jigs pa dang bral zhing chos kyis spro bar 'gyur ro/_/de ji ltar 
[\[107b.3\]]gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/_gal te mchog dam pa'i ro dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad bsams pa bzhin du zas dang 
[\[107b.4\]]skom gyis tshim par 'gyur ro/_/de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/_gal te mchog gi mdangs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can 
[\[107b.5\]]thams cad gang yang lhag pa'i mthu stobs dang mi ldan pa med de nad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/_gal te mchog dam pa'i yo byad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 
[\[107b.6\]]zhugs na/_ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad ci la mos pa bzhin du khri stan dang /_gding ba dang /_gos dang /_rin po che'i rgyan dang /_ci tsam du 'tsho ba'i yo byad du gtogs pa de dag thams cad kyis brel zhing phongs pa 
[\[107b.7\]]med de rab tu mdzes pa shin tu yid du 'ong ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/_gal te rtsod pa med pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad lus dang /_sems zo mdog bde zhing yang ba dang /_dgra sdang ba dang /_'ching ba thams cad dang bral ba dang /_'dum zhing dga' ba dang /_spro ba dang /_sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 
[\[108a.2\]]'grus rtsom pa dang /_sems mi 'khrug pa dang /_shes rab yongs su rdzogs pa la dga' zhing mos par 'gyur ro/_/de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/_gal te phul du gyur pa'i spro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs 
[\[108a.3\]]na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad khyad par can gyi rab tu dga' ba tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/_gal te 'jig rten pa'i lam gyi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[108a.4\]]'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad thogs pa med pa'i ye shes thob cing rnam par dag pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs sbyong bar 'gyur ro/_/de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin 
[\[108a.5\]]du 'gyur te/_gal te rgyal ba'i rdo rje la shin tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad dbang po kun dang ldan zhing dbang po mi nyams pa dang /_rtag tu yang dag par 'byung ba'i 
[\[108a.6\]]lam la mos shing sems rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/_gal te lhag pa'i rgyal mtshan rtog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na 
[\[108a.7\]]gnas pa'i sems can thams cad bdag sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos la shin tu skyo zhing mi 'dod pa dang /_thams cad kyang dge ba srung ba dang /_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis mtho ris kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]du 'gyur te/_gal te byams pa dang /_snying rjer ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems dang /_snying rje'i sems dang /_gnod pa'am/_'tshe ba med 
[\[108b.2\]]pa'i sems dang /_kun la snyoms pa'i sems dang /_gcig la gcig phan pa dang bde bar byed pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/_gal te bsod nams thams cad shin tu sdud pa zhes bya ba'i ting 
[\[108b.3\]]nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad 'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_nad dang /_mu ge dang yongs su bral te/_dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang /_char pa dang /_kha ba dang /_rtsub pa dang /_tsha ba dang /_
[\[108b.4\]]sdug bsngal ba la sogs pa'i reg bya'i yul yid du mi 'ong ba thams cad yongs su zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar skyes bu chen po de gal te rgya mtsho glog 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi sa chen po thams 
[\[108b.5\]]cad rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs las byas par 'gyur zhing nyes pa'i skyon thams cad dang yongs su bral te rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rin po che'i shing dang /_gos kyi shing dang /_snod kyi shing dang /_rgyan gyi shing dang /_me tog gi shing dang /_'bras bu'i shing dang /_rol mo sna tshogs kyi 
[\[108b.6\]]shing la sogs pa 'tsho ba'i yo byad dam pa tshad med pa snyed kyis yongs su brgyan par gyur to/_/de bzhin du ma dor na rigs kyi bu de ni sems can mang po yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir nyin re zhing snga dro'i dus su ting nge 'dzin gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms 
[\[108b.7\]]par 'jug ste/_ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun na gdul ba'i sems can thams cad la ci dang cis 'dul ba bzhin du phan pa dang bde ba'i don de dang de dag gis yongs su smin par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni sngon bskal pa chen po 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]tshad med dpag tu med pa'i bar du rnyog pa lnga'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mi bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sems can yongs su smin par byed do/_/phyi ma ma 'ongs pa'i dus su 'jig rten gyi khams la lar gal te mtshon gyis 'jigs pa byung ste/_
[\[109a.2\]]sems can dag yongs su gdungs par gyur pa na/_rigs kyi bu 'di de lta bu dag mthong nas snga dro'i dus kyi tshe ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mthus mtshon gyis 'jigs pa de dag yongs su bcil nas sems can rnams gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems kyis snying brtse bar 
[\[109a.3\]]byed do/_/'jig rten gyi khams la lar nad kyis 'jigs pa byung ste/_sems can kha btag pa na rigs kyi bu 'dis de lta bu dag mthong nas snga dro'i dus kyi tshe ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mthus nad kyis 'jigs pa yongs su bcil nas sems can rnams rab tu bde ba thob par 
[\[109a.4\]]byed do/_/'jig rten gyi khams la lar gal te mu ges 'jigs pa byung ste sems can kha btag pa na/_rigs kyi bu 'dis de lta bu dag mthong nas snga dro'i dus kyi tshe ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus mu ges 'jigs pa yongs su bcil te/_sems can rnams kha zas kyis yongs 
[\[109a.5\]]su tshim par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu 'dis de ltar ting nge 'dzin mang po'i shugs kyis de lta bu la sogs pa tshad med dpag tu med/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyis sems can gyi dbugs 'byin to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di de ltar nan tan gyi khyad par tshad med grangs 
[\[109a.6\]]med pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pas sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde bar byed pa'i don la rab tu brtson pa'o/_/sngon 'das pa'i dus na skye bo mang po la phan pa dang bde ba dang yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med 
[\[109a.7\]]pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las zad mi shes pa'i yi dam chen po bcas te/_snying rje chen po dang mi 'phrogs pa'i brtson 'grus chen po rab tu bskyed do/_/de ltar snying rje chen po dang mi 'phrogs pa'i brtson 'grus bskyed de zad mi shes pa'i yi dam bcas pas gong nas gong du 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]'phags pa'i shugs kyis nyin zhag gcig gam/_skad cig thang cig tsam gyis kyang so so'i skye bo tshad med pa bye ba khrag khrig btul te/_sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs las bsgral nas thams cad ci dang ci 'dod pa de dang de dag gis re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/gnas gang 
[\[109b.2\]]dag na sems can gang 'dod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sdug bsngal te/_'dod pas yongs su gdungs par gyur pa dag sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing /_dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na ci dang 
[\[109b.3\]]ci 'dod pa thams cad 'thob cing sdug bsngal dang bral te/_skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gnas gang dag na sems can gang bza' ba dang /_btung bas phongs par gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byang 
[\[109b.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas te mchod pa byas na ci dang ci 'dod pa thams cad 'thob cing bza' ba dang btung ba dang ldan te mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[109b.5\]]gnas gang dag na sems can gang bgo ba'am/_rin po che'i rgyan nam/_nad kyi rkyen sman nam/_gding ba'am/_khri stan nam/_'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis brel cing phongs par gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan 
[\[109b.6\]]nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na ci dang ci 'dod pa rnyed cing bgo ba dang /_rin po che'i rgyan dang /_nad kyi rkyen sman dang /_gding ba dang /_khri dang /_'tsho ba'i yo byad thams cad 'byor cing skal ba ji lta ba bzhin mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas mya 
[\[109b.7\]]ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gnas gang dag na sems can gang dag byams sdug pa dang bral te/_dgra sdang bar gyur pa dang phrad par gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas te mchod pa byas na/_byams sdug pa dang phrad cing dgra sdang ba dang bral te/_skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gnas gang dag na sems can gang dag lus dang 
[\[110a.2\]]sems nad dang sdug bsngal mang pos gzir bar gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na de kun lus dang sems bde zhing nad thams cad dang bral te skal 
[\[110a.3\]]ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gnas gang dag na sems can gang 'thab cing rtsod par gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas 
[\[110a.4\]]bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na zhe 'gras pa'i sems dang bral te gcig la gcig dga' ba dang /_bzod pa dang /_gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems kyis 'gyod cing chags par 'gyur te skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob 
[\[110a.5\]]par 'gyur ro/_/gnas gang dag na sems can gang btson du bzung ste/_btson rar bcug gam/_lcags dang /_khong sgril dang /_shing gi gdos kyis bcings sam/_yan lag bcings te sdug bsngal bar gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[110a.6\]]chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na/_de kun btson ra dang /_lcags dang /_khong sgril dang /_lcags sgrog las thar te bag yangs su gyur nas dga' ba dang /_skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan 
[\[110a.7\]]las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gnas gang dag na sems can gang dag btson du bzung nas gzhu ba'am/_'tshog pa'am/_nan la bor ba dang /_gsod pa la thug pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na/_de kun btson du bzung ba dang /_gzhu 'tshog pa dang /_nan la bor ba las thams cad thar te skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gnas 
[\[110b.2\]]gang dag na sems can gang dag lus dang sems dub pa dang /_mthu stobs dang mi ldan cing /_nyam chung bdag gis sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na 
[\[110b.3\]]de kun lus dang sems yang zhing bde ba dang mthu stobs bskyed de cis 'dul ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gnas gang dag na sems can dbang po nyams pa dang ma tshang bar gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byang chub 
[\[110b.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na/_de kun dbang po ma tshang ba med cing dbang po dang ldan te skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur 
[\[110b.5\]]ro/_/gnas gang dag na sems can gang dag smyos shing sems 'khrugs sam/_'byung po'i gdon gyis brlams pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas te 
[\[110b.6\]]mchod pa byas na/_de kun smyos shing sems 'khrugs pa dang bral te rab tu bde ba dang skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gnas gang dag na sems can gang dag 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti 
[\[110b.7\]]mug dang /_khong khro ba dang /_phrag dog dang /_nga rgyal dang /_ngan par lta ba dang /_gnyid dang /_bag med pa dang /_the tsom la sogs pas lus dang sems gdungs te mi 'pho bar gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas te mchod pa byas na/_de kun 'dod chags la sogs pa dang bral te lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[111a.2\]]gnas gang dag na sems can gang dag mes tshig par gyur pa'am/_chus khyer ba'am/_rlung gis khyer ba'am/_rbab tu lhung ba'am/_shing ka'am/_khang thog nas lhung ste sems dngangs shing 'khums par gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[111a.3\]]chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na/_de kun mi bde ba'i bgegs dang /_g.yang sa de dag thams cad las thar te skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[111a.4\]]gnas gang dag na sems can gang dag sbrul gdug pa'am/_gcan gzan gdug pas zin tam/_dug rnam pa sna tshogs kyis phog par gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang 
[\[111a.5\]]dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na/_de kun 'tshe zhing gnod pa thams cad dang bral te skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gnas gang dag na sems can gang 'byung po'i gdon gyis btab ste/_rtag pa'i rims dang /_
[\[111a.6\]]zhag gcig pa dang /_zhag gnyis pa dang /_zhag gsum pa dang /_zhag bzhi pa dang /_smyos nas lus dang sems 'dar zhing 'khrugs te/_dran pa nyams shing shes pa med par gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i 
[\[111a.7\]]mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na/_de kun 'jigs pa las rnam par grol te lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gnas gang 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]dag na sems can gang gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za dang /_srul po dang /_lus srul po dang /_grul bum dang /_mdangs za ba dang /_de ma yin pa gzhan yang seng ge dang /_stag dang /_spyang ki la sogs pa gcan gzan gdug pas nyen pa dang /_sngags 
[\[111b.2\]]dang /_byad dang /_g.yul ngor lhags pa dang /_gzhan yang 'jigs par gyur pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis dkris shing glags te/_lus dang sems rab tu dngangs par gyur nas shi bas 'jigs shing 'tsho bar 'dod pa dang /_bde ba tshol zhing sdug bsngal mi 'dod pa dag gis sems 
[\[111b.3\]]rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na/_de kun 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral te lus dang srog la mi dma' ba dang skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas 
[\[111b.4\]]mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gnas gang dag na sems can gang mang du thos par 'dod pa'am/_mos pa dag par 'dod pa'am/_tshul khrims dag par 'dod pa'am/_bsam gtan bsgrub par 'dod pa'am/_mngon par shes pa 'dod pa'am/_
[\[111b.5\]]shes rab 'dod pa'am/_rnam par grol ba 'dod pa'am/_gzugs dam pa 'dod pa'am/_sgra snyan pa 'dod pa'am/_dri zhim po 'dod pa'am/_ro zhim po 'dod pa'am/_reg bya mchog 'dod pa'am/_khe dang rnyed pa 'dod pa'am/_grags pa 'dod pa'am/_
[\[111b.6\]]bsod nams 'dod pa'am/_bzos 'tsho bar 'dod pa'am/_me tog dang 'bras bu 'dod pa'am/_skyed mos tshal 'dod pa'am/_khri stan 'dod pa'am/_gding ba 'dod pa'am/_yul rgyu bar 'dod pa'am/_nor dang 'bru 'dod pa'am/_nad kyi rkyen sman 'dod pa'am/_khang khyim 
[\[111b.7\]]'dod pa'am/_bran khol 'dod pa'am/_tshon rtsi 'dod pa'am/_char pa 'dod pa'am/_chu 'dod pa'am/_lo thog 'dod pa'am/_bsil yab 'dod pa'am/_rlung bsil ba 'dod pa'am/_me 'dod pa'am/_theg pa 'dod pa'am/_bu pho dang bu mo 'dod pa'am/_thabs 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]mkhas par 'dod pa'am/_bsod nams bya bar 'dod pa'am/_dro bar 'dod pa'am/_bsil bar 'dod pa'am/_yid gzhungs par 'dod pa'am/_de ma yin pa 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i don gyi dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs 'dod pa'i phyir nyon mongs 
[\[112a.2\]]shing sdug bsngal gyis gdungs par gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas te mchod pa byas na/_rigs kyi bu de'i ting nge 'dzin dam pa'i yon tan dang /_mthu dang gzi brjid 
[\[112a.3\]]kyi shugs kyis de dag thams cad sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa dang bral te/_re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs nas skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gnas gang dag na sems can gang dag zhing gshin pa'am/_
[\[112a.4\]]zhing mi gshin pa la sa bon btab nas/_gal te nan tan byas kyang rung /_nan tan ma byas kyang rung ste/_sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas te mchod pa byas na/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[112a.5\]]de'i ting nge 'dzin dam pa'i yon tan dang /_mthu dang /_gzi brjid kyi shugs kyis de dag gi lo thog thams cad legs shing 'bras bu smin cing legs par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni sngon bskal pa chen po tshad med grangs med pa'i bar du sangs rgyas 
[\[112a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med pa dag la brtson 'grus chen po'i sbyor ba dang /_brtan pa'i yi dam bcas pa'i smon lam gyi dbang gis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir rtag tu sa chen po thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_rtag tu sa bon gyi tshogs thams cad 
[\[112a.7\]]yongs su 'dzin cing rtag tu sems can thams cad kyis yid bzhin du spyod par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus sa chen po 'di las skye ba'i rtswa dang /_shing gi rtsa ba dang /_yal ga dang /_myu gu dang /_lo ma dang /_sdong po dang /_'dab ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]bu la sogs pa thams cad rgyas par skye zhing /_rtsi shing dang /_lo tog la sogs pa'i me tog dang /_'bras bu yang smin cing grung ba dang /_mngar ba dang /_snum pa dang /_dri zhim par byed do/_/gnas gang dag na sems can gang dag 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug la 
[\[112b.2\]]sogs pa drag la rno bas srog gcod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_ngag rtsub por smra ba dang /_phra ma byed pa dang /_tshig kyal par smra ba dang /_'dod chags can dang /_zhe sdang can dang /_log par lta ba dang /_mi 
[\[112b.3\]]dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mngon du spyod pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas te mchod pa byas na nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi zhing mi dge ba bcu dang yongs su bral te dge ba 
[\[112b.4\]]bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan zhing sems can thams cad la byams pa dang /_snying rje ba dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar rigs kyi bu 'di ni de lta bu'i yon tan dam pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_mthu dang /_gzi brjid kyi shugs dang /_shin tu 
[\[112b.5\]]brtson pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis skad cig thang cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med par phyin cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de re rer yang skad cig thang cig gis sems can snod du gyur pa/_tshad med grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed sdug bsngal las bsgral nas 
[\[112b.6\]]bde ba thob par byas te skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar rigs kyi bu de ni de lta bu'i yon tan dang /_smon lam brtan pa dang /_shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan te/_
[\[112b.7\]]sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su kha cig la ni tshangs pa chen po'i rgyal po'i lus su ston te/_sems can rnams cis 'dul ba'i chos ston to/_/kha cig la ni dbang phyug chen po'i lha'i lus su ston to/_/kha cig la ni 'dod 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]pa'i khams kyi gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gnam gyi lha'i lus su ston to/_/kha cig la ni 'phrul dga' gnam gyi lha'i lus su ston to/_/kha cig la ni dga' ldan gnam gyi lha'i lus su ston to/_/kha cig la ni ra ba mtshe ma gnam gyi lha'i lus su ston to/_/kha 
[\[113a.2\]]cig la ni sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lha'i lus su ston to/_/kha cig la ni rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i lus su ston to/_/kha cig la ni sangs rgyas kyi skur ston to/_/kha cig la ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus su ston to/_/kha cig la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi lus su ston to/_/kha cig la 
[\[113a.3\]]ni nyan thos kyi lus su ston to/_/kha cig la ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i lus su ston to/_/kha cig la ni rgyal rigs kyi lus su ston to/_/kha cig la ni bram ze'i lus su ston to/_/kha cig la ni dmangs rigs kyi lus su ston to/_/kha cig la ni rje'u rigs kyi lus su 
[\[113a.4\]]ston to/_/kha cig la ni skyes pa'i lus su ston to/_/kha cig la ni bud med kyi lus su ston to/_/kha cig la ni gzhon nu'i lus su ston to/_/kha cig la ni bu mo'i lus su ston to/_/kha cig la ni dri za'i lus su ston to/_/kha cig la ni lha ma yin gyi lus su ston to/_/kha cig 
[\[113a.5\]]la ni mi'am ci'i lus su ston to/_/kha cig la ni lto 'phye chen po'i lus su ston to/_/kha cig la ni klu'i lus su ston to/_/kha cig la ni gnod sbyin gyi lus su ston to/_/kha cig la ni srin po'i lus su ston to/_/kha cig la ni grul bum gyi lus su ston to/_/kha cig la ni sha 
[\[113a.6\]]za'i lus su ston to/_/kha cig la ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi lus su ston to/_/kha cig la ni srul po'i lus su ston to/_/kha cig la ni lus srul po'i lus su ston to/_/kha cig la ni gnon po'i lus su ston to/_/kha cig la ni seng ge'i lus su ston to/_/kha cig la ni spos kyi ba lang 
[\[113a.7\]]gi lus su ston to/_/kha cig la ni rta'i lus su ston to/_/kha cig la ni khyu mchog gi lus su ston to/_/kha cig la ni gcan gzan sna tshogs kyi lus su ston to/_/kha cig la ni gshin rje'i lus su ston to/_/kha cig la ni sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma'i lus su ston to/_/kha 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]cig la ni sems can dmyal ba ba'i sems can gyi lus su ston to/_/de dag la sogs pa tshad med grangs med pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lus ston cing skye bo mang po la skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston pas theg pa gsum las phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la 'dzud do/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[113b.2\]]skyes bu chen po de ni de ltar de lta bu'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par dang ldan te/_de ni yon tan mchog tu gyur pa phul du gyur pa'i gter yin no/_/rnam par grol ba rin po che thams cad 'byung ba'i 'byung gnas yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' mang po'i mig yongs su 
[\[113b.3\]]dag pa yin no/_/mya ngan las 'da' ba'i grong khyer chen por 'gro ba'i ded dpon yin no/_/de ltar ched du ma byas par gong du rgyas par bshad pa'i yon tan chen pos chos kyi 'khor lo chen po rab tu bskor ba yin no/_/'di lta ste/_rigs kyi bu gal te 'ga' zhig gis byams pa'am/_
[\[113b.4\]]'jam dpal lam/_kun du spyan ras gzigs sam/_kun du bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la bskal pa brgya'i bar du sems rtse gcig tu skyabs su song nas de dag gi mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang 
[\[113b.5\]]bcas pas mchod cing phyag 'tshal ba dang /_'dod pa'i re ba'i phyir smon lam btab pa bas 'ga' zhig gis skad cig thang cig yud tsam sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas pas 
[\[113b.6\]]mchod pa dang phyag byas na re ba'i smon lam thams cad myur du 'grub cing rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po 'di sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir/_sems can rnams kyi smon lam yongs su 
[\[113b.7\]]rdzogs par byed na dper na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gter dang 'dra'o/_/de ltar skyes bu chen po 'di ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir yun ring po nas smon lam chen po shin tu brtan pa dang /_snying rje chen po dang shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus bsgoms pa'i phyir byang 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]chub sems dpa' kun pas khyad par du 'phags pa yin pas khyed kyis bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod par bya'o/_/de nas phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /_nyan thos dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_
[\[114a.2\]]dri za la sogs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'dug pa las langs nas ci nus su so so nas gser dang /_dngul dang /_rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi me tog dang /_spos kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la mchod pa'i phyir mngon par gtor to/_/de 
[\[114a.3\]]ma yin pa gzhan yang lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /_nor bu dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_mu tig gi phreng ba dang /_mu tig gi se mo do dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_rin po che'i phreng ba dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_gdugs la sogs pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[114a.4\]]dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la mchod pa'i phyir phul lo/_/gzhan yang tshad med pa'i lha rdzas kyi rol mo snyan pa dang /_tshigs su bcad pa'i bstod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas so/_/de nas 
[\[114a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lha rdzas kyi mchod pa'i yo byad de dag slar bcom ldan 'das la phul nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin mi rnams dang /_/phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i mchod pa 
[\[114a.6\]]rnams/_/yon tan chen po 'jig rten gtso la dbul/_/mchog gi mchod pa 'di dag bzhes su gsol/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos tshigs su bcad pa de smras nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal ba dang /_de la bcom 
[\[114a.7\]]ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/brtan pa'i blo dang rnam dag sems bskyed nas/_/sems can tshad med pa yi sdug bsngal bcil/_/rin chen dag ltar bde ba 'byung bar mthong /_/rdo rje bzhin du the tsom dra ba gcod/_/snying rje chen po'i blo can 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]brtson 'grus kyis/_/mchod pa dam pa bcom ldan 'das la dbul/_/rgya mtsho ye shes sems can sdug bsngal sgrol/_/'jigs pa med pas srid pa'i pha rol phyin/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po 'dug pa las langs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di 
[\[114b.2\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chu bo bzhi las sgrol ba'i bcom ldan 'das kyi nye gnas dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa dran pa 'phel ba dang /_bsrung ba'i dran pa 'phel ba dang /_'tsho ba 'phel ba dang /_lus bde 
[\[114b.3\]]ba 'phel ba dang /_nad ma mchis pa 'phel ba dang /_gzugs dang stobs 'phel ba dang /_grags pa 'phel ba dang /_'tsho ba'i yo byad 'phel ba dang /_gnyen bshes 'phel ba dang /_slob ma 'phel ba dang /_tshul khrims 'phel ba dang /_mang du thos pa 'phel ba dang /_sbyin pa 
[\[114b.4\]]'phel ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin 'phel ba dang /_bzod pa 'phel ba dang /_thabs mkhas pa 'phel ba dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dag dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa 'phel ba dang /_theg pa chen po'i yang dag pa'i lam la gzhol ba'i 'phel ba dang /_chos kyi sgron ma 'phel ba dang /_
[\[114b.5\]]sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba 'phel ba dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po 'phel ba dang /_rnam par dkar ba'i chos 'phel ba dang /_khams gsum du grags pa 'phel ba dang /_khams gsum du chos kyi char 'phel ba dang /_sa chen po thams cad kyi ro bro ba 
[\[114b.6\]]'phel ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi mdangs dang dge ba'i las 'phel ba dang /_chos kyi dga' ba dang dge ba spyod pa 'phel ba dang /_shes rab kyi 'od 'phel ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug 'phel ba dang /_spyan lnga 'phel ba dang /_dbang bskur ba 'thob pa dang /_
[\[114b.7\]]lhar skye ba dang /_mya ngan las 'da' ba 'phel ba la sogs pa thob par byed pa nas/_'di lta ste/_me dang chur ldan pa dang /_bkra shis kyi 'od snang ba dang /_thos pa 'dzin pa'i rig sngags chen po dang /_gzungs kyi tshig 'di bdag gis 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]chu klung gang gA'i bye ma snyed la bsnyen bkur bgyis nas gzungs 'di thos te/_gzungs 'dis ni rnam par dkar ba'i chos thams cad 'phel zhing skye ba dang /_sa bon gyi tshogs dang /_rtsa ba dang /_myu gu dang /_yal ga dang /_sdong po dang /_lo ma dang /_'dab ma dang /_me 
[\[115a.2\]]tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_rtsi shing dang /_lo thog gi bro ba dang /_bsung 'phel zhing skye ba dang /_char chu dang ldan pa dang /_phan par 'gyur ba'i sa dang /_chu dang /_me dang /_rlung 'phel zhing skye ba dang /_dga' ba dang /_bde ba 'phel zhing skye ba dang /_rin po che dang nor rdzas 'phel zhing skye ba dang /_
[\[115a.3\]]mthu stobs 'phel zhing skye ba dang /_'tsho ba'i yo byad thams cad 'phel zhing skye bar 'gyur ro/_/yang gzungs 'dis ni shes rab skye bas nyon mongs pa'i dgra yang yongs su bcom par 'gyur ba'i sngags la 'di lta ste/_tshim b+ho tshim b+ho/_tsim tshim b+ho/_A kA Sha tshim b+ho/_ba ka ra 
[\[115a.4\]]tshim b+ho/_a ma bar tshim b+ho/_bar tshim b+ho/_ba tsir tshim b+ho/_a ro ga tshim b+ho/_d+harma tshim b+ho/_sa te ba tshim b+ho/_sa te ni ha la tshim b+ho/_bi ba ro ka sha ba tshim b+ho/_u pa sha ma tshim b+ho/_nA yan tshim b+ho/_pradz+nyA sa ma mo ne rat+na tshim b+ho/_k+Sha Na tshim b+ho/_bi She ma ba ri yA tshim 
[\[115a.5\]]b+ho/_shA sI ta la ma ba tshim b+ho/_bi a dra so ta ma he le/_dam be ya ma be/_tsakrA se/_tsakrA ba si le/_k+Shi le phi le ka ra b+ha/_bA ra ba rI te/_ha se re pra rA be/_pa re tsa rA b+han dA ne/_a ra dA ne/_phAn ra/_tsa tsa tsa tsa/_hi le mi le/_a kha ta thA ge khe/_thag khI lo/_th+hA re th+hA re/_
[\[115a.6\]]mi le ma d+he/_nan te ku le mi le/_ang ku tsi ta b+he/_A rai gyi re/_ba ra gyi re/_ku ta sha ma ma le/_ton gye ton gye/_ton gU le/_hu rU hu rU hu rU/_ku lo sto mi le/_me ri to/_me ri te/_b+han d+ha ta/_ha ra kha ma re ma/_hu ru hu ru/_srid pa'i dri ma sbyong ba dge bar gsungs/_/'thab 
[\[115a.7\]]rtsod bskal pa zhi ba'ang dge bar gsungs/_/mi dge bsam pa sbyong ba dge bar gsungs/_/'byung ba chen po sbyong ba'ang dge bar gsungs/_/ngan par 'gro ba sbyong ba dge bar gsungs/_/sdig pa'i bag chags sbyong ba'ang dge bar gsungs/_/re ba rdzogs par byed pa dge bar gsungs/_/lo 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]thog smin par byed pa'ang dge bar gsungs/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis dge bar gsungs pa 'di/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis byin brlabs pa/_/dge bar gsungs 'dis byang chub sems dpa'i rnams/_/byin gyis rlob mdzad rjes su yi rang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar me dang chu dang 
[\[115b.2\]]ldan pa dang /_bkra shis kyi 'od snang ba dang /_thos pa 'dzin pa'i rig sngags chen po gzungs kyi tshig 'di ni bdag gis 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu klung gang gA'i bye ma snyed la bsnyen bkur bgyis pas thos so/_/gzungs 'di ni rnam par dkar ba'i chos thams cad 'phel 
[\[115b.3\]]zhing skye bar bgyid pa nas de bzhin du rgyas pa'i longs spyod pa'i yo byad thams cad kyi bar du 'phel zhing skye bar bgyid do/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzungs 'dis ni chu bo bzhi las sgrol bar byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi nye gnas su gyur pa dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_
[\[115b.4\]]dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa'i dmigs pa 'phel bar bgyid pa nas/_de bzhin du rgyas par 'tsho ba'i yo byad thams cad kyi bar du 'phel zhing skye bar bgyid do/_/gzungs 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa'i gsung rab bdud rtsi lta bu yongs su rgyas pa dang /_
[\[115b.5\]]yun du gnas shing khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos thos pa 'dzin pa'i rigs sngags chen po dang /_gzungs kyi tshig 'di smras pa na/_ri kha la te ya rab tu g.yos nas 
[\[115b.6\]]lha'i rol mo bye ba khrag khrig kyang ma dkrol bar rang 'khrol te/_lha'i spos dang /_me tog dang /_rin po che tshad med pa rnam pa sna tshogs char bzhin du babs nas de'i tshe 'khor mang po de dag thams cad kyang ngo mtshar rmad du gyur to/_/de'i tshe na 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de na lha mo 
[\[115b.7\]]bkra shis chen mo dang /_dpal ldan lha mo chen mo dang /_mchod dbyangs lha mo chen mo dang /_brtan pa lha mo chen mo dang /_chu can lha mo chen mo dang /_'od chen lha mo chen mo la sogs pa lha mo 'byung ba chen po bzhi la dbang du gyur pa stong phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad 'dug pa las langs nas/_
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbyar nas bsti stang dang bcas pas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/ngo mtshar che'o/_/bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar che'o/_/bde bar gshegs pa bdag gis 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag la dbang sgyur mod kyi 
[\[116a.2\]]'byung ba chen po bzhi'i thog ma dang /_bar ma dang /_tha ma'i skye ba dang /_'gag pa dang /_'thun pa dang /_mi 'thun pa'i phyogs mi 'tshal te/_skyes bu chen po 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phra ba shin tu zab mo thob nas 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i thog ma dang /_bar ma dang /_tha ma'i mtshan nyid 
[\[116a.3\]]dang /_skye ba dang /_'gag pa dang /_'thun pa dang /_mi 'thun pa'i phyogs la shin tu mkhas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phra ba shin tu zab mo thob pas 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i thog ma dang /_bar 
[\[116a.4\]]ma dang /_tha ma'i mtshan nyid skye ba dang /_'gag pa dang /_'thun pa dang /_mi 'thun pa'i phyogs la shin tu mkhas so/_/lha mo 'di ltar shes par bya'o/_/'di lta ste/_yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ni yon tan mang po dang ldan pas rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs char 
[\[116a.5\]]bzhin du 'bab ste/_sems can mang po la sbyin pa byed do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di yang de bzhin du byang chub kyi yan lag gi rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs char bzhin du 'bebs te sems can la sbyin pa byed do/_/'di lta ste/_rin po che'i gling ltar rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su 
[\[116a.6\]]gang ba bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'di yang byang chub kyi yan lag gi rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan no/_/'di lta ste/_lha rdzas kyi shing pa ri tsi tra la bsung dang me tog gis mdzes pa bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu mdzes so/_/
[\[116a.7\]]'di lta ste/_seng ge'i rgyal po ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]thams cad kyi zil gyis mi non cing mi skrag pa bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'di yang sems can thams cad kyis bag tsha ba'am zil gyis non pa med do/_/'di lta ste/_ji ltar nyi ma gsal bas 'jig rten gyi mun pa thams cad yongs su sel ba 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'di yang sems can thams cad kyi ngan par lta ba'i ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sel ba'o/_/'di lta ste/_nam thang ba'i zla ba ni mtshan mo'i dus su lam stor ba'i sems can thams cad la bde ba'i lam ston te/_gar 'gro bar dga' ba bzhin du phyin par 'gyur 
[\[116b.2\]]ba ltar/_rigs kyi bu 'di yang ma rig pa'i mtshan mor theg pa gsum las 'brog bslad de 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon par 'khyam pa'i sems can thams cad la theg pa gsum gyis yang dag pa'i lam ston cing skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du thabs kyis yang dag par 'byung ba'i lam la 'god 
[\[116b.3\]]par byed do/_/'di lta ste/_sa chen po la ni sa bon gyi tshogs thams cad dang /_rtsi shing dang /_lo thog dang /_sa'i khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ba ltar/_rigs kyi bu 'di la yang byang chub kyi yan lag khyad par can gyi chos thams cad ston pa'i 
[\[116b.4\]]gnas so/_/'di lta ste/_rin po che chen po'i ri rab ri'i rgyal po ni shin tu brtan zhing ma god ma nyams pa bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi ma 'dres pa'i chos thams cad la shin tu gnas shing sems can thams cad mi gtong ba'i phyir mi nyams pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[116b.5\]]ba thams cad la gtong ba'i phyir ma god pa'o/_/'di lta ste/_nam mkha' la sems can thams cad spyod pa bzhin du/_rigs kyi bu 'di yang sems can thams cad de la longs spyod do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni de ltar yon tan tshad med dpag tu med pa dang ldan no/_/de'i tshe 
[\[116b.6\]]'khor mang po rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa bstod pa thos nas ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te/_bkur sti dang rim gro byas nas rab tu dga' bas sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la mig mi 
[\[116b.7\]]'dzums par lta'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu yang dag sa yi snying po ni/_/yon tan mang po phun sum tshogs par ldan/_/dge sbyong cha lugs 'dzin cing ston byed pa/_/ston pa chen 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]po la ni phyag 'tshal lhags/_/sems can kun la bde ba rab tu byin/_/srid pa gsum gyi sdug bsngal kun la sgrol/_/tshad med rnam pa sna tshogs char phab nas/_/ston pa chen po la ni mchod pa byed/_/brgya byin dri ma med par skyes pa des/_/phyogs bzhi kun 
[\[117a.2\]]du bltas shing brtags nas su/_/thal mo sbyar nas bsti stang rab bcas te/_/ston pa chen po la ni bsngags shing bstod/_/bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor mthong ba/_/nor bu rin po che yi 'od zer ltar/_/sangs rgyas mang po'i zhing kun snang byas te/_/thams cad gsal 
[\[117a.3\]]bar ma gyur gang yang med/_/mngon shes drug gis 'jig rten snang bar byed/_/deng 'dir 'dus shing lhags par 'gyur ba ni/_/shin tu dpa' ba sa yi snying po ste/_/rab tu byung ba'i spyod lam mngon par ston/_/'phags pa'i nor bdun 'byung ba'i gter yin te/_/'jigs 
[\[117a.4\]]pa med pa'i sangs rgyas nga ro dbyangs/_/byang chub sems dpa' mang po'i rgyal mtshan te/_/sems can mang po 'dren pa'i gtso bo'o/_/rnam par grol ba'i rin chen 'byung khung ste/_/brtson 'grus brtan pa'i bsod nams rgya mtsho yin/_/byams pa'i blo gros snying rje brtse la mos/_/
[\[117a.5\]]sdug bsngal ba yi sems can mang po sgrol/_/'jigs pa srung ba'i 'obs dang mkhar yin te/_/nam mkha' dang ba'i zla bzhin lam yang ston/_/sa ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skyed/_/rdo rje ltar ni the tsom yongs su gcod/_/rnam par grol ba'i rin chen kun la gtor/_/
[\[117a.6\]]chu ltar sgrib pa thams cad 'dag par byed/_/nyon mongs tsha bas gdungs pa'i gdugs su 'gyur/_/sman pa ltar ni nad kun 'tsho bar byed/_/zhag gcig sa yi snying po'i ming brjod pa'i/_/grags pa chen po'i bsod nams thob pa ni/_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig bar du yang /_/blo 
[\[117a.7\]]can gzhan gyi ming nas brjod pas lhag_/so so'i skye bo grol bar byed pa ni/_/nyon mongs thams cad rnam par 'ching byed pa'o/_/dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin mthar phyin cing /_/ting 'dzin gzhan dag gi yang pha rol phyin/_/rkyen mang bcu gsum po yang rnam dag pas/_/
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]mang po kun la ye shes nam mkha' bzhin/_/dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas zhing rnams kyi/_/skye bo mang po'i mun pa'i tshogs kyang bcom/_/zhing rnams ji bzhin ting 'dzin der 'jug cing /_/bsam gtan bzhi po la yang rgyun du 'jug_/ting nge 'dzin du zhugs nas sems can 
[\[117b.2\]]gyi/_/nyon mongs pa yi gdung ba rab tu sel/_/so so'i skye bo sngon gyi sdig pa'i las/_/mtshon dang nad dang mu ges 'jigs pa dang /_/rnam pa mang pos 'tshe zhing gsod gyur pa/_/de dag kun nas rnam par grol bar byed/_/sems can nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga/_/sdug bsngal 
[\[117b.3\]]mang pos 'tshe zhing gdungs gyur pa/_/sa yi snying po de la skyabs gsol na/_/srid pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/_/sems can sdug bsngal 'khor lo rab bskor te/_/gcig gis gcig la 'tshe zhing gnod gyur pa/_/sa yi snying po de la skyabs gsol na/_/bzod 
[\[117b.4\]]cing byams pa'i sems la gnas par 'gyur/_/bcu gsum rkyen gyis rab 'jigs skrag byed cing /_/tshol ba mi rnyed rkyen gyis sdug pa dag_/sa yi snying po de la skyabs gsol na/_/'jigs pa med la bde bar gnas par 'gyur/_/bsod nams byed la mos shing dran pa dang /_/
[\[117b.5\]]tshul khrims mang thos shes rab 'dod pa dag_/sa yi snying po de la skyabs gsol na/_/re ba bzhin du thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur/_/yon tan so sor smos pa'i bzod rtsal dang /_/sman dang sa bon tshogs la mos pa dag_/sa yi snying po de la skyabs gsol na/_/re ba 
[\[117b.6\]]kun dang ldan zhing rdzogs par 'gyur/_/lo thog rtsi shing legs par 'dod pa dang /_/khye'u dang bu mo gos dang bran khol phyir/_/sa yi snying po de la skyabs gsol na/_/re ba bzhin du thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur/_/yon tan mang po kun dang ldan pas na/_/sa chen 'di yang 
[\[117b.7\]]mi gtong rab tu 'dzin/_/de yi rkyen gyis sman dang lo thog rnams/_/snum zhing 'jam la ro dang ldan par 'gyur/_/nyon mongs mang pos bsgribs par gyur nas su/_/mi dge bcu yi las la mos pa dag_/sa yi snying po de la skyabs gsol na/_/mi dge nyon mongs thams cad 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]zhi bar 'gyur/_/rnam pa sna tshogs kun gyi lus ston cing /_/skye bo mang po dag la chos kyang ston/_/sbyin pa'i yon tan thams cad rdzogs pas ni/_/sems can kun la snying brtse bde bar gyur/_/gal te bskal pa mang po brgya yi bar/_/de yi yon tan 
[\[118a.2\]]bsngags shing rab bstod de/_/mthar phyin rdzogs par 'gyur ba shin tu dka'/_/de bas kun gyis bsti stang bcas pas mchod/_/'dus pa chen po las byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//
[\[118a.3\]]bam po gnyis pa/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po stan las langs te bla gos phyogs gcig tu byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das 
[\[118a.4\]]la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/yon tan tshad med rgya mtsho can/_/bcom ldan 'das la zhu gsol ba/_/the tsom nem nur ci mchis pa/_/bdag la rgyas par bshad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu yang dag pa khyod ni chos thams cad ye shes 
[\[118a.5\]]kyis mthong ba la thogs pa med do/_/'on kyang sems can la phan pa dang bde bar 'dod pa'i phyir khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems 
[\[118a.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_bdag sngon bskal pa bcu gsum du/_/spyod pa dka' ba shin du spyad/_/so so'i skye bo kun don du/_/'jigs pa gsum dang rnyog lnga bsal/_/sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig la/_/tshad ma mchis pa'i 
[\[118a.7\]]mchod bgyis pas/_/bsam pa dag pa'i 'khor 'di dang /_/tshogs chen 'dus pa'ang sngon mthong ngo /_/blo can brtson 'grus rtsol ba dag_/thams cad 'dus shing tshogs 'dir lhags/_/shin tu skyon med 'khor 'di dag_/mthong bar gyur pa ngo mtshar rmad/_/ci slad sangs 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]rgyas zhing 'di kun/_/sdig pas dge ba nyams bgyis shing /_/blo can dag gis spangs pa yi/_/ngan par spyod kun lhan cig gnas/_/mtshams med sdig pa bgyid pa dang /_/yang dag dam pa'i chos la skur/_/'phags la smod cing log lta bas/_/rtag dang chad pa'i gtsug 
[\[118b.2\]]lag 'chad/_/sdig pa bcu yi las bgyid cing /_/'jig rten phyi mas mi 'jigs pa/_/theg pa rnam gsum ring spangs shing /_/sdig can dag la ngan 'gror gzhol/_/ma rig pas ni bsgribs pa'i mig_/'dod chags phrag dog sgyus 'tsho ba/_/sangs rgyas 'khor lo rab 
[\[118b.3\]]bskor te/_/sems can 'di dag sgrol bar mdzad/_/ji ltar nying mtshams sbyor ba yi/_/nyon mongs rdo rje lta bus bcad/_/ji lta bur na gzungs dag 'thob/_/de bzhin bzod pa'ang nges par 'gyur/_/bdag gis 'dren pa tshogs chen dag_/mthong bar gyur pa ngo mtshar che/_/
[\[118b.4\]]'di 'dra'i yon tan kun tshogs pa/_/phyogs gzhan dag na ma mthong ngo /_/yon tan mang po kun ldan zhing /_/byang chub lam la rab brtson pas/_/ji ltar byis pa'i 'khor dag la/_/sangs rgyas 'khor lo bskor ba mdzad/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_legs 
[\[118b.5\]]so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyi sngon 'das pa'i dus na yang chu klung gang gA'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas dag gi zhing na rnyog pa lnga'i tshe/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu klung gang gA'i bye ma snyed la sngon 'di lta bu'i don dag zhu ba zhus so/_/khyod kyis dris pa'i don 'di dag la 
[\[118b.6\]]sngon yang nan tan shin tu byas pas shin tu rtogs shing khong du chud do/_/spyod pa mang po phun sum tshogs pa pha rol tu phyin pas shin tu thabs mkhas pa'i shes rab dang ldan te/_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_phan pa dang bde ba'i don thob par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[118b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i spyod pa'i gter sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i spyod pa'i khyad par dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su rdzogs 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]par bya ba dang /_rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po spyod pa mi dge ba la gnas pa thams cad ngan song gsum las bzlog cing mi ltung bar bya ba dang /_zhing 'dir dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung shin tu rgyas shing yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'di lta bu'i don 
[\[119a.2\]]dris pa legs so/_/shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_ngas bstan par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das la slar nyan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying 
[\[119a.3\]]po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon gyi smon lam gyi shugs kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu dang ldan te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnyog pa lnga can gyi sems can thams cad rnam par dkar ba'i chos thams cad las phyir ldog pa dang /_
[\[119a.4\]]'phags pa'i nor rin po che bdun gyis brel ba dang /_mkhas pa dag dang ring du gyur pa chad pa dang /_rtag pa'i dra bas kun nas glags pa dang /_ngan song du 'gro ba'i shing rta la spro zhing dga' ba dang /_skye ba phyi ma'i sdug bsngal la 'jigs par mi lta ba dang /_ma rig pa'i mun nag 
[\[119a.5\]]thibs po la gnas pa la dad pa dang /_mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rdzogs par byed pa dang /_mtshams med pa lnga byed pa dang /_dam pa'i chos la skur cing 'phags pa la dbang za ba/_dge ba'i chos thams cad ring du spong zhing mi dge ba'i chos rdzogs par byed pa'i gnas na 
[\[119a.6\]]bzhugs so/_/de lta bu'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i zhing na bzhugs kyang rab tu bde bar bzhugs te/_bag tsha ba med pa dang /_'jigs skrag pa med pas drang srong chen po'i gnas su phyin te/_sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo bskor nas lha dang bdud du bcas pa'i mu 
[\[119a.7\]]stegs can log par smra ba thams cad btul nas/_so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi rigs la nyon mongs pa shin tu sra ba rdo rje lta bu dag bsal nas ci la mos pa bzhin du so sor bkod do/_/mthu dang ldan pa'i sems can dag ni theg pa gsum las phyir mi ldog par yang mdzad do/_/
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_yul kha cig tu srid med par 'gyur ba na de na gnas pa'i mi thams cad bdag gi dmag dang /_gzhan gyi dmag gis yongs su gtses shing nyon mongs pa dang sdug bsngal bar gyur te/_de na gnas pa'i mi mang po yang mi bde bas 'thab pa dang /_rtsod 
[\[119b.2\]]pa dang /_gcig la gcig smod pa tshad med pa snyed 'byung ste/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_g.yo sgyu dang /_tshig rtsub por smra ba dang /_skur klang 'debs shing 'khrug pa dang /_dmus long dang /_ling tog can du 'gyur ba dang /_nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gzir ba dang /_grang ba dang /_tsha ba'i 
[\[119b.3\]]nad ma rungs pa dang /_rims rnam pa mang po dang /_smyo ba dang /_skem byed dang /_kha zas mi 'ju ba dang /_sems 'khrug cing myos pa dang /_dbang po ma tshang zhing yan lag dang nying lag nyams pa dang /_bgo ba dang /_bza' ba dang /_'tsho ba'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis phongs shing 
[\[119b.4\]]brel te/_bdog pa thams cad yid du mi 'ong ba dang /_skye bo thams cad mu stegs can dang /_'jig rten gyi lha la skyabs su song zhing lta ba ngan pa dang /_bsam pa ngan pa dang /_mos pa ngan pa yongs su rgyas te/_yang dag pa'i lam stor nas ngan song du ltung bar 'gyur ba 
[\[119b.5\]]na/_de'i tshe yul de na gnas pa'i rgan po blo dang ldan zhing yid gzhungs pa/_mang du thos pa/_drang dkan che ba 'dus nas gros su bgros te/_yul dang grong mi kun bsdus nas thams cad kyis 'thun par rgyal bu gcig btus pa ni sngon sbyin pa rab tu byas pa/_tshul khrims shin 
[\[119b.6\]]tu bsrungs pa/_brtson 'grus la brtun pa/_shin tu dka' ba spyod pa dang ldan pa/_mchog tu gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi mtshan dang ldan pa/_dbang po yongs su rdzogs shing yan lag ma nyams pa/_lus byad che chung ran pa/_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa/_phul du 
[\[119b.7\]]gyur pa'i mdog dam pa dang ldan pa/_thams cad kyis bkur sti dang rim gro byed pa/_yul de na gnas pa'i mi thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing lta 'dod pa/_rang bzhin gyis drang zhing brtan pa/_byams pa dang snying rjer ldan pa/_mang du thos pa/_rtsal thams cad dang ldan pa dang /_des 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]pa'i bzod pas sems rab tu brgyan pa/_btsun mo dam pa'i sras thu bor gyur pa/_spos dam pa rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par dag pa'i chus lus bkrus nas/_rin po ches brgyan pa'i gos dam pa spos kyis bdugs pa rnam pa sna tshogs gyon zhing /_nor bu rin po che spyi 
[\[120a.2\]]bo'i gtsug phud la btags pa/_rin po che'i me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa'i gser gyi cod pan mgo la thogs pa/_rab tu yang la 'jam pa'i dar gyis bcings pa/_gzhan yang nor bu rin po che dang /_mu tig dang /_gser dang /_dngul la sogs pa rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs las 
[\[120a.3\]]byas pa'i rna cha dang /_se mo do dang /_dpung rgyan dang /_gdu bu la sogs pa thogs pa/_rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs las byas pa'i lham gyis rkang pa bteg pa/_rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs las byas pa'i gdugs kyis steng gi bla res bres pa/_sngon lha dang drang srong thams cad kyis 
[\[120a.4\]]bsrung zhing 'dzin pa'i khri bshams pa/_brgya byin la sogs pa thams cad kyis bsrung zhing skyob pa/_bzo shin tu mkhas pas las su byas pa'i gzhal med khang chen por sngon rgyal po snga ma 'dug 'dug pa'i khri la bzhag nas rgyal por bcug go/_/rgyal sar zhugs nas lha'i dbang po 
[\[120a.5\]]dang /_klu'i dbang po dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang /_grul bum gyi dbang pos bsrung zhing 'dzin pa'i dril bu dang /_rnga chen po brdungs nas de'i sgras yul khams kun du grags par gyur te/_rgyal rigs la sogs pa rigs chen po bzhi la gtogs 
[\[120a.6\]]pa'i mi tshad med pa snyed lus yang dag par bkrus nas gos gtsang ma gyon te/_lag na rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rin po che'i gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_mu tig dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_bai dUr+ya 
[\[120a.7\]]la sogs pa tshad med pa snyed thogs te rgyal po de la phul lo/_/gzhan yang rigs mtho zhing btsun pa tshangs par spyod pa/_thos pa dang ldan zhing shes pa che ba'i bram ze thams cad kyis kyang tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa dang /_glu dang dbyangs dam pa tshad med pa snyed kyis rgyal po de la 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]bstod pa byas so/_/legs par 'gyur ba rnam pa sna tshogs thob par gyur cig ces smon lam yang btab bo/_/bkra shis pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rgyal po'i spyi bor gtor to/_/rgyal po snga ma'i blon po'i rigs la gtogs pa thos pa dang ldan zhing shes pa che ba/_drang ba/_g.yo 
[\[120b.2\]]med pa/_mdzangs pa dag kyang ci rigs su blon por rim par phye ste bcug nas/_rgyal po'i las byed pas sngon yul de na bdag dang gzhan gyi dmag thams cad kyis gtse bar 'gyur ba dang /_phyir rgol ba dang grogs po ngan pa thams cad med par byas nas phas rgol ba'i dgra dang /_
[\[120b.3\]]gnod pa byed pa thams cad zhi bar gyur nas/_nag po'i phyogs thams cad byang zhing rnam par dkar ba'i phyogs thams cad skyes te 'phel bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po de lta bu'i 'khor lo gcig dang ldan na/_'khor 
[\[120b.4\]]lo de'i dbang gis bdag gi rgyal srid rab tu che zhing phas rgol ba'i dgra thams cad shin tu thul ba las tshe yang ring bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du rnyog pa lnga'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa'i tshe/_de na gnas pa'i 
[\[120b.5\]]sems can thams cad rang gi sems kyi bag la nyal ba'i nyon mongs pas yongs su bcings nas nang gi dgra dang /_phyi rol gyi dgras rnam par gtses te/_kun nas nyon mongs pas nyon mongs nas gti mug gis ldongs te/_mi bde bar gyur pas rtag pa dang chad pa la rnam par zhen 
[\[120b.6\]]cing chags pa tshad med pa bskyed nas phan tshun rtsod cing 'gal bar byed de/_gcig la gcig dbang za zhing smod pas 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug bskyed de g.yo dang sgyu'i tshul du smra zhing mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rdzogs par byed pa dang /_rnam par zhen cing chags 
[\[120b.7\]]pa'i skye bo dag nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir rnam pa sna tshogs kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis gzir ba dang ldan pas yang dag pa'i chos kyi mig ldongs te/_zhe sdang dang khong khro bas gdungs shing 'khrugs kyang yang dag pa bden pa'i chos cung zad kyang yid la mi byed de/_
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]yang dag pa'i chos kyi ro yongs su btang nas dge ba byed pa la dbang za zhing smod do/_/de sngar bde zhing skyid pas ni brel cing phongs par 'gyur gyi rtag tu nyon mongs pa'i dra ba rnam pa mang pos dkris shing glags nas mu stegs can gyi ston pa rnam pa drug po la skyabs 
[\[121a.2\]]su song ste/_'phags pa'i lam las phyir log cing ngan song gsum las gzhol bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon sangs rgyas tshad med pa snyed la mchod cing bsnyen bkur byas pa/_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi rgya mtshor zhugs pa/_snga ma 
[\[121a.3\]]'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul la gnas pa thams cad 'dus shing tshogs nas nga'i spyan sngar lhags te tshig 'thun par 'di skad zer ro/_/khyod sngon 'das pa'i dus na sbyin pa tshad med pa la nan tan byas pa dang /_tshul khrims rab tu bsrungs pa dang /_shin tu 'bad pa'i 
[\[121a.4\]]brtson 'grus kyis shin tu spyad dka' ba spyad de/_thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bsgoms so/_/de lta bu'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang /_shes rab dang /_thabs mkhas pa dang /_snying rje chen po la sogs pas yongs su brgyan pas yon tan chen po'i 
[\[121a.5\]]gter du gyur pa/_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang gzungs rnams las rab tu bzod pa/_sa'i yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgya mtshor gyur pa'o/_/g.yo dang sgyu med cing lus byad shin tu ring la mtshan dang dpe byad phun sum tshogs par gyur pa dang des pa'i bzod 
[\[121a.6\]]pa dang ldan zhing shin tu mdzes par gyur pa/_gzhan gyi dring la mi 'brang bas byang chub kyi lam bsgom par ye shes kyi rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa/_phul du gyur pa'i mdog mchog dam pa dang ldan par gyur pa/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams 
[\[121a.7\]]cad kyi ston pa chen por gyur pa/_'khor bas 'jigs skrag pa'i sems can thams cad kyi dpung gnyen du gyur pa/_byams pa dang snying rje chen po la sogs pa yon tan tshad med pas yongs su brgyan pa/_bcom ldan 'das log par dad sel dang /_gser thub dang /_'od 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]srung la sogs pa'i sras yang dag pa bskal pa bzang po 'dir mngon par 'tshang rgya ba/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi nang na gtso bor gyur pa/_yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi spos can/_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi chu yongs su dag pas khrus byas pa/_khrel ba dang 
[\[121b.2\]]'dzem pa'i gos gyon pa/_rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings gtsug gi nor bur thogs pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul rgya chen po'i me tog gi phreng ba'i cod pan thogs pa/_rnam par grol ba'i srad bus bcings pa/_gzhan yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye 
[\[121b.3\]]shes dang /_mi skye ba'i bzod pa la sogs pa yon tan gyi rin po che sa yongs su brgyan pa/_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms kyi lham rin po che gyon pa/_khams gsum yongs su khebs pa'i spyod pa rnam gsum gyis 'phags pa'i 
[\[121b.4\]]rgyu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i gdugs kyis bkab pa/_sngon gyi sangs rgyas dang /_lha dang /_drang srong gis yongs su bzung ba'i rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi gdan bshams pa/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bkur sti dang bcas te yongs su bzung ba'i dran 
[\[121b.5\]]pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la bzhugs pa/_sngon gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bting ba'i gdan la bzhugs nas bla na med pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su gyur pa dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi gcad pa'i phyir chos kyi 'khor 
[\[121b.6\]]lo bskor to/_/chos kyi rnga rab tu brdungs nas khams gsum kun du chos kyi sgra bsgrags te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_grul bum dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za dang /_
[\[121b.7\]]srul po dang /_lus srul po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa thams cad 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhis grol bar byas so/_/yan lag bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo gang 'jig rten du bcas pa dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_lha dang /_bdud dang /_tshangs pa 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa gang gis kyang ma bskor ba de/_'jig rten du bcas pa lha dang mi tshad med pa dag la phan pa dang bde ba'i don chen po mchog dam pa thob par bya ba'i phyir sngon gang gis kyang ma bskor ba de rnam pa gsum du rab tu bskor to/_/
[\[122a.2\]]rigs kyi bu nga de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo gcig pa de dang ldan te/_'khor lo de'i dbang gis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jig rten 'di dang 'jig rten phyi ma dang /_gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mngon sum du mkhyen pas 'jigs pa med pa thob ste/_bde bar gnas 
[\[122a.3\]]shing lha dang bdud du bcas pa'i mu stegs can log par smra ba thams cad shin tu btul nas tshangs pa chen po'i 'khor lo bskor te/_tshangs pa chen po'i spyad pa shin tu grub pas nga ni rnyog pa lnga'i sdig pa can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du seng ge'i sgra yang 
[\[122a.4\]]dag par bsgrags te/_sems can thams cad kyi mtshams med pa lnga'i las zhi bar byas so/_/de bzhin du mi dge ba'i rtsa bar gtogs pa thams cad bsal nas skye bo thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i rgyun rdo rje ltar sra bdag kyang zhi bar byed do/_/zag pa thams cad yongs su 
[\[122a.5\]]zad pa rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bu dam pa la rnam par bzhag nas ci dang ci la mos pa bzhin du thams cad bde bar 'jog pa dang /_mthu dang ldan pa'i sems can dag ni theg pa gsum la bzhag ste phyir mi ldog par yang mdzad do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_rgyal rigs 
[\[122a.6\]]rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po thog ma rgyal sar zhugs nas rgyal po'i srid bzung ma thag tu 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar gyi rgyal po thams cad kyis chos dang khrims la shin tu lta zhing rtog go/_/de ltar rgyal po kun gyi las kyi 'khor 
[\[122a.7\]]lo shin tu rtogs nas rgyu dang 'bras bu smin pa yang shes te/_ci dang cir ldan pa bzhin de dang de lta bu'i thabs byin te las su bcug pas/_yul de na gnas pa'i mdzangs ngan las las kyi 'khor lo rnam pa gsum byed du bcug go/_/las kyi 'khor lo de'i dbang gis 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad yun ring por 'tsho ba'i yo byad yid du 'ong ba rnam pa sna tshogs la longs spyod pa dang /_bde skyid 'phel zhing skye ba dang /_phas rgol ba'i dgra thams cad kyang thul bar gyur to/_/las kyi 'khor lo rnam pa gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta 
[\[122b.2\]]ste/_rgyal po srid kyi las kyi 'khor lo rnam par bzhag pas gang dgra thabs mkhas par bslabs shing rtsal sbyangs te/_phas rgol ba'i dgra 'dul zhing mi mang po srung bar byed pa dang /_zhing dang gnas byed pa'i las kyi 'khor lo rnam par bzhag pas gang khang khyim brtsigs 
[\[122b.3\]]pa dang zhing gi las lag byad kyis phyin par byed du 'jug cing bde bar byas pas bza' ba dang btung bas mi brel bar byed pa dang /_/nor rin po che tshol ba'i las kyi 'khor lo rnam par bzhag pas gang tshong spogs dang /_bzo rnam pa sna tshogs slob tu gzhug cing 'tsho ba'i 
[\[122b.4\]]yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs yid bzhin du spyad du yod la bde zhing skyid pa 'phel bar byed pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po rgyal po'i 'khor lo gsum po 'di dang ldan na 'khor lo 'di'i dbang gis bdag gi yul rab tu bde 
[\[122b.5\]]zhing skyid pa dang /_phas rgol ba'i dgra dang grogs po ngan pa btul zhing lus srung ba'i nan tan la mkhas pas tshe yang ring bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang thog ma mngon par sangs rgyas te bla na med pa'i ye shes thob nas 'das pa dang /_
[\[122b.6\]]ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi mig la shin tu rtog go/_/de ltar shin tu brtags pas las dang chos rnams kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu rab tu mkhyen te/_'dul bar 'gyur ba'i sems can thams cad la las kyi 'khor lo rnam pa gsum rnam par gzhag 
[\[122b.7\]]go/_/las kyi 'khor lo de'i dbang gis dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung dang /_chos kyi mig yun ring du gnas pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag pa'i chos rgya cher kun du khyab pa dang /_skye bo thams cad rtag tu mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du shin tu bde 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]ba thob pa dang /_mu stegs can log par smra ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs shing yang dag pa'i chos kyi mig gis phas rgol ba thams cad chos bzhin du thul bar 'gyur ro/_/de la rigs kyi bu las kyi 'khor lo rnam pa gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ting nge 
[\[123a.2\]]'dzin bsgom pa'i las kyi 'khor lo rnam par gzhag pa dang /_kha don goms par bya ba'i las kyi 'khor lo rnam par gzhag pa dang /_bsod nams bya ba'i las kyi 'khor lo rnam par gzhag pa dang gsum mo/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[123a.3\]]bsgom pa'i las kyi 'khor lo gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin rnam pa bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'i lus 'di la brtags na yul drug dang /_bdag dang bdag gir zhen cing chags pa'i rgyu dang /_las kyi zhing dang /_ma rig 
[\[123a.4\]]pas bsgribs pa dang /_sred pa'i chus brlan pa'i dbang med par gzhan gyi dbang gis yod par gyur pas rkyen mang po la rag las pa'o/_/las dang nyon mongs pa dang sdug bsngal gyi rgyun rnam pa gsum po dgag pa'i phyir de ltar brtag go/_/las kyi rgyun gang zhe na/_gang sems 
[\[123a.5\]]can rnams ji snyed kyi 'du byed mngon du spyod pa de ma rig pa dang /_sred pa'i rgyu las srid pa skye bas nyon mongs pa'i rgyun ces bya'o/_/nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis rnam par shes pa'i rgyu dang rkyen mang po 'dus pa las ming dang gzugs skye'o/_/ming dang gzugs kyi rgyu dang rkyen mang po 'dus 
[\[123a.6\]]pa las skye mched drug skye'o/_/skye mched drug gi rgyu dang rkyen mang po 'dus pa las reg pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_srid pa phyi ma'i skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_'chi ba la sogs pa rim gyis 'byung ba ni sdug bsngal gyi rgyun ces bya'o/_/de ltar rgyun gsum po 'di ni las kyi zhing la ma rig pa'i rgyu 
[\[123a.7\]]dang /_sred pa'i brlan gyis skye bar gyur to/_/'di ltar las kyi zhing la ma rig pa'i rgyu dang /_sred pa'i brlan gyis rnam pa gsum po bskam pa'i phyir nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa dang /_bems po dang /_g.yo ba med pa dang /_sgyu 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]ma lta bu dang /_smig rgyu ba lta bu dang /_chu'i zla ba lta bu dang /_rmi lam lta bu stong pa ci yang med pa/_mtshan ma med pa/_smon pa med pa/_byas pa med pa/_ma byung ba/_ma skyes pa/_gzugs med pa/_zhi ba dang /_dben pa dang /_byung ba dang /_skye ba'i gnas med par rtogs so/_/de ltar 
[\[123b.2\]]nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la shin tu brtags pas stong pa nyid dang rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa la phyogs so/_/yang nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la rjes su brtag par bya ba'i phyir gzhan 
[\[123b.3\]]yang thabs mkhas pas dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba la rtog ste nang du rgyu ba dang /_phyir rgyu ba'i dran pa goms par byed do/_/de la ji ltar na dran pa'i dbang gis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba la rtog ce na/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bgrang ba dang /_rjes su 'brang 
[\[123b.4\]]ba dang /_zhi gnas dang /_lhag mthong dang /_'jug pa dang /_yongs su dag pa la rtog go/_/de la bgrang bas ni las kyi dngos po rnam pa gnyis byed par 'gyur te/_rten du gyur pas rnam par rtog pa dang /_rnam par dpyod pa rnams thul ba dang /_dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba'i 
[\[123b.5\]]mtshan nyid 'dzin par nus pa'o/_/rjes su 'brang bas kyang las kyi dngos po rnam pa gnyis byed par 'gyur te/_yang dag par 'byung ba la rten cing rnam par rtog pa dang /_rnam par dpyod pa dang bral ba dang /_dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba'i 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid la mkhas par gyur 
[\[123b.6\]]pa'o/_/zhi gnas kyis kyang las kyi dngos po rnam pa gnyis byed par 'gyur te/_dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba bri bar mngon du ston pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi mchog la gnas par nus pa'o/_/lhag mthong gis kyang las kyi dngos po rnam pa gnyis byed par 'gyur te/_dbugs phyi 
[\[123b.7\]]nang du rgyu ba zad par mngon du ston pa dang /_sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos so sor rtogs pa la gnas pa'o/_/'jug pas kyang las kyi dngos po rnam pa gnyis byed par 'gyur te/_nye bar len pa'i phung po spong ba'i sbyor ba la mkhas pa dang /_'phags pa'i sar 'jug 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]pa la sbyor ba'o/_/yongs su dag pas kyang bya ba'i las kyi dngos po gnyis byed par 'gyur te/_kun nas nyon mongs pa spong ba dang /_lta ba yongs su dag pa'o/_/de ltar sbyor ba rnam pa drug gis dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba la rtog pa bsgoms pas nye 
[\[124a.2\]]bar len pa'i phung po lnga rtogs pa dang rjes su 'thun par 'jug go/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ji ltar dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba'i rang bzhin ni gzugs nye bar len pa'i phung po'o/_/dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba len cing myong bar byed pa ni tshor ba nye bar len pa'i phung po'o/_/dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba'i 
[\[124a.3\]]mtshan nyid len pa ni 'du shes nye bar len pa'i phung po'o/_/dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba mngon du byed pa ni 'du byed nye bar len pa'i phung po'o/_/dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba bye brag tu 'byed pa ni rnam par shes pa nye bar len pa'i phung po ste/_de ltar nye bar len pa'i phung po rnam pa lnga bshad pa ni 
[\[124a.4\]]so so ba/_tha dad pa mi 'dra ba/_gsar ma yin pa/_rnying ma yin pa/_gnas med pa/_spungs pa med pa ma yin pa/_brjod du med pa'o/_/de ltar nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga shin tu rtogs pas 'du byed rnam pa gsum yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te de ltar 'du 
[\[124a.5\]]byed rnam pa gsum yongs su zad par rjes su brtags pa'i mthar phyin na rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'i lus dang /_yul drug rjes su rtogs pa'i mthar phyin par 'gyur ro/_/bdag dang bdag gir zhen pa dang /_las dang /_ma rig pa dang /_srid pa'i rgyu dang /_zhing dang /_
[\[124a.6\]]kun nas 'gebs pa'i rlan pa yang thams cad zad par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom pa yang yongs su rdzogs pa nas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du yang bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[124a.7\]]chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du yang bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang /_mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa dang /_dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa'i bar du bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]ro/_/de bzhin du 'gro ba dang 'ong ba rjes su dran pas gzung bar bsam gtan dag la zhugs pa ni yang dag pa'i chos don dam pa la gnas pa'i sems can zhes bya'o/_/bsam gtan yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bsgom pa zhes bya'o/_/dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[124b.2\]]la yang dag par mchod pa zhes bya'o/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs las byung ba'i sras thams cad kyi gsung las skyes pa/_chos kyis grub pa/_chos kyis btul ba zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' la las de ltar bsgoms pa las bags kyis phyir nur na yang zag pa 
[\[124b.3\]]zad pa'i dgra bcom par gyur pa nas mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' la la de ltar bsgoms pas gong nas gong du 'phar ba ni yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por gyur pa nas sangs rgyas 
[\[124b.4\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/_ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu ngas rnam pa de snyed kyi las dang /_chos dang /_
[\[124b.5\]]tshor ba dang /_rgyu dang /_'bras bu dang /_rnam par smin pa la ye shes kyis dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi chos la brtags na sems can dag ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'i las kyi 'khor lo bcu rnam par bzhag la sgom du 'dzud do/_/rigs kyi bu de dag ni de bzhin gshegs 
[\[124b.6\]]pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom pa'i las kyi 'khor lo zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha ton goms pa'i las kyi 'khor lo zhe na/_gang dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dang /_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs
