[\[144b.6\]]nas thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ltar tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba bzhi shin tu srung ba'i rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo dag chos kyi snod du gyur pa'i chos kyi snod du ma gyur pa kun la sems mnyam 
[\[144b.7\]]par bzhag ste/_mi brnyas mi smad bdag mi bstod mi snyems glo bur du nyes pa ma gleng ngo zhes gsungs na/_de lta na ni ma mchis pa'i dus na dge slong tshul khrims nyams zhing mi dge ba spyod pa/_dge sbyong ma lags par dge sbyong du khas 'che ba/_tshangs par spyod pa ma lags par 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]tshangs par spyod par khas 'che ba dag la dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis ji lta bu'i thabs kyis gleng zhing dgar bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa u pa li la bka' stsal pa/_ngas mu stegs can dang /_khyim pa rnams kyis dge slong gi nyes pa gleng du ni gnang ba'i 
[\[145a.2\]]skabs med do/_/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis kyang chos bzhin ma yin pa dang /_ma rtogs par tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi nyes pa gleng du ma gnang na dgar ba'am bskrad pa lta ci smos/_chos bzhin ma yin pa dang /_ma rtogs par tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi nyes pa glengs 
[\[145a.3\]]sam gal te bskrad na kha na ma tho ba chen po'i sdig pa 'thob bo/_/u pa li 'di ltar shes par bya ste/_chos bzhin ma yin pa dang /_ma rtogs pa rnam pa 'di bcus tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi nyes pa glengs na kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa chen po thob par 'gyur gyis/_mkhas pa dag 
[\[145a.4\]]gis ni de ltar mi bya'o/_/bcu gang zhe na/_dge 'dun ma dad par rgyal po'i spyan sngar ma rtogs bzhin du tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba dang /_dge 'dun ma dad par kun du rgyu ba'i mdun du tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba dang /_dge 'dun ma dad 
[\[145a.5\]]par blon po'i mdun du tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba dang /_dge 'dun ma dad par tshong dpon dang /_khyim bdag gi mdun du tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba dang /_bud med mang po'i mdun du tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba 
[\[145a.6\]]dang /_skyes pa mang po'i mdun du tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba dang /_ma rung bar byed pa mang po'i mdun du tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba dang /_dge slong dang dge slong ma mang po'i mdun du tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba dang /_
[\[145a.7\]]khon yod pa'i mdun du tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba dang /_dgra bo zhe 'gras pa'i mdun du ma rtogs bzhin du tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba'o/_/'di dag ni chos ma yin pa dang /_ma rtogs par tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi nyes 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]pa glengs na kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur ba bcu zhes bya'o/_/gal te bden pa yang dag pa la brten te glengs na yang nyes par 'gyur na bden pa ma yin pa la brten te gleng ba lta ci smos te/_kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang chos ma yin pa 
[\[145b.2\]]rnam pa 'di bcus tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi nyes pa glengs na kha na ma tho ba chen po'i sdig 'thob par 'gyur gyis mkhas pa dag gis de ltar mi bya'o/_/bcu gang zhe na/_mu stegs can dag gis dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba dang /_tshul khrims med pa'i khyim pa dag gis 
[\[145b.3\]]dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba dang /_mtshams med pa byas pa dag gis dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba dang /_dam pa'i chos la skur pa dag gis dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba dang /_'phags pa rnams la smod pa dag gis dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba dang /_glen pa sems 'khrug pa dag gis 
[\[145b.4\]]dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba dang /_nad kyis yongs su gzir ba dag gis dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba dang /_phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rung bar byed pa bas dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba dang /_bza' shing gi ra ba srung ba dag gis dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba dang /_dge slong chad pa pa 
[\[145b.5\]]dag gis dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba ste/_chos ma yin pa rnam pa 'di bcus dge slong tshul khrims nyams pa'i nyes pa glengs na kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/ji ste bden pa yang dag pa la brten te glengs na yang nyes par 'gyur na bden pa ma yin par gleng 
[\[145b.6\]]ba lta ci smos te/_kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang u pa li gal te dge slong tshul khrims nyams pa dag dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi nang na dge 'dun dang lhan cig tu gnas na/_dge slong de'i nang na tshul bzhin du byed pa/_spyod lam dang ldan 
[\[145b.7\]]pa/_yon tan lnga phrugs dang ldan pa gcig 'dug pa las langs te/_gos tshags bcos la bsti stang dang bcas pas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal la/_de nas tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi mdun du song la nyes pa gleng ngo zhes 'di skad 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]gsol ba thob shig_/tshe dang ldan pa dgongs shig bdag deng tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi nyes pa gleng ngo /_/bden pa/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa ma yin pa dus la bab pa/_dus las mi 'da' ba/_'dzum bzhin du smra ba/_mi brlang ba'i tshig dang /_byams pa'i sems dang /_zhe sdang 
[\[146a.2\]]med pa dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba'i gnod pa ma yin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mig dang /_chos kyi sgron ma yun du gnas par bya ba'i phyir gleng ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi nyes pa bdag gis chos bzhin du gleng ngo zhes gsol ba thob shig_/gang zag des gleng 
[\[146a.3\]]du gnang na ni chos bzhin du gleng bar bya'o/_/gal te gleng du ma gnang na phyir yang gnas brtan dang /_dge 'dun gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te bsti stang dang bcas pas 'di skad ces gsol cig_/dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba nyes pa 'di lta bu zhig bgyis te/_bdag gis chos 
[\[146a.4\]]lnga la brten te gleng bar 'tshal lo zhes gsol cig_/de nas dge 'dun gyi nang na dge slong gnas brtan gyis shin tu rtogs la gleng ba bas ci gleng ba dang /_nyes pa ci byas pa dang /_bden nam [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]nam lci'am yang ba rtogs la 'dul ba dang /_mdo sde la brten te bsdigs 
[\[146a.5\]]pa dang /_bzho ba'i thabs sna tshogs kyis dri zhing gleng bar bya'o/_/bdun shin tu zhi bar bya ba'i chos kyis gang dang gang du 'thun pa de dang de'i chos kyis zhi bar bya'o/_/gal te nyes pa chen po byas na yang chad pa chen pos gcad do/_/nyes pa 'bring byas na yang chad pa 'bring gis gcad do/_/
[\[146a.6\]]nyes pa chung ngu byas na yang chad pa chung ngus gcad de khrel ba dang /_ngo tsha bas nyes pa mthol du gzhug go/_/de nas u pa lis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/nyes pa yang dag par byung ba'i sdig pa bgyis pa'i dge slong dag gal te khyim pa'i mthu 
[\[146a.7\]]la snyems sam/_nor gyi mthu snyems sam/_mang du thos pa'i mthu dang /_smra bshags kyi mthu dang /_slob ma'i mthu la snyems te/_mthu rnam pa de lta bus mjing bsdoms te/_de dge 'dun gyi ngag mi nyan la dge slong gnas brtan mdo sde dang /_'dul ba dang /_ma mo 'dzin 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]pas chos bzhin du bstan cing bcos kyang nyan du mi btub pa'i dge slong de la ji ltar chad pas gcad par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gnas brtan sde snod gsum 'dzin pas dge 'dun la dad pa dris te/_rgyal po dang /_blon po chen po la 
[\[146b.2\]]mthu btsal ba'i pho nya thong la gdod chos bzhin du chad pas chod cig_/u pa lis yang gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te sdig pa bgyid pa'i dge slong de nor dbyig gi mthu dang /_mang du thos pa'i mthu dang /_smra bshags kyi mthu dang /_thabs rnam pa sna tshogs 
[\[146b.3\]]kyis rgyal po dang /_blon po yang dga' bar bgyis te/_thams cad chos ma lags pa bgyid pa/_tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi grogs bgyid de/_tshul khrims ngan pa tsam gyi dge slong de dag sdig pa nyam rangs su bgyid du stsal nas/_chos bzhin du 
[\[146b.4\]]chad pas gcad du yang mi ster na/_de'i tshe de la dge 'dun gyis ji ltar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis u pa li la bka' stsal pa/_gal te dge slong de mi gnas pa dang mi bya ba la brten te/_dge 'dun gyi nang du gnas nas sdig pa chen po mngon sum du mi snang na/_
[\[146b.5\]]de'i tshe dge 'dun gyis skad cig gzhag go/_/gal te dge slong de mi gnas pa dang mi bya ba'i sdig pa chen po mngon sum du snang bzhin du dge 'dun gyi nang na gnas na/_de'i tshe dge 'dun dag dad pa dris te/_chos bzhin du bskrad de sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir dbyung ngo /_/
[\[146b.6\]]u pa li 'di lta ste/_nas kyi zhing gi nang na nas la gnod pa skyes pa yang myu gu dang /_sdong bu dang /_tshigs nas dang 'dra yang /_nas bzang po sme bar byed de/_nas la gnod pa de snye ma ma byung ba na nas kyi bdag pos skad cig 'jog go/_/snye ma byung ma thag pa na nas kyi 
[\[146b.7\]]bdag pos nas bzang po sme bar byed do snyam bsams nas rtsa thon du phyung ste zhing de'i phyi rol du 'dor ro/_/de bzhin du mi gnas pa dang /_mi bya ba'i dge slong tshul khrims nyams pa de khyim pa dang mthu rnam pa mang po snyems te/_dge 'dun gyi nang na gnas pa spyod 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]lam dang cha lugs dge 'dun dang 'dra yang /_dge 'dun rnam par dag pa sme bar byed de/_srung ma'i lhas ma glengs kyi bar du dge 'dun gyi nang na gnas te/_sdig pa chen po mngon sum du mi snang na de'i tshe dge 'dun gyis skad cig zhog shig_/gal 
[\[147a.2\]]te lha srung mas kyang bskul la dge 'dun gyi nang na nyes pa chen po yang mngon sum du snang bar gyur na/_de'i tshe dge 'dun dad pa dris te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir skrod cig_/u pa li 'di lta ste/_rgya mtsho chen por ni ro zhag lon par mi 'jog go/_/de bzhin 
[\[147a.3\]]du nga'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi slob ma yang tshul khrims nyams pa/_sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong ro dang 'dra ba dang lhan cig mi 'grogs so/_/u pa lis yang gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te tshul khrims nyams pa sdig pa byed pa'i dge slong de dge 'dun dad pa dris 
[\[147a.4\]]te bskrad kyang nor rin po che'i mthu dang /_mang du thos pa'i mthu dang /_smra bshags kyi mthu dang /_thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rgyal po dang /_blon po chen po dga' bar bgyis te/_thams cad tshul khrims ngan pa can gyi grogs su gyur na/_mthu chen pos nan gyis lhan 
[\[147a.5\]]cig tu bzhag nas/_tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong dang dge 'dun lhan cig tu gnas na/_de'i tshe dge 'dun gyis de ji ltar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de'i tshe dge 'dun gyi nang na 'dzem pa dang /_ngo tsha bar ldan pa dang /_tshul khrims dang 
[\[147a.6\]]ldan pa'i dge slong dag tshul khrims bsrung ba'i phyir/_tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong de la zhe sdang mi bskyed pa dang /_rgyal po dang /_blon po chen po la gnod par ma gyur par gsol ba thob ste/_gnas de spongs la gnas gzhan du song shig/_//bam po bzhi pa/_
[\[147a.7\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnyog pa lnga can de bzhin gshegs pa mi bzhugs pa na/_de'i tshe de na gnas pa'i sems can 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]dag nyon mongs pas gzir te/_mi dge ba spyod cing glen pa'i rang bzhin can du gyur nas/_shin tu gdul dka' ba rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang /_blon po gdol pa can dang /_khyim bdag gdol pa can dang /_tshong dpon gdol pa can dang /_bram ze gdol 
[\[147b.2\]]pa can de dag la sogs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba/_dad pa'i sems ma mchis pa/_g.yo dang sgyus 'tsho ba/_glen pa dag shes pa bsnyems shing /_'jig rten phyi ma'i sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bus mi 'jigs pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen spong ba/_
[\[147b.3\]]mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba la 'jug cing 'bab pa de dag khe dang rnyed pa'i phyir/_tshul khrims nyams pa sdig pa bgyid pa'i dge slong dang sten cing /_chos ma yin pa la spyod pa'i grogs su gyur nas/_thams cad gdon mi za bar mtshams med 
[\[147b.4\]]pa'i sems can dmyal ba la 'jug cing 'bab pa'i gnas de dag tu bdag mchis te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyis sems can de dag la phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_dbugs dbyung ba'i slad du bla na med pa'i bdud rtsi lta bu'i dam pa'i chos thabs kyis 
[\[147b.5\]]bstan cing drangs te/_de la spyod du gzhug pa dang /_rgyal rigs gdol pa can nas bram ze gdol pa can gyi bar du mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ba las rnam par bzlog par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[147b.6\]]chen po sa'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu khyod phyi ma ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sems can dag nyon mongs pas yongs su gdungs nas sdig pa spyod cing /_byis pa gti mug can gdul dka' bar gyur pa gang 
[\[147b.7\]]rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang /_blon po gdol pa can dang /_khyim bdag gdol pa can dang /_tshong dpon gdol pa can dang /_dge sbyong gdol pa can dang /_bram ze gdol pa can la sogs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba/_dad pa'i sems med pa/_g.yo dang 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]sgyus 'tsho ba/_gti mug can/_shes pa snyems pa can/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen spong ba/_smras pa'i tshig bden pa med pa/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bstan pa la mi 'jug pa dang brnyas shing dbang za ba/_tshig ngan pas rnam par 'thing ba/_
[\[148a.2\]]dam pa'i chos la the tsom za zhing log par lta ba/_'jig rten phyi ma'i sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu la mi 'jigs pa/_rtag tu ngang tshul ngan pa can dag la sten par dga' ba/_srog gcod pa nas log par lta ba'i bar du spyod pa la dga' zhing /_g.yo dang sgyus 'jig rten 
[\[148a.3\]]slu ba dang /_bdag dang gzhan la gnod pa byed pa'i rgyal rigs gdol pa can nas/_bram ze gdol pa can gyi bar du nga'i chos 'jig par byed pa/_nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung na yang tshul khrims nyams shing /_'jig rten gyi 'du 'dzi'i las byed par spro 
[\[148a.4\]]ba la rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze la sogs pas bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa dang /_khe la brkam pas nor tshol ba'i phyir tshig tsam du smra zhing spyod pa dang mi ldan pa phan tshun du phrin cing yi ge skyel ba la dga' ba dang /_tshong dang khe spogs byed cing 'jig rten rgyang phan pa'i 
[\[148a.5\]]gtsug lag slob pa dang /_zhing rmo ba'i las la dga' ba dang /_nor rin po che sogs shing sbed pa dang /_khang khyim dang /_chung ma dang /_bu smad srung ba dang /_'jig rten gyi sngags dang /_phyag rgyas 'byung po 'khol ba dang /_ltas bzang ngan blta ba dang /_sman sbyar 
[\[148a.6\]]cing nad gsos pa'i nor gyis 'tsho ba dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_bgo ba dang /_rin po che'i rgyan la chags shing khyim pa'i las byed pa la dga' ba dang /_tshul khrims 'dra la zhing sdig pa spyod pa dang /_dung gi sgra la khyi'i spyod pa dang ldan pa/_dge sbyong ma yin par 
[\[148a.7\]]dge sbyong du khas 'che ba dang /_tshangs par spyod pa ma yin par tshangs par spyod par khas 'che ba yod de/_rgyal rigs gdol pa can nas bram ze gdol pa can gyi bar du de dag la bsnyen bkur byed cing bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byed de/_de dag gi ngag kyang nyan to/_/tshul khrims 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]nyams pa de dag kyang rgyal rigs gdol pa can nas bram ze gdol pa can gyi bar du de dag la sten par dga' zhing bkur sti dang rim gro byed de de'i ngag nyan to/_/gal te gang zag 'ga' zhig nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/_slob pa dang mi slob pa 
[\[148b.2\]]la nan tan byed pa nas 'bras bu'i mthar phyin gyi bar du gyur pa la/_rgyal rigs gdol pa can nas bram ze gdol pa can gyi bar du de dag gis de la phrag dog byed de/_bsnyen bkur dang /_bsti stang dang /_rim gro dang /_mchod pa mi byed cing slar ngag nyan par yang mi byed do/_/
[\[148b.3\]]rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_mi la la zhig rin po che'i gling du phyin pa las rin po che in dra nI la dang /_ma ha nI la dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_mu tig dang /_pad ma rA ga dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_rin thang med pa'i rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs bor nas nor bu mching bu len pa 
[\[148b.4\]]ltar de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir rgyal rigs gdol pa can nas bram ze gdol pa can gyi bar du yang de dang 'dra ste/_ngas bstan pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi rin po che'i gling du phyin nas tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/_don dam pa la dga' ba/_'dzem 
[\[148b.5\]]pa dang ngo tsha bar ldan pa/_slob pa dang mi slob pa'i gang zag dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug la nan tan byed pa la brtson pa'i so so'i skye bo dge ba'i yon tan dang ldan pa/_'phags pa'i 'khor spangs nas tshul khrims nyams pa/_sdig pa mang po spyod pa/_ngo tsha ba med pa dang 
[\[148b.6\]]'dzem pa med pa/_tshig brlang zhing rtsub pa/_lus dang sems nga rgyal gyis dregs pa/_rnam par dkar ba'i chos dang bral ba/_byams pa'i sems med pa/_snying rje med pa/_sdig pa'i dge slong dag la bsod nams kyi zhing du 'dzin cing bkur sti dang rim gro dang /_mchod pa byed 
[\[148b.7\]]de de'i ngag nyan to/_/de ltar sdig pa can de dag ni slob dpon dang slob mar bcas te gdon mi za bar mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu sdig pa'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu yod de/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir rgyal rigs 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]gdol pa can dang /_rje'u rigs gdol pa can dang /_khyim bdag gdol pa can dang /_tshong dpon gdol pa can dang /_dge sbyong gdol pa can dang /_bram ze gdol pa can dag sdig pa'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po las 'ga' zhig dang ldan nam/_gal te kun 
[\[149a.2\]]dang ldan na sngon bsags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang tshig ste thal ba bzhin du 'gyur la ring po mi thogs par lus kyi yan lag kyang dum bur bcad pa dang /_nyin mtshan du mar lce ldib cing smra mi nus pa dang /_mi zad pa'i sdug bsngal chen po myong ba dang /_tshe 'phos nas 
[\[149a.3\]]kyang gdon mi za bar mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_de ltar tshul khrims nyams pa sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong dag gi ngan par lta ba ni rgyal rigs dang /_blon po la sogs pas bzod la/_slar de bas mthar 
[\[149a.4\]]gnas pa'i dge slong yongs su dag pa mthong na de la 'di skad zer ro/_/kye skyes bu dag 'di ltar dge slong 'di dag ni glen pa gti mug can/_tshul 'chos shing 'jig rten slu ba yin te/_kha zas dang /_btung ba dang /_bgo ba dang /_khe dang /_rnyed pa dang /_grags pa 'dod pa'i phyir 
[\[149a.5\]]ba dag ni stod/_gzhan la ni smod cing phrag dog gis dkrugs ma byed do/_/khe dang grags pa la skyo zhing chog mi shes pa yin pas bskrad par 'os pa de dag gi tshig kyang mnyan par mi bya'o/_/dge slong de dag ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]'ba' zhig smra zhing bden pa'i chos dang bral bas 'bras bu 
[\[149a.6\]]thob pa yang med/_'dod pa dang bral zhing zag pa yongs su zad pa yang ma yin la/_khe dang grags pa dang /_mchod pa tsam 'dod pa'i phyir bas mthar gnas shing yon tan can du ston pa dag la mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur dang bsti stang ma byed cig_/de ni g.yo dang sgyus 'tsho ba yin gyi/_bsod 
[\[149a.7\]]nams kyi zhing yang dag pa'am/_lam la nan tan byed pa ni ma yin no zhes skur to/_/de nas rgyal rigs gdol pa can nas bram ze gdol pa can gyi bar du thams cad kyi bas mthar gnas pa'i dge slong yongs su dag pa la dad pa'i sems mi skye/_dkon pa'i 'du shes mi 'byung ste/_bsti 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]stang bya ba'i sems med do/_/de la mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur byed pa la mi mos shing /_ji skad du bstan kyang de'i tshig mi nyan te de la brnyas shing smod do/_/de ltar bas mthar gnas pa'i dge slong yongs su dag pa la brnyas smod pa nyid chos kyi mig dang dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung 
[\[149b.2\]]la brnyas shing smod pa yin pas de'i tshe yul de na gnas pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha la sogs pa dkon mchog gsum la bsam pa dag pa dad pa mi phyed pa dag rgyal rigs gdol pa can nas bram ze gdol pa can gyi bar du gdol pa can de dag thams cad khros te zhe sdang 
[\[149b.3\]]gi sems skyes nas gcig la gcig 'di skad zer ro/_/kye skyes bu dag ltos rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_khyim bdag dang /_tshong dpon dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze gdol pa can 'di dag chos kyi mig dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung 'tshob pa thams cad 
[\[149b.4\]]la ni brnyas shing dbang bzas pas dge ba'i rtsa ba yang med par byas te mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dbang du gyur pas sdig pa'i las kyis ngan song du ltung bar 'gyur gyis bdag cag deng phyin chad de dag gi skyabs mi bya'o/_/rgyal rigs gdol pa can la sogs pa de dag gi gnas 
[\[149b.5\]]dang /_yul dang /_grong khyer dang /_srid kyang mi bsrung ngo zhes zer te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha la sogs pa thams cad de dag la mi skyo ba mi 'go ste yal bar gtong ngo /_/de bas na rgyal rigs gdol pa can la sogs pa'i yul dang /_grong khyer na gnas 
[\[149b.6\]]pa'i yang dag pa'i chos kyi snod du 'gyur ba dang /_yang dag par bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba thams cad yul de nas byung ste 'gro'o/_/ji ste 'dug pa zhig yod na yang mi 'dod cing gtong ba'i bsam pa skyes pas bskyab cing bsrung ba'i sems med do/_/de ltar lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod 
[\[149b.7\]]sbyin dang /_lha la sogs pa dang /_yang dag pa'i chos kyi snod du gyur pa dang /_bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba thams cad kyis rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang /_de'i srid dang /_yul dang /_grong khyer la bsrung zhing bskyab pa'i sems med de/_bsrung zhing bskyab pa'i sems med pas de'i tshe na yul 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]de'i srid la nang gi dgra dang /_phyi'i dgra gnyi ga ldang ste/_srid 'phrog pa'i phyir gcig la gcig 'tshe zhing gsod pa dang /_nad dang mu ge la sogs pa yang de'i dbang gis 'byung ngo /_/de nas rgyal rigs gdol pa can nas dge sbyong dang /_bram ze gdol pa can gyi bar du 
[\[150a.2\]]gdol pa can de dag thams cad dang /_yul de na gnas pa thams cad kyang dga' zhing spro ba'i sems med de/_sngon gyi yid du 'ong ba dang /_sdug pa thams cad dang yang bral nas gnyen bshes dang /_mdza' bo dang /_grogs kyang gcig gis gcig yid byung zhing phrad mi 'dod pa 
[\[150a.3\]]dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje med de/_phrag dog dang ser sna byed cing sdig pa mang po yang byed par 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste/_srog gcod pa nas ngan par lta ba'i bar du kun spyod cing ngo tsha ba dang /_'dzem pa med par mchod rten gyi nor dang /_dge 'dun gyi nor la spyod cing za ba la 'gyod 
[\[150a.4\]]pa'i sems med do/_/rgyal rigs gdol pa can de mdzangs shing drang po la ni sdang la/_gcam sgyu can la ni dga' bas bas blon po dang /_dmangs gcig la gcig gnod pa byed cing 'khon dang shar gnyer nas 'thab cing rtsod pa dang pha rol po'i dgra dang g.yul sprod pa na'ang 'og 
[\[150a.5\]]ma sems mi 'thun pa'i phyir g.yul yang nyes par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang /_blon po dang /_khyim bdag dang /_tshong dpon dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze la sogs pa gdol pa can de dag thams cad ring po mi thogs par lus kyi yan lag nyams shing nyin mtshan du mar lce 
[\[150a.6\]]lkugs par 'gyur ba dang /_shin tu mi bzad pa'i na ba dang tsha ba'i sdug bsngal chen po myong ba dang /_'chi 'phos nas kyang gdon mi za bar mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang /_blon po dang /_khyim bdag dang /_tshong 
[\[150a.7\]]dpon dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze la sogs pa'i gdol pa can sdig pa'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su spyod pa dag dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba/_/g.yo dang sgyus 'tsho ba/_glen pa gti mug can shes pa bsnyems pa/_dkon mchog gsum la bsam pa dag pa'i sems med pa/_'jig rten phyi ma'i sdug bsngal 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]gyi 'bras bu la 'jigs par mi lta ba dag de la kha cig ni nyan thos kyi theg pa la cung zad dad kyang yang dag par glen pa'i rang bzhin can du gyur pas 'di snyam du bdag las shes shing mkhas pa med do snyam nas/_ngas bstan pa'i rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos dang /_theg pa chen po'i chos 
[\[150b.2\]]la brnyas smod de 'phya zhing skur nas sems can gzhan dag kyang tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam gyi bar du 'chang zhing 'dzin pa dang /_klog cing 'don du yang mi ster to/_/de la kha cig ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dad pa cung zad thob kyang /_yang dag par glen pa'i rang bzhin can du gyur 
[\[150b.3\]]pas 'di snyam du bdag las mkhas shing shes pa med do snyam nas/_ngas bstan pa'i nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos dang /_theg pa chen po'i chos la brnyas shing smod de 'phya zhing skur nas/_sems can gzhan dag tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam gyi bar du 'chang ngam/_'dzin tam 
[\[150b.4\]]klog gam/_'don du yang mi ster to/_/de la kha cig ni theg pa chen po'i chos la dad pa cung zad tsam thob kyang yang dag par glen pa'i rang bzhin can du gyur pas 'di snyam du bdag las shes shing mkhas pa med do snyam nas ngas bstan pa'i nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos dang /_rang sangs 
[\[150b.5\]]rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos la brnyas smod de 'phya zhing skur nas/_sems can gzhan dag tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam gyi bar du yang 'chang zhing 'dzin tam/_klog cing 'don du yang mi ster to/_/gang zag de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi dam pa'i chos la brnyas skur ba dang /_dus gsum gyi 
[\[150b.6\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dbang za ba dang /_/dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sde snod thams cad bshig nas bsregs te thal ba bzhin du 'jig par byed pa/_'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad pa thams cad gcod pa/_tshad med pa'i sems can gyi mig 'dzar ba zhes bya'o/_/rgyal 
[\[150b.7\]]rigs gdol pa can nas dge sbyong dang /_bram ze gdol pa can gyi bar du de dag gis sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa'i nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos dang /_theg pa chen po'i chos bcabs te bar chad byas nas tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam gyi bar du 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]med par byas na/_gang zag de ni chos kyi mig dang dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung 'tshob pa thams cad la ma gus pa ste/_de'i rgyu dang de'i rkyen gyis yul de srung ba'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha la sogs pa dkon mchog gsum la bsam pa dag cing dad pa mi phyed pa dag 
[\[151a.2\]]rgyal rigs gdol pa can nas bram ze gdol pa can gyi bar du gdol pa can de dag thams cad la khro zhing zhe sdang ba'i sems skye ba nas gzhung de bzhin du rgyas par rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang /_blon po dang /_khyim bdag dang /_tshong dpon dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze la sogs pa gdol pa can 
[\[151a.3\]]thams cad ring po mi thogs par lus kyi yan lag nyams shing nyin mtshan du mar lce lkugs par 'gyur ba dang /_shin tu mi bzad pa'i na ba dang /_tsha ba'i sdug bsngal chen po myong ba dang /_'chi 'phos nas kyang gdon mi za bar mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung ngo /_/rigs 
[\[151a.4\]]kyi bu gzhan yang rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang /_blon po dang /_khyim bdag dang /_tshong dpon dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze la sogs pa'i gdol pa can rnams tshul khrims nyams pa sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong gi rjes su zhugs pa nas/_gzhung de de bzhin du rgyas par yul de na chos kyi 
[\[151a.5\]]snod du gyur pa yang dag pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pa thams cad rgyal rigs gdol pa can la sogs pa la spong ba'i sems skyed de bskyab pa'am srung ba mi byed do/_/brgya la yul de na gnas su zin kyang chos la rten gyi khyim pa la dga' zhing gnas par mi byed pa dang /_sbyin 
[\[151a.6\]]bdag gi khyim du yang dang yang du 'gro bar mi byed pa dang /_gal te skad cig tsam phyin na yang tshig srung zhing mi smra ba dang /_ji ste smra na yang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi bag med de/_khyim pa'i mdun du tshul khrims nyams pa dag la 'phya ba'am brnyas par mi byed pa dang /_tshul khrims nyams pa sdig pa 
[\[151a.7\]]spyod pa'i dge slong de dag gi nyes pa mi rjod cing mi gleng ba dang /_rtag tu bsod nams kyi zhing la sten gyi tshul khrims nyams pa yongs su spong ngo /_/tshul khrims nyams pa sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong de dag ni phyir tshul khrims srung ba dge ba'i yon tan dang ldan pa dag la khro ba dang /_
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]zhe sdang gi sems bskyed de brnyas smod pa dang /_rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze gdol pa can dag gi bar du khyim pa'i bus pa dang /_bud med kyi mdun du gcam pa dang /_sgyu sna tshogs kyis [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]zer zhing tshul khrims srung ba de dag la 'phya zhing skur pa dang /_tshig ngan 
[\[151b.2\]]pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'dogs te/_rgyal rigs gdol pa can nas bram ze gdol pa can gyi bar du de dag thams cad nga'i slob ma 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes pa/_tshul khrims srung ba/_mang du thos pa/_spobs pa dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong la zhe sdang ba dang /_khro ba'i sems skyed cing tshig rtsub po rnam 
[\[151b.3\]]pa sna tshogs kyis 'phya zhing skur du bcug nas lus dang sems mi bde bar byed do/_/gzhan yang chos gos dang /_lhung bzed dang /_'tsho ba'i yo byad kyang 'phrog tu bcug nas 'tsho bas brel bar byed do/_/gzhan yang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi nor 'phrog tu bcug nas spyod du mi ster ba dang /_
[\[151b.4\]]la la ni btson rar bcug nas lcags dang /_khong sgril dang /_shing gi gdos la sogs pa'i nan la bor ro/_/la la ni lus kyi yan lag gtubs/_la la ni mgo gcod du bcug go/_/rigs kyi bu khyod ltos shig_/de ltar rgyal rigs gdol pa can nas dge sbyong dang /_bram ze gdol 
[\[151b.5\]]pa'i bar du gdol pa can de dag tshul khrims nyams pa sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong la brten nas de lta bu'i kha na ma tho ba chen po'i sdig pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed do/_/mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i bar du ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can gang gis mtshams med pa lnga byas 
[\[151b.6\]]sam/_tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba dag bshig gam/_mtshams med pa la nye ba'i sdig byas sam/_rang bzhin gyi sdig gam/_bcas pa'i sdig gang byas pa bas ni rgyal rigs gdol pa can nas dge sbyong dang /_bram ze gdol pa can gyi bar du tshul khrims nyams pa chos las 'gal bar 
[\[151b.7\]]byed pa la bsten pa bas sdig pa yang ngo /_/rigs kyi bu de ltar tshul khrims nyams pa sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong dag de ltar chos las 'gal ba'i sdig pa chen po byas mod kyi/_'on kyang nga'i bstan pa la gnas shing skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/_spyod 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]lam dang cha lugs 'phags pa rnams dang 'thun te/_de la ni rgyal po dang /_blon po chen po dang /_khyim pa rnams kyis khyim pa'i chos nyid dang yang sbyar du mi gnang na/_gzhu ba dang /_'tshog pa dang /_nan la bor ba dang /_btson rar gzhug pa dang /_gshe 
[\[152a.2\]]zhing spyo ba dang /_lus kyi yan lag gtub pa dang /_'tsho ba'i dbang po dang phral ba chos ma yin pa byed pa lta ci smos/_rgyal po'am/_blon po'am/_khyim pa rnams kyis gal te de ltar byas na kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur te/_gdon mi za bar mtshams med 
[\[152a.3\]]pa'i sems can dmyal bar skye'o/_/'di ltar tshul khrims nyams pa sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong la yang chad pas gcod du mi gnang na tshul khrims dang ldan pa dge ba spyod pa la lta ci smos/_rigs kyi bu dge slong gang gis tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba'i sdig las gcig nyams pa yang 
[\[152a.4\]]tshul khrims nyams shing sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong zhes bya mod kyi/_bstan pa bzhin du dad pa'i dge 'dun gyis las byas pa'i sdom pa rgyun mi 'chad par yod de/_bslab pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi bar du btang yang rnam par dkar ba'i chos kyi gsung tsam yod kyis/_de 
[\[152a.5\]]la yang rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_khyim pa dang /_sdom pa med pa rnams kyis brnyas smod dam/_chad pas gcad du mi gnang ngo /_/de ltar dge slong de chos kyi snod ma yin te/_'phags pa'i chos nyams pas yongs su dag pa'i dge 'dun sme bar byed cing dge sbyong gi las su 
[\[152a.6\]]bya ba'i las thams cad mi rung bar byed pa yin te/_phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi longs spyad la spyod du ni mi dbang mod kyi/_'on kyang yid 'thun pa'i dge 'dun las bsnyen par rdzogs te sdom pa thob pa ma btang bas khyim pa skye bo thams cad pas mchog go/_/rtsa ba'i 
[\[152a.7\]]sdig nyams kyang de lta bu yin na/_de ma yin pa bcas pa'i sdig phra mo gzhan nyams pa lta ci smos te/_de bas na rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_khyim pa rnams kyis brnyas pa'am/_smod pa byed dam/_chad pas gcod du mi dbang ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]sngon 'das pa'i dus na yul ka shi zhes bya ba na rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_des gdol pa lnga la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyed deng la ri kha ba can gyi drung na glang po che mche ba drug dang ldan pa u pa li'i mig ces bya ba zhig yod kyis/_khyed kyis de'i 
[\[152b.2\]]mche ba phyung la 'on cig gal te khyod kyis ma thob na gson du ma re shig ces bsgo'o/_/de'i tshe gdol pa can de dag lus dang srog gi phyir mda' gzhu zhig thogs nas gos tshon can gyon te/_dge sbyong gi tshul ltar bcos nas ri kha ba can gyi drung du glang po che'i rgyal po gang na bar 
[\[152b.3\]]song ngo /_/der phyin pa dang de na glang po che mo zhig gis sngar mthong ba dang /_mda' gzhu thogs pa des dang ngas nas glang po che'i rgyal po'i gan du brgyugs te phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha chen po ma gzigs sam/_mi kha cig mda' gzhu thogs te dal gyis 'jab cing mchi 
[\[152b.4\]]na ci bdag cag gi tshe'i bar chad du mi 'byung grang /_glang po che'i rgyal pos mgo bteg ste bltas na/_skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos tshon can gyon pa dag cig 'ong ba mthong nas/_glang po che mo la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi/_/rgyal 
[\[152b.5\]]mtshan chos gos gyon pa 'di dag ni/_/sdig pa thams cad yongs su spangs pas na/_/nges par sems can dag la gnod mi byed/_/de nas glang po che mos kyang tshigs su bcad nas lan btab pa/_chos gos gyon pa ltar ni byed mod kyi/_/thams cad lag na mda' gzhu thogs 
[\[152b.6\]]pas na/_/'di ni snying rje med cing ma rungs pa/_/sdig pa byed la mos pa'i gdol pa yin/_/de nas glang po che'i rgyal pos kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_chos gos tshal bu gyon par snang bas na/_/byams dang snying rje'i rtsa ba de nyid yin/_/sems can kun la byams shing 
[\[152b.7\]]brtse ba'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas la ni 'di dag skyabs song nges/_/khyed cag 'di la the tsom ma za bar/_/myur du sems de rjes su bzung na mdzes/_/chos gos tshon can gyon pa 'di dag ni/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las ni sgrol mdzad pa'o/_/de nas de'i tshe gdol pa de dag gis mda' 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]dug can gyis glang po che'i rgyal po la 'phangs nas gzas pa bzhin du snying la phog go/_/de nas glang po che mos skad chen po phyung ste ngus nas/_skad kyis brnangs bzhin du tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so/_/chos gos gyon pa de dag ni/_/sangs rgyas la ni skyabs song 
[\[153a.2\]]snyam/_/cha lugs shin du zhir snang yang /_/gdug pa'i sems ni khong na srel/_/lha yi sku la mda' 'phen pa'i/_/dgra de shin du brlag pa'i phyir/_/myur du lus kun brdzis nas su/_/'tsho ba'i dbang dang dbral bar bya/_/de nas glang po che'i rgyal pos tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_'tsho ba'i srog 
[\[153a.3\]]dang bral kyang sla'i/_/sdig pa'i sems ni bskyed mi rigs/_/'di dag slu ba'i sems yod kyang /_/cha lugs sangs rgyas slob ma 'dra/_/mkhas pa'i sems ni rnam dag pa/_/srog gi phyir ni ma yin te/_/skye bo mang po bsgral ba'i phyir/_/rtag tu byang chub spyad pa spyod/_/de'i tshe glang po che'i 
[\[153a.4\]]rgyal pos snying brtse ba'i sems skyes nas mi de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyed nga la ci 'dod/_de dag gis smras pa/_khyod kyi mche ba 'dod do/_/glang po che'i rgyal po snying shin du dga' nas mche ba phyung ste de dag la byin nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_khro zhing phangs pa'i bsam pa 
[\[153a.5\]]med bzhin du/_/khyed la nga yi mche ba dkar po 'di/_/byin pa'i bsod nams mngon par sangs rgyas nas/_/skye bo'i nyon mongs nad rnams zhi byed shog_/rigs kyi bu sngon 'das pa'i dus na de ltar glang po che'i rgyal po byol song gi skye gnas su gyur pa yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[153a.6\]]pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir lus dang srog la ma chags par btang nas chos gos gyon pa de la rim gro dang /_bsti stang bya ba'i phyir des dgrar byas kyang lan mi ldon pa la ltos/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang /_blon po dang /_khyim bdag dang /_tshong dpon dang /_
[\[153a.7\]]dge sbyong dang /_bram ze gdol pa can dag yang dag par glen pa'i rang bzhin can yin yang cung zad tsam gyi shes pa snyems te/_g.yo dang sgyus 'tsho zhing 'jig rten dag bslus nas 'jig rten phyi ma'i sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu la 'jigs par mi lta bas nga'i bstan pa la skyabs su song zhing rab tu byung ba 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]chos kyi snod du gyur pa dang /_chos kyi snod du ma gyur pa kun la 'tshe zhing gnod pa byed de gshe zhing spyo ba dang /_'tshog pa dang /_gzhu ba dang /_btson rar gzhug pa dang /_'tsho ba'i dbang po dang phral ba'i bar du byed do/_/de ni 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[153b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi dam tshig las 'gal ba'i kha na ma tho ba chen po byed pa ste/_gdon mi za bar mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung ngo /_/dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsregs te rgyun bcad pas mkhas pa thams cad kyis yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/de dag gis de ltar kha na 
[\[153b.3\]]ma tho ba sdig pa chen po byas kyang g.yo dang sgyus 'tsho ste/_nga rgyal gyi dbang du gyur nas 'jig rten dag bslu ba'i phyir de dag kyang so so nas bdag cag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa yin te/_bdag cag ni theg pa chen pos mngon par 'tshang rgya'o zhes zer ro/_/'di lta ste 
[\[153b.4\]]dper na mi zhig bdag gi mig phyung nas long bar gyur pa pha rol gzhan gyi lam mtshon pa'i phyir ri chen po la 'dzeg pa ni gnas med do/_/de bzhin du phyi ma ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang /_blon po dang /_khyim bdag dang /_tshong dpon dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze gdol pa can 
[\[153b.5\]]dag kyang de dang 'dra ste/_nga'i bstan pa la skyabs su song zhing rab tu byung ba chos kyi snod du gyur pa'am/_chos kyi snod ma yin pa'ang rung ba'i slob ma rnams la 'tshe zhing gnod par byed de/_gshe zhing spyo ba dang /_brdeg pa dang /_btson rar gzhug pa dang /_'tsho ba'i dbang po dang phral ba'i bar 
[\[153b.6\]]du byed de/_de ni 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dam tshig las 'gal ba'i kha na ma tho ba chen po byas pas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsregs shing rgyun bcad pas gdon mi za bar mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung ngo /_/de bas na 
[\[153b.7\]]mkhas pa rnams kyis spang bar bya'o/_/des de ltar kha na ma tho ba chen po byas kyang g.yo dang sgyus 'tsho zhing nga rgyal gyi dbang du gyur pa 'jig rten bslu ba'i phyir bdag cag ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tshol ba yin te/_bdag cag kyang theg pa chen pos mngon par 'tshang rgya'o zhes zer ro/_/de dag 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]gis de ltar rab tu byung ba la 'tshe zhing gnod pa byas pas ma rabs tha ma'i lus kyang mi thob na theg pa rnam gnyis kyi byang chub pa'am/_bla na med pa'i theg pa thob pa lta ci smos te skal ba chad pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang sngon 'das pa'i dus na/_yul pan tsa la zhes 
[\[154a.2\]]bya ba na rgyal po dgra las rgyal zhes bya ba yod de/_yul de'i srid 'dzin cing dbang byed do/_/de na dur sa chen po kha lam pa zhes bya ba shin tu 'jigs pa'i gnas shig yod de/_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po yang de na mang du gnas so/_/de dag tu phyin na 'jigs shing ba spu ldang ngo /_/de yul 
[\[154a.3\]]de na nyes pa byas pa gsad pa zhig yod na rgyal po'i khrims kyis gsad pa de/_bcing ba lngas bcings nas kha lam pa zhes bya ba'i dur sa chen po der skyel te/_srin po dang /_'byung po rnams zar 'jug go/_/gsad pa gcig gis srog gi phyir skra dang kha spu bregs te chos gos kyi tshal bu 
[\[154a.4\]]zhig rnyed pa mgul du btags so/_/btson rdzis khrid de rgyal po'i khrims bzhin du bcing ba lngas bcings nas dur sa chen po der bskyal to/_/skyel ma phyir log nas de'i nub mo srin mo chen mo mtshon cha'i mig ces bya ba 'khor lnga stong dang bcas te dur khrod der lhags so/_/mi des rgyang 
[\[154a.5\]]nas mthong nas rab tu 'jigs shing skrag go/_/de'i tshe srin mo des mi de bcing ba lngas bcings pa skra dang kha spu bregs pa chos gos kyi tshal bu mgul du btags pa mthong nas g.yas nas bskor te bsti stang dang bcas pas phyag byas te thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad pas 'di skad smras so/_/
[\[154a.6\]]skyes bu khyod ni ma bsnyengs bde bar bzhugs/_/khyod la bdag cag gnod pa mi bgyid do/_/skra bregs chos gos gyon pa khyod mthong nas/_/bdag cag sangs rgyas rjes su dran par gyur/_/de'i tshe srin mo'i bu rnams kyis ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag cag shin tu bkres skom 
[\[154a.7\]]pas/_/lus dang sems ni rnam par gzir/_/lus dang sems ni bde ba'i phyir/_/yum gyis mi de 'tshal du gnong /_/de nas srin mos bu rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi/_/rnam par grol ba'i rgyal mtshan gos gyon pa/_/'di la mi dge 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]sdig pa'i sems bskyed na/_/nges par mtshams med sems can dmyal bar ltung /_/de nas srin mo'i bu dang 'khor du bcas pas bskor te/_bsti stang dang bcas pas phyag byas te thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad pas 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshon can gyon pa khyod la so sor 'chags/_/
[\[154b.2\]]bdag cag ji ste pha dang ma dag la/_/lus dang ngag yid mi dge byas sla yi/_/khyod la nam du'ang gnod par mi bgyid do/_/de nas yang srin mo chen mo bong bu so zhes bya ba 'khor lnga stong dang bcas te dur khrod der lhags so/_/srin mo des kyang bcing ba lngas bcings pa skra dang kha spu bregs pa 
[\[154b.3\]]chos gos kyi tshal bu mgul du btags pa'i mi de mthong nas bskor te/_bsti stang dang bcas pas phyag byas nas thal mo sbyar te tshigs su bcad pas 'di skad ces smras so/_/skyes bu bdag gis ma bsnyengs bde bar bzhugs/_/khyod kyi mgul du btags pa'i tshal bu 'di/_/drang srong 
[\[154b.4\]]chen po'i rgyal mtshan na bza' lags/_/de la bdag cag mchod cing phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas srin mo de'i bu rnams kyis ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/mi yi sha dang khrag las zhim pa med/_/lus dang sems stobs skye zhing 'phel bar 'gyur/_/shin tu dpa' la rtul phod 'jigs 
[\[154b.5\]]med pa/_/yum gyis de la bdag cag 'tshal du gnong /_/de nas srin mos bu rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha mi'i longs spyod ldan pa thams cad kyang /_/rab tu byung ba dag las thob pa'i phyir/_/chos gos gyon pa 'di la mchod pas na/_/bde ba tshad med pa yang 'thob par 
[\[154b.6\]]'gyur/_/de nas srin mo'i bu rnams 'khor dang bcas pas bskor nas bsti stang dang bcas pas phyag byas te/_thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_skra bregs chos gos gyon pa'i skyes bu la/_/bdag cag shin tu gus par phyag 'tshal bas/_/rtag tu ma 'ongs pa yi 
[\[154b.7\]]dus kun du/_/sangs rgyas mthong zhing dad pa skye bar shog_/de'i tshe yang srin mo chen mo khro gnyer 'phral skra can zhes bya ba 'khor lnga stong dang bcas te dur khrod der lhags so/_/srin mo des kyang bcing ba lngas bcings pa skra dang kha spu bregs pa chos gos kyi tshal bu mgul du btags 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]pa'i mi de mthong nas g.yas nas bskor te/_bsti stang dang bcas pas phyag byas nas thal mo sbyar te tshigs su bcad pas 'di skad ces smras so/_/drang srong chen po'i rgyal mtshan na bza' 'di/_/mkhas pa thams cad shin tu bstod cing bsngags/_/gang zhig 
[\[155a.2\]]'di la mchod pa byed pa ni/_/srid pa'i bcings pa kun las nges par 'grol/_/de'i tshe srin mo de'i bu rnams kyis ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/mi 'di'i lus kyi sha dang khrag kun ni/_/rgyal po chen pos bdag cag rnams la bsngos/_/bdag cag 'di la za zhing 'thung du gnong /_/mthu 
[\[155a.3\]]dang ldan nas ma yi g.yog kyang bgyi/_/de nas srin mos bu rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/chos gos btags pa gyon pa 'di dag ni/_/khyod kyis bza' ba'i rigs pa ma yin gyis/_/'di la mi dge sdig pa'i sems bskyed na/_/sdug bsngal chen po'i snod du gyur ta re/_/de nas 
[\[155a.4\]]srin mo'i bu rnams 'khor dang bcas pas bskor nas bsti stang dang bcas pas phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_khyod ni drang srong chen po'i gos gyon te/_/shin tu bsod nams zhing du gyur pa yin/_/de bas bdag cag khyod la mchod pas na/_/srid 
[\[155a.5\]]pa'i bcings pa las ni thar bar shog_/de'i tshe na yang srin mo chen mo mtshon cha'i gdong zhes bya ba yang 'khor lnga stong dang bcas te dur khrod der lhags so/_/srin mo des kyang mi de bcing ba lngas bcings pa skra dang kha spu bregs pa chos gos kyi tshal bu mgul du btags pa mthong nas 
[\[155a.6\]]bskor te bsti stang dang bcas pas phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te tshigs su bcad pas 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod ni btags pa'i chos gos gyon pas na/_/mya ngan 'da' ba'i bde ba thob tu nges/_/de bas khyod la bdag cag gnod byed na/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis rnam par smod 
[\[155a.7\]]kyis dogs/_/de nas srin mo de'i bu rnams kyis ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag cag rtag tu mi yi mdangs 'phrog cing /_/de bzhin sha dang khrag kyang za 'thung bas/_/gzugs dang mthu ni yongs su 'phel ba'i phyir/_/bdag cag 'di la ci bder 'tshal du gnong /_/
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]de nas srin mo des bu rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/ji ste skra dang kha spu bregs pa yi/_/chos gos gyon pa 'di la gnod byas na/_/nges par mtshams med sems can dmyal bar ltung /_/yun ring sdug bsngal chen po'i snod du 'gyur/_/de nas srin mo bu rnams dang 'khor 
[\[155b.2\]]du bcas pas bskor nas bsti stang dang bcas pas phyag 'tshal te/_thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/bdag cag sems can dmyal bas rab 'jigs te/_/de bas khyod kyi srog la gnod mi bgyid/_/bcings pa 'di yang bkrol te khyod gtang gis/_/
[\[155b.3\]]dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal kun las thar bar shog_/de'i tshe srin mo bu smad 'khor dang bcas pa snying rje'i sems bskyed nas mi de'i bcings pa bkrol te bshags pa dang /_spro ba bskyed pa byas nas phyir btang ngo /_/mi de phyis nyin snga rab tu rgyal po'i drung du 'ongs nas dngos po de dag 
[\[155b.4\]]rgyus kyis zhib tu gsol to/_/de'i tshe rgyal po dgra las rgyal ba 'khor dang bcas pas de skad thos nas dang ngas te ngo mtshar rmad du gyur nas khrims su bcas te yul gyi mi rnams la bkas btags pa/_deng phyin chad nga'i yul na gnas pa sangs rgyas kyi slob ma tshul khrims srung ngam/_
[\[155b.5\]]tshul khrims nyams sam/_chung ngu na tshul khrims med par skra dang kha spu bregs te ngur smrig gyon pa la su zhig kyal ka'am gnod pa byas na thams cad gsad do zhes khrims su byas so/_/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis mi mang po yang bsod nams la dga' bas thams cad bags kyis bstan 
[\[155b.6\]]pa la phyogs nas 'dzam bu'i gling na rgyal po de dbang ba'i mi thams cad bsam pa des pas dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol to/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar 'das pa'i dus na srin mo [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi rgyud du skyes pa/_mdangs 'phrog pa sha dang khrag za ba/_sdig pa la brkam pa/_
[\[155b.7\]]snying rje med pa yang de lta bu'i tshul khrims med pa skra dang kha spu bregs pa chos gos kyi tshal bu mgul du btags pa de la bskor ba dang /_bsti stang dang /_rim gro dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_mchod pa dang /_tshigs su bcad pas bstod de/_gnod pa byed pa'i sems med na/_phyi ma 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]ma 'ongs pa'i dus su rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang /_blon po dang /_khyim bdag dang /_tshong dpon dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze gdol pa can la sogs pa gdug pa'i sems 'chang zhing snying rje med pa/_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po bas thu bar sdig pa byed 
[\[156a.2\]]do/_/glen zhing gti mug can dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su gcod pa de nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i chos kyi snod du gyur pa dang /_chos kyi snod du ma gyur pa yang rung /_skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig gyon pa'i slob ma la dad pa dang bkur sti mi byed de/_de la gnod pa dang /_gshe zhing 
[\[156a.3\]]rdeg pa dang /_nan la 'dar zhing btson rar gzhug pa dang /_'tsho ba'i dbang po dang phral ba'i bar du byed pa de ni 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis bstan pa'i kha na ma tho ba chen po dang 'gal bar byed pa ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[156a.4\]]yongs su bsregs nas rgyun bcad pas gdon mi za bar mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur bas mkhas pa rnams kyis yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/yang rigs kyi bu sngon rgyal po bsod nams chen po zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_rgyal po de snying rje che bas nyes 
[\[156a.5\]]pa byas pas gsad pa la thug pa dag kyang gsod du mi dga'o/_/de'i tshe blon po blo dang ldan pa gcig gis rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/rgyal po thugs ngan ma mdzad cig_/rgyal pos kyang srog gcod pa'i sdig pa mi 'thob la/_gshed mas kyang 'gum mi 'tshal bar 
[\[156a.6\]]mi de 'gum pa'i thabs mchis so zhes gsol nas blon po chen po des gsad pa la thug pa'i mi de bal glang rmis pa ma rungs pa'i mdun du bzhag go_/de nas bal glang rmis pa des mi de snas bzung ste yar bteg nas sa la brdabs pa las/_mi de gos dmar po gyon pa mthong nas 
[\[156a.7\]]chos gos yin no snyam ste/_bsam pa dag pa'i dad pa skyes nas dal gyis sa la bzhag cing de la 'gyod nas sa la btud de/_mi de'i rkang pa la snas 'phyi zhing bsti stang dang bcas pas mig mi 'dzums par mi de la lta'o/_/blon po chen po des de lta bur gyur pa mthong nas brgyugs 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]te/_rgyal po de la de bzhin du gsol to/_/rgyal pos de skad ces thos nas dngangs te ngo mtshar rmad du gyur nas/_mi yongs la deng phyin chad dkon mchog gsum la bsti stang gyis shig par bkas btags so/_/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis srog gcod pa yang spangs te 'dzam bu'i gling 
[\[156b.2\]]la dbang byed par gyur to/_/ltos rigs kyi bu de ltar 'das pa'i dus na bal glang rmis pa byol song gi skye gnas su gyur pa yang chos gos la gus pas sdig mi byed na/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang /_blon po dang /_khyim bdag dang /_tshong dpon dang /_dge 
[\[156b.3\]]sbyong dang /_bram ze gdol pa can la sogs pa sems gdug pa can snying rje'i sems med pa/_bal glang rmis pa bas thu ba'i sdig pa'i las byed do/_/bus pa glen pa can de dag nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba chos kyi snod du gyur pa'am/_chos kyi snod ma yin pa'ang rung /_skra 
[\[156b.4\]]dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig gyon pa la dad pa dang gus pa mi byed de/_de la gnod pa dang /_gshe zhing spyo ba dang /_gzhu zhing 'tshog pa dang /_btson ra ra gzhug pa dang /_'tsho ba'i dbang po dang phral ba'i bar du byed pas 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar bzhugs 
[\[156b.5\]]pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis bstan pa'i kha na ma tho ba chen po dang 'gal bar byed pas dge ba'i rtsa ba bsregs nas rgyun gcad pas gdon mi za bar mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur bas mkhas pa rnams kyis spang bar bya'o/_/gal te rgyal 
[\[156b.6\]]rigs gdol pa can nas dge sbyong dang /_bram ze gdol pa can gyi bar du sdig pa'i 'khor lo gsum po 'di dang ldan pas/_de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis yul srung ba'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin la sogs pa dkon mchog gsum la bsam pa dag cing dad pa mi phyed pa thams cad rgyal 
[\[156b.7\]]rigs gdol pa can nas dge sbyong dang /_bram ze gdol pa can gyi bar du gdol pa de dag la khro zhing zhe sdang ba'i sems skye ba nas gzhung de bzhin du rgyas par rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang /_blon po dang /_khyim bdag dang /_tshong dpon dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze la sogs 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]pa gdol pa can de thams cad ring por mi thogs par lus kyi yan lag dum bur chad cing zhag mang du lce ldibs pa dang /_shin tu mi bzad pa'i na ba dang tsha ba'i sdug bsngal chen po myong bar 'gyur ba dang /_'chi 'phos nas kyang mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal 
[\[157a.2\]]ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang phyi ma ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang /_blon po dang /_khyim bdag dang /_tshong dpon dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze gdol pa can la sogs pa sdig pa'i bshes gnyen la sten 
[\[157a.3\]]pa dge ba'i rtsa ba chung zhing zhen pa nas de bzhin du rgyas par 'jig rten phyi ma'i sdug bsngal ma mthong ba dag phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi nor dang /_gtsug lag khang gi nor dang /_gtsug lag khang du bsngos pa'i nor dang /_skyed shing gi ra ba dang /_skyed shing gi ra bar bsngos pa'i nor 
[\[157a.4\]]dang /_zhing 'brog dang /_zhing 'brog tu bsngos pa'i nor dang /_gtsug lag khang so so'i rung bar byed par gtogs pa'i skyes pa dang /_bud med phrogs pa dang /_nor phyugs phrogs pa dang /_gos dang /_bsod snyoms phrogs pa dang /_gding ba dang /_khri stan phrogs pa dang /_nad 
[\[157a.5\]]kyi rkyen sman phrogs pa dang /_de ma yin pa'i 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs la 'phrog pa ste/_de ltar phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la phul ba'i nor de ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_yon tan dang ldan pa/_brtson 'grus rtsom pa/_slob pa dang mi slob pa la nan tan du byed pa nas mtha'i gnas 
[\[157a.6\]]byas pa'i 'bras bu thob pa'i bar gyi dge slong yongs su dag pa spyod du gnang bar zad na/_rgyal rigs gdol pa can nas dge sbyong dang /_bram ze gdol pa can gyi bar du gdol pa can de dag gis mthu dang dpung bsnyems te nan gyis phrogs nas/_dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa yongs 
[\[157a.7\]]su dag pa dag ni spyod du mi ster gyi/_tshul khrims nyams pa sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong khyim na gnas shing khyim pa'i las byed pa dag la byin nas kha cig ni thun mong du spyod/_kha cig ni khud par yang spyod do/_/tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong dag gis de dag thos nas kyang kha cig ni thun 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]mong du spyod/_kha cig ni khud par yang spyod do/_/kha cig ni khyim pa la byin nas de dang yang thun mong du spyod do/_/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis yul srung ba'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin la sogs pa dkon mchog gsum la bsam pa dag cing dad pa mi phyed pa dag rgyal rigs gdol pa can nas 
[\[157b.2\]]dge sbyong dang /_bram ze gdol pa can gyi bar du gdol pa can de dag la khros te zhe sdang gi sems skye ba nas de bzhin du rgyas par rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang /_blon po dang /_khyim bdag dang /_tshong dpon dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze la sogs pa gdol pa can de dag ring por mi thogs 
[\[157b.3\]]par lus kyi yan lag dum bur chad pa dang /_zhag mang du lce ldibs pa dang /_shin tu mi bzad pa'i na ba dang tsha ba'i sdug bsngal chen po myong zhing 'chi 'phos nas kyang gdon mi za bar mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i 
[\[157b.4\]]dus na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang /_blon po dang /_khyim bdag dang /_tshong dpon dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze gdol pa can la sogs pa sdig pa'i bshes gnyen la sten pa dge ba'i rtsa ba chung zhing zhan pa nas de bzhin du rgyas par 'jig rten phyi ma'i sdug 
[\[157b.5\]]bsngal gyi 'bras bu ma mthong ba dag gis nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba/_shes rab rno ba/_mang du thos pa/_tshig dang don rdzogs par smra ba dang ldan pa/_nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos ston nus pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos chud cing ston nus pa'am/_bla na med pa'i theg 
[\[157b.6\]]pa'i chos ston nus shing rgyas par sems can la phan pa dang /_bde ba'i don du ston nus pa'i chos smra ba la spyo zhing gshe ba dang /_smad pa dang /_'phya zhing skur pa dang /_dbang za ba dang /_gnod pa byed cing chos ston pa'i bar chad byed do/_/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis yul srung ba'i lha dang /_klu 
[\[157b.7\]]dang /_gnod sbyin la sogs pa dkon mchog gsum la bsam pa dag cing dad pa mi phyed pa dag rgyal rigs gdol pa can nas dge sbyong dang /_bram ze gdol pa can gyi bar du gdol pa can de dag la khros te/_zhe sdang gi sems skye ba nas gzhung de bzhin du rgyas par rgyal rigs gdol pa can 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]nas blon po dang /_khyim bdag dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze la sogs pa gdol pa can de dag thams cad ring po mi thogs par bdag gi lus dum bur chad pa dang /_zhag mang du lce ldibs pa dang /_shin tu mi bzad pa'i na ba dang tsha ba'i sdug bsngal chen po myong ba dang /_
[\[158a.2\]]'chi 'phos nas kyang gdon mi za bar mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang phyi ma ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang /_blon po dang /_khyim bdag dang /_tshong dpon dang /_dge sbyong dang /_
[\[158a.3\]]bram ze la sogs pa gdol pa can sdig pa'i bshes gnyen la sten pa dge ba'i rtsa ba zhan cing chung ba nas de bzhin du rgyas par 'jig rten phyi ma'i sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu la 'jigs par mi lta ba dag phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la phul ba'i nor dang /_gtsug lag khang gi zhing 'brog dang /_nor 
[\[158a.4\]]phyugs dang /_rin po che dang /_me tog gi shing dang /_'bras bu'i shing dang /_kha dog gi shing dang /_bsil grib dang /_bsung dang /_sman gyi shing la sogs pa dang /_de ma yin pa 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs la 'phrog cing nga'i slob ma tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_yon tan dang 
[\[158a.5\]]ldan pa/_brtson 'grus rtsom pa/_slob pa dang mi slob pa la nan tan byed pa nas mtha'i gnas byas pa'i 'bras bu'i bar du thob tu nye ba'i dge slong yongs su dag pa 'ba' zhig gis spyod du dbang bar zad na/_rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze gdol pa can la sogs 
[\[158a.6\]]pa mthu dang dpung bsnyems te nan gyis phrogs sam/_gzhan 'phrog tu bcug gam/_bdag spyod dam/_gzhan spyod du bcug kyang rung /_de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis yul srung ba'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin la sogs pa dkon mchog gsum la bsam pa dag cing dad pa mi phyed pa dag 
[\[158a.7\]]rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze gdol pa can la sogs pa la khros te/_zhe sdang gi sems skye ba nas de bzhin du rgyas par rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang /_blon po dang /_khyim bdag dang /_tshong dpon dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze gdol pa can la sogs 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]pa de dag thams cad ring po mi thogs par lus kyi yan lag dum bur chad pa dang /_zhag mang du lce ldibs pa dang /_shin tu mi bzad pa'i na ba dang tsha ba'i sdug bsngal chen po myong ba dang /_'chi 'phos nas kyang gdon mi za bar mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 
[\[158b.2\]]'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang /_blon po dang /_khyim bdag dang /_tshong dpon dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze gdol pa can la sogs pa sdig pa'i bshes gnyen la sten pa dge ba'i rtsa ba chung zhing 
[\[158b.3\]]zhan pa bsam pa ma dag pa g.yo dang sgyus 'tsho ba/_glen pa gti mug can cung zad kyi shes pa tsam bsnyems pa/_/tshig la bden pa med pa/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen spong ba/_sdig pa'i grogs po la sten cing mi dge ba spyod pa/_'phags pa'i chos la the tsom za ba/_'jig rten 
[\[158b.4\]]phyi ma'i sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu la 'jigs par mi lta ba dag sdig pa'i sdom pa srung bar dga' ba/_srog gcod pa nas ngan par lta ba'i bar du mos pa/_nga rgyal gyis mngon par zin pa/_'jig rten pa dag slu ba/_bdag ni tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pa'o zhes khas 'che ba'i 
[\[158b.5\]]rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze gdol pa can la sogs pa dag_/thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nga'i bstan pa 'jig par byed cing nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba dag la yang dang yang du khro zhing gshe ba dang /_spyo zhing smod pa dang /_nan la bor ba dang /_btson rar gzhug 
[\[158b.6\]]pa dang /_lus kyi yan lag gtub pa dang /_'tsho ba'i dbang po dang phral ba'i bar du byed de/_ngas bstan pa'i chos la yid mi ches pa/_mchod rten 'jig pa/_gtsug lag khang 'jig pa/_dge slong dag khyim par 'bebs pa/_skra dang kha spu 'breg cing gos ngur smrig gyon pa'i bar chad byed pa 
[\[158b.7\]]las rnam pa sna tshogs byed du 'jug cing 'khol ba ste/_de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis yul srung ba'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin la sogs pa dkon mchog gsum la bsam pa dag cing dad pa mi phyed pa dag rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze gdol pa can la khros te zhe 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]sdang gi sems bskyed pa nas de bzhin du rgyas par rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang /_blon po dang /_khyim bdag dang /_tshong dpon dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze la sogs pa gdol pa can de dag ring po mi thogs par lus kyi yan lag kun dum bur chad pa dang /_zhag mang 
[\[159a.2\]]du lce ldibs pa dang /_shin tu mi bzad pa'i na ba dang tsha ba'i sdug bsngal chen po myong ba dang /_'chi 'phos nas kyang gdon mi za bar mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang /_blon po dang /_khyim bdag dang /_
[\[159a.3\]]tshong dpon dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze la sogs pa 'di dag sdig pa'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po gsungs pa 'di las 'ga' zhig dang ldan na yang dge ba'i rtsa ba sngar bsags pa thams cad thal ba bzhin du tshig ste med par 'gyur la/_ring por mi thogs par lus kyi yan lag dum 
[\[159a.4\]]bur chad pa dang /_zhag mang du lce ldibs pa dang /_shin tu mi bzad pa'i na ba dang tsha ba'i sdug bsngal chen po myong ba dang /_shi nas kyang mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang /_blon po dang /_khyim bdag dang /_tshong dpon dang /_
[\[159a.5\]]dge sbyong dang /_bram ze la sogs pa gdol pa can 'di dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na mi ma rabs tha ma'i lus kyang 'thob par dka' na theg pa rnam pa gnyis kyi byang chub bam bla na med pa'i byang chub thob pa lta ci smos te skal ba med pa med do/_/sdig pa can de theg pa chen po'i ming yang thos par 
[\[159a.6\]]dka' na bla na med par mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i 'bras bu thob pa lta ci smos te/_gang zag de ni yun du bdag ma rung la gzhan yang ma rung bar byas pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang bskyab mi spyod do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_'bru'i mar 'tshir ba'i las byed pa ni 'bru re re las srin bu re rer 
[\[159a.7\]]gyur te btsir nas mar 'byung ngo /_/khyod ltos shig mar 'tshir ba'i las byed pa de nyin gcig la sems can ji snyed cig gsod par 'gyur/_gal te 'bru mar 'tshir ba de mar 'tshir ba'i gnas rnam pa bcu bcas nas nyin zhag gcig la gnas de re rer yang 'bru khal stong stong rgyun mi 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]'chad par lo stong tshang bar 'tshir na gang zag des srog gcod pa'i kha na ma tho ba'i las rab tu mang ba yin nam/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos gsol pa/_rab tu mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das rab tu mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa gang zag des 
[\[159b.2\]]srog gcod pa yang tshad ma mchis/_dpag tu ma mchis la kha na ma tho ba'i las kyang gzhal bar ram/_rtsi bar ram/_bgrang bar ram/_dper yang mi bzod de/_de bzhin gshegs pa nyag gcig gis mkhyen gyi gzhan gyis 'tshal ba ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[159b.3\]]bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_gal te mi la la zhig gis nor dang khe'i phyir smad 'tshong ma'i gnas rnam pa bcu bcas te/_gnas de gcig tu yang bud med smad 'tshong ma stong stong bzhag nas bu da med de dag so so nas rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan te/_skye bo bslus 
[\[159b.4\]]nas 'dod chags kyi las rgyun mi 'chad par lo stong gi bar du byed du bcug na/_gang zag de'i kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa yang gzhal du med de/_brtsi bas sam/_bgrang bas sam/_dper yang mi bzod do/_/'bru mar 'tshir ba'i gnas bcu po'i sdig pa de ni smad 'tshong ma'i gnas 
[\[159b.5\]]gcig bcas pa'i sdig dang mnyam mo/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'di lta ste/_gang zag gang la la zhig nor dang khe'i phyir chang 'tshong ba'i gnas bcu bcas te/_gnas de so sor rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan nas gnas de re rer yang thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis chang dad 
[\[159b.6\]]che ba'i mi stong stong brid de chang blud nas nyin mtshan du rgyun mi 'chad par lo stong gi bar du rtse na/_gang zag de'i sdig pa yang dpag tu med de/_brtsi bas sam/_bgrang bas sam/_dper yang mi bzod do/_/gong du bshad pa'i smad 'tshong ma'i gnas bcu po'i sdig pa de chang 'tshong ba'i gnas 
[\[159b.7\]]bcas pa'i sdig gcig dang mnyam mo/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'di lta ste/_gang zag la la zhig nor dang khe'i phyir shan pa'i gnas rnam pa bcu bcas te/_gnas de re rer yang nyin zhag gcig la bal glang dang /_lug dang /_rnga mo dang /_sha ba dang /_bya dang /_phag stong 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]stong rgyun mi 'chad par lo stong gi bar du bsad na gang zag de'i kha na ma tho ba'i sdig kyang gzhal du med de/_brtsi bas sam/_bgrang bas sam/_dper yang mi bzod do/_/de ltar sngar bshad pa'i chang 'tshong ba'i gnas bcu po'i sdig pa de shan pa'i gnas gcig bcas 
[\[160a.2\]]pa'i sdig dang mnyam mo/_/'di ltar shan pa'i gnas bcu po'i sdig de rgyal rigs gdol pa can nas/_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze la sogs pa'i gdol pa can de dag sdig pa'i 'khor lo bcu po las 'ga' zhig dang ldan na nyin zhag gcig gi kha na ma tho ba'i sdig kyang snga ma dang mnyam mo/_/
[\[160a.3\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_mar 'tshir gnas sdig bcu po dag_/smad 'tshong gnas sdig gcig dang mnyam/_/smad 'tshong gnas sdig bcu po dag_/chang 'tshong gnas sdig gcig dang mnyam/_/chang 'tshong gnas ni bcu po dag_/
[\[160a.4\]]shan pa'i gnas sdig gcig dang mnyam/_/shan pa'i gnas ni bcu bcas pas/_/rgyal po gdol can sdig gcig mnyam//_//bam po lnga pa/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[160a.5\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te rgyal rigs dge ba'am/_blon po dge ba dang /_khyim bdag dge ba dang /_tshong dpon dge ba dang /_dge sbyong dge ba dang /_bram ze dge ba dag bdag shin tu skyong zhing gzhan dag kyang shin tu skyong la/_'jig rten phyi mas kyang 'dzem pa/_sangs 
[\[160a.6\]]rgyas kyi bstan pa la gnas pa/_rab tu byung ba chos kyi snod du gyur pa'am/_chos kyi snod du ma gyur pa'am/_chung ngu na tshul khrims ma mchis pa'ang rung ste skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig 'tshal ba la shin tu bsti stang dang bcas te rim gro dang mchod pa bgyid do/_/gzhan yang 
[\[160a.7\]]nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos dang /_theg pa chen po'i chos la bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa nyan pa dang ba gzungs su 'dzin pa mchod pa byed pa theg pa chen po la gnas shing tshul khrims dang ldan pa yon tan dang ldan pa/_brtson 'grus 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]rtsom zhing nan tan du bgyid pa nas 'bras bu la gnas pa'i bar gyi gang zag rjes su srung zhing mthu stobs bstang ba dang /_zhu zhing 'dri ba dang /_nyan cing 'dzin pa dang /_dga' bzhin du gtam zer zhing gleng ba dang /_tshul khrims nyams pa sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong ring du spong ba dang /_
[\[160b.2\]]phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi nor la pha rol po gzhan chud gzon du mi gzhug cing shin tu srung ba dang /_phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi nor dang /_mchod rten gyi nor la bdag kyang mi rku/_gzhan yang rkur mi 'dzud pa dang /_bdag mi spyod/_gzhan yang spyod du mi 'dzud pa dang /_theg 
[\[160b.3\]]pa rnam gsum gyi chos smra ba la bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod cing mthus bstang ba dang /_pha rol po gzhan dag 'phya zhing skur pa dang smod du mi 'dzud pa dang /_de la rim gro bgyid cing spro ba skyed pa dang /_gang rab tu byung ba dag dang /_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i chos la dad pas 
[\[160b.4\]]srung zhing rjes su 'dzin pa dang /_mchod rten mi 'jig pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi gnas dang /_gtsug lag khang yang shin tu srung ba dang /_skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig gyon pa'i rab tu byung ba'i gang zag la mi brnyas mi smod pa dang /_sdig pa'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu la bdag 
[\[160b.5\]]mi spyod/_pha rol po gzhan sdig pa'i 'khor lo bcu las ring du gyur cing rgyal po snga ma'i chos dang lugs kyis rgyal po'i srid 'tsho ba dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung 'tshob cing dad cing rgyas par byed pa dang /_rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sten cing byams pa'i sems kyis mi 
[\[160b.6\]]yongs la skyong ba dang /_thams cad la ci dang cis 'dul ba bzhin du de dang de'i chos kyis 'dul zhing ston to/_/ngan par lta ba spangs nas yang dag pa'i chos la nan tan byed du 'dzud pa'i rgyal rigs dge ba nas bram ze dge ba'i bar du dge ba de dag bsod nams ji snyed cig thob cing /_sdig 
[\[160b.7\]]pa ji snyed cig 'byang bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu gal te gang zag mthu chen po dang ldan pa gcig 'jig rten du mngon par byung ste/_snga dro'i dus su yang rin po che sna bdun gyis 'dzam bu gling yongs su bkang nas sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun la 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]'bul ba dang /_nyi ma'i gung la yang rin po che sna bdun gyis 'dzam bu'i gling yongs su bkang ste sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun la 'bul ba dang /_phyi dro'i dus su yang rin po che sna bdun gyis 'dzam bu'i gling yongs su bkang ste sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun la 'bul 
[\[161a.2\]]ba dang /_de bzhin du nyin re rer yang rgyun mi 'chad par lo brgya stong gi bar du sbyin pa byin na gang zag de'i bsod nams kyi tshogs de mang ba yin nam/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos gsol pa/_shin tu mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das shin tu mang ngo /_/
[\[161a.3\]]bde bar gshegs pa gang zag de'i bsod nams kyi tshogs ni tshad ma mchis/_dpag tu ma mchis te/_brjod pa'am/_brtsi ba'am/_bgrang ba'am/_dper yang mi bzod de/_sangs rgyas nyag gcig gis mkhyen gyi gzhan gyis ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[161a.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_khyod kyis smras pa de bzhin no/_/gal te rgyal rigs dge ba nas bram ze dge ba'i bar du gang zhig sdig pa'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po bdag kyang mi spyod la pha rol po gzhan spyod pa dag sdig pa'i 'khor lo bcu spong 
[\[161a.5\]]bar yang gzhan la ston pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma bas tshad med/_dpag tu med/_brjod par ram/_brtsi bas sam/_bgrang bas sam/_dper yang mi bzod par che'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'di lta ste/_gang zag mthu chen po dang 
[\[161a.6\]]ldan pa gcig 'jig rten du mngon par byung ste phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi phyir gtsug lag khang dang /_gnas khang shin tu bzang zhing yangs pa gling bzhi dang mnyam pa brtsigs nas gnas de dag kun tu khri stan dang /_na bza' dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_snyun gyi rkyen sman dang /_
[\[161a.7\]]'tsho ba'i yo byad thams cad dang ldan par bshams te de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i nye gnas chen po'i 'khor thams cad de na bzhugs pa la/_brtson 'grus su dge ba'i phyogs rnam pa sna tshogs la nan tan byed cing nyin mtshan le lo med par 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bar du mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur rgyun mi 'chad par byed na/_gang zag de'i bsod nams kyi phung po shin tu mang ba yin nam/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos gsol pa/_shin tu mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das shin tu mang 
[\[161b.2\]]ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa gang zag de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni tshad ma mchis/_dpag tu ma mchis te/_brjod par ram/_brtsi bas sam/_bgrang bas sam/_dper yang mi bzod de/_sangs rgyas nyag gcig gis ni mkhyen gyi gzhan gyis ni ma lags so/_/
[\[161b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_khyod kyis smras pa bzhin no/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'di lta ste gang zag mthu chen po dang ldan pa gcig 'jig rten du mngon par byung ste phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi phyir gtsug lag khang dang gnas 
[\[161b.4\]]khang shin tu bzang la yangs pa/_gling bzhi pa bcu dang mnyam pa brtsigs te/_gnas de dag kun tu khri stan dang /_na bza' dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gsos sman dang /_'tsho ba'i yo byad thams cad dang ldan par bshams te de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_
[\[161b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po'i nye gnas thams cad de na bzhugs pa la brtson 'grus su dge ba'i phyogs rnam pa sna tshogs la nan tan byed cing nyin mtshan le lo med par lo brgya stong bye ba khrag khrig gi bar du mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur rgyun mi 'chad par byed na/_gang zag 
[\[161b.6\]]de'i bsod nams kyi phung po shin tu mang ba yin nam/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos gsol pa/_shin tu mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das shin tu mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa gang zag de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni tshad ma mchis/_dpag tu ma mchis 
[\[161b.7\]]te/_brjod par ram/_brtsi bas sam/_bgrang bas sam/_dper yang mi bzod de/_sangs rgyas nyag gcig gis mkhyen gyi gzhan gyis ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_ji ltar khyod kyis smras pa 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]bzhin no/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'di lta ste/_gang zag mthu chen po dang ldan pa gcig 'jig rten du mngon par byung ste/_sangs rgyas kyi ring bsrel gyi phyir mchod rten shin tu mdzes pa/_mtho zhing yangs pa/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[162a.2\]]dang mnyam pa brtsigs la sngar bshad pa bzhin phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi phyir gtsug lag khang dang /_gnas khang brtsigs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po bas sangs rgyas kyi ring bsrel gyi phyir mchod rten brtsigs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po che ste/_brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba 
[\[162a.3\]]nas stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/khrag khrig gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/grangs kyi char ram/_rtsis kyi char ram/_dpag pa'i char ram/_dpe'i char ram/_rgyu'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/
[\[162a.4\]]rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'di lta ste/_gal te pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa/_rnam par grol ba brgyad dang ldan pa bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dgra bcom pa chen po sha stag gis/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir yongs su gang ba ni 'di lta ste/_'bras kyi ljang 
[\[162a.5\]]bu'am/_til lam/_'od ma'am/_'dam bu'am/_bu ram shing gi tshal lta bur gyur la/_de dag thams cad bcing ba lngas bcings nas lo bye ba brgya stong snyed lon pa las mthu chen po dang ldan pa'i gang zag gcig 'jig rten du mngon par byung ste/_bsod nams 'dod pa'i phyir de dag 
[\[162a.6\]]gi bcings pa thams cad bkrol nas dgra bcom pa de dag thams cad spos chus bkrus te/_chos gos dang /_lhung bzed lo brgya stong gi bar du phul nas/_gnas khang dang /_khri stan dang /_gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_nad kyi gsos sman dang /_'tsho ba'i yo byad rnam 
[\[162a.7\]]pa sna tshogs kyang yid bzhin du byin la/_dgra bcom pa de dag mya ngan las 'das nas kyang mchod pa byas te/_bsregs nas de dag gi ring bsrel bsdus nas rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten gyi nang du bcug go/_/gzhan yang rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_gdugs dang /_
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]spos dang /_me tog dang /_rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po bas sangs rgyas kyi ring bsrel gyi phyir mchod rten brtsigs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po mang ste/_dgra bcom pa'i bcing ba bkrol te mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams kyis/_brgya'i char 
[\[162b.2\]]yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/khrag khrig gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/_rtsis kyi char ram/_grangs kyi char ram/_dpag pa'i char ram/_dpe'i char ram/_
[\[162b.3\]]rgyu'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/rigs kyi bu gal te rgyal rigs dge ba nas bram ze dge ba'i bar du gang gis sdig pa'i 'khor lo bcu po bdag kyang mi byed la/_gzhan dag kyang sdig pa'i 'khor lo bcu po ma spyod cig par gros 'debs na de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni/_bsod 
[\[162b.4\]]nams kyi phung po snga ma gang bas kyang tshad med/_dpag tu med/_brjod du med par che ste/_ji snyed kyi bsod nams skyes pa de snyed kyi sdig kyang yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gal te rgyal rigs dge ba'am/_blon po dge ba'am/_khyim bdag gam/_tshong dpon nam/_
[\[162b.5\]]dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze dge ba gang zhig ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya'i tha ma la dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig tu nye ba na ngas bstan pa'i chos kyi mig shin tu srung zhing bdag kyang shin tu sdom la/_pha rol po gzhan yang srung ba/_'jig rten phyi ma'i bag byed pa nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i slob ma 
[\[162b.6\]]chos kyi snod du gyur pa'am chos kyi snod du ma gyur pa yang rung /_mthar ni tshul khrims med pa yang rung ste/_skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig gyon pa la shin tu bag byed cing bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod de gnod pa mi byed dam/_gzhan yang theg pa gsum gyi dam pa'i chos 
[\[162b.7\]]shin tu srung zhing nyan te 'dzin pa dang /_nyan thos kyi chos la bsti stang byed pa na rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos dang theg pa chen po'i chos la mi 'phya mi skur pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang /_theg pa chen po la phrag dog mi skyed pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]chos la rim gro byed de nyan cing 'dzin pa na/_nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_theg pa chen po'i chos la mi 'phya mi skur/_nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_theg pa chen po la phrag dog mi skyed pa dang /_theg pa chen po'i chos la rim gro byed de nyan cing 'dzin pa na nyan 
[\[163a.2\]]thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos la mi brnyas/_mi skur cing /_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la phrag dog mi skyed la/_nyan thos kyi theg pa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos mngon du mi byed do/_/theg pa chen po'i chos 
[\[163a.3\]]yang dag pa nyid mngon du byed pa dang /_theg pa chen po la gnas pas tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_yon tan dang ldan pa/_brtson 'grus rtsom pa nas 'bras bu la gnas pa'i bar du nan tan byed pa'i gang zag la rtag tu bsnyen bkur byed cing g.yog dang /_mchod pa dang /_dad pa'i 
[\[163a.4\]]sems kyis bkur sti byed de 'dri ba dang /_nyan pa dang /_'dzin par byed pa dang /_tshul khrims nyams pa sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong dag ring du spong ba dang /_dad pas phul ba'i phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi nor la chos ma yin pas chud gzon du mi gzhug pa dang /_phyogs 
[\[163a.5\]]bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi nor dang /_mchod rten dang /_dge 'dun gyi khud pa'i nor la bdag kyang thug thub mi byed cing /_pha rol po gzhan yang thug thub tu spyod du mi 'dzud pa dang /_theg pa gsum gyi chos smra ba'i gang zag la shin tu bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod cing mthu bstang 
[\[163a.6\]]ba dang /_pha rol po gzhan dag 'phya zhing skur pa dang /_smod du mi gzhug pa dang /_rab tu byung ba'i gang zag la shin tu dad pas spro ba skyed pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i 'phags pa'i bka' la dad cing 'dzin pa dang /_mchod rten mi 'jig pa dang /_phyogs bcu'i 
[\[163a.7\]]dge 'dun gyi gnas gtsug lag khang skyong ba dang /_nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i slob ma dag la dbang mi za zhing phyir yang khyim par mi 'bebs pa dang /_sdig pa'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po dag la bdag kyang mi spyod cing pha rol po gzhan yang sdig pa'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po yongs su 
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]spongs shig par gros 'debs pa dang /_rgyal po snga ma'i chos lugs dang srid kyis 'tsho zhing dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis 'jig rten mang po yongs su sdud cing ston pa dang /_rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sten pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung 'tshob cing shin tu rgyas par byed 
[\[163b.2\]]pa dang /_chos kyi mig nam du yang mi nub par srung ba'i rgyal rigs dge ba nas bram ze dge ba'i bar du de dag de lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pas na de dag 'tsho bas spyod pa chud za bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_gnod sbyin dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_lus srul po la sogs pa thams 
[\[163b.3\]]cad kyang dga' ste byams pa'i sems kyis srung zhing skyob bo/_/chos kyi snod du gyur pa bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa thams cad kyang dga' zhing snying rje'i sems kyis skyob cing rjes su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis gnas pa'i yul dang /_skye bo thams cad kyang phyir zhing bde 
[\[163b.4\]]la shin tu skyid pa dang /_phyi'i dgras kyang gnod pa byed ma nus shing thams cad bka' nyan te ma pham par ngang 'du ba dang /_de'i dbang gis dge ba'i phyogs la phyir zhing brtson te mi dge ba'i rgyud yongs su skems pa dang /_lha dang mi la sogs pa yongs su rgyas shing kun tu srung ba'i phyir 
[\[163b.5\]]tshe shin tu ring bar 'gyur ba dang /_bdag gi nyon mongs pa yongs su 'joms shing pha rol po'i nyon mongs pa yang 'jil bar byed pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i lam pha rol du phyin pa drug yongs su bzung bas log par lta ba'i lam ngan pa thams cad yongs su bcom pas 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 
[\[163b.6\]]yun ring por 'khor ba las ldog pa/_sdig pa'i bshes gnyen spong zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rtag tu sten pa dang /_gang nas gang du skye ba'i gnas thams cad du sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang phrad cing bsnyen bkur ba dang /_mchod pa rgyun mi 'chad par byed par 'gyur 
[\[163b.7\]]ba dang /_ring po mi thogs par bsams bzhin du gang nas gang du dga' ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang de dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang nas lha'i dbang po 'khor dang bcas pa thams 
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]cad nas sha za'i dbang po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyi bar du 'dug pa las langs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs te thal mo sbyar nas bsti stang dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 
[\[164a.2\]]ma mchis pa'i dus lnga brgya'i tha ma la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'jig tu nye ba na/_gal te rgyal rigs dge ba nas bram ze dge ba'i bar du gang sdig pa'i 'khor lo bcu po bdag kyang yongs su spangs la gzhan yang yongs su spongs shig par gros 'debs pa 
[\[164a.3\]]dang /_bdag dang gzhan srung ba la mkhas pa/_'jig rten slad ma'i bag bgyid pa la mkhas pa/_dam pa'i chos srung ba/_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung 'tshob cing rgyun mi 'chad par rgyas par bgyid pa nas/_mdor na bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ltar gang zag de dag 
[\[164a.4\]]la sogs pa theg pa gsum gyi chos la bsti stang dang bcas pas nyan cing 'dzin te/_nam du yang mi 'chab pa dang /_theg pa gsum la gnas pa'i gang zag la shin tu srung zhing mchod pa bgyid de gnod pa mi bgyid pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi nor rdzas la shin tu srung zhing god 
[\[164a.5\]]par mi bgyid pa'i rgyal rigs dge ba nas bram ze dge ba'i bar du de dag la bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pas bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_chos rnam pa 'di bcu yang skye zhing 'phel bar bgyi'o/_/bcu gang zhe na tshe ring bar 'gyur ba dang /_bgegs med pa skye zhing 'phel ba dang /_
[\[164a.6\]]nad med pa skye zhing 'phel ba dang /_'khor skye zhing 'phel ba dang /_nor dang rin po che skye zhing 'phel ba dang /_'tsho ba'i yo byad skye zhing 'phel ba dang /_go 'phang skye zhing 'phel ba dang /_grags pa skye zhing 'phel ba dang /_dge ba'i grogs po skye zhing 'phel ba dang /_shes rab 
[\[164a.7\]]skye zhing 'phel ba ste/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te rgyal rigs dge ba dang bram ze dge ba'i bar du sdig pa'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po yongs su spong zhing pha rol po gzhan yang spong bar gros 'debs la/_yon tan sngar smos pa dang ldan na bdag kyang srung zhing skyob pa dang chos 
[\[164b\]]
