[\[205b.4\]]gang nas gang du skyes par nad med pa dang /_tshe ring ba dang /_byad gzugs bzang ba dang /_yid gzhungs pa dang /_rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang /_gzhan yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa bsod nams 
[\[205b.5\]]kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/_de'i rjes su slob pa dang /_srog gcod pa yongs su spong ba dang /_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su gcod pa dang /_dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam 
[\[205b.6\]]grangs thams cad tshol ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang sbyor ba thams cad la rim gyis gzhol zhing shin tu yangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa nas bla na med pa'i byang chub thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtshon cha med pa dang /_dgra 
[\[205b.7\]]dang 'tshe ba'i ming mi grag pa dang /_'jigs pa thams cad dang bral te rab tu bde skyid pa dang /_nad med pa dang /_tshe ring ba'i zhing du sems can dag skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu med de sems can dag cis 'dul ba'i bzhin 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]du dam pa'i chos ston to/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas shing sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srog gcod pa 
[\[206a.2\]]yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor lo ste dang po'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo de dang ldan na nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/_nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg 
[\[206a.3\]]pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro/_/theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/_theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro/_/dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yongs su 
[\[206a.4\]]'phel ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi snod dam/_chos kyi snod ma yin pa yang rung /_chung ngu na chos gos kyi tshal bu gyon cing skra dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro/_/theg pa chen po'i chos la gong 
[\[206a.5\]]nas gong du 'phar zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /_rno ba'i shes rab dang /_bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs dang /_bzod pa dang /_sa rnams thams cad la dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /_rtag tu dge ba'i 
[\[206a.6\]]bshes gnyen dang phrad cing rjes su 'gro ba dang /_rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /_chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /_dge 'dun la mchod pa dang bsnyen 
[\[206a.7\]]bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa dang /_byang chub kyi spyod pa dang smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems mi ngoms par 'gyur te/_'bras bu gzhan thob pa yang ji ltar rgyas par bshad pa 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]bzhin no/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang na ma 'tsho'i bar du ma byin par len pa yongs su spangs na de nyid sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa yin te/_yongs su gdung ba med pa dang /_'tshe ba med pa dang /_bdag 
[\[206b.2\]]nyid tshul bzhin du rnyed pa'i nor gyis chog shes par gnas kyis/_chos ma yin pa'i nor dang khe la re ba med pa de'i dbang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/thog ma med pa'i mtha' nas rgyud lngar 'khor zhing 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 
[\[206b.3\]]bying bar 'gyur ba yang ma byin par len pa'i dbang gis lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid mi dge ba'i lam rnams bdag kyang byed la/_gzhan yang byed du 'dzud cing mthong ba dang thos pa'i rjes su yi rang ba las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /_sems can gyi sgrib pa 
[\[206b.4\]]dang /_chos kyi sgrib pa dang /_rin po che dang nor la sgrib pas bsgribs par gyur to/_/'di ltar ma byin par len pa yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor los lhag ma ma lus par yongs su bcom pas rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi myong ste/_lus 'di nyid la yang lha dang mi 
[\[206b.5\]]la sogs pa kun dga' zhing yid du 'ong bas dogs pa mi skye ba dang /_lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang /_nor rin po che thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/nam 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa na yang lus dang sems sdug bsngal gyis mi gdung zhing yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang /_chung 
[\[206b.6\]]ma dang /_'khor thams cad kyis yongs su bskor bas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed kyi shin tu 'jigs pa gshin rje'i pho nya mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi chos kyis dul ba tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa bsod nams kyi zhing yang 
[\[206b.7\]]dag pa dang phrad de/_lus dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang de la bkur sti dang bcas pas dang ba skye bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'phos nas kyang phyir mi'i nang du skye ste/_dbang po yongs su rdzogs shing yan lag dang ldan pa dang /_gang nas gang du skyes par longs spyod chen po dang ldan zhing 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]byad gzugs bzang ba dang /_yid gzhungs pa dang /_rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang /_'jigs pa lnga dang nor thun mong du mi 'gyur ro/_/phyir yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba/_tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/_bsod 
[\[207a.2\]]nams dang yon tan dang ldan pa/_bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/_de'i rjes sa slob cing ma byin par len pa yongs su spong ba dang /_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su gcod pa dang /_dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad yongs su rdzogs 
[\[207a.3\]]pa dang /_theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang spyod pa thams cad la rim gyis gzhol ba dang /_shin tu yangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa nas bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[207a.4\]]yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang /_rin po che'i shing dang /_rin po che'i rdzing dang /_rin po che'i gzhal med khang la sogs pas yongs su gang ba dang /_bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bral ba rgyan thams cad kyis bkod pa dang ldan pa'i zhing 
[\[207a.5\]]der sems can dag skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu med de sems can dag cis 'dul ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos ston to/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas shing sems can tshad med pa la phan pa 
[\[207a.6\]]dang bde ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma byin par len pa yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor lo gnyis pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na nyan thos kyi theg pa la 
[\[207a.7\]]'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro/_/theg pa chen po la 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]'khrul pa med par 'gyur/_theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro/_/dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yongs su 'phel ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi snod dam/_chos kyi snod ma yin pa yang rung 
[\[207b.2\]]chung ngu na chos gos kyi tshal bu gyon cing skra dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/_theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du 'phar zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /_rno ba'i shes rab dang /_bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[207b.3\]]dang /_gzungs dang /_bzod pa dang /_sa rnams thams cad la dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /_rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad cing de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang /_rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan 
[\[207b.4\]]thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /_chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /_dge 'dun la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa dang /_byang chub kyi spyod pa dang smon lam rnam 
[\[207b.5\]]pa sna tshogs kyis sems mi ngoms par 'gyur te/_'bras bu thob pa dag kyang ji ltar bshad pa bzhin no/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang na ma 'tsho'i bar du 'dod pas log par g.yem pa yongs su spangs na/_de nyid 
[\[207b.6\]]sems can thams cad 'dod pa'i rlung gis g.yengs pa las 'jigs pa med pa/_phrag dog med pa/_'tshe ba med pa/_yongs su gdung ba med pa/_'khrug pa med pa'i sbyin pa yin te/_bdag gi chung mas chog shes shing gzhan gyi chung ma la re ba med pas de'i 
[\[207b.7\]]dbang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/thog ma med pa'i mtha' nas rgyud lngar 'khor bar 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'bying ba yang 'dod pas log par g.yem pa'i dbang gis lus dang ngag dang /_yid mi dge ba'i las bdag kyang byed 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]la/_gzhan yang byed du 'jug cing mthong ba dang thos pa'i rjes su yi rang ba las byung ba nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /_sems can gyi sgrib pa dang /_chos kyi sgrib pa dang /_chung ma'i sgrib pas bsgribs par gyur to/_/'di ltar 'dod pas log par g.yem pa 
[\[208a.2\]]yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor los lhag ma ma lus par bcom pas rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi len te/_lus 'di nyid la yang lha dang mi la sogs pa kun dga' zhing yid du 'ong bas dogs pa mi skye ba dang /_lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang /_chung ma lhod pa dang 
[\[208a.3\]]bcas pa ma yin par 'gyur ro/_/'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa na yang lus dang sems la sdug bsngal gyis mi gdungs shing yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang /_chung ma dang /_'khor thams cad kyis yongs su bskor bas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed par 'gyur gyi/_shin tu 'jigs pa'i 
[\[208a.4\]]gshin rje'i pho nya ni mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/_lus dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang /_de la bkur sti dang bcas pas 
[\[208a.5\]]de la shin tu dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'phos nas kyang phyir mi'i nang du skyes te/_dbang po yongs su rdzogs shing yan lag dang ldan pa dang /_gang nas gang du skyes par 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang /_byad gzugs bzang ba dang /_yid gzhungs pa dang /_rab tu 
[\[208a.6\]]bde zhing skyid pa dang /_phyir yang shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/_de'i rjes su slob cing 'dod pas log par g.yem pa yongs su spong ba dang /_sdig pa 
[\[208a.7\]]mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su spong ba dang /_dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang spyod pa thams cad la rim gyis 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]gzhol zhing shin tu yangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa nas bla na med pa'i byang chub 'thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing bud med med pa dang /_'dod chags dang g.yem pa med pa/_tshangs par spyod pa mchog dang ldan pa'i sems can dag zhing der 
[\[208b.2\]]skye ste/_de dag thams cad kyang rdzus te skye'i mi gtsang ba'i mngal nas skye ba ni ma yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu med de/_sems can dag la cis 'dul ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos ston to/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam 
[\[208b.3\]]pa'i chos yun ring du gnas shing /_sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pas log par g.yem pa yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor lo gsum pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[208b.4\]]sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/_nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 
[\[208b.5\]]'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro/_/theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/_theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro/_/dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yongs su 'phel ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas 
[\[208b.6\]]chos kyi snod dam/_chos kyi snod ma yin pa yang rung chung ngu na chos gos kyi tshal bu gyon zhing skra dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/_theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du 'phar zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /_rno ba'i shes rab dang /_bsod nams kyi khyad par 
[\[208b.7\]]rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs dang /_bzod pa dang /_sa rnams thams cad la dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /_rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad cing rjes su 'thun par 'gyur ba dang /_rtag tu sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]'bral zhing byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /_chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /_dge 'dun la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la brtson pas sems 
[\[209a.2\]]mi ngoms pa dang /_byang chub kyi spyod pa dang smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems mi ngoms pa dang /_'bras bu gzhan dag thob pa yang ji ltar bshad pa bzhin no/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam 'tsho'i bar du [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba 
[\[209a.3\]]yongs su spangs na sems can thams cad kyis rtag tu bkur ba dang /_tshig btsugs pa tshad mar 'gyur ba dang /_tshig kun nyan cing gus pa dang dogs pa mi skye bar 'gyur te/_de'i dbang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/thog ma med pa'i 
[\[209a.4\]]mtha' nas rgyud lngar 'khor bar 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'bying ba yang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba'i dbang gis lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyis sdig pa mi dge ba'i las bdag kyang byed la/_gzhan yang byed du 'dzud cing mthong ba dang thos pa'i rjes su yi rang ba las byung ba'i nyon mongs 
[\[209a.5\]]pa'i sgrib pa dang /_sems can gyi sgrib pa dang /_chos kyi sgrib pa dang /_tshig btsugs pa las sgrib pas bsgribs par 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor los lhag ma ma lus par yongs su bcom pas rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi len par 
[\[209a.6\]]'gyur ro/_/lus 'di nyid la lha dang mi la sogs pa kun dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba dang /_dogs pa mi skye ba dang /_lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang /_tshig tu smra ba thams cad la gzhan yid ches shing nyan par 'gyur ro/_/'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa na yang lus dang sems 
[\[209a.7\]]la sdug bsngal gyis mi gdung zhing yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang /_chung ma dang /_'khor thams cad kyis yongs su bskor bas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed kyi shin tu 'jigs pa'i gshin rje'i pho nya ni mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]kyis dul ba tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/_lus dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang /_de la bkur sti dang bcas pas shin tu dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'phos nas kyang phyir mi'i lus su skye zhing dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa yan lag 
[\[209b.2\]]dang ldan pa dang /_gong nas gang du skyes par tshig btsugs pa dang /_byad gzugs bzang ba dang /_yid gzhungs pa dang /_rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang /_yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa bsod nams kyi 
[\[209b.3\]]zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/_de'i rjes su slob pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba yongs su spangs pa dang /_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su gcod pa/_dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad rdzogs pa dang /_theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol 
[\[209b.4\]]ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang spyod pa thams cad la rim gyis gzhol ba dang /_shin tu yangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa nas bla na med pa'i byang chub 'thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad bden par smra ba/_sgyu dang 
[\[209b.5\]]bral ba/_lha'i gsung gis yongs su brgyan pa dang /_slu ba med cing sems kyi spyod pa drang ba dang /_yang dag pa'i spyad pa rnam par dkar ba'i chos 'ba' zhig la spyod pa/_lha'i gos bsung can gyon pa/_rin po che'i rgyan gyis bkod pa'i sems can dag zhing der skye bar 
[\[209b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu med de/_sems can dag cis 'dul ba bzhin du chos ston to/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas shing sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[209b.7\]]rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor lo bzhi pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/_nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro/_/theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/_theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med 
[\[210a.2\]]par 'gyur ro/_/dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yongs su 'phel bar byed pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi snod dam/_chos kyi snod ma yin pa yang rung chung ngu na chos gos kyi tshal bu gyon cing skra dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa med 
[\[210a.3\]]par 'gyur/_theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du 'phar zhing phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang /_rno ba'i shes rab dang /_bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu 'phel zhing skye ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs dang /_bzod pa dang /_sa rnams thams cad la dbang du 'gyur 
[\[210a.4\]]zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /_rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad cing de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang /_rtag tu sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /_chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /_
[\[210a.5\]]dge 'dun la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad shin tu tshol ba la brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa dang /_byang chub kyi spyod pa dang smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems mi ngoms par 'gyur te/_'bras bu gzhan 'thob pa yang ji 
[\[210a.6\]]ltar bshad pa bzhin no/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang na ma 'tsho'i bar du phra ma yongs su spangs na sems can thams cad kyis rtag tu bkur zhing bla mar byed pa dang /_tshig tu smra ba thams cad gzhan gyis mnyan pa dang /_'dum pa dang /_
[\[210a.7\]]dogs pa mi skye bar 'gyur te/_de'i dbang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/thog ma med pa'i mtha' nas rgyud lngar 'khor bar 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'bying ba yang phra ma byas pa'i dbang gis lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyis mi dge ba'i las 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]bdag kyang byed la/_gzhan yang byed du 'dzud cing mthong ba dang thos pa'i rjes su yi rang ba las byung ba nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /_sems can gyi sgrib pa dang /_chos kyi sgrib pa dang /_'dum pa la sgrib pas bsgribs par 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar phra ma'i tshig yongs su spangs pa'i 
[\[210b.2\]]'khor los lhag ma ma lus par yongs su bcom pas rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi len par byed do/_/lus 'di nyid la yang lha dang mi la sogs pa kun dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba dang /_dogs pa mi skye ba dang /_lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang /_tshig tu smra ba thams 
[\[210b.3\]]cad la nyan cing 'dum par 'gyur ro/_/'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa na yang lus dang sems la sdug bsngal gyis mi gdung zhing yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang /_chung ma dang /_'khor thams cad kyis yongs su bskor bas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed par 'gyur gyi/_shin tu 'jigs 
[\[210b.4\]]pa'i gshin rje'i pho nya mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/_lus dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang bkur sti dang bcas pas shin tu dad pa skye bar 
[\[210b.5\]]'gyur/_tshe 'phos nas kyang phyir mi'i nang du skye ste/_dbang po yongs su rdzogs shing yan lag dang ldan pa dang /_gang nas gang du skyes par smra ba'i tshig 'jam zhing 'dum pa dang /_byad gzugs bzang ba dang /_yid gzhungs pa dang /_rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang /_
[\[210b.6\]]phyir yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/_bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/_de'i rjes su slob pa dang /_phra ma'i tshig dang yongs su bral bas sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su gcod pa 
[\[210b.7\]]dang /_dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang spyod pa thams cad la rim gyis gzhol zhing ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa nas bla na med pa'i byang 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]chub thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu brtan pa sra ba mi shigs pa dang /_lha rdzas bzang pos yongs su brgyan par 'gyur ba dang /_'thun pa dang /_mi rtsod pa shin tu dul zhing 'dum pa dge ba'i chos tshol ba'i sems can dag zhing der skye 
[\[211a.2\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu 'dum zhing gus pas dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu med de/_sems can dag ci dang cis 'dul ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos ston to/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos yun 
[\[211a.3\]]ring du gnas shing sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phra ma yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor lo lnga pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo 'di 
[\[211a.4\]]dang ldan na nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/_nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro/_/theg pa chen po 
[\[211a.5\]]la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/_theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro/_/dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yongs su 'phel ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi snod dam/_chos kyi snod ma yin pa yang rung /_
[\[211a.6\]]chung ngu na chos gos kyi tshal bu gyon zhing skra dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/_theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du 'phar zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /_rno ba'i shes rab dang /_bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs 
[\[211a.7\]]dang /_bzod pa dang /_sa rnams thams cad la dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /_rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad cing de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang /_rtag tu sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]'bral ba dang /_chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /_dge 'dun mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa dang /_byang chub kyi spyod pa dang /_smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems mi ngoms 
[\[211b.2\]]par 'gyur te/_'bras bu gzhan 'thob pa yang ji skad bshad pa bzhin no/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang na ma 'tsho'i bar du zhe gcod pa'i tshig thams cad yongs su spangs na sems can thams cad kyis bkur zhing bla mar 
[\[211b.3\]]byed pa dang /_tshig tu smra ba kun la pha rol po kun dga' zhing nyan pas dogs pa med par 'gyur te/_de'i dbang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/thog ma med pa'i mtha' nas rgyud lngar 'khor bar 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'bying ba 
[\[211b.4\]]yang zhe gcod pa'i tshig gi dbang gis lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid mi dge ba'i las bdag kyang byed la/_gzhan yang byed du 'dzud cing mthong ba dang thos pa'i rjes su yi rang ba las byung ba nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /_sems can gyi sgrib pa dang /_chos kyi sgrib pa dang /_shin 
[\[211b.5\]]tu dul ba la sgrib pas bsgribs par gyur to/_/'di ltar zhe gcod pa'i tshig yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor los lhag ma ma lus par yongs su bcom pa'i dbang gis rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yongs su mi len te/_lus 'di nyid la yang lha dang mi la sogs pa kun 
[\[211b.6\]]dga' bas dogs pa mi skye ba dang /_lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang /_tshig tu smra ba thams cad pha rol gyi yid du 'ong ba dang snyan par 'gyur ro/_/nam 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa na yang lus dang sems la sdug bsngal gyis mi gdung zhing nyon mi mongs pa dang /_yid du 
[\[211b.7\]]'ong ba'i bu dang chung ma dang 'khor thams cad kyis yongs su bskor bas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed par 'gyur gyi shin tu 'jigs pa'i gshin rje'i pho nya mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba/_tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]pa/_bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de lus dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang /_de la bkur sti dang bcas pas shin tu dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'phos nas kyang phyir mi'i nang du skyes na yang dbang po yongs su rdzogs shing yan lag dang ldan pa dang /_
[\[212a.2\]]gang nas gang du skyes par tshig 'jam por smra ba dang /_byad gzugs bzang ba dang /_yid gzhungs pa dang /_rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang /_phyir yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba/_tshul khrims dang /_yon tan du ldan pa/_bsod nams 
[\[212a.3\]]kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de de'i rjes su slob pa dang /_zhe gcod pa'i tshig yongs su spong ba dang /_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su gcod pa dang /_dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams 
[\[212a.4\]]cad tshol ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang spyod pa thams cad rim gyis gzhol zhing shin tu yangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa nas bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi bar du 'thob pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing na yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra thams cad dang bral te/_
[\[212a.5\]]yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyangs snyan pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_chos kyi sgras zhing de yongs su gang ba dang /_dran pa dang blo gros su ldan pa/_tshangs pa'i dbyangs can/_shin tu dul ba'i sems can dag zhing der skye ba dang /_rtag tu tshig 'jam pos gcig la gcig skul bar 
[\[212a.6\]]byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu med de/_sems can dag cis 'dul ba bzhin du chos ston pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas zhing sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[212a.7\]]rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe gcod pa'i tshig yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor lo drug pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo 'di dang ldan pas nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/_nyan thos kyi theg pa'i 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro/_/theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/_theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 
[\[212b.2\]]'gyur ro/_/dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yongs su 'phel ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi snod dam/_chos kyi snod ma yin pa yang rung chung ngu na chos gos kyi tshal bu gyon cing skra dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa med 
[\[212b.3\]]par 'gyur/_theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du 'phar zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /_rno ba'i shes rab dang /_bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs dang /_bzod pa dang /_sa rnams thams cad la dbang du 'gyur 
[\[212b.4\]]zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /_rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad cing rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang /_rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /_chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba 
[\[212b.5\]]dang /_dge 'dun la mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa dang /_byang chub kyi spyod pa dang smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems mi ngoms par 'gyur te/_'bras bu gzhan 
[\[212b.6\]]dag thob pa yang ji skad bshad pa bzhin no/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang na ma 'tsho'i bar du tshig kyal pa yongs su spangs pas sems can thams cad kyis bkur zhing bla mar byed pa dang /_tshig tu smra ba thams cad don du 'gyur 
[\[212b.7\]]zhing tshig thos pa rnams nyan cing gus pas dogs pa med par 'gyur ro/_/de'i dbang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/thog ma med pa'i mtha' nas rgyud lngar 'khor bar 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying ba yang tshig kyal pa smra ba'i dbang gis 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid mi dge ba'i las bdag kyang byed la/_gzhan yang byed du 'dzud cing mthong ba dang thos pa'i rjes su yi rang ba las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /_sems can gyi sgrib pa dang /_chos kyi sgrib pa dang /_don du smra ba la sgrib 
[\[213a.2\]]pas bsgribs par gyur to/_/'di ltar tshig kyal pa yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor los lhag ma ma lus par yongs su bcom pas rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi len par byed do/_/lus 'di nyid la lha dang mi la sogs pa kun dga' zhing yid du 'ong bas dogs pa med 
[\[213a.3\]]par 'gyur ba dang /_lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang /_tshig tu smra ba thams cad don du 'gyur ba dang /_'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa na yang lus dang sems la sdug bsngal gyis mi gdung zhing yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang /_chung ma dang /_'khor gyis yongs su bskor bas 'chi 
[\[213a.4\]]'pho ba'i dus byed par 'gyur gyi shin tu 'jigs pa'i gshin rje'i pho nya mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba/_tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/_bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de lus dang sems rab tu dga' 
[\[213a.5\]]ba dang /_de la bkur sti dang bcas shing shin tu dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'phos nas kyang phyir mi'i nang du skye zhing dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa yan lag dang ldan pa dang /_gang nas gang du skyes par phan pa dang /_don du 'gyur ba'i tshig smra ba dang /_byad gzugs 
[\[213a.6\]]bzang ba dang /_yid gzhungs pa dang /_rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang /_phyir yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba/_tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/_bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/_de'i rjes su slob pa dang /_tshig kyal par smra 
[\[213a.7\]]ba yongs su spong ba dang /_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su gcod pa dang /_dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang spyod pa 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]thams cad la rim gyis gzhol zhing shin tu yangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa nas bla na med pa'i byang chub 'thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing don med pa'i tshig thams cad dang bral te/_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod du gtogs pa'i chos chen 
[\[213b.2\]]po'i sgra mchog dam pa rnam pa mang pos zhing de yongs su khyab pa dang /_dpag tu med pa'i smon lam dang /_ye shes dam pa phun sum tshogs pas chos kyi don rnam pa sna tshogs 'chad pa la mkhas pa'i sems can de lta bu dag zhing der skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[213b.3\]]pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu med de/_sems can dag cis 'dul ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos ston to/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas shing sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di 
[\[213b.4\]]ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig kyal pa yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor lo bdun pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo 'di dang ldan pas nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/_nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 
[\[213b.5\]]'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro/_/theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/_theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur 
[\[213b.6\]]ro/_/dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yongs su 'phel ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi snod dam/_chos kyi snod ma yin pa yang rung chung ngu na chos gos kyi tshal bu gyon cing skra dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/_theg 
[\[213b.7\]]pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du 'phar zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /_rno ba'i shes rab dang /_bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs dang /_bzod pa dang /_sa rnams thams cad la dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /_
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad cing de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang /_rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /_chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /_dge 'dun la mchod pa 
[\[214a.2\]]dang bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa dang /_byang chub kyi spyod pa dang smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems mi ngoms par 'gyur te/_'bras bu gzhan thob pa yang ji skad bshad pa bzhin 
[\[214a.3\]]no/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang na ma 'tsho'i bar du chags sems yongs su spangs na sems can thams cad kyis bkur zhing btsun par byed pa dang /_sems rnam par dag cing rnyog pa dang bral te/_de'i dbang gis dge ba'i 
[\[214a.4\]]rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/thog ma med pa'i mtha' nas rgyud lngar 'khor bar 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'bying ba yang chags sems kyi dbang gis lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid sdig pa mi dge ba'i las bdag kyang byed la gzhan yang byed du 'dzud cing mthong ba dang 
[\[214a.5\]]thos pa'i rjes su yi rang ba las byung ba nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /_sems can gyi sgrib pa dang /_chos kyi sgrib pa dang /_'dod sems med pa la sgrib pas bsgribs par 'gyur ro/_/'dod sems yongs su spong ba'i 'khor los lhag ma ma lus par yongs su bcom pas rnam par smin 
[\[214a.6\]]pa'i 'bras bu yongs su mi len te/_lus 'di nyid la yang lha dang mi la sogs pa kun dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba dang /_dogs pa med par 'gyur ba dang /_lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang /_sems rnam par dag cing rnyog pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/'chi 'pho ba'i dus 
[\[214a.7\]]byed pa na yang lus dang sems la sdug bsngal gyis mi gdung ba dang /_yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang /_chung ma dang /_'khor gyis yongs su bskor bas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed par 'gyur gyi/_shin tu 'jigs pa'i gshin rje'i pho nya mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba/_tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/_bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de lus dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang /_de la bkur sti dang bcas pas shin tu dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'phos nas kyang phyir mi'i nang du skye zhing dbang po 
[\[214b.2\]]yongs su rdzogs pa/_yan lag dang ldan pa/_gang nas gang du skyes par sems rnam par dag cing rnyog pa med pa dang /_byad gzugs bzang ba dang /_yid gzhungs pa dang /_rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang /_phyir yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul 
[\[214b.3\]]ba/_tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/_bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/_de'i rjes su slob pa dang /_chags sems yongs su spong ba dang /_mi dge ba'i chos yongs su gcad pa dang /_dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa 
[\[214b.4\]]dang /_theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang spyod pa thams cad la rim gyis gzhol zhing shin tu yangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa nas bla na med pa'i byang chub 'thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[214b.5\]]kyi zhing lag mthil bzhin du mnyam la rin po che rnam pa mang pos yongs su gang ba dang /_rin po che'i shing rnam pa sna tshogs dkrigs pa dang /_rin po che'i gos dang /_rin po che'i rgyan gyi yo byad dang /_rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_gdugs dang /_gser dang /_dngul 
[\[214b.6\]]dang /_mu tig gi dra ba dang /_shing la sogs pas yongs su gang ba dang /_shin tu yid du 'ong zhing blta na sdug pa/_nga rgyal yongs su spangs pa/_byad gzugs shin tu mdzes pa dang /_dbang po ma nyams pa/_sems mnyam pa'i sems can dag zhing der skye bar 'gyur te/_
[\[214b.7\]]chags sems med pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pas brgyan par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu med de/_sems can dag cis 'dul ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos ston to/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]gnas shing sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chags sems yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor lo brgyad pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor 
[\[215a.2\]]lo 'di dang ldan na nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/_nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[215a.3\]]theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/_theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro/_/dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yongs su 'phel ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi snod dam/_chos kyi snod ma 
[\[215a.4\]]yin pa yang rung chung ngu na chos gos kyi tshal bu gyon cing skra dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro/_/theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du 'phar zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /_rno ba'i shes rab dang /_bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang /_ting nge 
[\[215a.5\]]'dzin dang /_gzungs dang /_bzod pa dang /_sa rnams thams cad la dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /_rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad cing de'i rjes su 'thun par 'gyur ba dang /_rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing /_byang chub 
[\[215a.6\]]sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /_chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang dge 'dun la mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la brtson pas mi ngoms pa/_byang chub kyi spyod 
[\[215a.7\]]pa dang smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems mi ngoms par 'gyur te/_'bras bu gzhan dag thob pa yang ji skad bshad pa bzhin no//_//bam po dgu pa/_rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam 'tsho'i bar 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]du gnod sems yongs su spangs na/_sems can thams cad kyis bkur zhing bla mar byed pa dang /_sems rnam par dag pa dang /_dri ma dang bral bar 'gyur te/_de'i dbang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/thog ma med pa'i mtha' 
[\[215b.2\]]nas rgyud lngar 'khor bar 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'bying ba yang gnod sems kyi dbang gis lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid sdig pa mi dge ba'i las bdag kyang byed la gzhan yang byed du 'dzud cing mthong ba dang thos pa'i rjes su yi rang ba las byung ba nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /_
[\[215b.3\]]sems can gyi sgrib pa dang /_chos kyi sgrib pa dang /_gnod sems byed pa la sgrib pas bsgribs par gyur to/_/'di ltar gnod sems yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor los lhag ma ma lus par yongs su bcom pas rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yongs su mi len te/_lus 'di nyid 
[\[215b.4\]]la yang lha dang mi la sogs pa kun dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba dang /_dogs par mi 'gyur ba dang /_sems rnam par dag pa dang /_dri ma dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa na yang lus dang sems la sdug bsngal gyis mi gdung zhing yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang /_
[\[215b.5\]]chung ma dang /_'khor thams cad kyis yongs su bskor bas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed par 'gyur gyi/_shin tu 'jigs pa'i gshin rje'i pho nya mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba/_tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/_
[\[215b.6\]]bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de lus dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang /_de la bkur sti dang bcas pas shin tu dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'phos nas kyang phyir mi'i nang du skye zhing dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_yan lag dang ldan pa dang /_gang nas gang 
[\[215b.7\]]du skyes par sems rnam par dag cing dri ma dang bral ba dang /_byad gzugs bzang ba dang /_yid gzhungs pa dang /_rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang /_phyir yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba/_tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/_bsod 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de de'i rjes su 'thun par slob pa dang /_gnod sems yongs su spong ba dang /_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su gcod pa dang /_dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_theg pa chen po'i chos kyi 
[\[216a.2\]]rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang spyod pa thams cad rim gyis gzhol zhing shin tu yangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa nas bla na med pa'i byang chub 'thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnyog pa dang /_sme ba dang /_sprin dang /_
[\[216a.3\]]khug rlangs dang /_rdul dang /_dri ma dang /_mi sdug pa dang /_mi mdzes pa thams cad dang bral te/_rin po che mang pos shin tu brgyan pa yid du 'ong ba dang /_nga rgyal dang bral ba/_gzugs mdzes shing sdug pa/_dbang po ma nyams pa/_sems rtag tu zhi ba'i sems can 
[\[216a.4\]]dag zhing der skye ste/_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_yon tan phun sum tshogs pas brgyan par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu med de/_sems can dag cis 'dul ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos ston to/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i 
[\[216a.5\]]chos yun ring du gnas zhing sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnod sems yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor lo dgu pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo 'di dang 
[\[216a.6\]]ldan na nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/_nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro/_/theg pa chen po la 
[\[216a.7\]]'khrul pa med par 'gyur/_theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro/_/dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yongs su 'phel ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi snod dam/_chos kyi snod ma yin pa yang rung chung ngu na chos 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]gos kyi tshal bu gyon cing skra dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro/_/theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du 'phar zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /_rno ba'i shes rab dang /_bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs dang /_bzod pa dang /_
[\[216b.2\]]sa rnams thams cad la dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /_rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad cing de'i rjes su slob pa dang /_rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /_chos 
[\[216b.3\]]thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /_dge 'dun la mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa dang /_byang chub kyi spyod pa dang /_smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems mi ngoms par 'gyur te/_'bras 
[\[216b.4\]]bu gzhan dag thob pa yang ji skad bstan pa bzhin no/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam 'tsho'i bar du log par lta ba yongs su spangs na sems can thams cad kyis bkur zhing bla mar byed pa dang /_sems rnam par dag cing log 
[\[216b.5\]]par rtog pa dang bral bar 'gyur te/_de'i dbang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/thog ma med pa'i mtha' nas rgyud lngar 'khor bar 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'bying ba yang log par lta ba'i dbang gis lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i 
[\[216b.6\]]las bdag kyang byed la gzhan yang byed du 'dzud cing mthong ba dang thos pa'i rjes su yi rang ba las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /_sems can gyi sgrib pa dang /_chos kyi sgrib pa dang /_yang dag par lta ba la sgrib pas bsgribs par gyur to/_/'di ltar log par lta ba yongs su spangs pa'i 
[\[216b.7\]]'khor los lhag ma ma lus par bcom pas rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yongs su mi len te/_lus 'di nyid la yang lha dang mi la sogs pa kun dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba dang /_dogs pa med par 'gyur ba dang /_lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang /_sems rnam par dag cing 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]log par lta ba dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa na yang lus dang sems la sdug bsngal gyis mi gdung zhing yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang /_chung ma dang /_'khor thams cad kyis yongs su bskor bas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed par 'gyur gyi/_shin tu 'jigs pa'i 
[\[217a.2\]]gshin rje'i pho nya mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/_bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de lus dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang /_bkur sti dang bcas pas shin tu dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[217a.3\]]tshe 'phos nas kyang phyir mi'i nang du skye zhing dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa yan lag dang ldan pa dang /_gang nas gang du skyes par sems rnam par dag cing log par lta ba dang bral ba dang /_byad gzugs bzang ba dang /_yid gzhungs pa dang /_rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang /_phyir yang 
[\[217a.4\]]yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba/_tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/_bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de de'i rjes su 'thun par slob pa dang /_log par lta ba'i chos yongs su spong ba dang /_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su gcod 
[\[217a.5\]]pa dang /_dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang spyod pa thams cad rim gyis gzhol zhing shin tu yangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa nas bla 
[\[217a.6\]]na med pa'i byang chub 'thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang bral ba dang /_lha'i bdud kyi 'khor thams cad dang bral ba dang /_mu stegs can gyi 'khor thams cad dang bral ba dang /_rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 
[\[217a.7\]]brgyan cing shin tu mdzes pa dang /_yang dag par lta ba dang ldan zhing ngo mtshar dang /_bkra shis dang /_tshul ngan pa'i lta ba sna tshogs dang /_rtag par lta ba dang /_chad par lta ba dang /_bdag dang bdag gir lta ba thams cad yongs su spangs pa'i sems can dag zhing der skye 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]ste/_shin tu tshe ring ba dang /_theg pa chen po'i ro gcig la longs spyod par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu med de/_sems can dag cis 'dul ba bzhin du chos ston pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du 
[\[217b.2\]]gnas shing /_sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang /_bde ba'i don du ro gcig pa'i chos bstan pa la rtsod pa med pas yongs su rgyas par byed cing bgegs dang bar chad med par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po log par lta ba 
[\[217b.3\]]yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor lo bcu pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po 'di dang ldan pas nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/_nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg 
[\[217b.4\]]pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro/_/theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/_theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro/_/dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yongs su 'phel ba 
[\[217b.5\]]dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi snod dam/_chos kyi snod ma yin pa la yang rung chung ngu na chos gos kyi tshal bu gyon cing skra dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ba dang /_theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du 'phar zhing phyir mi 
[\[217b.6\]]ldog pa dang /_rno ba'i shes rab dang /_bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs dang /_bzod pa dang /_sa rnams thams cad la dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /_rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad cing rjes su 
[\[217b.7\]]slob pa dang /_rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /_chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /_dge 'dun la mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /_
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa dang /_byang chub kyi spyod pa dang /_smon lam dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sems mi ngoms par 'gyur te/_'bras bu gzhan 'thob pa yang ji skad bshad pa bzhin no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub 
[\[218a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po de dag dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_snga ma 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[218a.3\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang mi dge ba bcu'i las yongs su spangs nas thams cad kyis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi 'bras bu bsngags shing bstod de/_sems can thams cad la bde ba dang phan pa'i don dang /_byang chub kyi lam skye zhing 'phel bar bya ba dang /_
[\[218a.4\]]sems can thams cad kyi las dang nyon mongs pa'i sdug bsngal lhag ma ma lus par bsal bar bya ba dang /_ngan song gsum bskam par bya ba dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung bsab par bya ba dang /_khams gsum gyi srid pa yongs su gcad par bya ba dang /_phung po 
[\[218a.5\]]dang /_khams dang /_skye mched gcad par bya ba dang /_thams cad myur du 'jigs pa med pa'i mya ngan las 'da' ba'i grong khyer du gzud pa'i phyir ji skad bshad pa bzhin du mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi 'bras bu yongs su spong ngo /_/de bas na rigs kyi bu gal te yang dag pa ji lta ba 
[\[218a.6\]]bzhin du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di ma bsgrubs par mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'am/_chung ngu na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'ga' tsam yang mi srung bar nga ni theg pa chen po yang dag par spyod pa'o zhe'am/_nga ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[218a.7\]]chub sgrub pa'o zhes zer na/_gang zag de ni shin tu [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]par smra ba ste/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'jig rten slu ba dang /_'dzem pa dang /_ngo tsha ba med pa yang stong par smra zhing chad par lta ba/_glen pa mi shes pa slu ba can yin te/_de tshe 'phos 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]nas ngan song du ltung bar shes par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu gang tshig tu brjod pa tsam 'am mnyan pa tsam gyis chog ste/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bsgoms pa'am/_nan tan bya mi dgos par byang chub dang /_mya ngan las 'das par thob tu zin na ni bskal pa gcig la yud tsam thang 
[\[218b.2\]]cig gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sa'i khams kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi sems can thams cad byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya ste/_mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba zhig na de ni de lta bu'i gnas med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam ni theg pa chen 
[\[218b.3\]]po'i rtsa ba yin te/_byang chub kyi rgyu dang mya ngan las 'da' ba'i them skas lta bu'o/_/rigs kyi bu gal te sems bskyed pa tsam 'am smon lam btab pa tsam gyis chog ste/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam goms par nan tan bya mi dgos par byang chub dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[218b.4\]]'da' ba 'thob tu zin ni bskal pa gcig la yud tsam thang cig gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sa'i khams kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi sems can dag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba zhig na de ni de lta bu'i 
[\[218b.5\]]gnas med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'da' ba'i 'bras bu'i khyad par dang yon tan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gal te dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la nan tan du ma byas na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul 
[\[218b.6\]]phra mo snyed kyi bskal par ba dag ni theg pa chen po pa'o zhes zer te/_'chad dam/_nyan tam/_sems bskyed dam/_smon lam btab kyang byang chub dang /_mya ngan las 'da' ba 'thob par mi 'gyur la gzhan yang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las 'don mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu dge ba 
[\[218b.7\]]bcu'i las kyi lam la nan tan byas pas 'jig rten na rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze la sogs pa rigs chen po dang /_rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched stengs kyi bar du yod pa dang /_nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /_bla na 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du yang yod par 'gyur te/_de dag kun kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la shin tu nan tan byed pa'i khyad par dang bye brag las gyur to/_/de bas na rigs kyi bu gang myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob 
[\[219a.2\]]par 'dod na dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la nan tan gyi rgyan gyis brgyan te/_mi dge ba bcu'i sdom pa la mi gnas na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gang myur du theg pa chen po'i spyod yul du chud par 'dod dam/_myur du bla na med pa 
[\[219a.3\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'dod dam/_myur du dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'dod na sngar dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam shin tu bsrung bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis ni dge ba'i chos thams cad dang /_yon tan rnam 
[\[219a.4\]]par gzhag pa'i gzhi dang /_'jig rten dang /_'jig rten las 'da' ba'i 'bras bu'i mchog thob par byed pa'i rgyu yin no/_/de bas na dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la shin tu nan tan bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad 
[\[219a.5\]]de gsungs pa/_srid pa'i sdug bsngal kun gcod cing /_/byang chub chen po 'thob 'dod pa/_/dge bcu'i 'khor lo'i nan tan la/_/le lo ma byed brtson par gyis/_/theg pa gsum gyi dam chos dang /_/theg pa rnam gsum gang zag dang /_/rab tu byung ba thams 
[\[219a.6\]]cad la/_/'khrul pa med par 'thob par 'gyur/_/theg chen spyod la dad mos shing /_/thams cad 'khor gyi dbugs 'byin pa'i/_/chos mchog rtogs nas zhing dag der/_/byang chub chen po myur du 'thob/_/gal te srog gcod yongs spangs na/_/kun gyis bkur zhing bla 
[\[219a.7\]]mar byed/_/rtag tu nad med tshe yang ring /_/bde zhing skyid la gnod pa med/_/skye ba'i gnas ni thams cad du/_/sangs rgyas spyod yul lam la mos/_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun mthong /_/myur du bla med byang chub 'thob/_/ma byin len pa yongs spangs na/_/mkhas 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]pas bkur zhing bla mar byed/_/'dod chags skye ba'i lam kun zhi/_/'dod chags med pa skye bar 'gyur/_/skye ba kun tu longs spyod ldan/_/sbyin bdag chen por de 'gyur te/_/rin chen mang pos brgyan pa dang /_/yid 'ong sangs rgyas zhing yang 'thob/_/'dod pas log 
[\[219b.2\]]g.yem yongs spangs na/_/nyon mongs dri ma zhi bar 'gyur/_/'dod chags srid pa'i mtsho yang skems/_/rnam dag sangs rgyas zhing myur 'thob/_/sems can rnam pa mang po yang /_/'dod pa'i 'dam las 'byin par 'gyur/_/theg chen la ni rab bkod nas/_/
[\[219b.3\]]tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod du btsud/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba yongs spangs na/_/'phags pa'i dbang dang ye shes 'thob/_/rtag tu bden la smra bar dga'/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal 'jil/_/tshig gcig tshad mar btsugs pas na/_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 
[\[219b.4\]]'dun mthong /_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]mi smra ba bsgoms pas na/_/byang chub chen po myur du 'thob/_/phra ma'i tshig smra yongs spangs na/_/dge ba'i chos kyi snod du 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun mthong /_/chad par lta bar yong mi 'gyur/_/'phags pa'i chags med dga' ba 
[\[219b.5\]]dang /_/rin chen gter gyi gzungs 'thob cing /_/zab mo chos kyi rgya mtshor rig_/myur du bla med byang chub 'thob/_/gal te zhe gcod tshig spangs te/_/'jam zhing mnyen pa'i tshig smras na/_/sems can kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur/_/snga ma'i mi dge las kyang zhi/_/
[\[219b.6\]]'khor rnams rtag tu dga' ba dang /_/byang chub sems dpa'i ston par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas mang po'i spyod yul shes/_/sa bcu las kyang 'da' bar 'gyur/_/kyal par smra ba yongs spangs na/_/mkhas pas bkur zhing bla mar byed/_/gzhan la tshig tu smra ba kun/_/
[\[219b.7\]]yon tan rnam lnga 'thob par 'gyur/_/rtag tu 'phags pa'i tshig nyan cing /_/'phags pa'i lam tshol spro bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas rgya mtsho yongs rdzogs shing /_/thams cad mkhyen pa myur du 'thob/_/gal te chags sems yongs spangs te/_/'phags pa rnams 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]la mi smod cing /_/ngur smrig gyon la mchod par byed/_/theg pa gsum gyi byang chub sgrub/_/rtag tu rnam dag zhing du skye/_/ston pa'i gnas su gnas par 'gyur/_/bla med theg pa la zhon te/_/rgyal ba'i ye shes myur du 'thob/_/gal te gnod sems 
[\[220a.2\]]yongs spangs te/_/gcig tu byams pa'i sems bsgoms na/_/mnyam par gzhag pa'ang myur du 'thob/_/'phags pa'i spyod yul mos par 'gyur/_/rnam dag sangs rgyas zhing du skye/_/nyes pa'i skyon rnams kun dang bral/_/de la gnas na byang chub 'thob/_/gnod 
[\[220a.3\]]sems thams cad spang bar bya/_/ngan par lta ba yongs spangs te/_/rnam dag dad pa'i sems bsgoms na/_/theg gsum ston la mos byed cing /_/sangs rgyas kun la mchod pa byed/_/ngan song gsum las yongs thar te/_/'phags pa'i dge 'dun rnams dang phrad/_/
[\[220a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan ldan/_/ye shes mchog kyang 'thob par 'gyur/_/dge ba bcu yi las lam gyis/_/byang chub mchog thob 'gyur zhes gsungs/_/snyoms par 'jug dang gzungs rnams dang /_/sa dang bzod pa skye bar 'gyur/_/bdag nyid che ba'i 
[\[220a.5\]]'khor lo 'dis/_/ngan song thams cad rab bcom nas/_/sdig pa'i sgrib pa kun kyang choms/_/myur du byang chub chen po thob/_/'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po sa'i snying po 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug 
[\[220a.6\]]pa'o//_//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zang zing gi sbyin pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu yod de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo de dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed pa nas 'dod pa lnga yongs 
[\[220a.7\]]su bsal te/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das nas nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /_bsrung ba dang /_bsnyen bkur 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]byed par 'gyur ro/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rnam pa sna tshogs kyi zas dang /_skom dang /_gos dang /_rin po che'i rgyan dang /_bal glang dang /_rta dang /_shing rta dang /_lus kyi yan lag dang /_rkang pa dang /_lag pa dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_mgo dang /_mig dang /_rkang 
[\[220b.2\]]dang /_klad pa dang /_pags pa dang /_rus pa dang /_sha dang /_khrag dang /_yul dang /_srid dang /_bu dang /_chung ma dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_khang khyim dang /_zhing 'brog la sogs pa de dag thams cad sbyin pa de re re byed pa na lus dang srog la mi lta zhing bdag 
[\[220b.3\]]gcig pu 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba 'dod pa'i phyir sems bskyed de sbyin pa byed pa ma yin gyi/_sems can thams cad la byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po'i myu gu bskyed pa'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems bskyed do/_/thabs mkhas pa dang shes rab mchog bskyed 
[\[220b.4\]]pa'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems bskyed do/_/sems can thams cad la byams pa chen po phan pa dang /_bde ba'i don gyi phyir sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems bskyed do/_/sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems bskyed do/_/gzhan las spag 
[\[220b.5\]]go snyam pa med pa'i sems dang /_brlang ba med pa'i sems dang /_phrag dog med pa'i sems dang /_ser sna dang zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin no/_/gang sbyin pa'i dngos po che yang rung /_chung yang rung /_chung ngu na zan changs gcig tsam gyi sbyin pa byas na yang 
[\[220b.6\]]rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu la mi re bar sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems bskyed do/_/nyan thos kyi theg pa'i 'bras bu la mi re bar sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems bskyed do/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i 'bras bu la mi re bar sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems bskyed do/_/gang sbyin pa'i dngos po de che yang rung /_
[\[220b.7\]]chung yang rung /_chung ngu na zan changs gcig tsam gyi sbyin pa byas na yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su bsngo zhing sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems bskyed do/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zang zing gi sbyin pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po de 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]dang ldan na/_thog ma sems bskyed pa na 'dod pa rnam pa lnga yongs su bsal ba'i phyir nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams chen po'i zhing du 'gyur ba dang /_nyan thos dang /_
[\[221a.2\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod cing bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_yongs su bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems bskyed pa ni byams pa dang /_snying rje chen po'i sems med kyi bdag gi dbul ba de 
[\[221a.3\]]spong ba dang /_bdag sdug bsngal las thar pa dang /_bdag bde ba thob par bya ba dang /_bdag mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin pa byed de/_sems can thams cad kyi phyir sbyin pa byed pa ni ma yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin na ni 
[\[221a.4\]]byams pa dang /_snying rje chen po'i sems kyis sems can thams cad kyi dbul phongs pa spong ba dang /_sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las gdon pa dang /_sems can thams cad bde ba thob par byed pa dang /_sems can thams cad mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir sbyin pa byed kyi 
[\[221a.5\]]bdag 'ba' zhig gi phyir sbyin pa spyod pa ma yin no/_/de lta bas na nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa 
[\[221a.6\]]thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur byed cing yongs su bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zang zing gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na 'dod pa rnam lnga'i mchog la sems mi chags te/_bdag nyid dbang ba bde ba'i yo byad 
[\[221a.7\]]thams cad sems can kun la sbyin pa byed de/_sems can thams cad yongs su sdud pa'i sems dang /_bdag gi sdug bsngal thams cad la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa'i sems dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba'i sems dang /_sems can thams cad la 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]bde ba sbyin pa'i sems dang /_sems can thams cad mya ngan las bzla ba'i sems la gnas te sbyin pa byed do/_/de bas na nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang /_nyan 
[\[221b.2\]]thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur dang /_srung ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gal te 'dod pa lnga la sems mi chags shing byams pa dang /_snying rje chen pos sbyin pa byed na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes 
[\[221b.3\]]bya'o/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa zhes bya'o/_/gal te 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa rnam lnga yang ma spangs la byams pa dang /_snying rje chen po yang med par sbyin pa byed na sbyin pa'i dngos po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa btang yang byang chub 
[\[221b.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes mi bya ste/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa yang ma yin pas sbyin pa 'di ni 'phags pa rnams kyi phyag rgyas btab pa ma yin no/_/de bas na 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa lnga spangs te/_byams pa dang /_snying rje chen po 
[\[221b.5\]]dang ldan pas sbyin pa bya'o/_/gal te 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa lnga yang ma spangs la byams pa dang /_snying rje chen po yang med par sbyin pa byed na byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang mi bya la bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa yang ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'dod pa rnam pa lnga la chags pas sbyin 
[\[221b.6\]]pa byed na bdag nyid kyi lus kyi sdug bsngal gyi cha [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang zhi bar mi 'gyur na sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal tshad med pa bsal ba lta ci smos/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_zang zing sbyin pa'i 'khor 
[\[221b.7\]]lo ldan pa/_/mkhas pa bsam pa dag pa'i mos pas/_/'dod pa rnam lnga dag ni spangs te/_/sems can kun la phan dang bde byed/_/sems can kun la bde ba'i phyir gyi/_/rnam smin 'bras bu re phyir ma yin/_/sbyin pa'i dngos po byin pa chung yang /_/yang dag bsod nams 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]zhing du de 'gyur/_/sbyin pa'i dngos po mang du byas kyang /_/'dod pa rnam lnga dag la gnas na/_/'phags pa dag gi phyag rgyas ma btab/_/ma nges pa yi tshogs la gnas 'gyur/_/sbyin pa'i dngos po byin pa chung yang /_/'dod pa lnga la mi gnas pa ni/_/nyan thos 
[\[222a.2\]]dag dang rang rgyal ba yi/_/yang dag bsod nams zhing du de 'gyur/_/de bas 'dod pa rnam lnga spangs la/_/rtag tu rnam dag sbyin pa byed cing /_/sems can kun la bde ba byas na/_/yang dag bsod nams zhing du de 'gyur/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[222a.3\]]sems dpa' chen pos chos kyi sbyin pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu yod de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo de dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa rnam lnga yongs su bsal ba'i phyir myur du nyi ma'i sgron ma'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[222a.4\]]thob cing nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams chen po'i zhing du 'gyur ba dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /_bsrung ba dang /_bsnyen 
[\[222a.5\]]bkur bya bar 'gyur ro/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bstan pa dam pa'i chos nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos dang /_theg pa chen po dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos dang /_
[\[222a.6\]]'jig rten gyi chos dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos dang /_zag pa zad pa'i chos dang /_'dus byas kyi chos dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos dang /_gnyis su med pa'i chos rnams te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 
[\[222a.7\]]rnam pa bcu po 'di la dad cing gus par byed pa dang /_ji skad thos pa rnams ci nus su gzungs su 'dzin cing yid la byed do/_/rab tu rtog go/_/mthar khong du chud par byed cing gzhan dag la yang ci rigs par ston par byed do/_/nam chos ston pa'i tshe na phrag dog med pa'i sems 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]dang /_ser sna med pa'i sems dang /_nga rgyal med pa'i sems dang /_rnyed par mi re ba'i sems dang /_gzhan mi smod pa'i sems dang /_bdag mi stod pa'i sems dang /_bsti stang dang bcas pa'i sems dang /_phan pa'i sems dang /_byams pa chen po'i sems dang /_snying rje chen po'i 
[\[222b.2\]]sems su bya'o/_/nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi gang zag la ni nyan thos kyi chos ston cing 'chad kyi/_de la rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/_theg pa chen po'i chos kyis ma yin pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gyi gang zag la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos ston gyi/_nyan thos 
[\[222b.3\]]kyi theg pa'i chos sam/_theg pa chen po'i chos kyis ma yin pa dang /_theg pa chen po'i gang zag la ni theg pa chen po'i chos ston gyi/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i chos kyis ma yin pa dang /_sems can gyi dbang po dang /_snod ji lta ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos 
[\[222b.4\]]ston gyi/_dbang po dang snod du ma gyur pa la chos mi ston to/_/gang theg pa chen po'i sems can la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa spyod cig par ram/_nyan thos kyi theg pa spyod cig par mi skul lo/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gyi sems can la skabs kha cig tu theg pa chen po'i spyod 
[\[222b.5\]]pa la nan tan byos shig ces skul ba'i skabs ni yod de/_nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi sems can la skabs kha cig tu rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i spyod pa dang /_theg pa chen po'i spyod pa la nan tan gyis shig ces skul ba'i skabs kyang yod de/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i 
[\[222b.6\]]dam pa'i chos chung ngu na tshigs su bcad pa gcig gam tshigs su bcad pa phyed tsam la yang shin tu dad cing bkur sti byed kyi/_de la 'phya ba'am skur pa'am/_bgegs sam/_bar chad mi byed de/_chos ston pa la sangs rgyas dang 'dra bar 'du shes pa dang /_chos nyan pa'i 
[\[222b.7\]]'khor rnams la nad pa dang 'dra bar 'du shes pa dang /_gang 'chad pa'i chos la sman bzang po dang 'dra bar 'du shes shing 'dod pa rnam pa lnga yongs su bcad de re ba med pas dam pa'i chos ston to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]sbyin pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo de dang ldan na 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/_myur du nyi ma'i sgron ma'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams 
[\[223a.2\]]cad las shin tu 'das pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /_bsrung ba dang /_bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[223a.3\]]'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_mkhas pa chos kyi sbyin pa spyod pa dag_/snod bzhin theg pa gsum gyi chos ston to/_/theg pa gzhan dag de la ston mi byed/_/thos nas de la 'phya zhing skur mi 'gyur/_/dbang po snod 
[\[223a.4\]]bzhin dam pa'i chos ston gyi/_/dbang po snod min dag la ma yin no/_/so sor ji ltar ci la mos pa bzhin/_/de dang de yi chos ston mgu bar byed/_/theg pa chen po spyod pa'i gang zag la/_/theg pa rnam pa gnyis kyi chos mi bstan/_/bar rab theg pa gnyis kyi gang zag 
[\[223a.5\]]la/_/theg pa 'bring dang rab kyi chos ston to/_/shin tu dad cing gus pas chos mnyan gyi/_/de la 'phya zhing skur bar mi bya'o/_/chos smra ba la mchod pa byed pa ni/_/sangs rgyas 'dra bar de la 'du shes bskyed/_/kun nas nyon mongs pa yi nad bsal phyir/_/dam pa'i 
[\[223a.6\]]chos kyi sman dag nyan par bskul/_/khe dang grags pa shin tu ring spangs te/_/dam pa'i chos dag bstan cing bshad par bya/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/_byang chub 
[\[223a.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo de dang ldan na/_thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]'gyur ba dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /_bsrung ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de la ji ltar na tshul khrims rnam par dag pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhe na/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims 
[\[223b.2\]]rnam par dag pa rnam pa gnyis te/_thun mong ba dang /_thun mong ba ma yin no/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i 'khor lo thun mong ba zhe na/_gang khyim na gnas pa dge bsnyen pha dang /_dge bsnyen ma'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa blangs pa'am/_
[\[223b.3\]]yang na rab tu byung ba so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims kyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa ste/_sdom pa 'di dang so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i 'khor lo thun mong ba ste/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba 
[\[223b.4\]]yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi 'khor lo rnam par dag pa 'di'i dbang gis sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa chod par ram/_log par lta ba sel bar ram/_las kyi sgrib pa dang /_'khor ba las grol bar mi 'gyur te/_go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 
[\[223b.5\]]zhes kyang mi bya/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa ma yin no/_/de la ji ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 
[\[223b.6\]]thun mong ma yin pa zhe na/_gang byang chub sems dpa' rnams phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi sems dang /_gnod pa med pa'i sems dang /_khon du 'dzin pa med pa'i sems kyis rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims srung ngo /_/tshul khrims dang /_tshul 
[\[223b.7\]]khrims ngan pa can dang /_sbyin pa dang /_ser sna dang /_byams pa dang /_zhe sdang dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_le lo can rab 'bring tha ma kun la bye brag mi 'byed pa'i sems dang /_khyad par med pa'i 'du shes kyis tshul khrims yongs su srung ngo /_/khams gsum gyi 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]sems can thams cad la zhe sdang med pa dang /_khong khro ba med pa dang /_ngan par spyod pa med pas tshul khrims yongs su srung ngo /_/srid pa gsum gyi phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched la rnam par rtog pa med pas tshul khrims yongs su srung ngo /_/'dod 
[\[224a.2\]]pa'i khams la mi gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo /_/gzugs yod pa'i khams la mi gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo /_/gzugs med pa'i khams la mi gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo /_/srid pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu thams cad la mi gnas par tshul khrims 
[\[224a.3\]]srung ngo /_/rnyed pa dang mi rnyed pa la mi gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo /_/'du byed rnams la mi gnas par tshul khrims srung ste/_'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo thun mong ma yin pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang 
[\[224a.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams 
[\[224a.5\]]cad las shin tu 'das shing nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /_srung ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[224a.6\]]kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_khyim na gnas shing sdom pa len pa/_/rab byung so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims/_/theg pa gnyis dang thun mong yin te/_/byang chub chen po zhes ni mi bya/_/mkhas pa stong pa nyid chos sgom 
[\[224a.7\]]pa/_/'jig rten kun la mi rten mi gnas/_/srid pa kun la gnas ma yin par/_/rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims srung ngo /_/mtshan ma spong ba'i tshul khrims dag ni/_/chags pa med de zag pa kun med/_/tshul khrims 'di lta srung ba dag ni/_/yang dag bsod nams 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]zhing zhes de bya/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba yod de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su 
[\[224b.2\]]bsal te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /_bsrung ba 
[\[224b.3\]]dang /_bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/_/de la ji ltar na bzod pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhe na/_rigs kyi bu/_byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa la mtshan nyid rnam pa gnyis te/_gang zhe na 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'o/_/de la ji ltar na 
[\[224b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi bzod pa zhe na/_de ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i bzod pa ste/_sems can la dmigs pa/_len pa dang bcas pa/_mtshan ma dang bcas pa/_rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu la rten pa/_bsod nams kyi las la brten te bzod par byed 
[\[224b.5\]]pa'o/_/gzhan yang bdag gi gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya la brten nas bzod par byed pa'o/_/'jug pa dang bcas pa'i bzod pa ji mi snyam pa med pa'i bzod pa dang /_mthu zhan pa'i bzod pa'i sems can gtong ba'i bzod pa dang /_g.yo dang 
[\[224b.6\]]sgyur bcas pa'i bzod pa dang /_pha rol la 'drid pa'i bzod pa dang /_sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i don mi byed pa'i bzod pa ste/_'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi bzod pa zhes bya ste/_bzod pa 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dang 
[\[224b.7\]]thun mong ma yin gyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes mi bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang ma yin te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa zhes kyang mi bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bzod pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhe na/_zag pa med pa'i bzod pa ste/_'phags pa thams cad kyi chos chen po'i 'od kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir chags pa med pa'i bzod pa dang /_bya 
[\[225a.2\]]ba'i dngos po thams cad dang /_tshig tu smra ba dang /_rgyu dang /_mtshan ma dang /_yi ge dang /_sgra skad thams cad yongs su bcad pa'i skye mched la brten pa'i bzod pa spyod do/_/bzod pa 'di bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs pa gsum dang /_bskal pa rnam gsum dang /_mtshan 
[\[225a.3\]]nyid gsum dang /_dus gsum dang /_srid pa gsum dang /_'du byed rnam gsum dang /_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gsum dang /_chu bo bzhi dang /_mdud pa rnam bzhi dang /_nye bar len pa bzhi dang /_lus kyi mdud pa rnam bzhi la sogs pa yongs su bcad pas bzod pa 'di sgom pa'i tshe 
[\[225a.4\]]sems dang yid rab tu zhi bas 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo'i bzod pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po'i 'khor lo'i bzod pa de dang ldan pas thog ma sems bskyed pa nas 
[\[225a.5\]]'dod pa lnga rnams yongs su bsal ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba nyan thos dang /_
[\[225a.6\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /_bsrung ba dang /_bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_bzod pa la ni rnam pa gnyis te/_/mtshan mar 
[\[225a.7\]]bcas dang mtshan ma med pa/_/mtshan mar bcas pa'i bzod pa chags yod/_/mkhas pa dag ni de la mi stod/_/'du byed rnam gsum phung po khams dang /_/skye mched la rten bzod pa sgom pa/_/de ni zag bcas bzod pa yin te/_/byang chub sems dpa' chen po 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]ma yin/_/phyin ci log ni rnam bzhi bsal nas/_/chags pa med pa'i bzod pa sgom zhing /_/'du byed rnam pa gsum dag zhi na/_/bzod pa 'di la thams cad bstod 'gyur/_/'du byed thams cad rab tu zhi zhing /_/rtog pa thams cad yongs su spangs te/_/sems ni 
[\[225b.2\]]nam mkha' 'dra bar mnyam pa/_/bzod pa 'di la thams cad bstod 'gyur/_/thams cad chos la ro gcig 'thun par/_/stong pa mtshan ma med pa zhi ba/_/sems ni ci la'ang mi gnas mi chags/_/bzod pa 'di ni phan don cher 'gyur/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang 
[\[225b.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo de dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed pa nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad las 
[\[225b.4\]]shin tu 'das pa nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /_srung ba dang /_bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/_/de la ji ltar na brtson 'grus kyi go cha 
[\[225b.5\]]chen po'i 'khor lo zhe na/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus la rnam pa gnyis te/_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i brtson 'grus zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams shin tu 
[\[225b.6\]]'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis 'jig rten gyi bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po rnam pa gsum la nan tan byed do/_/bsod nams gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sbyin pa byed pa'i bsod nams kyi las dang /_tshul khrims srung ba'i bsod nams byed pa'i las dang /_bsgom pa'i bsod 
[\[225b.7\]]nams byed pa'i las so/_/las 'di dag byed pa ni brtson 'grus rnam pa gsum zhes bya ste/_brtson 'grus rnam pa gsum po 'di dag ni sems can la dmigs pa zag pa dang bcas pa/_nye bar len pa dang bcas pa/_rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu la brten pa bsod 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]nams kyi las la brten pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi brtson 'grus zhes bya'o/_/brtson 'grus 'di ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sogs pa dang thun mong yin te/_go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes mi bya/_byang chub
