[\[226a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa yang ma yin no/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhe na/_byang 
[\[226a.3\]]chub sems dpa' dag shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems kyis nyon mongs pa'i las dang sdug bsngal thams cad sel ba ste/_brtson 'grus 'di ni 'phags pa thams cad kyis bsngags pa/_zag pa med pa/_nye bar len pa med pa/_
[\[226a.4\]]rten dang gnas med de/_brtson 'grus dang /_le lo dang /_sbyin pa dang /_ser sna dang /_tshul khrims dang /_ngan pa'i tshul khrims can dang /_byams pa dang /_zhe sdang dang /_sems can rab dang /_'bring dang /_tha ma kun la mi 'byed pa'i sems dang /_bye brag med pa'i 'du 
[\[226a.5\]]shes kyis shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang /_dmigs pa med pas bya ba'i las byed de smra ba dang /_rtog pa dang /_dpyod pa'i gnas thams cad la mi gnas pa'i sems kyis shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus 
[\[226a.6\]]rtsom mo/_/srid pa gsum gyi phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched la rnam par rtog pa med pas shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom ste/_'dod pa'i khams la mi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang /_gzugs yod pa'i khams la mi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus 
[\[226a.7\]]dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams la mi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang /_srid pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu thams cad la mi rtog pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang /_rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa kun la mi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang /_'du byed rnams la mi gnas 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang /_'jig rten gyi bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po gsum la mi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po rnam pa gsum la shin tu brtson 'grus rtsom pa ste/_'di ni byang chub 
[\[226b.2\]]sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gang brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo de dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed pa nas 'dod pa rnam lnga yongs su bsal te/_
[\[226b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis 
[\[226b.4\]]mchod pa dang /_srung ba dang /_bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_dbang po drug la shin tu chags pa'i/_/bus pa chu bo lngas ni khyer ba/_/shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 
[\[226b.5\]]'grus rtsom yang /_/mkhas pa rnams kyis de la smod 'gyur/_/sems can dmigs shing zag dang bcas la/_/len par bcas shing brtson 'grus rtsom na/_/yang dag bsod nams zhing ma yin te/_/byang chub sems dpa' chen po ma yin/_/mkhas pa brtson 'grus rtsom pa 
[\[226b.6\]]dag ni/_/chags pa thams cad ring du spangs te/_/sems ni ci la'ang mi gnas mi chags/_/yang dag bsod nams zhing zhes de bya/_/ming dang gzugs la chags pa med cing /_/phung po khams dang skye mched spangs te/_/thams cad 'khor gyi rten du 'gyur ba/_/de ni byang 
[\[226b.7\]]chub sems dpa' chen po/_/'jig rten spyod kyang chu zla bzhin te/_/'bad pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i mthar phyin/_/'khor lo 'di yis yongs su bcom pa/_/skye bo kun nas nyon mongs bcings pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]chen po'i bsam gtan gyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed pa nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das nas 
[\[227a.2\]]nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /_srung ba dang /_bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/_/de la ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi go cha chen po'i 'khor 
[\[227a.3\]]lo zhe na/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan la rnam pa gnyis te/_'jig rten dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi bsam gtan zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams phung po la gnas nas bsam gtan 
[\[227a.4\]]sgom pa dang /_khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_skye mched la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_'dod pa'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_gzugs yod pa'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i 
[\[227a.5\]]khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_sdom pa gsum la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_rnam par grol ba gsum la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba 
[\[227a.6\]]bzhi la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_dbang po lnga la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_stobs lnga la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la gnas nas bsam gtan 
[\[227a.7\]]sgom pa dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_sa'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_chu'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_me'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_rlung gi khams 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_nam mkha'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_bde ba'i tshor ba la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba la gnas nas bsam 
[\[227b.2\]]gtan sgom pa dang /_bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_cung 
[\[227b.3\]]zad med pa'i skye mched la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_'jig rten 'di la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_'jig rten pha rol la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_'du shes 
[\[227b.4\]]chung ngu la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_'du shes chen po la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_'du shes tshad med pa la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa ste/_bsam gtan de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa/_nye bar len pa dang bcas pa/_chags pa dang bcas pa 
[\[227b.5\]]ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten dang bcas pa'i bsam gtan zhes bya'o/_/bsam gtan 'di ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang thun mong ba zhes bya ste/_go cha chen po'i 'khor lo ma yin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes mi bya ste/_nyan 
[\[227b.6\]]thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa yang ma yin no/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams phung po dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_khams 
[\[227b.7\]]dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_skye mched dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_'dod pa'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]dang /_sdom pa gsum dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_rnam par thar pa gsum dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa 
[\[228a.2\]]dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_dbang po lnga dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_stobs lnga dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_'phags pa'i lam 
[\[228a.3\]]yan lag brgyad pa dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_sa'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_chu'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_me'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_rlung gi khams dang bral bar bsam gtan 
[\[228a.4\]]sgom pa dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_bde bar tshor ba dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_sdug bsngal du tshor ba dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_
[\[228a.5\]]sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin par tshor ba dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]med pa'i skye mched dang bral 
[\[228a.6\]]bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_'jig rten 'di dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_'jig rten pha rol dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_'du shes chung ngu dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom 
[\[228a.7\]]pa dang /_'du shes chen po dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_'du shes tshad med pa dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa ste/_bsam gtan 'di ni 'phags pa'i 'od zer chen po bskyed pa/_zag pa med pa/_nye bar len pa med pa/_chags pa med pa ste/_'di ni 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan gyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bsam gtan gyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed pa nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/_
[\[228b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis 
[\[228b.3\]]mchod pa dang /_srung ba dang /_bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_bdag gi khur lci spong ba'i phyir ni/_/dmigs dang bcas pa'i ting 'dzin bsgoms te/_/bdag 
[\[228b.4\]]gi kun nas nyon mongs gcod 'dod/_/yang dag mkhas pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin/_/snod la rten cing rtog dang bcas pa/_/rnam par grol 'dod ting 'dzin sgom yang /_/tshu rol pha rol mu la gnas na/_/sems can dag la phan don byed min/_/sems can kun la phan dang 
[\[228b.5\]]bde phyir/_/ting 'dzin sgom zhing khur lci spangs te/_/kun nas nyon mongs thams cad sel ba/_/de ni yang dag mkhas pa'i mtshan nyid/_/sems can thams cad sim par byed phyir/_/mi gnas pa yi ting 'dzin sgom ste/_/'dod pa'i srid pa thams cad chod pa/_/de ni blo 
[\[228b.6\]]gros chen po zhes bya/_/srid pas bcings pa thams cad bkrol te/_/'jigs pa med pa'i grong du bzung phyir/_/rab tu zhi ba'i ting 'dzin sgom pa/_/de ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po'o//_//bam po bcu pa ste tha ma/_rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[228b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba yod de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo de dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed pa nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]tu 'das shing nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /_srung ba dang /_bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/_/de la ji ltar na shes rab kyi 
[\[229a.2\]]go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhe na/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab la ni rnam pa gnyis te/_'jig rten gyi dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i shes rab ce na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams theg pa 
[\[229a.3\]]gsum gyi dam pa'i chos klog pa dang /_'don pa dang /_glegs bam du 'dri ba dang /_nyan pa dang /_pha rol la ston cing 'chad pa 'ba' zhig la rten te/_sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa sel bar 'dod pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi shes rab kyi sgron ma 
[\[229a.4\]]'byung ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos la shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis klog pa dang /_'don pa dang /_nyan pa dang /_glegs bam du 'dri ba dang /_gzhan dag la rgyas par ston cing 'chad pa dang /_yang dag pa'i brtson 
[\[229a.5\]]'grus kyis nan tan byed pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos la klog pa dang /_'don pa dang /_nyan pa dang /_glegs bam du 'dri ba dang /_gzhan dag la rgyas par ston cing 'chad pa dang /_yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyis 
[\[229a.6\]]nan tan du spyod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i theg pa chen po dang ldan pa'i chos la brtson 'grus su klog pa dang /_'don pa dang /_nyan pa dang /_glegs bam du 'dri ba dang /_gzhan la yang rgyas par ston cing 'chad pa dang /_yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyis nan tan byed 
[\[229a.7\]]pa ste/_'phags pa'i zag pa med pa'i lam gyi yan lag tshol ba ma yin/_'phags pa'i lam tshol ba ma yin/_'phags pa'i lam du gtogs pa'i rnam par grol ba tshol ba ma yin/_rab tu zhi ba yang dag pa'i shes rab la nan tan byed pa ma yin te/_rtag tu lta 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]ba dang bcas pa/_shes rab dang bcas pa'i shes rab la nan tan byed do/_/de ltar len pa dang bcas pa/_chags pa dang bcas pa'i shes rab ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi shes rab ces bya'o/_/shes rab de ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba yin 
[\[229b.2\]]te/_go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes mi bya/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa ma yin no/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes 
[\[229b.3\]]rab ce na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyi lam la brtson 'grus su nan tan byed pa ni ci nus su theg pa gsum gyi yang dag pa'i chos la klog pa dang /_'don pa dang /_nyan pa dang /_glegs bam du 'dri ba dang /_gzhan dag la rgyas par ston cing 'chad 
[\[229b.4\]]kyang de la dmigs su med pa'i sbyor ba la gnas te/_mi g.yo ba dang /_mi rtog pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa dang /_nam mkha' lta bu'i sems dang /_rab tu zhi ba'i sems dang /_'phel ba dang /_'grib pa med pa'i shes rab dang /_chags pa med pa'i sems dang /_skye ba 
[\[229b.5\]]dang 'gog pa med pa'i sems dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i sems dang /_chos mnyam pa nyid kyi sems dang /_de bzhin nyid kyi sems dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha'i sems dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi sems dang /_bdag med pa'i sems dang /_rnam par mi rtog pa'i sems 
[\[229b.6\]]dang /_rab tu zhi ba dang /_bzod pa dang /_rtog pa dang bral ba'i sems kyis grub pa dang /_'jigs pa med pa'i sa la shin tu thabs mkhas pas bde bar gnas pa dang /_mi gnas pa mi chags pa'i mchog dam pa'i blo gros kyi sa la thabs mkhas pas bde bar gnas pa ste/_
[\[229b.7\]]shes rab 'di ni len pa med pa chags pa med pas byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las shin tu 'das shing nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[230a.2\]]nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mchod pa dang /_bsrung ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 
[\[230a.3\]]'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das nas nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[230a.4\]]kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /_srung ba dang /_bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/_/de la ji ltar na/_thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhe na/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas pa la rnam pa gnyis te/_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten 
[\[230a.5\]]las 'das pa'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag gi don nam gzhan gyi don nam/_gnyi ga'i don la bdag dang gzhan du rtog cing bzo dang sgyu rtsal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 
[\[230a.6\]]bdag dang gzhan gyi don yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_nyan thos la mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_pha dang /_ma dang /_nad pa dang /_nyam thag pa dang /_mgon dang rten med pa dang /_
[\[230a.7\]]gnod pa mang pos sdug bsngal bar gyur pa mthong na shin tu thabs mkhas pas sgrol zhing bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams zhes sems can yongs su smin par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' de bdag theg pa chen po la gnas pas nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]pa dang /_theg pa chen po'i snod ma yin pa nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi dbang po yongs su ma smin pa la shin tu phra la zab pa dam pa'i chos ston te/_slob tu gzhug pa dang /_'phags pa'i bsam gtan la nan tan du byed du gzhug go/_/gzhan yang don dam pa'i bden pa bstan te 
[\[230b.2\]]nan tan byed du gzhug pa dang /_phyin ci log bzhi las bzla zhing mi ltung ba'i chos kyi mtshan nyid rig par bya ba dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gzhol bar bya ba nas/_gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang 
[\[230b.3\]]pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_lhag ma dang bcas pa dang /_lhag ma ma lus pa'i lam dang lam gyi 'bras bu'i bar du 'jug par bya ba la mkhas pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su 
[\[230b.4\]]smin par byed do/_/sems can gang khe dang /_grags pa dang /_longs spyod la chags te dbang po rgod pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma smin pa la ni mdo sde dang /_'dul ba dang /_ma mo klog pa dang /_'don pa byed du gzhug pa dang /_sangs rgyas gzhan gyis bshad pa las 
[\[230b.5\]]gzhan pa rnam par grol ba dang /_'thun pa'i gtsug lag klog cing 'don du bcug ste yongs su smin par byed do/_/sems can gang sbyin pa byed pa la mi mos pa la ni nor rin po che dang /_nor dbyig rnam pa sna tshogs gtong bar bskul bas yongs su smin par byed do/_/sems can 
[\[230b.6\]]gang gtum pa mi nges pa'i rang bzhin can la tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi slob tu skul ba dang /_sems can gang zhe sdang can la bzod pa slob par skul ba dang /_sems can gang le lo can la ni brtson 'grus slob tu skul ba dang /_sems can gang sems g.yengs pa la ni bsam gtan 
[\[230b.7\]]sgom par skul ba dang /_sems can gang 'chal ba'i shes rab can la ni yang dag pa'i chos ston pas bka' lung brda sprod cing lung 'bogs pa la thabs mkhas pas yongs su smin par byed do/_/sems can gang dkon mchog gsum la mngon par ma dad cing mi gnas pa dang /_
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]mi spyod pa can la ni dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_dkon mchog gsum la dad pa dang /_dge bsnyen pa'i sdom pa la bslab pa dang /_bsnyen gnas pa'i sdom pa bslabs pas yongs su smin par byed do/_/gzhan yang bzo dang sgyu rtsal rnam pa sna tshogs 
[\[231a.2\]]kyi gnas la slob cing spyod du btsud pas yongs su smin par byed do/_/de la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten pa'i shin tu thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes kyi rnam pa ni chu klung gang gA'i bye ma snyed pas mang ngo /_/de ltar yi ge dang /_gtsug lag dang /_
[\[231a.3\]]bzo dang /_sgyu rtsal gyi las kyi gnas thams cad la lhag pa'i spyod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes kyis mu stegs can dang /_ston pa gzhan la zhugs pa thams cad btul ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/_/
[\[231a.4\]]thabs mkhas pa 'di ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba yin te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad gnas pa'i rgyur gyur pa/_thabs mkhas pa spyod pa'i gnas su gyur pa shin tu thabs mkhas pa lhun gyis grub pas rtog pa med pa'i phyir ldog pa med pa'i 
[\[231a.5\]]chos su gyur pa'o/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang ston pa mkhas pa la'ang mi rten/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la'ang mi ltos par 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas pa la nan tan byed na/_byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas pas rmongs pa yin 
[\[231a.6\]]te/_ngan song du ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shin tu thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes la gzhol zhing gnas par yang mi nus la/_thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa ma yin no/_/shin tu thabs mi mkhas pas sems can gyi dbang po dang /_spyod pa'i 
[\[231a.7\]]khyad par yang mi shes la/_shin tu thabs mkhas pa la'ang rmongs par gyur pas nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /_theg pa chen po'i snod ma yin pa dang /_theg pa chen po'i dbang por ma smin pa dag la theg pa chen po ston pa dang /_slob cing nan tan byed du bcug go/_/
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]gang theg pa chen po'i chos kyi snod du gyur pa'i sems can la ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos ston cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la slob cing nan tan byed du bcug go/_/gang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos kyi snod du gyur pa'i sems can la 
[\[231b.2\]]ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos ston cing /_nyan thos kyi theg pa la slob cing nan tan byed du bcug go/_/gang nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos kyi snod du gyur pa'i sems can la ni 'khor ba'i chos la bde ba dang dga' bar ston te/_'khor ba'i chos la skyo ba skyed par mi ston to/_/gzhan yang 
[\[231b.3\]]shin tu thabs mkhas pa la rmongs pas sems can gang srog gcod pa la dga' ba nas de bzhin du log par lta ba'i bar du mos pa dag la ni shin tu zab pa theg pa chen po'i chos ston te/_de la 'khor ba 'di nas shi 'phos nas pha rol tu skye zhing sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 
[\[231b.4\]]myong ba la skyo zhing 'jigs pa dang /_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos spong ba mi ston to/_/gzhan yang shin tu thabs mkhas pa la rmongs pas sems can gang tshul khrims srung bar mos pa la ni sbyin pa spyod du 'jug go/_/sems can gang bzod pa sgom par mos pa la ni bzod pa spong ba 
[\[231b.5\]]ston cing tshul khrims srung du 'jug go/_/sems can gang brtson 'grus sgom par mos pa la ni brtson 'grus spong ba ston cing bzod pa spyod du 'jug go/_/sems can gang bsam gtan sgom par mos pa la ni bsam gtan spong ba ston cing brtson 'grus la nan tan byed du bcug go/_/sems 
[\[231b.6\]]can gang shes rab sgom par mos pa la ni shes rab spong ba ston cing bsam gtan sgom du 'jug go/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas pa la rmongs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed mi nus te/_sems can thams cad 
[\[231b.7\]]kyi sdig pa'i grogs por gyur to/_/thabs mkhas pa 'di ni dmigs pa dang bcas pa chags pa dang bcas pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas pa zhes bya'o/_/de ltar 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas pa 'di ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]theg pa dang thun mong pa yin te/_go cha chen po'i 'khor lo ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa ma yin no/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig 
[\[232a.2\]]rten las 'das pa'i shin tu thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag gi don btang ste/_gzhan gyi don lhur byed pas bzo dang sgyu rtsal rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par ston pas yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /_byang 
[\[232a.3\]]chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_pha dang ma la bsnyen bkur dang /_mchod pa byed pa dang /_nad pa dang /_phongs pa dang /_nyam thag pa dang /_mgon dang skyabs med pa dang /_shin tu sdug bsngal rnam pa mang pos gzir ba la thabs kyis sgrol 
[\[232a.4\]]ba dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhis sems can yongs su smin par byed do/_/ci la mos pa dang /_dbang po dang /_snod ji lta ba bzhin du sems can la dam pa'i chos ston to/_/gzhan yang rim gyis nyan thos kyi theg pa pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la slob cing nan 
[\[232a.5\]]tan byed par skul ba dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa ni theg pa chen po slob cing nan tan byed par skul ba dang /_gal te nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par dbang po ma smin pa ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi chos kyis skyo ba ston cing 'khor bas skyo ba dang /_mya ngan las 
[\[232a.6\]]'da' ba tshol bar skul lo/_/sems can gang srog gcod pa la mos pa nas log par lta ba'i bar du chags pa la ni dbang po dang /_rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du 'khor bar 'khor ba'i chos ston pa dang /_'jig rten 'di nas pha rol du skye ba dang /_pha rol gyi sdug 
[\[232a.7\]]bsngal gyi 'bras bu myong bar ston te/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos kyis 'jigs pa dang skyo ba ston to/_/kha cig la ni nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston to/_/kha cig la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston to/_/kha cig la ni bla na med pa'i theg pa'i chos 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]yang dag par bstan te khad kyis slob tu 'jug go/_/sems can gang sbyin pa la mos par gyur pa rnams la ni tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i mchog srung bar bstan pa de bzhin du rgyas par sems can gang bsam gtan la mos par gyur pa la ni zag pa med pa 'phags pa'i lam gyi 
[\[232b.2\]]mchog gis bsdus pa dang /_shes rab bla na med pa ston cing nan tan byed du bcug ste/_shin tu thabs mkhas pa 'di ni dmigs pa med pa dang /_chags pa med pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes 
[\[232b.3\]]bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shin tu thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa rnam pa lnga yongs su bsal bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos dang /_
[\[232b.4\]]rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /_bsrung ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'o/_/de nas 
[\[232b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis don de dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_shes rab nan tan rnam gnyis te/_/'jig rten bcas dang 'jig rten 'das/_/chags pa de ni 'jig rten bcas/_/chags med pa ni 'jig rten 'das/_/shin tu thabs mkhas 
[\[232b.6\]]nan tan ni/_/khyad par rnam pa gnyis la gnas/_/dmigs pa yod pa 'jig rten bcas/_/dmigs med de ni 'jig rten 'das/_/gang zhig theg pa gcig ston pa/_/de ni legs par chos ston min/_/bdag kyang yongs su mi smin na/_/gzhan gyi don du ga la 'gyur/_/gcig 
[\[232b.7\]]tu mi dge sems can la/_/theg pa gsum gyi chos ston na/_/de ni gti mug rmongs pa ste/_/byang chub chen po de'i ma yin/_/theg pa gsum la 'jug spro zhing /_/yang dag pa yi chos 'dod la/_/'khor bas spro ba'i chos ston na/_/mkhas pa'i rang bzhin de ma yin/_/rtse gcig 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]blo yis rab brtags te/_/'dod dang mos pa bzhin du ston/_/'di ni shin tu thabs mkhas pas/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis de la bsngags/_/sems can sdig pa dag spyod cing /_/theg pa gsum gyi snod 'gyur na/_/dbang po'i snod bzhin chos bstan te/_/sdig pa kun las grol 
[\[233a.2\]]bar byed/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa rnam pa lnga yongs su bsal te/_nyan thos dang /_rang 
[\[233a.3\]]sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pas nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /_srung ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de la ji ltar na byams pa chen 
[\[233a.4\]]po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhe na/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa la rnam pa gnyis te/_chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa dang /_sems can la dmigs pa'i byams pa'o/_/chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa ni byams pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o/_/sems 
[\[233a.5\]]can la dmigs pa'i byams pa ni byams pa chen po'i go cha zhes mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can la dmigs pa'i byams pa ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang thun mong du gyur pa ste/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas ni bdag la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir 
[\[233a.6\]]sems can la dmigs pa'i bzod pa la nan tan byed do/_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas ni bdag zhi ba dang /_bdag mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /_bdag gi sgrib pa bsal ba dang /_bdag gi kun nas nyon mongs pa gcad pa'i phyir yin gyi sems can thams cad kyi phyir sems can la 
[\[233a.7\]]dmigs pa'i byams pas brtson 'grus la nan tan byed pa ni ma yin no/_/de bas na byams pa 'di ni byams pa chen po zhes mi bya ste/_go cha chen po ma yin no/_/chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang thun mong ba ma yin gyi/_byang chub sems 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'ba' zhig gis nan tan byed nus par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du/_brtson 'grus kyi sbyor bas chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa 'di la nan tan byed do/_/byang chub sems 
[\[233b.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa yongs su gcad pa'i phyir shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa la nan tan byed do/_/de bas na byams pa 'di ni byams pa chen po'i go cha chen 
[\[233b.3\]]po zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa la nan tan byed pa ni phung po la mi gnas/_skye mched la mi gnas/_khams la mi gnas/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mi gnas pa nas byang chub kyi lam gyi yan lag gi bar du mi gnas so/_/
[\[233b.4\]]'dod pa'i khams la mi gnas/_gzugs kyi khams la mi gnas/_gzugs med pa'i khams la mi gnas/_'jig rten 'di la mi gnas 'jig rten pha rol la mi gnas/_tshu rol gyi mu la mi gnas/_pha rol gyi mu la mi gnas/_dmigs pa la mi gnas/_mi dmigs 
[\[233b.5\]]pa la mi gnas te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa la nan tan byed pas nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg pa'i sa las shin tu 'das te/_de ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes 
[\[233b.6\]]bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang byams pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa rnam pa lnga yongs su bsal te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/_nyan thos dang /_rang 
[\[233b.7\]]sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /_srung ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]de bka' stsal pa/_nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal ba/_/sems can dmigs pa'i byams sgom pa/_/sems la bcu gsum skyon 'chang zhing /_/bdag la phan pa'i don phyir rtsol/_/byang chub sems dpa' grags chen ni/_/sems can thams cad kun gyi phyir/_/thun mong ma 
[\[234a.2\]]yin byams chen bsgoms/_/bcu gsum sems kyi skyon rnams spangs/_/dri ma bcu gsum rab spangs nas/_/byang chub chen por gzhol bar byed/_/chos la dmigs pa'i byams bsgoms na/_/bsod nams zhing grub ring ba min/_/bcu gsum stobs la bder gnas na/_/sems 
[\[234a.3\]]can kun las shin tu 'phags/_/ji ltar seng ge'i rgyal po de/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kun las 'phags pa bzhin/_/bcu gsum dgra rnams shin tu btul/_/rtag dang chad pa'i mthar 'dzin spangs/_/sems la cis kyang mi gos na/_/myur du byang chub chen po 'thob/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[234a.4\]]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa rnam pa lnga yongs su bsal te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[234a.5\]]thams cad las shin tu 'das pas nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur zhing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /_srung ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de ji ltar zhe na/_
[\[234a.6\]]nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad ni bdag la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir snying rje la spyod kyi/_sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir snying rje chen po skyed pa ma yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdag 'ba' zhig 
[\[234a.7\]]la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir snying rje chen po skyed pa ma yin gyi/_sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir snying rje chen po skyed do/_/de bas na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo dang ldan pas nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]thams cad las shin tu 'das pa nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /_srung ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems 
[\[234b.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhis sems can yongs su smin par byed do/_/snying rje chen pos sems can thams cad la bde ba'i don gyi phyir sbyin pas yongs su sdud pa ni 'di lta ste/_rin po che dang /_nor dang /_dbyig 
[\[234b.3\]]dang /_theg pa dang /_bran dang /_las byed pa'i mi dang /_yul dang /_srid dang /_bu dang /_chung ma dang /_lus dang /_srog gi bar du yongs su gtong ba la ser sna med de/_mi dmigs pa'i spyod pa la sbyor bas 'dul ba'i sems can yod par mi mthong /_sbyin pa byed par mi mthong /_len 
[\[234b.4\]]par mi mthong /_nor gyi dngos por mi mthong /_sbyin pa spyod par mi mthong /_sbyin pa byas pa'i 'bras bur mi mthong ba nas mi dmigs pa'i bar du yang mi mthong ste/_de lta bu'i snying rje chen po skyed do/_/sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don 
[\[234b.5\]]gyi phyir ngag snyan pa dang /_don sgrub pa dang /_don 'thun pas ci dang cis 'dul ba bzhin du mi dmigs pa yang mi mthong ba'i bar du de dang des rgyas par ston cing 'chad do/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag tu mchog dam pa'i dul ba'i sems dang /_rab tu zhi ba'i 
[\[234b.6\]]sems dang /_tshad med pa'i sems dang /_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched thams cad la mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i sems kyis gang nas gang du skyes kyang g.yo ba med pa dang /_mi gnas pa'i snying rje chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'dis snod du gyur pa'i sems can thams 
[\[234b.7\]]cad yongs su smin par byed pa la skyo ba med do/_/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya ste/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang snying rje chen po'i 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[235a.2\]]thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /_srung ba dang /_bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs 
[\[235a.3\]]su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_shin tu zab mo dam pa'i chos dag_/snying rje chen po'i gzhi ru de 'gyur/_/shin tu dpag dka' nam mkha' 'dra ste/_/gnas pa med de gzugs kyang med do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus chen po/_/yon tan chen po dang ni 
[\[235a.4\]]ldan te/_/rgyal ba'i ye shes snying rje chen pos/_/dpa' bo 'jig rten 'da' bar des 'gyur/_/mgon dang skyabs med sems can dag ni/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnyog pas bcings pa/_/snying rje chen po'i chu yis bkrus te/_/sems can rnam par grol bar byed do/_/byang 
[\[235a.5\]]chub sems dpa'i snying rje bskyed pas/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho skems par byed de/_/nyan thos theg pa'i 'khor rnams dang ni/_/rang rgyal theg pa spyod pas ma yin/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sems can/_/ngan song dag tu ltung bar 'gyur ba/_/snying rje chen po'i chu yis 
[\[235a.6\]]bkrus te/_/sdug bsngal kun las grol bar byed do/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig so so yang dag par rig pa/_nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/_tshad med pa/_mtha' yas pa/_shin tu rgya chen po dang ldan pa ji snyed 
[\[235a.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de/_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs rnams dang /_shin tu brtan pa'i bzod pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa rnam pa lnga yongs 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]su bsal te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /_srung ba dang /_bsnyen 
[\[235b.2\]]bkur byed par 'gyur ro/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig so so yang dag par rig pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa tshad med pa mtha' yas pa/_shin tu rgya che ba dang ldan pa ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de/_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_
[\[235b.3\]]gzungs rnams dang /_shin tu brtan pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad la shin tu rtog pa ni ji ltar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od kyis nam mkha' kun tu khyab pa bzhin du/_sems mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa/_
[\[235b.4\]]mtshan ma med pa rten pa med pa mi gnas pa/_gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la sems kyi spyod pa med pa/_mig dang /_gzugs dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /_mig gi 'dus te reg pa la yid kyis rnam par 
[\[235b.5\]]zhen pa dang bral ba/_sems kyi spyod pa med pa las mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis nang gi tshor ba rnam gsum skyes te/_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal dang /_bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin par tshor ba la sems rab tu zhi zhing chags pa med do/_/de bzhin 
[\[235b.6\]]du rna ba dang /_sgra dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_sna dang /_dri dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lce dang /_ro dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lus dang /_reg bya 
[\[235b.7\]]dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /_yid dang /_chos dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar du gzhung de bzhin du rgyas par sems dang /_yid dang /_rnam par shes pa thams cad rtag tu zhi zhing chags pa med do/_/
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]sems dang /_yid dang /_rnam par shes pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba rnam gsum ste/_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal dang /_bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin par tshor ba la sems rtag tu zhi zhing chags pa med do/_/dus gsum gyi phung po dang /_
[\[236a.2\]]khams dang /_skye mched rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad la len pa med pa/_sems kyi spyod pa med pa'o/_/gang ji snyed khams gsum dang /_'du byed gsum dang /_reg bya gsum dang /_tshor ba gsum dang /_dbang po gsum dang /_theg pa gsum dang /_sdom pa gsum dang /_
[\[236a.3\]]rnam par grol ba gsum dang /_rnam pa de dag thams cad la sems rab tu zhi ba/_gnas med pa/_mtshan ma med pa/_len pa med pas mnyam pa nyid du gnas so/_/gang ji snyed sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_
[\[236a.4\]]shes rab dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la sems kyi spyod pa med pa rab tu zhi bar gnas so/_/de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan 
[\[236a.5\]]lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang sems kyi spyod pa med pa rab tu zhi bar gnas so/_/gang ji snyed dgu mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la yang sems kyis spyod pa med par rab tu zhi bar gnas so/_/gzhan yang mngon par 
[\[236a.6\]]'du byed pa gsum dang /_chos la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes dang /_lam gyi yan lag dang /_lam gyi rang bzhin 'dren par byed pa dag la yang len pa med pa/_sems kyi spyod pa med pa/_kun gzhi rnam par shes pa dang /_kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ma yin pa dang /_
[\[236a.7\]]nye bar len pa dang bcas pa dang /_nye bar len pa med pa dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa dang /_tshu rol gyi mu dang /_pha rol gyi mu dang /_chung ngu dang /_chen po dang /_tshad med pa dang /_byed pa dang /_mi byed pa dang /_dge ba dang /_mi dge ba dang /_
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]lung du mi ston pa thams cad kyi rnam pa la len pa med pa dang /_sems kyi spyod pa med par rab tu zhi bar gnas so/_/gang ji snyed byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_thabs mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa nas bsrung bar bya ba med pa gsum dang /_mi 
[\[236b.2\]]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du chos thams cad kyi rnam pa la len pa med pa/_sems kyi spyod pa med par rab tu zhi bar gnas so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'khor lo 'di'i dbang gis tshor ba rnam 
[\[236b.3\]]gsum gyi nyes pa yongs su bsal ba dang /_rnam par rtog pa thams cad yongs su zhi ba dang /_mtshan ma'i chos thams cad yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang ji snyed nam mkha'i mig dang /_spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs rnams la thabs mkhas 
[\[236b.4\]]pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yang 'dren par 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lo de la gnas pas gang 'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi lhag mas gnyer te ngan 'gro mnar med pa dang /_gzhan yang srid pa dang /_'gro ba rnams su 'khor 
[\[236b.5\]]ba'i las thams cad lhag ma ma lus par yongs su bsal te/_rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi myong bar byed do/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu/_'di lta ste/_mun pa nag pos nam mkha' thams cad yog pa na nyi ma shar ba'i tshe mun pa thams cad sel bar 'gyur 
[\[236b.6\]]ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang tshig so so yang dag par rig pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/_tshad med pa/_mtha' yas pa/_yangs shing rgya chen po dang ldan pas ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de/_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs rnams dang /_shin 
[\[236b.7\]]tu brtan pa'i bzod pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yang grub cing 'dren par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang nam mkha'i mig dang /_spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs rnams la thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo la gnas pa dpag tu med pa nam mkha' lta 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]bu'i ye shes kyi nyi mas phyin ci log bzhi'i mun pa yongs su bsal te/_'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi lhag mas gnyer te ngan 'gro mnar med pa dang /_gzhan yang srid pa dang 'gro ba rnams su 'khor bar 'khor ba'i las thams cad lhag ma ma lus 
[\[237a.2\]]par yongs su sel te/_rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu myong bar mi byed do/_/gzhan yang de'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la dbang thob pa dang /_phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/_sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du mi 'gro zhing rjes su mi spyod pa dang /_rtag tu sangs rgyas mthong 
[\[237a.3\]]ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /_chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /_dge 'dun la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /_yon tan thams cad la sems mi ngoms pa nas byang 
[\[237a.4\]]chub kyi bar du rgyun mi 'chad de/_rtag tu sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang mi 'bral ba ni chung ngu na rmi lam du yang bar chad med par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig so so yang dag par rig pas nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/_
[\[237a.5\]]tshad med pa/_mtha' yas pa/_yangs shing rgya che ba dang ldan pas ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de/_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs rnams dang /_shin tu brtan pa'i bzod pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'dren par 'gyur zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems 
[\[237a.6\]]dpa' rnams bsam gtan dang po nas bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar du snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 
[\[237a.7\]]'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas na tshor ba rnam gsum dang /_'du byed gsum po yongs su bcad de/_mngon par 'du byed pa dang /_g.yo ba'i sems kyi spyod pa med pa/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_sems pa dang /_rig pa dang /_yid la byed pa la sogs pa kun 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]gcod par 'gyur ro/_/ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas na zhag gcig gam/_zhag bdun gyi bar du bsam gtan gyi zas za bar 'gyur ro/_/ting nge 'dzin de las langs na yang sems rab tu zhi ba len pa med cing /_lhan ner gnas par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang don dam pa'i mthas gtugs pa'i 
[\[237b.2\]]stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog go/_/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas na sems rab tu mnyam pas nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa dang /_lus kyi ba spu'i bu ga kun nas zil dngar gyi thigs pa skar ma lta bu/_mngon par byung bas kun nas nyon mongs pas bcings pa'i 
[\[237b.3\]]yongs su gdung ba thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro/_/ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas yang dag pa'i dran pa thob ste/_dga' ba khyad par can gyis lus la khyab par gyur pa ni ji ltar lha'i sras po dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'jug pa nas lus kyi 
[\[237b.4\]]ba spu'i khung bu kun nas rab tu bde ba myong ba bzhin de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de lus la bde bas reg pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas rjes su dran pas sangs rgyas mthong ba las mtshan ma gzhan mthong ba med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe sangs 
[\[237b.5\]]rgyas gcig yid la byas na sangs rgyas gcig mthong ngo /_/gal te sangs rgyas mang po yid la byas na sangs rgyas mang po mthong ngo /_/gal te sangs rgyas kyi sku chung bar yid la byas na sangs rgyas kyi sku chung ngur mthong ngo /_/gal te sangs rgyas kyi sku chen por yid la byas na sangs 
[\[237b.6\]]rgyas kyi sku chen por mthong ngo /_/gal te sangs rgyas kyi sku tshad med par yid la byas na sangs rgyas kyi sku tshad med par mthong ngo /_/gal te bdag gi lus sangs rgyas kyi sku'i mtshan dang ldan par yid la byas na bdag gi lus de sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra bar mtshan phun sum tshogs 
[\[237b.7\]]par mthong ngo /_/gal te gzhan gyi lus sangs rgyas kyi skur yid la byas na gzhan gyi lus sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra bar mtshan phun sum tshogs par mthong ngo /_/gal te sems can dang sems can ma yin pa dang /_ji snyed gzugs su gtogs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sku 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]mtshan dang ldan par yid la byas na sems can dang /_sems can ma yin pa dang /_ji snyed gzugs su gtogs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra bar mtshan phun sum tshogs par mthong gi gzugs gzhan du mi mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe yang 
[\[238a.2\]]'di snyam du chos thams cad dang /_gzugs thams cad ni sgyu ma dang 'dra ste/_yang dag pa ma yin pas bdag gis tshor ba rnam gsum dang /_'du byed gsum la sogs pa chos thams cad lhag ma ma lus par yongs su gcad do snyam nas 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms 
[\[238a.3\]]par zhugs so/_/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas nas blo sngon du btang ba bzhin du thams cad yongs su bcad de ting nge 'dzin gyi ro'i zas kyis 'tsho'o/_/gal te na zhag bdun nam/_zhag bdun gnyis sam/_bdun gsum mam/_bzhi'am/_lnga'am/_drug gam/_bdun nam/_
[\[238a.4\]]brgyad dam/_gal te na bskal pa tshad med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bar du ci nus su gnas te/_ting nge 'dzin gyi zas za'o/_/ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas sems rab tu zhi bas ci la yang mi chags te bde bar gnas so/_/gal te don dam pa'i mthas gtugs pa'i 
[\[238a.5\]]ting nge 'dzin la zhugs na yang sngar ji skad bshad pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sku mtshan dang ldan pa yid la bya ba nas chos thams cad dang /_gzugs thams cad sgyu ma dang 'dra ste yang dag pa ma yin pa'i bar du chud par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[238a.6\]]po'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/_tshad med pa/_mtha' yas pa/_yangs shing rgya che ba dang ldan pa ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de/_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs thams cad dang /_shin tu brtan pa'i bzod pa'i go cha chen 
[\[238a.7\]]po'i 'khor lo zhes bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'khor lo 'di dang ldan nam mkha'i mig dang /_spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs rnams las shin tu thabs mkhas pa thams cad lhag ma ma lus par spangs te rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]len par mi byed do/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_'jig rten gyi khams su mes 'jig pa 'byung du nye ba ni nyi ma lnga cig car shar te/_'jig rten gyi khams na rdzing bu dang /_rdzing bu chen po dang /_'bab chu dang /_'bab chu chen po dang /_mtsho dang /_mtsho chen po'i chu rnams 
[\[238b.2\]]lhag ma ma lus par thams cad skems par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang tshig so so yang dag par rig pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/_tshad med pa/_mtha' yas pa/_yangs shing rgya che ba dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de/_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs 
[\[238b.3\]]rnams dang /_shin tu brtan pa'i bzod pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yang mngon par 'dren to/_/gzhan yang nam mkha'i mig dang /_spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs rnams la thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo la yang gnas shing 'dren par 'gyur ro/_/gang 
[\[238b.4\]]'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi lhag mas gnyer te/_ngan 'gro mnar med pa dang /_gzhan yang srid pa dang /_'gro ba rnams su 'khor bar 'khor ba'i las thams cad lhag ma ma lus par yongs su bskams te/_rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi len par byed do/_/
[\[238b.5\]]gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_'jig rten du chu'i 'jig pa byung ba na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams chu 'di'i khams chung ngu'i gling chen po bzhi dang /_gling phran brgyad dang /_ri rab ri'i rgyal po dang /_ri phran thams cad chu yis bkrus te zhi gnas lhag 
[\[238b.6\]]ma ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang tshig so so yang dag par rig pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/_tshad med pa/_mtha' yas pa/_yangs shing rgya che ba dang ldan pas ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de/_ting nge 'dzin rnams 
[\[238b.7\]]dang /_gzungs rnams dang /_shin tu brtan pa'i bzod pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yang 'grub cing 'dren par 'gyur ro/_/nam mkha'i mig dang /_spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs rnams la thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo la gnas shing 'dren par 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]'gyur bas 'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi lhag mas gnyer te ngan 'gro mnar med pa dang /_gzhan yang srid pa dang /_'gro ba rnams su 'khor ba 'khor ba'i las la mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo la yang gnas par 'gyur ro/_/'khor lo 'di la 
[\[239a.2\]]gnas pas dpag tu med pa nam mkha' lta bu'i ye shes kyi nyi ma byung bas rang gi lus la phyin ci log bzhi dang /_ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad yongs su sel bar 'gyur ro/_/'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi lhag mas gnyer te ngan 'gro mnar med pa dang /_gzhan yang 
[\[239a.3\]]srid pa dang /_'gro ba rnams su 'khor bar 'khor ba'i las thams cad kyang lhag ma ma lus par yongs su sel te/_rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yang myong bar mi byed do/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed pa nas 
[\[239a.4\]]'dod pa rnam lnga yongs su bsal te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /_srung ba 
[\[239a.5\]]dang /_bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/_/'khor lo 'di'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang du 'gyur ba dang /_phyir mi ldog pa dang /_sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du mi 'gro ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing byang chub sems dpa' dang /_
[\[239a.6\]]nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /_chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /_dge 'dun la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /_yon tan thams cad la sems mi ngoms pa ste/_mngon par byang chub kyi bar du rgyun mi 'chad pa dang rtag tu sangs rgyas 
[\[239a.7\]]rjes su dran pa dang mi 'bral ba ni chung ngu na rmi lam na yang 'bral bar mi byed do/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyang myur du rdzogs pa dang /_ring po mi thogs par rnam par dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]par sangs rgyas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can thams cad kyang rdzus te skye ba dang /_mtshan dang gzugs sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra ba/_nyon mongs pa srab cing chung ba/_theg pa chen po la bde bar gnas pa sha stag go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de dag 
[\[239b.2\]]gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_chos kyi snod du 'gyur bar 'dod pa dag_/nyon mongs thams cad yongs su gcad par bya/_/yang dag stong pa nyid la snyoms zhugs na/_/dngos po gang yang bya bar dka' ba min/_/srid pa'i bcings pa thams 
[\[239b.3\]]cad gcad pa'i phyir/_/snyoms par 'jug la nan tan brtson par bya/_/ting 'dzin yon tan dag dang ldan pas na/_/gdon mi za bar dpag dka'i shes rab thob/_/gzugs med pa yi bsam gtan rab bsgom zhing /_/'gog pa'i ting 'dzin stong pa nyid brtags na/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[239b.4\]]dran pa'i blo mchog rab skyes te/_/sdig pa thams cad yongs su zad 'gyur ro/_/yod dang med pa'i chos rnams thams cad ni/_/yang dag stong pa nyid du brtags pas bcom/_/ngan par 'gro ba'i rgyud rnams yongs bsal nas/_/rtag tu sangs rgyas mang po mthong bar 'gyur/_/yang 
[\[239b.5\]]dag stong pa nyid la rab bsgoms pas/_/dge ba'i chos gzhan kun la brtson bya ste/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kun la rab mchod na/_/myur du sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/_/sems can kun gyi dge ba'i grogs byas te/_/kun nas nyon mongs pa yi nad bsal na/_/rnam dag sangs 
[\[239b.6\]]rgyas zhing du myur du skye/_/mngon par 'tshang rgya byang chub chen po 'thob/_/sangs rgyas mtshan dang ldan pa'i sems can dag_/sangs rgyas zhing der yongs su gang bar 'gyur/_/thams cad sangs rgyas theg la 'dun pa ste/_/nyan thos rang rgyal theg pa yongs su spong /_/'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po 
[\[239b.7\]]sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo bcu pa bya ba las bsod nams kyi zhing gi mtshan nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ste bdun pa'o//_//bcom ldan 'das kyis theg pa chen po'i rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]mnyam pa sngon 'das pa'i dus na sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la goms pa dag deng 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la nan tan bya ba'i sbyor ba bshad pa thos nas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mo thams cad thob bo/_/gzhan yang sems can 
[\[240a.2\]]tshad med grangs med pa rnams chos 'di thos nas ting nge 'dzin gyi 'tsho ba me tog gi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sgo mo thams cad thob bo/_/gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas dpa' bar 'gro ba glog gi 'od la rten pa zhes bya ba'i 
[\[240a.3\]]gzungs kyi sgo mo thams cad thob bo/_/gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas chos la sgyur ba 'od snang ba las rten par byed pa rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa thams cad thob bo/_/gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 
[\[240a.4\]]'das kyis bshad pa thos nas rdul dang dri ma dang bral te chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa skyes te rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas lan cig phyir ldog pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/gzhan yang 
[\[240a.5\]]sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas phyir mi ldog pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas mchog gi dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/gzhan yang sems can tshad 
[\[240a.6\]]med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas khams gsum gyi btson ra nas 'byung bar rtsom pas bcom ldan 'das la rten cing rab tu byung nas yang dag pa'i chos la zhugs par gyur to/_/gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag na ma 'tsho'i bar du dge ba 
[\[240a.7\]]bcu'i las kyi lam la bde bar gnas shing nyan thos kyi theg par sems bskyed pas phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas nam 'tsho'i bar du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bde bar gnas nas/_rang sangs 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]rgyas kyi theg par sems bskyed pa las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas nam 'tsho'i bar du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bde bar gnas nas theg pa chen por sems bskyed cing bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[240b.2\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas 'jig rten gyi yang dag par lta ba thob par gyur te/_yang dag par lta ba de'i dbang gis ngan song du 'gro ba'i rgyu dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 
[\[240b.3\]]las dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad byang nas mtho ris su 'gro ba'i rgyu dang /_yang dag pa'i smon lam dang /_dge ba'i las thams cad skye zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas dkon mchog gsum la 
[\[240b.4\]]skyabs su song ste/_dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa blangs nas sangs rgyas mchod pa la spro ba dang /_chos thos pa la dga' ba dang /_dge 'dun gyi g.yog byed pa la mos te/_nyin mtshan du 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus la sems par tshad med par gyur to/_/gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs 
[\[240b.5\]]med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas log pa la 'bab pa dang /_log pa la phyogs pa dang /_blo gros ngan pa dang /_las ngan pa thams cad yongs su spangs te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos la mi 'gyur ba'i dad pa thob nas khyim na gnas pa'i chos yongs su spangs te rnam par dag 
[\[240b.6\]]pas rab tu byung bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu ngas sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba brda sprod pa chen po chos kyi sgo mo 'di/_khyod kyi lag tu gtad kyis khyod 
[\[240b.7\]]kyis gzungs su zung la shin tu rgyas par gyis shig_/sems can gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la klog gam/_'don tam/_yid la byed dam/_gzhan la yang rgya cher 'chad dam/_yang dag pa'i spyad pa la gnas pa dag la khyod kyis chos rnam pa 'di bcus bsrungs te/_yun ring 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]por phan pa dang bde ba'i don thob par gyis shig_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_de'i thabs dang bdog pa'i nor thams cad bsrungs te nyams par mi bya ba dang /_gnod pa thams cad las bsrungs te/_gnod pa med par bya ba dang /_log par lta ba dang /_log par phyogs pa las 
[\[241a.2\]]bsrungs te mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam spang bar bya ba dang /_de'i lus dang ngag la gnod pa thams cad las bsrungs te med par bya ba dang /_'phya ba dang skur pa thams cad las bsrungs te med par bya ba dang /_tshul khrims dang spyod pa thams cad nyams par mi 'gyur bar srung ba 
[\[241a.3\]]dang /_de la mi ma yin pa thams cad dang /_'byung ba chen po 'khrugs pa dang /_dus ma yin pa'i nad dang /_mi dge ba thams cad yongs su sel bar srung ba dang /_de la dus ma yin pa tshul ma yin pa/_ltas ngan dang /_rims thams cad mi 'byung bar srung ba dang /_de la 'chi ba'i dus 
[\[241a.4\]]byed pa na yang sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar srung ba dang /_de tshe 'phos nas kyang bde 'gror skye ba dang /_phan pa dang bde ba'i don thob par yongs su srung bar byed do/_/rigs kyi bu sems can gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di klog pa dang /_'don pa dang /_don yid la byed pa dang /_
[\[241a.5\]]gzhan la rgya cher 'chad dam/_yang dag pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa dag la khyod kyis chos rnam pa 'di bcus shin tu bsrungs shing /_byin gyis brlabs te/_chos rnam pa 'di bcus yun ring por phan pa dang bde bar gyis shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam 
[\[241a.6\]]mkha'i snying pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/de de bzhin no/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs gzungs su 'dzin cing shin tu rgyas par bgyi'o/_/sems can gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la klog pa dang /_'don pa dang /_don yid la bgyid pa dang /_pha 
[\[241a.7\]]rol po la rgya cher ston pa dang /_yang dag pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa dag la bdag gis chos rnam pa 'di bcus shin tu bsrungs te yun ring por phan pa dang bde bar bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde 'di gsungs nas/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de na gnas pa'i byang chub 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs par the tsom 'dri ba dang /_tshangs pa 
[\[241b.2\]]chen po lha'i snying po dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa 'khor mang po thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o//_//
[\[241b.3\]]'dus pa chen po las byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo bcu pa las bde ba'i don thob pa yongs su gdams pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste brgyad do//_//'dus pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs 
[\[241b.4\]]so//_//rgya'i mkhan po hwa shang zab mo la sogs pa dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de rnam par mi rtog gis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D240}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+yA bai brta tsakra nA ma 
[\[241b.5\]]ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa 
[\[241b.6\]]na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/_dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das nam gyi cha smad kyi thun la 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/'jam dpal gzhon 
[\[241b.7\]]nur gyur pa ni kun du snang byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa ni kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nam gyi cha smad kyi thun nam nangs kar 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]gnas khang nas byung ste/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas khang ga la ba der song ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas khang du 'jug par bsams pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi bzhugs khang gi khor yug nas pad ma 
[\[242a.2\]]khri byung ba mthong zhing glu'i sgra chen po yang thos so/_/pad ma de dag las kyang 'od byung ba mthong ngo /_/'od des kyang rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang bar byed pa mthong ngo /_/mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer chen po thams cad dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[242a.3\]]thams cad kyang snang bar gyur par mthong ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas khang du mi 'gro bar bsams pa dang /_zhugs par gyur cing bdag nyid 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mdun na 'dug par shes te/_des 'jam dpal gzhon 
[\[242a.4\]]nur gyur pa skyil mo krung bcas shing 'dug par mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang se gol gtogs na ma langs so/_/de nas lud pa'i sgra phyung na yang ma langs te/_des 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i cho 'phrul mthong nas/_bdag rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na gnas pa snyam du shes shing 
[\[242a.5\]]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa skyil mo krung bcas te/_'dug nas gnas khang dang bcas te/_shar phyogs su 'gro ba mthong ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mig mi 'dzums 
[\[242a.6\]]par lta zhing 'dug pa dang /_des 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa shar phyogs su gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams las 'das te/_'jig rten gyi khams phyir mi ldog pa'i dbyings zhes bya bar phyin par mthong ngo /_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyis khebs 
[\[242a.7\]]pa'i pad ma rab tu rgyas pa'i sku zhes bya ba mthong ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spu'i khung bu rnams nas pad ma dag byung ste pad ma de dag gis dpag tshad khrir khyab pa mthong ngo /_/pad ma de dag kyang shin tu rgyas shing 'dab ma stong dang ldan par mthong ngo /_/pad ma'i snying po de 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]dag la yang byang chub sems dpa' mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/_lus kyi mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu dag 'khod par mthong ngo /_/de'i nang na pad ma chen po gcig las bcom ldan 'das byung nas stong par gyur te/_pad ma chen po de la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dug 
[\[242b.2\]]nas/_pad ma chen po de dang lhan cig tu nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/_mngon par 'phags nas bcom ldan 'das de la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_pad ma chen po de nyid la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug 
[\[242b.3\]]pa mthong ngo /_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyis khebs pa'i pad ma rab tu rgyas pa'i skus mkhyen bzhin du/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa khyod da gzod gang nas 'ongs/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa 
[\[242b.4\]]dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyis khebs pa'i pad ma rab tu rgyas pa'i sku la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed nas mchis so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i rim gro pa byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[242b.5\]]sgra snyan ces bya ba de/_pad ma'i stan de las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga pad ma'i snying po la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar 
[\[242b.6\]]ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de ji srid cig na mchis/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyis khebs pa'i pad ma rab tu rgyas pa'i skus byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[242b.7\]]dpa' chen po sgra snyan la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na'o/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams de na/_bcom ldan 'das gang chos ston/_
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni chos ston pa ci 'dra ba zhig lags/_bka' stsal pa/_theg pa gsum la brtsams 
[\[243a.2\]]te'o/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das theg pa gsum po de dag gang lags/_bka' stsal pa/_nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /_theg pa chen po ste/_theg pa gsum po de dag la brtsams nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[243a.3\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de chos ston to/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi chos bstan pa 'thun pa ma lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos bstan pa ni 
[\[243a.4\]]'thun no/_/gsol pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos bstan pa ji tsam zhig 'thun/_bka' stsal pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos bstan pa ni phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lor 'thun no/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bcom ldan 
[\[243a.5\]]'das de theg pa gsum la brtsams te de ltar chos ston/_bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu sems can de dag ni dman pa la mos pa dag ste/_de dag theg pa gcig la mi 'jug pas na thabs mkhas pas/_de dag de ltar nye bar khrid de/_rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[243a.6\]]'das rnams ni thabs mkhas pa chen po dang ldan pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de ni snyigs ma lnga'i dus na byung ste/_de dag ni theg pa gcig la ma mos pa dag go/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de na chos ston pa ni de ltar tshegs che lags pa lta/_bka' stsal pa/_rigs 
[\[243a.7\]]kyi bu de de lta'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag der ma skyes pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de skad ma zer cig_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu gang zhig 'dir lo nyi 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]khri dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrub pa bas/_gang zhig der snga dro gcig gis de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du yang dag par sgrub bo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten gyi khams de tsam du kun nas nyon mongs pa can du gyur pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 
[\[243b.2\]]'jig rten gyi khams de ji tsam du kun nas nyon mongs pa can du gyur pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams de'i kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa ji tsam pa/_'jig rten gyi khams de'i kun nas nyon mongs pa mnyan na/_khyod kyi tshe'i tshad zad par 
[\[243b.3\]]'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgra snyan gyis de'i tshe rin po che sna bdun gyi pad ma dag blangs te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba de logs su gtor to/_/gtor 
[\[243b.4\]]nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de blta'o zhes tshig tu yang dang yang smras so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de mthong bar 'dod dam/_gsol 
[\[243b.5\]]pa bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di dang lhan cig song shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgra snyan gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal bdag gis de bzhin 
[\[243b.6\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de blta'o/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu re zhig kho bos phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/smras pa/_kho bo yang khyod dang lhan cig tu phyag bya'o/_/bsnyen bkur du 
[\[243b.7\]]bya'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer gyis khyab pa'i pad ma rab tu rgyas pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal te/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba'am/_brkyang ba las bskum pa de bzhin du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'jig rten gyi khams der mi snang bar gyur nas/_shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[244a.2\]]rnams kyi gan du byung ste/_thams cad na yang chos bstan pa 'di nyid byung ngo /_/lho phyogs dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_steng dang /_'og dang /_phyogs mtshams rnams su yang de bzhin te/_'on kyang 'dzam bu'i gling 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir nam ma na ngas so/_/de nas 
[\[244a.3\]]tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gnas khang gi nang na 'dug bzhin du skar khung gi gseb nas 'od byung bar mthong nas/_de gnas khang nas 'byung ngo snyam ste/_khri las langs pa dang /_nyi ma ma shar bar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang bar gyur par mthong ngo /_/rgyal bu 
[\[244a.4\]]rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad chu dang ba sngo ba gsal bas gang ba dang /_'di na shing yang med gtsug lag khang yang med par mthong nas/_des 'di snyam du bsams te/_ji ltar sngon ma byung ba'i snga ltas 'di dag snang ba las na/_deng ni chos chen po zhig ston par 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de 
[\[244a.5\]]nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di snyam du bsams te/_rkang pa sa la bzhag go snyam nas/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rkang pa sa la bzhag na gsher ba yang med/_byed pa yang med nas de dga' ba dang bde ba skyes te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bzhugs khang ga 
[\[244a.6\]]la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi bzhugs khang gi khor yug nas pad ma khri mthong zhing /_rol mo'i sgra chen po dang /_glu'i sgra chen po yang thos so/_/pad ma de dag las kyang 'od byung bar mthong ste/_'od des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[244a.7\]]khams thams cad snang bar gyur par mthong nas/_de dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal to/_/phyag 'tshal ba dang nam nangs te/_nyi ma shar bar gyur to/_/de dag gi nang nas 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]pad ma gcig rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi dbus su song ste 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos pad ma de rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi dbus su 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di snyam du bsams te/_chos ston pa'i snga ltas byung 
[\[244b.2\]]gi bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan shom du 'gro'o snyam nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan bshams ma thag tu sa chen po yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to/_/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad kyang me tog gis khyab par khebs par gyur to/_/me tog dang bcas 
[\[244b.3\]]pa dang /_'bras bu dang bcas pa'i shing ljon pa rnams kyang byung bar gyur to/_/dge slong thams cad kyang gnas khang nas 'byung bar bsams pa dang /_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad chu dang bsngo ba gsal bas gang bar mthong nas/_de dag 'byung ba'am ldog par yang mi 
[\[244b.4\]]nus la/_'di na shing dang gtsug lag khang yang ma mthong gi snang ba chen po mthong nas/_de dag gnas khang de nyid na 'dug bzhin du 'di snyam du sems te/_de'i snga ltas 'di dag snang ba las na/_deng chos chen po zhig ston par 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[244b.5\]]ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das bzhugs ma thag tu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag grangs med pa rnams dang /_lhan cig tu sa rum nas mngon par 'thon te/_'thon nas kyang bcom 
[\[244b.6\]]ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 
[\[244b.7\]]la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod song la mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma ji srid cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad bos shig_/bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/_gtsug lag khang nas gtsug lag khang du rgyu zhing song ste/_dge slong rnams la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa khyed la ston pa gsung ngo /_/de dag gis smras pa/_bdag cag gis kyang snga ltas rig mod kyi 'gro ma 
[\[245a.2\]]nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad chu dang bsngo ba gsal bas gang bar mthong ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong de dag gi ltar mnyan nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos 
[\[245a.3\]]phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong dag ni mchi ba'i rngo mi thogs so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal bas par chab dang bsngo ba gsal bas bltams par mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[245a.4\]]stsal pa/_kun dga' bo dge slong de dag ni chu ma yin pa la chur 'du shes pa dag ste/_ji ltar dge slong de dag chu ma yin pa la chur 'du shes pa de bzhin du de dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma yin pa la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur 'du shes/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 
[\[245a.5\]]ma yin pa la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur 'du shes/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma yin pa la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur 'du shes/_dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu ma yin pa la dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bur 'du shes/_rang sangs rgyas nyid ma yin pa la rang sangs 
[\[245a.6\]]rgyas su 'du shes/_gzugs ma yin pa la gzugs su 'du shes/_tshor ba ma yin pa dang /_'du shes ma yin pa dang /_'du byed rnams ma yin pa dang /_rnam par shes pa ma yin pa la rnam par shes par 'du shes pa dag ste/_kun dga' bo khyod song la bos shig dang 'ong bar 'gyur 
[\[245a.7\]]ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te/_yang dge slong de dag bod pa'i phyir mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer chen por zhugs nas dge slong rnams dang /_dge slong ma rnams dang /_dge bsnyen rnams dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams la bsgo ba/_tshe 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]dang ldan pa dag khyed la ston pa gsung ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'khor bzhi po dag la bsgo nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[245b.2\]]'das 'khor bzhi la bsgo lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu khyod song la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 
[\[245b.3\]]rnams dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad 
[\[245b.4\]]bos shig_/bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/_'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba'am/_brkyang ba las bskum pa de bzhin du skad cig 
[\[245b.5\]]thang cig yud tsam de la maud gal gyi bu chen pos/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_dge slong rnams dang /_dge slong ma rnams dang /_dge bsnyen rnams dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams dang /_lha 
[\[245b.6\]]rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_dri za rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams dang /_mi rnams dang /_mi ma yin pa rnams la bsgo nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_bdag 
[\[245b.7\]]nyid kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'khor bzhi la bsgo lags so/_/de nas 'khor bzhi po de dag gis dpag tshad stong khor yug tu khyab par gyur to/_/lha 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]rnams kyis kyang dpag tshad lnga khri tsam gyi steng gi bar snang khyab par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'khor bzhi po 'di yang 'dus shing mchis/_lha rnams kyis kyang 
[\[246a.2\]]bar snang bltams shing mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo la brtsams te chos bstan du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di na dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge 
[\[246a.3\]]bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dag kyang mang /_lha brgya stong phrag kyang mang /_de ma lags pa gzhan gang dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur 'du shes pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur 'du shes pa dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur 'du shes pa dang /_dgra 
[\[246a.4\]]bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bur 'du shes pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas nyid du 'du shes pa mang du mchis na/_de dag gi 'du shes rnam par dgrol ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis gang la dgongs te/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bstan pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 
[\[246a.5\]]dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu bstan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis gang la dgongs te/_rang sangs rgyas nyid kyi bstan pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang 
[\[246a.6\]]bar mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag mdang 'dir nam gyi cha smad la mchis langs nas/_gnas khang nas byung ste/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas khang ga la ba der
