[\[267b.3\]]dag pa'i mtha' mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' dang /_sems can gyi mtha' mig yor gyi mtha' dang /_rdzas med cing dngos po med pa dang /_chos thams cad kyi mtha' brjod du med pa dang /_brjod du med pa'i mtha' ming yongs su brjod pa'i mtha' dang /_tshig la mi gnas pa 
[\[267b.4\]]dang /_tshig gis yongs su brjod pa ma yin par shes so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar tshig ni stong pa gsog ste/_tshig gis bdag gi mtha' 'am/_sems can gyi mtha' mi shes so/_/des mtha' de rtogs te de mtha' de la mngon sum du gyur pas des na rang sangs 
[\[267b.5\]]rgyas zhes bya'o/_/gzugs kyi phung po 'di sgras brjod pa dang /_gzugs kyi phung po 'di sgra med pa dang /_sgra dang bral ba dang /_'di rtag tu gzugs kyi phung po zhes tshig gis brjod pa dang /_'di la bdag dang bdag gi med par de gzugs kyi phung po mngon sum du gyur pa yin 
[\[267b.6\]]no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshig gang gis gzugs kyi phung po brjod pa'i tshig de gsog stong pa/_ma skyes pa/_ma 'gags pa ste/_yang dag par na tshig nyid kyang rtag tu med pa yin na tshig gang gis gzugs kyi phung po brjod pa lta ga la yod ces de ltar gzugs kyi phung po mngon sum du 
[\[267b.7\]]gyur pa yin no/_/tshor ba'i phung po 'di sgras brjod pa dang /_tshor ba'i phung po 'di sgra med pa dang /_sgra dang bral ba dang /_'di rtag tu tshor ba'i phung po zhes tshig gis brjod pa dang /_'di la bdag dang bdag gi med par tshor ba'i phung po mngon sum du gyur pa yin no/_/
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshig gang gis tshor ba'i phung po brjod pa'i tshig de gsog stong pa/_ma skyes pa/_ma 'gags pa ste/_yang dag par na tshig nyid kyang rtag tu med pa yin na tshig gang gis tshor ba'i phung po brjod pa lta ga la yod ces de ltar tshor ba'i phung po mngon sum du gyur 
[\[268a.2\]]pa yin no/_/'du shes kyi phung po 'di sgras brjod pa dang /_'du shes kyi phung po 'di sgra med pa dang /_sgra dang bral ba dang /_'di rtag tu 'du shes kyi phung po zhes tshig gis brjod pa dang /_'di la bdag dang bdag gi med par de 'du shes kyi phung po mngon sum du gyur pa yin no/_/de ci'i 
[\[268a.3\]]phyir zhe na/_tshig gang gis 'du shes kyi phung po brjod pa'i tshig de gsog stong pa/_ma skyes pa/_ma 'gags pa ste/_yang dag par na tshig nyid kyang rtag tu med pa yin no/_/tshig gang gis 'du shes kyi phung po brjod pa lta ga la yod ces de ltar 'du shes kyi phung po mngon sum du gyur pa yin no/_/
[\[268a.4\]]'du byed kyi phung po 'di sgras brjod pa dang /_'du byed kyi phung po 'di sgra med pa dang /_sgra dang bral ba dang /_'di rtag tu 'du byed kyi phung po zhes tshig gis brjod pa dang /_'di la bdag dang bdag gi med par de 'du byed kyi phung po mngon sum du gyur pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshig gang 
[\[268a.5\]]gis 'du byed kyi phung po brjod pa'i tshig de gsog stong pa/_ma skyes pa/_ma 'gags pa ste/_yang dag par na tshig kyang rtag tu med pa yin na tshig gang gis 'du byed kyi phung po brjod pa lta ga la yod ces de ltar 'du byed kyi phung po mngon sum du gyur pa yin no/_/rnam par shes pa'i phung 
[\[268a.6\]]po 'di sgras brjod pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i phung po 'di sgra med pa dang /_sgra dang bral ba dang /_'di rtag tu rnam par shes pa'i phung po zhes tshig gis brjod pa dang /_'di la bdag dang bdag gi med par de rnam par shes pa'i phung po mngon sum du gyur pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe 
[\[268a.7\]]na/_tshig gang gis rnam par shes pa'i phung por brjod pa'i tshig de gsog stong pa/_ma skyes pa/_ma 'gags pa ste/_yang dag par na tshig kyang rtag tu med pa yin na tshig gang gis rnam par shes pa'i phung po brjod pa lta ga la yod ces de ltar rnam par shes pa'i phung po mngon sum du shes pa 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]yin no/_/de ltar phung po lnga sgra med pa dang /_tshig gang gis brjod par de dag mngon sum du gyur pa yin te/_des na rang sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshig sgra med pa dang /_phung po'i rkyen nyid rkyen nyid ma yin pa dang /_tshig gi rkyen nyid brjod du med pa'i rkyen nyid du des de 
[\[268b.2\]]khong du chud de/_des na rang sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/chos kun zag pa med pa dang /_/ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags dang /_/rtag tu shin tu mtshan med par/_/chos rnams thams cad mngon sum 
[\[268b.3\]]gyur/_/'di dag ngo bo nyid kyis stong /_/ngo bo nyid kyang yang dag tu/_/shin tu yod pa ma yin par/_/chos rnams thams cad mngon sum gyur/_/chos 'di ji ltar 'di 'dra bar/_/'di ni mngon sum nyid gyur te/_/chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pas/_/des de rang sangs rgyas 
[\[268b.4\]]zhes brjod/_/chos kun mya ngan 'das pa ste/_/de dag thog ma mi dmigs so/_/ma skyes pa yi mtha' de ni/_/yang dag pa yi mtha' zhes brjod/_/chos kun mya ngan 'das pa ste/_/skye ba med par nges par bstan/_/chos gang skye ba med pa de/_/mya ngan 'das zhes brjod pa 
[\[268b.5\]]yin/_/chos kun mya ngan 'das pa ste/_/ming tsam gyis ni brjod par zad/_/ma skyes shing ni ma 'gags te/_/de dag tshig gis yongs su brjod/_/tshig ni stong par yang dag brjod/_/tshig gis sems can shes ma yin/_/de bas ma skyes gnas med de/_/sems can mya ngan 
[\[268b.6\]]'das zhes brjod/_/tshig ni gsog ces brjod pa ste/_/g.yo ba med cing sems pa med/_/tshig 'di tshig gi rang bzhin gyis/_/rtag par shin tu yod ma yin/_/sems can mtha' ni bsam med par/_/tshig gis bstan pa gang yin pa/_/mtha' de tshig la mi rten te/_/tshig 
[\[268b.7\]]la gnas pa'ang ma yin no/_/sems can mtha' ni mya ngan 'das/_/yang dag mtha' ni mtha' min te/_/spros pa med cing zhi la bde/_/gnas dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen yin/_/mig yor gyi ni mtha' lta bur/_/sems can mtha' ni nges par bstan/_/dngos po med cing 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]dmigs pa med/_/yang dag mtha' ni bsam mi khyab/_/chos nyid kyi ni mtha' de yang /_/ming tsam du ni brjod par zad/_/ming gi brjod pa gang yin pa/_/mtha' de dmigs pa ma yin no/_/de ni sus kyang mngon sum du/_/brjod par nus pa ma yin te/_/sems 
[\[269a.2\]]can mtha' ni bsam mi khyab/_/'di ltar mtha' ni gsog yin no/_/mtha' ni tshig la mi gnas te/_/tshig gis yongs su brjod ma yin/_/'di ltar yang dag tu na de/_/sems can mtha' ni yod ma yin/_/sems can mtha' ni bsam yas par/_/tshig gang gis ni 
[\[269a.3\]]mngon bstan pa/_/tshig de stong pa gsog yin te/_/des ni ci yang mi shes so/_/'di 'dra bsam gyis mi khyab mtha'/_/'di ni nyid kyis khong du chud/_/des na smad du med pa de/_/rang sangs rgyas zhes brjod pa yin/_/'di ni sgra yis brjod min zhing /_/phung po gzhan 
[\[269a.4\]]zhes 'di sgra med/_/rtag tu sgra dang bral ba zhes/_/gzugs can phung po mngon sum gyur/_/'di ni yang dag bral ba ste/_/yang dag tu yang rjod par byed/_/yang dag tu na yang dag ni/_/gang du'ang gnas pa ma yin no/_/gzugs kyi phung po bdag med ces/_/tshig gis phung po 
[\[269a.5\]]'di brjod pa/_/tshig de stong pa gsog yin te/_/ma skyes shing ni 'gag pa med/_/yang dag tu na rnam par ni/_/tshig 'di shin tu yod ma yin/_/yod ma yin pa'i tshig gis ni/_/gzugs kyi phung po brjod pa byas/_/'di ni sgra yis brjod min zhing /_/tshor ba'i phung po sgra 
[\[269a.6\]]med de/_/rtag tu sgra dang bral ba zhes/_/tshor ba'i phung po mngon sum gyur/_/'di ni yang dag bral ba ste/_/yang dag tu yang rjod par byed/_/yang dag tu na yang dag ni/_/gang du'ang gnas pa ma yin no/_/tshig gis tshor ba'i phung po 'di/_/gsob tu yang dag brjod pa byas/_/
[\[269a.7\]]tshig de stong pa gsob yin te/_/ma skyes shing ni 'gag pa med/_/yang dag tu na rtag par ni/_/tshig 'di shin tu yod ma yin/_/yod ma yin pa'i tshig gis ni/_/tshor ba'i phung po brjod pa byas/_/'di ni sgra yis brjod min zhing /_/phung po 'di ni sgra med de/_/rtag tu sgra 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]dang bral ba zhes/_/tshor ba'i phung po mngon sum gyur/_/'di ni yang dag bral ba ste/_/yang dag tu yang rjod par byed/_/yang dag tu na yang dag ni/_/gang du'ang gnas pa ma yin no/_/tshig gis phung po rab brjod de/_/'du shes phung po bdag med pa/_/tshig de stong pa gsog 
[\[269b.2\]]yin te/_/ma skyes shing ni 'gag pa med/_/yang dag tu na rtag par ni/_/tshig 'di shin tu yod ma yin/_/yod ma yin pa'i tshig gis ni/_'du shes phung po brjod pa byas/_/'di ni sgra yis brjod min zhing /_/phung po 'di ni sgra med de/_/rtag tu sgra dang bral ba zhes/_/'du 
[\[269b.3\]]shes phung po mngon sum gyur/_/'di ni yang dag bral ba ste/_/yang dag tu yang rjod par byed/_/yang dag tu na yang dag ni/_/gang du'ang gnas pa ma yin no/_/tshig gis 'du byed phung po 'di/_/gsog tu rab tu brjod pa byas/_/tshig de stong pa gsog yin te/_/
[\[269b.4\]]ma skyes shing ni 'gag med de/_/yang dag tu na rtag par ni/_/tshig 'di shin tu yod ma yin/_/yod ma yin pa'i tshig gis ni/_/'du byed phung po brjod pa byas/_/'di ni sgra yis brjod min zhing /_/phung po 'di ni sgra med de/_/rtag tu sgra dang bral ba zhes/_/rnam shes phung po 
[\[269b.5\]]mngon sum gyur/_/'di ni yang dag bral ba ste/_/yang dag tu yang rjod par byed/_/yang dag tu na yang dag ni/_/gang du'ang gnas pa ma yin no/_/tshig gis rnam shes phung po 'di/_/gsog tu rab tu brjod pa byas/_/tshig de stong pa gsog yin te/_/ma skyes shing ni 
[\[269b.6\]]'gag pa med/_/yang dag tu na rtag par ni/_/tshig 'di shin tu yod ma yin/_/yod ma yin pa'i tshig gis ni/_/rnam shes phung po brjod pa byas/_/brjod pa med pa'i phung po la/_/tshad mar dmigs par mi 'gyur te/_/ma skyes ma 'gags rnams la ni/_/'di 
[\[269b.7\]]dag gnas med rten kyang med/_/nyon mongs med cing bral ba med/_/chos med rnam par smin pa med/_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun med/_/mya ngan 'das med rang byung med/_/de la zhi gnas gang yang med/_/lhag mthong yang ni yod ma yin/_/yo byad bsnyungs 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]med 'dod chung med/_/le lo med cing brtson 'grus med/_/rgod pa med cing 'gyod pa med/_/sdom pa'ang yod pa ma yin te/_/gang phyir sdom par gyur pa yi/_/'di la dngos po grub pa med/_/'di la rtog pa'am rnam rtog med/_/rnam mi rtog pa'ang yod ma yin/_/
[\[270a.2\]]'jigs pa med cing dgon pa med/_/bcings pa med cing thar pa med/_/'di ni sgra yis 'jug pa ste/_/'jug pa med par nges par bstan/_/chos rnams thams cad sgra med de/_/sgra nyid kyis ni brjod pa yin/_/'di ni mngon sum gyur pas na/_/zad mi shes pa'i tshul ston to/_/
[\[270a.3\]]ting 'dzin 'di la brten nas ni/_/de ni sgra la mi chags so/_/ci 'dra gang gi gang yin pa/_/sgra de des ni mngon sum shes/_/chos kun 'di ltar mnyam pa ste/_/brjod pa med cing gnas pa med/_/'di ni mngon sum gyur pas na/_/tshu rol nas ni pha rol song /_/des na smad 
[\[270a.4\]]pa med pa de/_/rang rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes brjod do/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ma rig pa la ma rig pa'i rang bzhin mngon sum du gyur pa yin/_'du byed rnams la 'du byed kyi rang bzhin dang /_rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes 
[\[270a.5\]]pa'i rang bzhin dang /_ming dang gzugs la ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang /_skye mched drug la skye mched drug gi rang bzhin dang /_reg pa la reg pa'i rang bzhin dang /_tshor ba la tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang /_sred pa la sred pa'i rang bzhin dang /_len pa la len pa'i rang 
[\[270a.6\]]bzhin dang /_srid pa la srid pa'i rang bzhin dang /_skye ba la skye ba'i rang bzhin dang /_rga shi la rga shi'i rang bzhin mngon sum du gyur pa yin te/_de lta bas na rang sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/
[\[270a.7\]]'di ni nam yang yod min zhes/_/des ni ma rig mngon sum gyur/_/de ni dngos por grub med de/_/chu yi nang gi gzugs brnyan bzhin/_/ma rig pa ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi gnas/_/chos gang dang yang 'dre ba med/_/chos gang 'dre ba med pa de/_/ma rig pa yi mtshan nyid do/_/ma rig 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]nam mkha' ji bzhin te/_/chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med/_/'di ni mngon sum gyur pas na/_/rang rgyal ba zhes brjod pa yin/_/lus kyi 'du byed gang brjod pa/_/de dag lus nang gang na'ang med/_/phyi rol ma yin phyi dang nang /_/gang du yang ni byung ba med/_/chu shing phung 
[\[270b.2\]]po snying po med/_/rtag par shin tu snying po med/_/ma skyes shing ni ma 'gags pa/_/nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs 'dra ba/_/'di ni mngon sum gyur pas na/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med pa/_/bsam gyis mi khyab des de na/_/rang rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes brjod do/_/sgyu 
[\[270b.3\]]ma'i rang bzhin spyod yul du/_/chos rnams thams cad rnam par shes/_/rnam shes sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du/_/'di ni mngon sum gyur pa yin/_/rnam shes spyod yul 'du shes 'di/_/log pa yin par rnam par shes/_/de yis 'du shes rnam bshig pas/_/chos 
[\[270b.4\]]rnams stong pa nyid du shes/_/shes pa shes pa ma yin shes/_/thams cad du yang de mi chags/_/'di ltar ming du btags pa'i chos/_/rnam par shes pa sgyu ma 'dra/_/ming dang gzugs su gang brjod pa/_/de ni dgongs te brjod pa yin/_/rtag par shin tu rang bzhin 
[\[270b.5\]]gyi/_/de yi dngos po grub pa med/_/skye mched yod pa ma yin par/_/skye mched 'di dag bstan byas pa/_/de dag sgra yis brjod pa ste/_/de dag gzod nas stong pa yin/_/sngon chad de yi reg pa gang /_/skye mched brtan nas byung gyur pa/_/gsog dang sgyu ma'i rang bzhin 
[\[270b.6\]]ltar/_/de ni de yis rnam par bshig_/reg pa rnam par rtog las byung /_/de ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong /_/ngo bo nyid kyis reg pa'i chos/_/gang yang gnas pa ma yin no/_/'di ni nor bar reg pa zhes/_/reg pa'i rang bzhin mngon sum gyur/_/reg pa dben pa phun sum 
[\[270b.7\]]tshogs/_/rang rgyal ba zhes brjod pa yin/_/tshor ba rnam gsum stong pa dang /_/ngo bo nyid kyis zhi ba dang /_/chu bur 'dra ba snying po med/_/shin tu gsog dang gsob tu shes/_/sred pa thams cad yang dag chad/_/sred pa med pa'i chos nyid shes/_/sred pa zad 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]pa rjes su thob/_/rang rgyal ba zhes brjod pa yin/_/len pa len pa ma yin te/_/stong par de yi rnam par bshig_/de ni dngos por grub med de/_/smig rgyu la ni chu bzhin no/_/de yi srid par 'du shes gang /_/de'i gnyen 'du shes sdig pa can/_/de yi de ni rang 
[\[271a.2\]]bzhin gyis/_/rtag par shin tu dngos med shes/_/de la skye ba thams cad med/_/de la 'chi ba yod ma yin/_/de ni nam yang gang zhig tu/_/skye bar 'gyur ba gang yang med/_/rkyen rnams 'di dag shes nas ni/_/de ni gang la'ang mi gnas te/_/rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i 
[\[271a.3\]]sgrar/_/byang chub sems dpa' rab tu bstan/_/kun dga' bo de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang sangs rgyas su yongs su bstan to//_//bam po bzhi pa/_de nas 
[\[271a.4\]]tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/mya ngan 'das med 'das pa zhes/_/'jig rten mgon pos brjod pa mdzad/_/nam mkha' mdud pa bor nas ni/_/nam mkha' nyid kyis bkrol bar gyur/_/chags pa mi mnga' chos ston pa/_/
[\[271a.5\]]sangs rgyas thabs la mkhas pa po/_/'dir gsung ci yang ma mchis la/_/'on kyang gsung ba brjod pa mdzad/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[271a.6\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ldem po ngag ma 'tshal ba'i 'jig rten gnas pa dag 'dir rmongs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ci la dgongs te/_dad pas rjes su 'brang ba yongs su bstan pa dang /_chos 
[\[271a.7\]]kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_de bzhin du brgyad pa dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas yongs su bstan par 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo gang dag sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa de dag 'di la rmongs par mi 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de lta bas na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bdag gis de 
[\[271b.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i ldem po ngag 'di shes par bya'o snyam du go cha de lta bur bgos pa de dag gnas 'di la rmongs par mi 'gyur ro/_/gang dag brtson 'grus mi dmigs par brtson 'grus dang ldan par 'gyur ba de dag 'di la rmongs par mi 'gyur ro/_/gang dag gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i 
[\[271b.3\]]shes pa dang ldan par gyur pa de dag 'di la rmongs par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/'jig rten mgon po skyob rnams kyis/_/ldem ngag shin tu shes dka' ste/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med pa/_/de yi 
[\[271b.4\]]ched du go cha bgos/_/le lo can dang blo chung bas/_/dgongs pa kun du shes mi nus/_/ldem po ngag gi ched du ni/_/de phyir brtson 'grus brtsam par gyis/_/'jig rten mgon po skyob rnams kyi/_/dgongs pa gang tshe shes gyur pa/_/de tshe de yi shes pa ni/_/ldem ngag 
[\[271b.5\]]rnam par sbyong bar 'jug_/de ltar de rtogs byang chub ste/_/byang chub sems dpas thob pa yin/_/brjod pas byang chub stong pa ste/_/byang chub kyis kyang brjod pa stong /_/stong pa stong pa mi shes la/_/stong pa stong pa zhes kyang brjod/_/brjod pa thams cad chad pa ni/_/stong pa nyid 
[\[271b.6\]]ces rab tu bstan/_/nam mkha' rtag tu gzung med de/_/'di la gzung ba yod ma yin/_/gang la gzung ba yod min pa/_/de ni stong nyid shes par gyis/_/gang dag bag yod gnas 'gyur zhing /_/de ltar stong nyid shes 'gyur ba/_/mkhas pa de dag gnas 'dir ni/_/kun du rmongs 
[\[271b.7\]]par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'khor de'i dge slong dad pas rjes su 'brang bar 'du shes pa bye ba phrag lnga stan las langs te 'dus nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/_/'jig rten mgon po bla na med/_/sangs rgyas bdag cag dogs ma mchis/_/
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]dgongs te bstan pa gang lags pa/_/byang chub mchog la gnas par bgyi/_/de nas dge slong de dag gi tshigs su bcad pa de thos nas/_de dag ma yin pa gzhan dge slong chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'du shes pa bye ba phrag lnga stan las langs te 'dus nas/_
[\[272a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod de tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/_/khyod kyis chos rjes 'brang ba zhes/_/dgongs te yongs su zhing bstan pa/_/the tsom de ni ma mchis te/_/bdag cag byang chub snang ba thob/_/de nas dge slong de dag gi tshigs su bcad pa de thos nas/_
[\[272a.3\]]de dag ma yin pa gzhan dge slong brgyad par 'du shes pa bye ba phrag bcu stan las langs te 'dus nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod de tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/_/brgyad pa'i 'du shes gang gyur pa/_/bdag cag 'du shes de rnams bshig_/gang 
[\[272a.4\]]gis brgyad par brjod pa yi/_/dgongs pa de ni bdag cag rtogs/_/de nas dge slong de dag gi tshigs su bcad pa de thos nas/_dge slong gzhan rgyun du zhugs par 'du shes pa bye ba phrag bcu gcig stan las langs te 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod 
[\[272a.5\]]de tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/_/sangs rgyas chos la rnam kun du/_/snang ba bdag cag de ring thob/_/gang phyir rgyun du zhugs bsten pa/_/dgongs pa de ni bdag cag 'tshal/_/de nas dge slong de dag gi tshigs su bcad pa de thos nas/_dge slong gzhan lan cig phyir 
[\[272a.6\]]'ong bar 'du shes pa brgya stong dag stan las langs te 'dus nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod de tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/_/bdag cag lan cig phyir 'ong bar/_/bdag cag mngon par zhen gyur pa/_/de ring zhen pa ma mchis gyur/_/dam pa bdag cag 
[\[272a.7\]]spros ma mchis/_/de nas dge slong de dag gi tshigs su bcad pa de thos nas/_dge slong phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur 'du shes pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa lnga stan las langs te 'dus nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod de tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/_/mi yi dam 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]pa 'jig rten mgon/_/bdag cag spros pa ma mchis gyur/_/'obs las rgal na sa de ring ni/_/byang chub la yang snang ba thob/_/de nas dge slong de dag gi tshigs su bcad pa de thos nas dge slong bsam gtan bzhi pa la bsam gtan pa bye ba phrag lnga bcu stan las langs te 
[\[272b.2\]]'dus nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod de tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/_/de ring ci yang ma mchis gyur/_/chos nyid ma lus par yang rtogs/_/sgyu ma'i chos nyid mnyam par ni/_/theg pa thams cad mnyam par 'tshal/_/de nas dge slong de dag gi tshigs 
[\[272b.3\]]su bcad pa de thos nas/_dge slong theg pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs pa nyi khri stan las langs te 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod de tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/_/lus can rnams ni dgrol slad du/_/dgongs pa gang gis nyan thos gsungs/_/
[\[272b.4\]]dgongs pa de ni bdag cag rtogs/_/de ni bden pa'am [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]ma lags/_/de nas dge slong de dag gi tshigs su bcad pa de thos nas/_/dge slong rang sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa lnga stong stan las langs te 'dus nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod de tshigs 
[\[272b.5\]]su bcad pa 'di smras so/_/rang sangs rgyas nyid bsam yas pa/_/rgyal bas dgongs te gang gsungs pa/_/rang rgyal byang chub bdag cag la/_/de ring mngon sum nyid du gyur/_/de nas dge slong de dag gi tshigs su bcad pa de thos nas/_dge slong ma rgyun du zhugs pa'i 
[\[272b.6\]]'bras bur 'du shes pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur 'du shes pa dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur 'du shes pa dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bur 'du shes pa 'bum phrag bcu stan las langs te 'dus nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod de 
[\[272b.7\]]tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/_/bud med dngos por 'gyur ba yi/_/mnyam pa'i chos rnams yang dag 'tshal/_/gzhan mi gsung ba'i sangs rgyas su/_/'jig rten mchog tu bdag cag 'gyur/_/de nas dge slong ma de dag gi tshigs su bcad pa de thos nas/_dge 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]bsnyen rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur 'du shes pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur 'du shes pa dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur 'du shes pa 'bum phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad stan las langs te 'dus nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod de tshigs su bcad 
[\[273a.2\]]pa 'di smras so/_/bdag cag sems deng dri ma med/_/bai dUr+ya ltar rnam par dag_/sangs rgyas chos thob bgyi slad du/_/de ring rab tu 'byung bar bgyi/_/de nas bar snang la 'khod pa'i lha bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug cus bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog gis gtor nas 'dus 
[\[273a.3\]]te tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/_/theg par 'du shes sngon gang gyur/_/de bzhin 'bras bur 'du shes pa/_/'du shes de dang bdag cag bral/_/sangs rgyas byang chub yang dag gtad/_/de nas shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu dang /_rab 'byor dang /_ma 'gags 
[\[273a.4\]]pa dang /_nam gru dang /_ka pi na la sogs pa dgra bcom pa stong phrag mang po stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das deng bdag cag brnag pa yongs su rdzogs 
[\[273a.5\]]lags so/_/bsam pa yongs su rdzogs lags so/_/bdud phyir rgol ba bcom lags so/_/mtshams med pa lnga yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das deng bdag cag 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan lags so/_/bcom 
[\[273a.6\]]ldan 'das deng bdag cag log par lta ba yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das deng bdag cag yang dag pa'i lta ba dang bral lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das deng bdag cag gis srog chags brgya stong mang po'i srog bkum lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[273a.7\]]deng bdag cag gis byang chub thob lags so/_/deng bdag cag phung po'i lhag ma ma mchis pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas btang snyoms su mdzad do/_/de nas 'khor de'i srog chags 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]brgya stong mang po dag the tsom du gyur te/_'di ci zhig bdag cag mun par gyur pa 'di ji lta bu zhig_/dgra bcom pa dag kyang tshig 'di skad ces 'dzer na/_so so'i skye bo lta smos kyang ci dgos so zhes 'dzer ro/_/the tsom du gyur pa de dag stan las bskyod par ma nus te/_gang dag 
[\[273b.2\]]'dug pa de dag ni ldang mi nus/_gang dag langs pa de dag ni 'dug mi nus nas de dag the tsom du gyur te rab tu sems shing 'dug go_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos srog chags brgya stong mang po de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas 
[\[273b.3\]]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal gnas brtan de dag gis smras pa thos nas srog chags brgya stong mang po 'di dag the tsom du gyur te/_'di dag gis gang la bsams te smras pa la/_bcom ldan 'das 'di yang cang mi gsung bar 
[\[273b.4\]]bzhugs nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gsungs shig_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kun dga' bo 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyis yin te/_gnas 
[\[273b.5\]]brtan 'di dag gis gang la bsams te/_tshig smras pa 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa rnams la mngon sum mo/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ci gnas brtan 'di dag kyang byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin nam/_smras pa/_kun dga' bo de de bzhin no/_/kun dga' bos smras pa/_
[\[273b.6\]]'jam dpal gnas brtan 'di dag gis gang la bsams te tshig smras pa la/_bcom ldan 'das 'di yang cang mi gsung bar bzhugs na/_de'i phyir gsungs shig_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa kun dga' bo ma ni 'khor ba'i skyed pa'i ma rig pa la bya ste/_'di dag 
[\[273b.7\]]gis ma rig pa de shin tu bcom mo/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo pha ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang ldan pa la bya ste/_'di dag tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa de dang bral lo/_/dga' ba'i 'dod chags kyang shin tu bcom btags so/_/
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba ni so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams te/_'di dag gis de dag rnam par mi gzhig pa'i tshul gyis rnam par gzhig ste bcom mo/_/'di dag la so so'i skye bo'i chos kyi 'du shes gang yod pa de yang 'di dag gis chos thams cad mi dbye ba'i tshul gyis phye'o/_/
[\[274a.2\]]'di dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'du shes su gyur pa gang yod pa'i 'du shes de yang mi skye ba'i tshul gyis 'di dag dang bral lo/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo 'di dag gis ni 'di la bsams nas deng bdag cag mtshams med pa lnga yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan pa lags so zhes smras 
[\[274a.3\]]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_khyer ba yang med/_blangs pa yang med de/_de'i phyir mtshams med pa lnga dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/'di dag gis ci la bsams te deng bdag cag gis 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan pa lags so/_/zhes de skad smras zhe na/_btsun 
[\[274a.4\]]pa kun dga' bo 'di dag 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po 'di dag rmi lam lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bur shes te/_'di dag la shes pa de yongs su rdzogs shing 'di dag gis 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ma tshang ba med pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa med par byas so/_/de ci'i 
[\[274a.5\]]phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag ni shin tu med pa ste/_de ltar 'di dag gis de dag yongs su shes so/_/de ltar de dag dang ldan no/_/de ltar de dag gis shes pa yongs su rdzogs te de'i phyir 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/kun dga' bo 'di dag 
[\[274a.6\]]gis ni 'di la bsams nas deng bdag cag 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan pa lags so zhes smras so/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo 'di dag gis deng bdag cag log par lta ba yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan lags so/_/yang dag pa'i lta ba dang bral lags so 
[\[274a.7\]]zhes de skad gang smras pa ni/_btsun pa kun dga' bo 'di dag gis chos thams cad ni log pa yin par mthong ngo /_/btsun pa kun dga' bo log pa zhes bya ba ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa ste/_chos thams cad ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o/_/gang du yang sbyor ba med cing nam mkha' dang 'dra ste zhum pa med pa/_
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]zhen pa med pa/_rton pa med pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de/_'di dag gis de dag de ltar shes so/_/yang dag par na chos thams cad ni mnyam pa ste/_mnyam pa de ni yang dag pa'i lta ba'o/_/'di dag ni mnyam pa'i 'du shes 
[\[274b.2\]]de dang bral lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub ni 'du shes thams cad dang bral ba ste/_'di dag gis chos phra rab tsam yang mi dmigs par sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag rjes su thob bo/_/rtogs so/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo 'di dag gis ni 'di la bsams te deng bdag cag log 
[\[274b.3\]]par lta ba yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan lags so/_/yang dag pa'i lta ba dang bral lags so zhes smras so/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo 'di dag gis gang la bsams te/_deng bdag cag gis srog chags brgya stong mang po'i srog bkum lags so zhes tshig smras pa la/_btsun 
[\[274b.4\]]pa kun dga' bo 'di dag gi ldem po ngag 'di thos nas srog chags brgya stong mang po dang /_lha brgya stong mang pos chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang /_rmi lam lta bu dang /_brag ca lta bur shes shing rtogs te/_des 'di dag sems can gyi 'du shes dang /_srog gi 'du shes dang bral 
[\[274b.5\]]nas chos thams cad bskrun pa med pa'i tshul du dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub tu bskrun to/_/'di thos nas de dag ma yin pa gzhan dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams kyang sems can gyi 'du shes dang /_srog gi 'du shes dang bral bar gyur 
[\[274b.6\]]te de'i phyir de dag yang 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can gyi 'du shes dang /_srog gi 'du shes yod na 'chi bar 'gyur na de dag shin tu mi skye ba'i chos nyid kyis 'du shes de dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo 'di dag gis ni 'di la bsams 
[\[274b.7\]]te/_deng bdag cag gis srog chags brgya stong mang po'i srog bkum lags so zhes tshig de skad smras so/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo 'di dag gis gang la bsams te/_deng bdag cag gis byang chub thob lags so/_/deng bdag cag phung po'i lhag ma ma mchis pa'i 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das lags so zhes tshig de skad smras pa la/_btsun pa kun dga' bo 'khor 'di'i nang nas srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang /_srog chags brgya stong phrag mang pos deng nyon mongs pa rnams sangs 
[\[275a.2\]]rgyas kyi byang chub dang mtshungs par rig nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyed de/_de'i phyir de dag deng byang chub kyi phyir nyon mongs pa rnams las rnam par rgyal nas 'di skad du deng bdag cag gis byang chub thob lags so zhes smras so/_/nyon mongs pa rnams spangs pa yang med/_sangs rgyas 
[\[275a.3\]]kyi chos rnams bstan pa yang med do/_/'di dag la nyon mongs pa chung rab tsam yang med do/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo 'di dag gis ni 'di la bsams te/_deng bdag cag gis byang chub thob lags so/_/deng bdag cag phung po'i lhag ma ma mchis pa'i mya ngan las 'das 
[\[275a.4\]]pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das lags so zhes tshig de skad smras so/_/deng zhes bya ba ni nyi ma 'di gang yin pa la deng zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_btsun pa kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis byang chub tu sems bskyed pa des chos thams 
[\[275a.5\]]cad snang ba byas te/_des sems can gang ma thob pa byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni chos thams cad dang 'char ba'o/_/gang gi tshe de byang chub kyi 'du shes dang bral ba de'i tshe de phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su chos thams cad dang nub bo/_/btsun 
[\[275a.6\]]pa kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa la ni 'phags pa'i 'du shes kyis 'di nyin mo'o/_/byis pa rnams la ni nya ma'i 'du shes kyis nyin mo'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gal te yang dag par snying por nyin mor gyur na ni/_de'i phyir nyin mo rnams phung por 'gyur ro/_/gal 
[\[275a.7\]]te yang dag par snying por phung por gyur na ni de'i phyir mtshan mo rnams kyang phung por 'gyur te/_'das pa'i nyin mtshan rnams 'dres par 'gyur ro/_/nyin mo yang mtshan mor 'gyur ro/_/mtshan mo yang nyin mor 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo byis pa rnams kyi nyin mo'i 'du 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]shes kyis nyin mo'o/_/mtshan mo'i 'du shes kyis mtshan mo'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa la ni nyin mo la nyin mo'i 'du shes dang /_mtshan mo la mtshan mo'i 'du shes med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni 'du shes 
[\[275b.2\]]thams cad dang bral ba ste de'i phyir mngon sum du smon pa med do/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/'khor ba skyed par byed pa yi/_/ma rig pa la ma zhes brjod/_/de dag de ni rtsar bcas bton/_/de phyir ma bsad ces brjod do/_/tshul bzhin ma yin 
[\[275b.3\]]yid la byed/_/dga' ba'i 'dod chags pha zhes brjod/_/de dag yang dag ji bzhin du/_/de ni rtag tu dngos med shes/_/'di ni yang dag dngos med par/_/rtsa nas bton la mi skyed de/_/dmigs pa med cing gnas med pa/_/des na bsad pa zhes brjod do/_/dgra bcom 
[\[275b.4\]]chos su gang brjod dang /_/byis pa'i chos gang tha dad pa/_/sred pa rnam par bshig pas na/_/de phyir dgra bcom bsad ces brjod/_/dge 'dun 'du shes gang gyur pa/_/de dag de yi rang bzhin shes/_/chos rnams thams cad dbye med par/_/dbye ba'i sgrar ni nges 
[\[275b.5\]]par bstan/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes 'du shes gang /_/sngon chad rnam par brtag gyur pa/_/skye ba med dang 'gag med par/_/de dag de ni rtsar bcas bton/_/rgyun mi 'chad par 'du shes 'di/_/stong zhing dbus dang mtha' stong par/_/'di dag gis ni tshig tu brjod/_/
[\[275b.6\]]de ni mnyam nyid rig par byas/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga brjod pa/_/ming gang gis ni yongs brjod pa/_/'du shes sgyu mar rtogs pas na/_/de phyir de dag 'du shes bral/_/dge slong dag gis 'dod 'di rnams/_/sngon cad ji bzhin mi nyung byas/_/'jig rten mgon gyi 
[\[275b.7\]]spyan sngar ni/_/de dag des na tshig tu brjod/_/'dod pa'i chos rnams rmi lam 'drar/_/'di dag gis ni stong du shes/_/de la shin tu skye med par/_/de dag shes pa rab tu rdzogs/_/gsob stong snying po med par ni/_/log par chos rnams yongs su shes/_/
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]log ces bya ba'ang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du brjod/_/de dag 'du shes 'dir rab rdzogs/_/chos rnams thams cad [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa ste/_/gang du'ang yang dag 'dre ba med/_/nam mkha' sor mo lnga lta bur/_/med pas yang dag 'dre ba med/_/yang dag ces ni gang brjod pa/_/lta ba de dag 
[\[276a.2\]]rnams kyis shes/_/chos kyi mnyam nyid gang dang mnyam/_/lta ba shes pa'ang de dang mnyam/_/sems can 'du shes pas na 'chi/_/byis pa'i blo can rnams kyis brtags/_/sems can rnams ni mi dmigs na/_/'chi ba srid par mi 'gyur ro/_/gang gis skye bo rab mang dag_/
[\[276a.3\]]sdug bsngal blangs pa mi 'dor ba/_/srog tu 'du shes rab sdig can/_/'du shes de de rnams kyis bsal/_/de dag sems can 'du shes bral/_/srog tu 'du shes rnam par bshig_/des na sems can mang po yi/_/srog bcad ces ni brjod pa yin/_/de dag nyon mongs kun 
[\[276a.4\]]las rgyal/_/nyon mongs med pa'i chos nyid rtogs/_/byang chub sgro btags med pa dang /_/'gyur med rab tu dri med shes/_/bdud rnams mtha' dag pham par byas/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams rnam par sbyangs/_/chos kun mi mthun med pa'i phyir/_/skye ba med pas mya ngan 'das/_/
[\[276a.5\]]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras ma thag tu de nas srog chags brgya stong rab tu mang po de dag the tsom dang som nyi dang bral te/_chos thams cad la snang ba yang thob par gyur nas/_de dag thams cad kyis so so nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la dga' ba phul 
[\[276a.6\]]te tshig 'di skad du ji ltar da ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa de bzhin du bdag cag gis kyang chos brjod par bgyi'o/_/sems can la yang bstan par bgyi'o zhes smras so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam 
[\[276a.7\]]dpal ldem po ngag tu smras pa de dag legs par bshad pa ni legs so legs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo srog chags brgya stong mang po the tsom dang som nyi za bar gyur pa gang dag the tsom dang som nyi las rnam par 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]bkrol ba'i srog chags brgya stong mang po de dag ni/_kun dga' bo 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pas yongs su smin par byas pa dag ste/_de dag ni 'dis chos bstan pa kun du shes so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_'di dag byang chub 
[\[276b.2\]]las slar mi ldog pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de de bzhin te/_'di dag ni byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yongs su bzung ba'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[276b.3\]]ldan 'das ci lags/_dge slong gang dag dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'i 'du shes dang /_chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i 'du shes dang /_de bzhin du brgyad pa dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[276b.4\]]kyi 'du shes rnams las langs pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub las slar mi ldog pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 'di ni yid ches par dka' ba ste/_dman pa la mos pa dang /_le lo can dang /_'dod pa'i chos bsten pa dang /_'du 'dzi la dga' ba 
[\[276b.5\]]dang /_dran pa brjed ngas pa dang /_shes bzhin med pa dang /_mnyam par ma bzhag pa dang /_sems rnam par 'khrul pa dang /_mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis yongs su zin pa dang /_lus rjes su srung ba dang /_srog rjes su srung ba dang /_lus dang srog la lta ba dang bcas pa dang /_ser sna 
[\[276b.6\]]can dang /_ngang tshul ngan pa can dang /_gnod sems can dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos la mi mos pa dang /_'chal ba'i shes rab can dang /_sdig pa'i bshes gnyen gyi lag tu song ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma zin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs 
[\[276b.7\]]su spangs pa dang /_dmigs par lta ba dang ldan pa dang /_'thob pa lhur len pa dang /_bkur sti lhur len pa dang /_lhung bzed dang chos gos la chags pa dang /_nam gyi cha stod dang nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar rnal 'byor du bya ba la mi brtson pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_phra ma'i tshig 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]can dang /_ngag rtsub po'i tshig can dang /_tshig kyal pa smra ba dang /_brnab sems can dang /_gnod sems mang ba dang /_log par lta ba dang /_'brel pa gang yang rung bas brel ba dang /_pho nya'i las kyi spyod yul pa dang mtshan ma la spyod pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan 
[\[277a.2\]]ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_chud za ba med pa'i chos thams cad la ma dad pa dang /_mi mos pa dang /_chos de lta bu dang ldan pas ni kun dga' bo gnas 'di la mos par dka'o/_/de nas bcom 
[\[277a.3\]]ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas 'da' bar mdzad/_'jam dpal gyis 
[\[277a.4\]]smras pa/_btsun pa kun dga' bo phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la chos 'di lta bu dang ldan pa'i sems can phal cher 'byung ste/_de dag mi mos pas de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas 'da' bar mdzad do/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal gang dag 'dir mos par 'gyur ba 
[\[277a.5\]]gang yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa kun dga' bo gang dag mos par 'gyur ba ni nyung ste/_btsun pa kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/_dper na sems can gang dag don la mkhas pa de dag ni nyung zad cig go/_/gang dag mi mkhas pa ni rab tu mang ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag de la 
[\[277a.6\]]mi spyod de/_de'i phyir de la mi mkhas so/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo de bzhin du gang dag chos bstan pa 'di la mos pa'i sems can ni nyung zad cig go/_/gang dag mos par 'gyur ba de dag ni rtag tu bkur stir bya bar mi 'gyur gyi/_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul 
[\[277a.7\]]'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor nas yongs su spang bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag ni rang gi las kyi sgrib pa chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las sngon byas pas so/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal gang dag mos pa nyung bar 'gyur ba de dag nyid kyi ched du 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]gsungs shig_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das la zhus shig dang /_bcom ldan 'das khyod la lan 'debs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang dag 
[\[277b.2\]]mos pa nyung bar 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag nyid kyi ched du bshad du gsol/_de dag gis thos nas kyang dga' bar 'gyur lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bzhir rnam par gzigs nas/_ljags kyi dbang pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 
[\[277b.3\]]'jig rten gyi khams mngon par bkab ste/_ljags kyi dbang po de las 'od phyung nas 'od des 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed khyab par byas te/_snang ba chen pos snang bar byas so/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor bzhi po des shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i 
[\[277b.4\]]klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston par mthong zhing de dag gis chos bstan pa de yang thos so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_phyogs bcu kun du chos bstan pa 'di nyid lhag chad med par thos so/_/thos nas kyang 'dus te/_bcom ldan 
[\[277b.5\]]'das la gsol ba btab pa/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu ma mchis par mang ba 'di dag kyang chos bstan pa 'di nyid lhag chad ma mchis par ston par mthong lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa 'di nyid dang /_chos kyi bka' 
[\[277b.6\]]mchid 'di nyid rgyun mi gcad par bshad du gsol zhes gsol ba btab bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ljags kyi dbang po de bsdus te/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo lce'i dbang po 'di lta bu [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smra ba yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[277b.7\]]ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_de'i slad du gang dag mos pa nyung bar 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag nyid kyi ched du bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/_gang dag ma mos pa de dag kyang dbang du gyur pa de dag gis mos par bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/bcom 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 'khor bzhi po gang da ltar 'dus pa de thams cad dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za gang dag chos bstan pa 'di thos pa de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa dag ste/_de 
[\[278a.2\]]dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang /_ji ltar da lta ra nga ston pa bzhin du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lhag chad med par sa phyogs 'di nyid du ston par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'khor bzhi po de dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za 
[\[278a.3\]]rnams tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes te/_kha cig gis ni gos rnams/_kha cig gis ni me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la gtor to/_/bud med rnams kyis ni rgyan thams cad lus las phog 
[\[278a.4\]]ste/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su gtor to/_/gtor nas kyang thams cad 'dus te tshig 'di skad du/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni gnyis su ma mchis pa gsung ba lags so zhes smras so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[278a.5\]]kyis yang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo bud med 'di dag gis ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni gnyis su med pa gsung ba/_chags pa mi mnga' ba/_zhe sdang mi mnga' 
[\[278a.6\]]ba/_gti mug mi mnga' ba/_dri ma mi mnga' ba ste/_des na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams thos pa don yod pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams thos zhes bgyi ba 'di ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[278a.7\]]kun dga' bo mi shes sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma 'tshal to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de'i phyir nyon cig dang bshad do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]gang dag gis shAkya thub pa zhes nga'i ming thos par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo byang chub ni chags pa med pa/_zhe sdang med pa/_gti mug med pa ste don yod pa yin na/_gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la me tog cig 
[\[278b.2\]]'bul ba dang /_gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel gyi mchod rten rnams la me tog cig 'thor ba dag lta smos kyang ci dgos/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa'i sems can gang dag gis thos pa de dag kyang byang chub 
[\[278b.3\]]las slar mi ldog par 'gyur ba lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo gang la la dag shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba thos pa de nyid de dag gi byang chub kyi sa bon du 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams thos 
[\[278b.4\]]pa don yod pa ma yin te/_de ltar gyur na ni de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis su med pa gsung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo khyod 'di la ji snyam du sems/_shing n+ya gro d+ha gang gi grib ma la srog chags brgya'am/_nyis brgya'am/_sum brgya'am/_bzhi brgya'am/_lnga brgya 'khod 
[\[278b.5\]]pa'i shing n+ya gro d+ha'i sa bon ji tsam zhig yin/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de'i sa bon chung lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo sa bon de tsam du chung ba de las shing n+ya gro d+ha de skyes nas rim gyis 'phel zhing bdo ste rgyas pa dang yangs par 
[\[278b.6\]]'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo shing n+ya gro d+ha de sa bon chung ngu las skyes nas rim gyis 'phel zhing bdo ste rgyas pa dang yangs par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_kun dga' bo shAkya thub pa'i sgra thos pa'i sa bon de yang 
[\[278b.7\]]rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub par 'gyur te/_chud za bar mi 'gyur/_rab tu chud za bar mi 'gyur rul bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo chos thams cad kyi sa bon 'di ni gnas pa med pa ste/_de'i phyir rab tu chud za bar mi 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo chos thams cad kyi sa bon 'di ni chud mi za ba ste/_de'i phyir chud mi za bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo chos thams cad kyi sa bon 'di ni mngon par zhen pa med pa ste/_des na rul bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun 
[\[279a.2\]]dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_'di bcom ldan 'das kyi sngon gyi smon lam lags sam/_'on te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams thos pa don mchis pa 'di chos nyid lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun 
[\[279a.3\]]dga' bo ngas gang nga'i ming thos pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur cig ces smon lam 'di yang btab par gyur la/_yang 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid kyang yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo sangs rgyas 
[\[279a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das thams cad ni chos thams cad kyis mtshungs mnyam mo/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos nyid kyis mtshungs mnyam pa de'i tshe ci'i slad du smon lam mdzad/_bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' chos dam pa 
[\[279a.5\]]'di ma thos pa rnams smon lam 'debs te/_smon lam des myur du chos bstan pa 'di thos pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang dag rnam pa de lta bu'i chos rnams dang ldan zhing sems can mang po'i don mdzad de/_ci tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 
[\[279a.6\]]chos rgya chen po dang ldan pa 'di ni ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de de bzhin te/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi don du ngas sems can mang po'i don byas so/_/kun dga' bo nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa ma yin te/_kun dga' bo 
[\[279a.7\]]ngas sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /_rim gro byas pa dang /_lus dang /_srog la ma bltas pa dang /_bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang ba dang /_ser sna dang bral ba dang /_brtson 'grus chen po brtsams nas chos thams cad la mi gnas 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]par sems can thams cad la phan btags pa dang /_chos thams cad mi gsung ba'i phyir byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs so/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos bstan pa 'di la bdud 
[\[279b.2\]]sdig can bar chad mi bgyid pa ni ngo mtshar to/_/bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo ma thos so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sngar byin gyis brlabs pas de'i phyir bar chad mi byed do/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byin gyi rlabs de bsdus so/_/'jam 
[\[279b.3\]]dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bdud sdig can gyi phyir byin gyi rlabs bsdus ma thag tu de nas rmi lam tsam gyi tshod du bdud sdig can gyis phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo'i sgra thos shing shAkya thub pa'i mtshan kyang thos so/_/de nas bdud sdig can 'jigs skrag dngangs te spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas bdag 
[\[279b.4\]]gi rnam par rgyal ba thams cad ni rnam par rgyal ba ma yin par 'gyur/_bdag gi yul thams cad ni yul ma yin par 'gyur zhes tshig tu smra zhing de mya ngan byed cing smre sngags 'don to/_/de mya ngan byed cing smre sngags 'don pas rgas 'khogs pa'i gzugs su gyur te/_'di lta ste/_dper 
[\[279b.5\]]na mi lo brgya lon pa rgas 'khogs par gyur pa de bzhin du gzugs rgas par gyur to/_/de nas bdud sdig can yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs dang lhan cig stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud kyi ris kyi lha ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad dang lhan cig tu 'di lta ste/_
[\[279b.6\]]dper na byang chub thob pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi bkod pa de lta bus bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo /_/de nas bdud sdig can bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du son pa dang /_rgas 'khogs gtugs par snang ste/_'di lta ste/_dper na mi lo brgya lon pa lus mdun du rgu ste/_khar ba la 
[\[279b.7\]]brten nas 'gro ba ltar bdud sdig can bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du son pa yang de bzhin no/_/son nas de'i dpung yan lag bzhi pa de la bar snang la 'khod pa'i lha rnams kyis phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo'i sgra dang /_shAkya thub pa'i mtshan thos pas phyir mi ldog pa nyid thob pa'i sgra rnam pa 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]de lta bu 'di bsgrags te/_thos nas kyang yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs de dag thams cad thogs shing the tsom du gyur te/_yang bdud sdig can gyi rjes su mi 'gro'o/_/de nas bdud sdig can gcig pu gnyis su med par bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste/_bcom ldan 
[\[280a.2\]]'das la 'di skad ces gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gcig pu ste/_gnyis su ma mchis la rgas 'khogs gtugs te/_lag pa nas 'degs pa yang ma mchis par gyur cing bdag gi rnam par rgyal ba thams cad kyang rnam par rgyal ba ma lags par gyur/_bdag gi yul thams 
[\[280a.3\]]cad kyang yul ma lags par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba can lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la thugs brtse ba mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das nyid ma gtogs par 
[\[280a.4\]]bdag la chab stsol ba 'ga' yang ma mchis na/_khyod bdag la thugs rje bar mdzad du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bdud sdig can sems can gyi khams mang ste/_sdig can gal te sangs 
[\[280a.5\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed nyin gcig bzhin 'jig rten du byung du zin kyang sdig can sems can gyi khams zad par byed par mi nus so/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la bdud sdig can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[280a.6\]]sems can gyi khams mang du lags kyang /_bdag ni gcig pu ste gnyis su ma mchis par gyur la/_bdag gi lag pa nas 'degs par bgyid pa 'ga' yang ma mchis te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag shul du rdeg 'cha' la 'khor zhing mchi na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag la 
[\[280a.7\]]dbugs dbyung du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das ci nas bdag dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_ji nas kyang myur du yongs su dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas bdag 'khor mang bar 'gyur ba de ltar bdag la dbugs dbyung du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]kyis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sdig can khyod snying las chung ngur song shig dang /_sdig can gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yid ches par mi 'gyur ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad khyod kyi lag nas brten pa dang grogs su 'gyur ro/_/de nas bdud sdig can tshim zhing mgu 
[\[280b.2\]]la yi rangs te rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te tshig 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag gis sems can rnams ci nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mi mos pa dang the tsom du 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su byin gyis brlab bo/_/de dag the tsom za bar gyur na bdag gi dbang du 'gro 
[\[280b.3\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bdud sdig can gyis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das yang bdag de bas kyang dga' bar 'gyur bar bdag dbugs dbyung du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du shAkya thub pa zhes nga'i ming thos par 'gyur ba 
[\[280b.4\]]ji snyed pa de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal pa yang ji skad sgra mi bsgrags shing /_bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar bzhugs su gsol/_sems can rnams sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yongs su sgrub par brtson 'grus rtsom par mi 'gyur ba dang /_byang 
[\[280b.5\]]chub la gnas par mi 'gyur ba de ltar bdag dbugs dbyung du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sdig can khyod snying las chung ngur song shig dang /_ci nas sems can gang yang byang chub la dgod 
[\[280b.6\]]par mi bya ba de ltar bya'o/_/gang gis sems can gang yang sems can gyi khams las bskyod par mi bya ste/_ci nas sems can gang yang gzugs las bskyod par mi bya ba dang /_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa las bskyod par mi 
[\[280b.7\]]bya ba de ltar bya'o/_/sdig can khyod snying las chung ngur song shig dang /_ci nas sems can gang yang 'jig tshogs la lta ba las mi bskyod pa dang /_sems can gang yang gzugs su dmigs pa las mi bskyod pa dang /_sems can gang yang lta bar gyur pa drug cu rtsa gnyis las mi bskyod pa 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]dang /_sems can gang yang 'das par 'du shes pa las mi bskyod pa dang /_ma 'ongs par 'du shes pa dang /_da ltar 'du shes pa las mi bskyod pa dang /_sems can gang yang srog gcod pa las mi bskyod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par 
[\[281a.2\]]g.yem pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_phra ma'i tshig dang /_ngag rtsub po dang /_tshig kyal pa dang /_brnab sems dang /_gnod sems dang /_log par lta ba las mi bskyod pa de ltar bya'o/_/sdig can khyod snying las chung ngur song shig dang /_sems can gang yang sbyin pa 
[\[281a.3\]]yang dag par 'dzin du mi gzhug go/_/tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab yang dag par 'dzin du mi gzhug go/_/sdig can khyod snying las chung ngur song shig dang /_sems can gang yang sems can du 'dzin pa dang /_
[\[281a.4\]]sems can du mngon par zhen pa las bskyod par mi bya'o/_/phar 'du shes pa dang /_mar 'du shes pa dang /_spun du 'du shes pa dang /_sring mor 'du shes pa dang /_chung mar 'du shes pa dang /_bur 'du shes pa dang /_bu mor 'du shes pa dang /_nyin mor 'du shes pa dang /_
[\[281a.5\]]mtshan mor 'du shes pa dang /_zla ba gcig tu 'du shes pa dang /_zla ba phyed du 'du shes pa las bskyod par mi bya'o/_/sdig can khyod snying las chung ngur song shig dang /_sems can gang yang sbyin pa'i 'du shes dang /_tshul khrims kyi 'du shes dang /_bzod pa'i 'du shes 
[\[281a.6\]]dang /_brtson 'grus kyi 'du shes dang /_bsam gtan gyi 'du shes dang /_shes rab kyi 'du shes dang /_byang chub kyi sems kyi 'du shes dang /_stobs dang mi 'jigs pa'i 'du shes dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag gi 'du shes dang /_lam gyi 
[\[281a.7\]]'du shes dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes dang /_chos kyi 'du shes dang /_dge 'dun gyi 'du shes dang /_sangs rgyas kyi dge 'dun gyi 'du shes dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen par 'du shes pa las bskyod par mi bya'o/_/sdig can khyod snying las chung ngur song shig dang /_
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]ci nas sems can gang yang chos thams cad las bskyod par mi bya ba dang /_sems can gang yang chos thams cad yang dag par 'dzin du mi gzhug pa de ltar bya'o/_/de nas bdud sdig can mgu zhing yi rangs te/_dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang bral te/_sa 
[\[281b.2\]]phyogs de nyid du gzhon nur gyur nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog rnams kyis gtor te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten mchog_/gzhan du mi gsung rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/
[\[281b.3\]]gzhan du 'gyur ba'i tshig mi gsung /_/de ring bdag ni dga' ba skyes/_/de nas bdud sdig can gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras nas snying las chung ngur bcom ldan 'das kyi gan nas song ngo /_/de nas bdud sdig can rang gi gnas su son nas lha'i 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan rnams dang ldan zhing 
[\[281b.4\]]dbang thob par gyur te/_rtse dga' mgur yongs su spyod cing yang rnam par gtse ba'i sems mi skyed do/_/bdud slar btang ba bstan pa 'di bshad pa na sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to//_//bam po lnga pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[281b.5\]]kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo bdud slar btang ba bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa bzhis mi skye ba'i 
[\[281b.6\]]chos la bzod pa thob pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di la kha cig the tsom du gyur lta mchis sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo srog chags bye ba phrag bcu ni 'di ci zhig 'di ji lta bu zhig bdag cag gis gzhan du thos par ma gyur tam 
[\[281b.7\]]zhes the tsom dang yid gnyis za bar gyur te/_de dag bdag cag bde bar ga la 'gyur/_de dag bdag cag ji lta bu zhig tu gnas/_bdag cag gang nas 'ongs zhes phyogs kyang mi shes shing gcig la gcig blta'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa/_kun dga' 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/ci la dgongs te gsung ba la so ma nyi ma mchis par 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di dag la myur du snang bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis sdig can khyod snying las chung ngur song shig dang /_ci nas sems can gang yang byang 
[\[282a.2\]]chub la dgod par mi bya ba de ltar bya'o/_/ci nas sems can gang yang sems can gyi khams las bskyod par mi bya ba de ltar bya'o/_/zhes bgyi ba nas snga ma bzhin du rgyas par sbyar te/_sdig can khyod snying las chung ngur song shig dang /_ci nas sems can gang yang chos 
[\[282a.3\]]thams cad las bskyod par mi bya ba dang /_/sems can gang yang chos thams cad yang dag par 'dzin du mi gzhug pa de ltar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ci la dgongs te/_de skad gsungs bcom ldan 'das sems can 'di dag la myur du snang ba mdzad du 
[\[282a.4\]]gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_'don pa dang /_'chang ba de dag gi ched du slad ma'i skye bo la snang ba bgyis par 'gyur bar/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ci la dgongs te de skad ces bka' stsal pa 
[\[282a.5\]]bshad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/byang chub de ni gnas pa med/_/byang chub gang du'ang rgyun chad med/_/des na ngas ni byang chub la/_/sems can dgod par mi bya smras/_/sems can kun dang byang chub 
[\[282a.6\]]dang /_/de bzhin bdag ni gnas pa med/_/'di la dgongs nas sems can ni/_/byang chub gnas pa med ces smras/_/sems can khams las rnam kun du/_/sems can bskyod par mi bya ste/_/de la dngos po grub pa ni/_/shin tu dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/sems 
[\[282a.7\]]can khams 'dir rang bzhin gyis/_/stong ste bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/thams cad mkhyen ldan rnams kyis kyang /_/'di las de ni bskyod mi nus/_/sems can de ni phung po nyid/_/phung po mya ngan 'das gnyis med/_/nga yis 'di la dgongs nas ni/_/sems can 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]gang yang mi bskyod smras/_/gang la bzung nas rab g.yo ba/_/de la gzung ba grub pa med/_/ngo bo nyid kyis mi g.yo ste/_/phung po rnam par shes par gyis/_/phung po mi g.yo gcig pu dang /_/sems can med cing rang bzhin med/_/rtag par shin tu rten med cing /_/gnas pa 
[\[282b.2\]]med par shes par gyis/_/phung po nam mkha' ji bzhin te/_/phung po rnams kyi spyod yul 'di/_/spyod yul med na spyod yul du/_/phung po nam mkha' 'dra zhes bstan/_/nam mkha'i khams su gang brjod pa/_/de ni ma skyes skye ma yin/_/bden par phung po de dang mnyam/_/
[\[282b.3\]]de dag bskyod par mi nus so/_/'jig tshogs shes bya'i chos gang yang /_/yang dag tu ni mi dmigs te/_/nam mkha' ma yin mi bskyod ces/_/nga yis tshig tu de skad smras/_/sems can sems ni rab gnas par/_/rtag par shin tu mi dmigs te/_/dmigs pa dang ni sems 
[\[282b.4\]]rnams kyang /_/ngo bo nyid kyis g.yo ba med/_/lta ba drug cu rtsa gnyis gang /_/gang yang chos rnams tha dad pa/_/de ltar de dag chu nang gi/_/gzugs brnyan de dang 'dra ba nyid/_/lta ba drug cu gnyis rtag tu/_/mig yor 'dra bar shes par gyis/_/bdag med phyir dang dngos med 
[\[282b.5\]]phyir/_/ngo bo nyid kyis g.yo ba med/_/'das dang ma 'ongs 'du shes dang /_/de bzhin da ltar byung ba yi/_/'du shes 'di ni dngos med de/_/dper na smig rgyu'i chu 'dra'o/_/'du shes 'di ni bdag med de/_/'di la sems can yod ma yin/_/gang la sems can yod min pa/_/
[\[282b.6\]]de ni bskyod par mi nus so/_/sems can srog gcod byed gyur pa/_/dgon pa chen por zhugs pa rnams/_/gcig tu mya ngan 'da' bya bar/_/'di las bskyod pa'i nus pa med/_/gal te 'gar ni des dmigs na/_/de ltar de dag bskyod par bya/_/sems can med phyir 
[\[282b.7\]]de dag ni/_/bskyod par mi bya zhes brjod do/_/byang chub ma yin brjod pa ste/_/nam yang su la'ang byin pa med/_/de phyir 'dir ni gang brtson pa/_/de ni bskyod par mi nus so/_/lus can rnams kyis ma byin pa/_/sbyin pa chos sbyin bsam mi khyab/_/de yi phyir na gang brtson 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]pa/_/de ni bskyod par mi nus so/_/'dod la log par g.yem brjod pa/_/'di la log par yod min par/_/de ltar shes nas gang brtson pa/_/de ni bskyod par mi nus so/_/brten nas [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi tshig smra bar/_/gnas pa'i skye bo rnam grol bar/_/gtso bo brtson 'grus 
[\[283a.2\]]rtsom byed pa/_/de ni bskyod par mi nus so/_/phra ma'i tshig rtsub gang yin dang /_/kyal par smra ba gang yin pa/_/de dag thams cad sgyu ma 'dra/_/gsog ste rtag tu dngos po med/_/de yi gnas sam gnas pa ni/_/nam yang yod pa ma yin no/_/sgra ni brag ca mtshungs rig bya/_/
[\[283a.3\]]de yang gnas pa yod ma yin/_/de yi chags sems gang byung ba/_/bdag la chags pa'i khyad par can/_/bdag de de yis yongs shes pa/_/des na de ni bskyod mi nus/_/gang gis gnod sems rang bzhin gyis/_/mtshan nyid med la byang chub de'ang /_/de yi mtshan 
[\[283a.4\]]nyid yin shes pa/_/de ni bskyod par mi nus so/_/log par lta ba yongs shes pas/_/yang dag lta bas rab phye la/_/grangs kun las ni rnam 'das gang /_/de ni bskyod par mi nus so/_/shes rab can dag gzhon nu ma/_/sbyin du 'jug par mi byed de/_/gzhon nu sbyin pa 
[\[283a.5\]]rab sdig pa/_/'di ni snang ba ma yin no/_/log par lta bas tshul khrims gang /_/'phags pa'i lam ni 'dor byed pa/_/'di la 'phags pa'i lam tshol ba/_/'dzud par byed pa ma yin no/_/'di las phyi rol mu stegs kyi/_/bzod pa rnam mang gang yod pa/_/de ni 
[\[283a.6\]]lam rjes 'gro bzod dang /_/mya ngan 'das sbyor ma yin 'dod/_/gzhan gyur mu stegs gdung ba lnga/_/de la sogs la brtson bzod gang /_/de ni byang chub thob byed min/_/de phyir mkhas pa der mi brtson/_/'di la phyi rol mtshan ma can/_/de dag ting 'dzin spyod yul kun/_/
[\[283a.7\]]sangs rgyas rnams kyis smad pa ste/_/de la de ni 'dzud mi byed/_/'dod ldan shes rab gang yin pa/_/de la 'dzud par mi byed de/_/shes pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi/_/ye shes bsam yas 'grub byed min/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med pa/_/gang zhig sems can sdud byed 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]pa/_/blo ldan de ni sems can rnams/_/sdud pa de las bskyod mi nus/_/sems can 'du shes zhen pas na/_/'dir ni byang chub sems brjod do/_/byang chub de ni zhen pa med/_/de ni bskyod par nus ma yin/_/pha dang ma dang spun rnams dang /_/sring mo bu dang rtsa lag rnams/_/thams 
[\[283b.2\]]cad sgyu ma lta bur brjod/_/de dag bskyod par mi nus so/_/dngos po sna tshogs de dag rnams/_/kun la 'du shes de dngos med/_/chos gang dngos po yod min pa/_/de ni bskyod par mi nus so/_/nyin mtshan 'du shes gang yin dang /_/zla gcig zla phyed gang yin pa/_/'du shes de kun 
[\[283b.3\]]chags med de/_/dper na smig rgyu'i chu bzhin no/_/sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus/_/bsam gtan shes rab byang chub sems/_/stobs dang mi 'jigs rnams la yang /_/'du shes gyur pa gang yin dang /_/dbang po byang chub yan lag dang /_/lam rnams la yang gang 
[\[283b.4\]]skyes pa/_/de ni mi shes byung shes nas/_/mkhas pa g.yo bar mi byed do/_/sangs rgyas 'du shes chos 'du shes/_/dge 'dun 'du shes gang gyur pa/_/sna tshogs bral la rab gnas pa/_/de las bskyod par mi bya'o/_/sangs rgyas dge 'dun 'du shes med/_/gang 
[\[283b.5\]]dag kun mkhyen 'du shes med/_/de dag sangs rgyas byang chub ni/_/bsam yas byang chub rgyang ring byed/_/byang chub ring bar mi 'gyur zhes/_/de phyir sdig can mdun du 'dir/_/de dag 'di las mi bskyod ces/_/ngas ni tshig tu brjod pa byas/_/chos rnams kun dang 
[\[283b.6\]]sems can rnams/_/de kun ji bzhin de bzhin du/_/rnam par bkrol nas sdig pa can/_/blo gros ngan pas de ma rtogs/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud slar btang ba bstan pa 'di bshad ma thag tu de nas srog chags bye ba phrag bcu po de dag the tsom dang bral zhing som nyi spangs te 
[\[283b.7\]]chos thams cad la snang ba thob par gyur nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/bzod pa thob ma thag tu thams cad 'dus te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/sangs rgyas lam ni bsam yas pa/_/lam gyi dam pa mngon par 'tshal/_/som nyi gcod pa 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]rnam 'dren pa/_/bcom ldan bdag cag ston pa lags/_/bdag cag kun du snang ba thob/_/sangs rgyas lam la legs par gnas/_/phyogs rnams thams cad snang gyur cing /_/sangs rgyas bye ba rnams kyang mthong /_/rtag tu gzugs la mi gnas 
[\[284a.2\]]pa'i/_/chos nyid kyang ni mthong 'gyur ba/_/de ltar bdag cag rnams kyi mig_/'dren pa 'jig rten mgon gyis sbyangs/_/de nas srog chags bye ba phrag bcu po de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas/_thams cad kyis so so nas gos rnams bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos 
[\[284a.3\]]kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir gtor nas/_tshig 'di skad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can thams cad kyi rna lam du grag par gyur cig ces smras so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[284a.4\]]gang dag bdud slar btang ba bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos ma thag tu mos shing yid ches te the tsom mi skyed na/_bcom ldan 'das de dag bsod nams ci tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang 
[\[284a.5\]]zhig snga dro'i dus na sangs rgyas brgya dang /_nyi ma gung gi dus na sangs rgyas brgya dang /_phyem red kyi dus na sangs rgyas brgya dang /_nam gyi cha stod la sangs rgyas brgya dang /_nam gyi gung la sangs rgyas brgya dang /_nam gyi cha smad la sangs rgyas brgyal bsti stang du byed bla mar byed rim 
[\[284a.6\]]gror byed la mchod par byed cing bde bar sbyar ba thams cad dang /_bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed la tshul 'dis lo nyi khrir bsnyen bkur byed na/_kun dga' bo 'di la ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las 
[\[284a.7\]]bsod nams mang du skyed dam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mang lags te/_bcom ldan 'das dpe bgyi bar sla ba ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]bdud slar btang ba bstan pa 'di thos ma thag tu mos shing yid ches te/_the tsom skyed par mi 'gyur ba de bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu gsum me tog man dA ra ba ri bo ri rab ltar mngon par 'phags pa bye ba brgya stong du ma thogs nas 
[\[284b.2\]]nam mkha' bar snang las 'ongs te/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu de dag rgyang ring po nas 'ong bar mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes su gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[284b.3\]]la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gang nas mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa 
[\[284b.4\]]na/_'jig rten gyi khams ri rab ltar pad ma mngon 'phags zhes bya ba yod de/_der 'di dag gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas de'i phyir de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de nas lhags so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu gsum po de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[284b.5\]]spyan sngar 'khod de/_me tog man dA ra ba de dag bcom ldan 'das la gtor/_rab tu gtor to/_/gtor rab tu gtor nas kyang tshig 'di skad du/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos shing yid ches te the tsom ma mchis so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di 
[\[284b.6\]]lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ltar bdag cag la yang som nyi ci yang ma mchis so/_/zhes smras so/_/de nas de dag gi nang nas byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu gcig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[284b.7\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa zhes yang dag pa'i smra bas smra na/_de bzhin gshegs pa de ni bdag lags te/_bdag ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la so ma nyi ma mchis the tsom mi 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu gnyis 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang dag bcom ldan 'das zhes yang dag pa'i smra bas smra na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag lags te/_bdag ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la som nyi ma mchis the tsom mi 'tshal lo/_/byang chub 
[\[285a.2\]]sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu gsum pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang dag sangs rgyas zhes yang dag pa'i smra bas smra na/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas de ni bdag lags te/_bdag ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la som nyi ma mchis/_the 
[\[285a.3\]]tsom mi 'tshal lo/_/de nas 'khor de'i nang nas srog chags brgya stong mang po dag 'di snyam du sems te/_ji ltar yang sangs rgyas gnyis 'jig rten du cig car 'byung mi srid na ci'i phyir 'di dag 'di skad smra snyam ste/_de dag yeng yeng por gyur nas rang rang gi stan la mi dga' bar gyur 
[\[285a.4\]]to/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci lags 'di dag 'di ltar seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa ltar ming de dag lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' 
[\[285a.5\]]bo 'di la gcig gi ming ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra brjod pas yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/gnyis pa'i ming ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sgra brjod pas yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/gsum pa'i ming ni sangs rgyas kyi sgra brjod pas yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[285a.6\]]kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/_/gang gi phyir 'di dag 'di skad du smra ba'i rnam grangs 'di yod de/_yang 'di dag gi ming ni de dag yin no/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gang dag yeng yeng por gyur pa de dag 'di dag gis 'di la bsams te/_'di dag gis 'di skad smras sa zhes 
[\[285a.7\]]'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang /_de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams de bas kyang ches 'od gsal bar 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/_dper na bcom ldan 'das khye'u gzhon nu thor bu sha mdog yongs su dag pa des tsan dan dmar po'i chus kyang bkrus na de'i lus de bas kyang dri dang ldan zhing sha mdog yongs su dag la 'od 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]gsal bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang dag ldem po ngag la mkhas pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de bas kyang ches 'od gsal bar 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di dag gis ldem po ngag tu smras pa/_srog chags brgya stong mang po yeng yeng por gyur 
[\[285b.2\]]pa rnams la bshad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/'das dang da ltar byung ba dang /_/ma 'ongs de bzhin nyid lta bur/_/chos kun de ltar mthong de'i phyir/_/de ni de bzhin gshegs zhes brjod/_/da ltar byung dang 'das pa 
[\[285b.3\]]dang /_/ma 'ongs chos rnams gang yin pa/_/de dag gnyis min gnyis dbyer med/_/rtag par shin tu mtshan nyid med/_/ji ltar sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyis/_/sbyin pa bsam yas byin pa ltar/_/'di dag de ltar sbyin sbyin te/_/de la bsams nas 'di smra'o/_/byang chub chags med zhugs 
[\[285b.4\]]pa ste/_/ji ltar 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs/_/de ltar byang chub zhugs pa ste/_/des na de bzhin gshegs zhes brjod/_/chos rnams kun la zhugs nas ni/_/byang chub zhi ba tshol bar byed/_/byang chub de yang mi dmigs te/_/de phyir de bzhin gshegs zhes brjod/_/
[\[285b.5\]]ji ltar 'das pa'i tshul bzhin brjod/_/ma 'ongs pa yang de bzhin te/_/da ltar byung ba'ang de bzhin thob/_/des na de bzhin gshegs zhes brjod/_/ji ltar srog chags snying rje'i bdag_/brtan pa rnams kyi sngon bzod ltar/_/de ltar brtan par de bzod de/_/bzod pa'i pha rol 
[\[285b.6\]]mtha' mar gnas/_/sngon chad byang chub tshol ba na/_/nga yis brtson brtsams ji bzhin du/_/de ltar de ni brtson 'grus gyur/_/des na de bzhin gshegs zhes brjod/_/chos kun gang mnyam ngas reg pa/_/mnyam pa de la 'dis reg ste/_/'di la rlom sems gang yang med/_/
[\[285b.7\]]des na de bzhin gshegs zhes brjod/_/chos kun rlom sems med pa ste/_/ngo bo nyid kyis rtag tu mnyam/_/rnam par rtog med ci yang med/_/'dis ni mnyam nyid de shes so/_/sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa ltar/_/'dis kyang de bzhin ting nge 'dzin/_/rnam par mi rtog zhi 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]ba rtogs/_/des na de bzhin gshegs zhes brjod/_/chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin gang /_/nga yis yongs su brjod byas pa/_/rtag par shin tu dngos med pa/_/rang bzhin de ni de yis shes/_/shes rab kyis ni mtshan nyid thob/_/chos kyi stong nyid rab shes 
[\[286a.2\]]pas/_/chos rnams thams cad rab shes te/_/shes rab kyi ni pha rol son/_/sngon gyi mkhas pa bsam yas kyis/_/ji ltar shes rab pha rol son/_/de dag de mthar son pa'ang med/_/ma phyin mya ngan 'das ma yin/_/de bzhin nyid mthar son rnams kyis/_/ji ltar 'di 
[\[286a.3\]]mthar ma phyin pa/_/de ltar 'dis kyang ma rnyed de/_/des na de bzhin gshegs zhes brjod/_/ji ltar gzhan gyis de bsams pa/_/de ltar byang chub mi dmigs te/_/chos rnams thams cad mi dmigs pas/_/de ni de bzhin gshegs zhes brjod/_/ji ltar byang chub mi chags 
[\[286a.4\]]pa/_/de ltar de yis chags med thob/_/chos rnams kun la mi chags pas/_/chags pa med pa'i byang chub rtogs/_/byis pa kun gyis ma spyad cing /_/ngo bo nyid kyang ma shes lam/_/'jig rten mgon po skyob rnams kyis/_/sngon chad ji ltar bsgoms pa bzhin/_/zag pa med pa 
[\[286a.5\]]lam gyi mchog_/de ni de ltar sgom par byed/_/thog ma med pa'i lam de ni/_/stong par de yis rnam par shes/_/'phags pa'i lam gyi chos nyid gang /_/mnyam par gyur pa thog ma med/_/de ni de dang mnyam par byed/_/des na de bzhin gshegs zhes brjod/_/lam ci 'dra bar 
[\[286a.6\]]byang chub ste/_/byang chub ci 'dra de bzhin du/_/lus gnas par ni rab shes te/_/des de de bzhin gshegs zhes brjod/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi sgra/_/mdor na chos zhes brjod pa ste/_/gang dag 'di la som nyi med/_/mkhas pa de dag byang chub zhugs/_/kun 
[\[286a.7\]]dga' 'di la bsams nas ni/_/'di yis tshig tu rab tu brjod/_/ji skad smras pa de de bzhin/_/'di ni mkhas pa'i spyod yul yin/_/mkhas zhes brjod pa'i mi ldog pa'i/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med de/_/gang dag yongs su brjod pa de/_/thams cad de yi spyod 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]yul yin/_/gang gis 'jigs med blo ldan de/_/de bzhin gshegs zhes brjod pa yi/_/rnam grangs 'di ni kun dga' bo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bshad/_/gsol pa/_gang gis blo ldan bcom ldan 'das/_/'jigs pa med ces khyod gsungs pa/_/rnam grangs 
[\[286b.2\]]de ni ci 'dra lags/_/chos de rnams kyang ci 'dra zhig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sangs rgyas byang chub bsam yas pa/_/gang gis byang chub bsgrubs pa ni/_/bskal pa bye ba brgya rnams dang /_/bskal pa bye ba mang pos te/_/de ltar sems can ched kyi phyir/_/
[\[286b.3\]]byang chub sgrub cing legs par gnas/_/de la de ni 'jigs pa med/_/de phyir bcom ldan 'das zhes bya/_/'khor ba la ni de mi 'jigs/_/'khor ba na yang shin tu gnas/_/de las sems can sad par byed/_/de phyir bcom ldan 'das zhes bya/_/de der mi 'jigs 
[\[286b.4\]]ji lta bu/_/'khor bar rab gnas ji 'dra zhig_/'jig rten mgon po bla na med/_/sems can 'grel pa ji lta bu/_/de chos 'phel bar mi byed cing /_/cung zad tsam yang 'jig mi byed/_/'phel ba med cing 'jig med phyir/_/sdug bsngal las ni sems can 'grel/_/
[\[286b.5\]]de ltar 'khor bar mi 'jigs shing /_/de ltar srid par shin tu gnas/_/de ltar sems can thar bar byed/_/des na bcom ldan 'das zhes bya/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams gang yin pa/_/ma lus pa la de mi 'jigs/_/chos rnams mtha' yas mu med pa/_/sems can 
[\[286b.6\]]rnams la de sgrogs so/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams ma lus par/_/ngo bo nyid kyis chos stong par/_/shes nas chos rnams de dag ni/_/sgrub cing de la mthong ba med/_/chos rnams ngo bo nyid stong par/_/de ltar bsti stang byas te sgom/_/rnam pa kun du stong shes nas/_/
[\[286b.7\]]'jigs pa med par sgrub par byed/_/chos rnams thams cad [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]par ni/_/rab tu shes nas zhum pa med/_/'jigs med gyur nas chos rnams kyi/_/yang dag mtshan nyid rab tu ston/_/'jigs pa kun las shin tu 'das/_/ngan song thams cad rnam par spangs/_/
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]'jigs skrag med par ngan song las/_/lus can rnams ni kun du 'don/_/'khor ba 'jigs chen bcas pa las/_/sems can dpag tu med pa sgrol/_/de las sems can mi bskyod la/_/de las sgrol bar byed pa'ang yin/_/bsgral nas mya ngan 'das pa'i thang /_/
[\[287a.2\]]zhi ba mchog la rab dgod kyang /_/sems can de dag mi dmigs te/_/de phyir bcom ldan 'das zhes bya/_/nam mkha' 'dra ba'i chos kyi rnams/_/lus can rnams la rab ston kyang /_/de ni de la 'jigs pa med/_/des na bcom ldan 'das zhes bya/_/rnam pa mang po'i chos 
[\[287a.3\]]rnams kun/_/bye brag med par rab brjod de/_/de dag byang chub mnyam pas mnyam/_/byang chub de yang mi dmigs so/_/skye bo byang chub sgrub pa'i phyir/_/gzhan dag 'di la 'dzud par byed/_/de ltar chos rnams ston byed kyang /_/gang la'ang 'jigs pa yod ma yin/_/bstan 
[\[287a.4\]]pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/_/lus can 'di ni rnam par 'grel/_/'jigs dang bral zhing kun 'dzin med/_/des na bcom ldan 'das zhes bya/_/'du shes 'gog pa yang dag thob/_/byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs med/_/des na ming 'di thob gyur te/_/bcom ldan 
[\[287a.5\]]'das zhes rnam par grags/_/ma smad gang zhig tshol byed par/_/chos rnams 'gog dang mnyam par ni/_/snga nas rab tu shes pas na/_/de yang bcom ldan 'das zhes brjod/_/blo ldan ming ni lhur mi len/_/de ni ming la chags pa med/_/ming la chags las rab dgrol phyir/_/
[\[287a.6\]]lus can rnams la chos ston to/_/gang la mkhas rnams zhugs pa yi/_/byang chub de ni ming dang bral/_/ming lhur len pa'i sems can gang /_/de ni byang chub shin tu ring /_/sgra rnams brag ca lta bur ni/_/rnam pa kun du rnam par 'jig_/sgra rnams med par shes nas ni/_/
[\[287a.7\]]mnyam mo zhes kyang chags pa med/_/sgra rnams kun la chags med cing /_/brjod pa rnams la gnas pa med/_/byang chub phyir ni spros med pas/_/bcom ldan 'das zhes brjod pa yin/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi sgra brjod pa'i/_/'di 'dra'i chos rnams de dag ni/_/byang chub 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]sems dpas ma rnyed de/_/des na bcom ldan 'das zhes bya/_/brtan pa byang chub rab zhugs pa/_/chags bral zag pa med pa de/_/rnam grangs 'di ni rab shes shing /_/'di la gang du'ang chags pa med/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi sgrar brjod pa/_/rnam grangs 'di dang gzhan gyi 
[\[287b.2\]]rnams/_/de dag shes nas nga sangs rgyas/_/bcom ldan 'das zhes smra bar byed/_/kun dga' 'di la bsams nas ni/_/bcom ldan yang dag gang smra bar/_/bdag la smra bas smra byed ces/_/des ni de skad brjod pa yin/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan byang chub sems 
[\[287b.3\]]dpa' la/_/bstan pa gang dag rab 'tshal nas/_/brtan 'di bdag ni sangs rgyas zhes/_/smra ba'i rnam grangs de gang lags/_/bka' stsal pa/_gang gis chos rnams ma lus par/_/shin tu med par rtogs gyur cing /_/chos rnams gtsang bar rtogs pa'i phyir/_/
[\[287b.4\]]sangs rgyas zhes ni brjod pa yin/_/gang zhig nyon mongs [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]shes nas/_/de dag dbang du mi 'gro zhing /_/nyon mongs kun la mi chags pa/_/de ni sangs rgyas zhes brjod do/_/lus ni stong par shes gyur na/_/'di ni nga'i min su'i 'ang min/_/yang dag tu na lus 'di 
[\[287b.5\]]la/_/snying po dmigs pa yod ma yin/_/byis pa lus la mi mkhas pa/_/snying po med la snying por shes/_/de ni yang dag ji bzhin rtogs/_/des na sangs rgyas zhes brjod do/_/gang zhig nga snyam 'du shes su/_/gyur pa shin tu mtshan nyid med/_/mtshan nyid med par 
[\[287b.6\]]de shes nas/_/de yi dbang du mi 'gro'o/_/gzugs ni sngon mthar ma skyes shing /_/yang dag byung ba med par shes/_/'di ni byis pas brtags pa ste/_/'di la grub pa yod ma yin/_/tshor ba rtsa ba med par rtogs/_/'di la rtsa ba mi dmigs te/_/chos rnams kun la mi 
[\[287b.7\]]gnas pas/_/des na 'di la tshor ba med/_/'du shes smig rgyu 'dra ba dang /_/rdzas med dngos po med rtogs nas/_/de phyir de ni chos kun la/_/rnam pa kun du mi 'jug go/_/lus kun snying po med pa ste/_/'du byed rnams kyis gzung ba med/_/'du byed rnams kyis 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]lus stong par/_/rtogs nas lus la mi chags so/_/'du byed rnams dang lus kyang ni/_/chu shing phung po'i snying po 'dra/_/de yis yang dag ji bzhin rtogs/_/des de sangs rgyas zhes brjod do/_/yang dag tu na rnam shes ni/_/lus kyi nang na mi gnas te/_/
[\[288a.2\]]lus 'di yi ni phyi rol na'ang /_/rnam par shes pa mi srid do/_/chos rnams kun la rnam kun du/_/rnam par shes pa mi srid de/_/'di yi gnas dang gnas med dang /_/'pho ba yang ni mi dmigs so/_/rtag par shin tu dngos med par/_/de ltar rnam shes khong du chud/_/dper
