[\[288a.3\]]na sprul pa sgyu ma ltar/_/sus kyang nam yang mi shes so/_/sems can kun gyis ji ltar yang /_/rnam shes de ltar mthong ba med/_/yang dag tu na sus kyang ni/_/thams cad shes par gyur pa med/_/chos rnams thams cad dngos med de/_/yang dag tu na shes 
[\[288a.4\]]pa med/_/'di la chos sam sems can du/_/brtags pa nang na'ang yod ma yin/_/chos rnams thams cad dngos med de/_/'gyur ba med cing spros med la/_/sprul pa 'dra bar de yis rtogs/_/des na sangs rgyas zhes brjod do/_/chos 'di thams cad rtogs gyur 
[\[288a.5\]]nas/_/ji ltar sangs rgyas de ltar gnas/_/chos rnams kun la gnas pa med/_/des na sangs rgyas zhes brjod do/_/ji ltar chos rnams gnas pa bzhin/_/de bzhin nyid ltar khong du chud/_/sangs rgyas dang ni byang chub 'dra/_/dmigs su med cing 'dus ma byas/_/gang 
[\[288a.6\]]gis byang chub phyir zhugs pa'i/_/sems bskyed pa ni gang yin pa/_/phra rab chos kyi mi dmigs pas/_/sems de dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/gang phyir byang chub ched kyi phyir/_/sems de bskyed par gyur pa des/_/byang chub de dang sems mnyam zhing /_/sgyu ma byas pa 
[\[288a.7\]]'dra bar rtogs/_/kun dga' 'di la bsams nas ni/_/sangs rgyas zhes ni gang brjod pa/_/sangs rgyas 'dren pa de bdag ces/_/'di ni tshig tu rab tu smra/_/sangs rgyas sgrar ni bstan pa yi/_/chos rnams 'di dag 'di 'dra bar/_/gang dag chos 'dir gnas pa ni/_/
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]de dag byang chub mchog phyir zhugs/_/gang dag chos rnams de ltar shes/_/de dag byang chub mchog la nye/_/de dag chos rnams thams cad la/_/yid gnyis ci yang yod ma yin/_/de ltar bsams te smras pa yi/_/chos 'di gang dag shes 'gyur ba/_/de dag the tsom spangs pa'i phyir/_/
[\[288b.2\]]'jig rten gyi ni mchog tu 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dang bcom ldan 'das dang /_sangs rgyas zhes bya ba gsum po 'di dag bstan pa'i lan btab ma thag tu de nas srog chags brgya stong mang po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[288b.3\]]'das kyis gang la dgongs nas byang chub sems dpa' la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes gsungs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das zhes gsungs pa dang /_sangs rgyas zhes gsungs pa la/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag som nyi ma mchis shing the tsom mi 'tshal bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[288b.4\]]bdag cag gis chos de dag kun du 'tshal to/_/chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bdag cag gis 'dir dran pa thob lags so/_/pha ma'i bgyi ba 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag cag la mdzad do/_/bcom 
[\[288b.5\]]ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la phyag brkyang ba stsal to/_/bdag cag slar zhing g.yo ba'i sems mi skyed de/_/bdag cag gis g.yo ba ma mchis pa'i chos rjes su thob bo/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' g.yo ba ma mchis pa la sus kyang g.yo bar bgyid 
[\[288b.6\]]par mi nus pa de bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang chos thams cad la g.yo ba ma mchis so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bdag cag gis chos thams cad ni g.yo ba ma mchis te nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing 'dra la ma skyes par rtogs so/_/de nas srog chags brgya stong 
[\[288b.7\]]mang po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das dang mi ring bar 'khod do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dgod pa dang bcas par dbang po dang bas de'i 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/'bras bur 'du shes mang po dag_/'bras bur 'du shes pa las bkrol/_/'bras bur brnyes pa phun tshogs pa/_/'jig mgon khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'bras bu rnams kyang brjod mdzad la/_/mnyam pa 
[\[289a.2\]]nyid kyang rab tu gsung /_/sangs rgyas 'bras bu phun tshogs pa/_/phyag 'tshal 'jig rten mkhas khyod la/_/'bras bu 'dod pa'i sems can med/_/'bras bu sna tshogs spyod yul ba/_/rnam par 'grel pa'i rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/phyag 'tshal 'jig rten kha sgyur 
[\[289a.3\]]khyod/_/mnyam pa nyid la rab zhugs shing /_/chos rnams thams cad ston pa'ang mdzad/_/sems can thams cad mnyam mkhyen pa/_/mnyam pas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sems can 'bras bur dmigs pa can/_/dmigs pa las ni rab tu bkrol/_/dmigs 
[\[289a.4\]]pa thams cad 'grel pa po/_/phyag 'tshal 'jig rten grags khyod la/_/'bras bu nyer zhi phun sum tshogs/_/'bras bu sna tshogs yongs su spangs/_/dge ba ma lus rnams ldan pa/_/'jig mkhyen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[289a.5\]]dgod pa dang bcas par dbang po dang bas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis/_bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ste mi ring ba 
[\[289a.6\]]zhig tu 'dug nas/_bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzums par blta zhing dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' bas 'dug go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das la pad ma dag gis gtor nas bcom 
[\[289a.7\]]ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/sems can dngos po'i 'du shes gnas/_/mang po khyod kyis rnam par bkrol/_/bsnyengs bral len pa mi mnga' ba/_/thub mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/srid pa nyer zhi srid bral ba'i/_/chos ni 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]rab tu ston par mdzad/_/dpa' bo srid pa bral ba po/_/thub mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/khyod kyis dngos po stong par mkhyen/_/rtag tu ngo bo nyid ma mchis/_/srid pa spangs pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/thub mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/srid pa 'dren pa yang dag bcad/_/
[\[289b.2\]]nyon mongs mi mnga' gar mi gnas/_/'jigs dang skrag las rnam grol ba/_/thub mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bsnyengs pa mi mnga' bag mi tsha/_/gsung gi dam pa sgrogs pa mdzad/_/sgra kun las ni rnam 'das pa/_/thub mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mya ngan 
[\[289b.3\]]mi mnga' mi bsnyengs brnyes/_/mya ngan zug rngu rab tu 'grol/_/bdud spangs skyon rnams mi mnga' ba/_/thub mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis 
[\[289b.4\]]mngon par bstod nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/phyi dus phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe/_/gang dag 'di 'dra'i mdo 'di la/_/mkhas pa skrag par mi 'gyur ba/_/sems can de dag phyag bgyi 'os/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdul med blo gros zhes bya bas bcom 
[\[289b.5\]]ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi rgya chen chos/_/mdo sde 'di ni nges par bstan/_/gang dag 'di la som nyi sems/_/ma mchis de dag nyung bar 'gyur/_/'jig tshogs la ni mngon zhen pas/_/lus min lus su 'du shes pas/_/byis pa 
[\[289b.6\]]'du shes yongs ldan rnams/_/'chad pa na ni mi snyan brjod/_/sems can gang dag bdud kyis ni/_mos bzlog bdud kyi byin brlabs dang /_/gang dag 'di 'dra'i mdo 'di la/_/ma mos pa dag mi mkhas lags/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ud 
[\[289b.7\]]pa la'i mig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/des pa gang dag 'di 'dra ba'i/_/mdo 'dir som nyi mi 'tshal ba/_/de dag 'jig rten mig dang mtshungs/_/mig stsol pa yang bgyid pa lags/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchod rten 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]la mos pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/des pa gang dag 'di 'dra ba'i/_/mdo sde la ni mos 'gyur ba/_/de dag 'jig rten mchod rten 'dra/_/mi yi mchog tu 'gyur ba lags/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu 'dod 
[\[290a.2\]]kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gang dag 'di 'dzin de dag ni/_/lus 'di la ni phyi phyir zhing /_/'dod pa mi skyes chos kun la/_/chags pa ma mchis som nyi bral/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gos la mos pas bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[290a.3\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/gang dag tshul 'dir som nyi bral/_/sems can de dag spos rnams dang /_/gos mang bye ba rnams dang ni/_/me tog rnams kyis rab tu dkris/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kha zas gtong gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad 
[\[290a.4\]]ces gsol to/_/gang dag tshul 'dir som nyi bral/_/de dag rnams la lha yi zas/_/ro brgya ldan pa ji snyed mchog_/de dag ma lus stsal bar bgyi/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can mthong na snying rje la yang dag par zhugs pas/_bcom ldan 
[\[290a.5\]]'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/mdo sde bla na med 'di la/_/bla ngan gang dag som nyi 'tshal/_/sems can de dag snying rje'i gnas/_/phyi phyir 'di ni bdud kyi 'os/_/gang dag 'di 'dra'i mdo sde la/_/yud tsam zhig ni som nyi 'tshal/_/de dag sems can dmyal gnas 
[\[290a.6\]]mchis/_/sems can dmyal na'ang rab tu gnas/_/gang dag tshul 'di mi rtogs pa/_/de dag sdig pa'i bshes gnyen grogs/_/zab mo 'di la mkhas ma lags/_/gti mug dra bas rab tu khebs/_/blo gros ngan pas skyon lta'am/_/'thob dang bkur sti chags pa yis/_/
[\[290a.7\]]gang dag 'di ni spong bgyid pa/_/de dag ngang tshul ngan pas 'gyur/_/gang dag byang chub ma mos shing /_/le lo can la brtson 'grus spangs/_/dman la mos shing shes rab 'chal/_/de dag 'di la mos mi 'gyur/_/gang dag 'khor bar rtag tu dga'/_/rtag tu lta ba'i 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]dbang 'gro zhing /_/'jig rten gsum la mngon zhen pa/_/de dag 'di la mos mi 'gyur/_/mu cor smra zhing blo ngan rmongs/_/'dod la brkam zhing mi mkhas la/_/rtag tu 'du 'dzi dga' ba rnams/_/rab tu spong bar bgyid pa lags/_/chos gos lhung bzed rnams la chags/_/
[\[290b.2\]]rtag tu zas la brkam gyur cing /_/dkar po'i chos kyi shas chung ba/_/rab tu spang bar bgyid pa lags/_/sems can 'bras bur 'dod pa dang /_/'bras bu rnams la mngon zhen pa/_/de dag rnams kyis 'jig rten mgon/_/skyob pa'i dgongs pa 'dir rtogs dka'/_/de 
[\[290b.3\]]nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa'i bshes gnyen yongs su spangs pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/'bras bu'i 'du shes rnam 'grel ba'i/_/mdo 'di gang zhig spong bgyid pa/_/sems can de dag bshang gci dang /_/shin tu rul 
[\[290b.4\]]ba bzhin du spangs/_/gang dag chos 'di spong bgyid pa/_/de dag 'di ltar rnam spangs te/_/dri nga ba yi ro bzhin du/_/kun nas yongs su spang bar bgyi/_/dper na chom rkun grong 'joms dang /_/dgon pa dag la gnas 'chas pa/_/thos nas blo gros ngan pa de/_/mthong 
[\[290b.5\]]du 'ong zhes 'bros par bgyid/_/de ltar gang dag mdo sde 'di/_/spong bar bgyid pa gti mug rmongs/_/shin tu sdig can blo ngan pa/_/thos nas de mthong 'gyur zhes 'bros/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[290b.6\]]'das rigs kyi bu 'di dag ji tsam du blo shin tu rnam par des pa 'di ni ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_'di dag ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pas tshig 'di skad mchi'am/_'on te sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'di skad ces mchi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[290b.7\]]stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi mthus de skad du smra ste/_rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa thob pa yang yin/_chags pa med pa thob pa yang yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]'di dag gis ji ltar da ltar nga las thos pa bzhin du sangs rgyas bye ba phrag drug cu las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'di tsam du lhag chad med par thos te/_'di dag gis de rjes su dran nas ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'di skad ces smra'o/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[291a.2\]]zhe na/_kun dga' bo 'di dag gis ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/_'di dag la de mngon sum mo/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos ma thag tu 
[\[291a.3\]]mos shing the tsom 'tshal bar mi 'gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams ji tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[291a.4\]]tu yang dag par zhugs pa gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rin po ches yongs su bkang ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la dbul ba phul ba babs/_gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos ma thag tu mos shing dad de yid ches la 
[\[291a.5\]]the tsom mi za ba de de bas bsod nams ches mang du skyod par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling rin po ches bkang ba lta zhog ste/_/kun dga' bo gang gis 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rin po ches bkang ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[291a.6\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la dbul ba phul ba babs/_gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos la/_thos nas kyang thos ma thag tu mos shing dad de yid ches la the tsom mi za ba de de bas bsod nams ches mang du skyed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 
[\[291a.7\]]tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di ni/_/rin chen bkang ste de bzhin gshegs/_/skyob pa sangs rgyas 'jig rten mgon/_/rnams la dbul ba byas pa bas/_/mkhas pa gang gis mdo sde 'di/_/thos nas lhag par mos byed pa//_
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]mos dang ldan de bsod nams ni/_/de bas mang du skyed par 'gyur/_/gang gis gang gA'i bye snyed kyi/_/zhing dag rin chen rnams bkang ste/_/sangs rgyas rnams la phul ba bas/_/'di ni de bas khyad par 'phags//_//bam po drug pa ste tha ma/_de skad ces 
[\[291b.2\]]bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos nas rtogs te 'dzin tam/_'chang ngam/_klog gam/_kun chub par bgyid 
[\[291b.3\]]dam/_'don na bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams ji tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 
[\[291b.4\]]zhugs pa gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang bral bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bskal pa brgyar sbyin pa sbyin pa dang /_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang bral bar bskal pa brgyar tshul khrims srung ba dang /_chos kyi rnam 
[\[291b.5\]]grangs 'di dang bral bar bskal pa brgyar bzod pa sgrub pa dang /_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang bral bar bskal pa brgyar brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang bral bar bskal pa brgyar bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[291b.6\]]'di dang bral bar bskal pa brgyar shes rab sgom zhing 'jig rten gyi gnas rnams la mkhas par gyur na/_kun dga' bo des ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bkur sti byas par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/
[\[291b.7\]]gang gis bskal pa brgya tshang bar/_/bza' ba la sogs thams cad kyis/_/de bzhin gshegs la bsnyen bkur ba/_/des ni bsti stang byas mi 'gyur/_/'bras bur dmigs pa 'joms byed pa'i/_/mdo sde 'di ni gang 'dzin pa/_/de ni sangs rgyas bkur 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]sti byas/_/chos kyi bkur sti byas pa yin/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi sku/_/chos skyes chos kyi tog ldan pas/_/sangs rgyas rnams la bkur sti 'di/_/des na sangs rgyas bkur sti byas/_/gang gis bskal pa brgya tshang bar/_/gos la sogs 
[\[292a.2\]]pas de bzhin gshegs/_/sangs rgyas rnams la mchod byed pa/_/de dag des ni bkur byas min/_/tshul 'di 'dzin par byed na ni/_/de ltas sangs rgyas bkur bar 'gyur/_/'di ni bkur sti rnams kyi mchog_/gos mang byin pa de ltar min/_/gang gis bskal pa 
[\[292a.3\]]brgya tshang bar/_/'jig rten mgon po sangs rgyas la/_/spos dang me tog gtor byed pa/_/de dag des ni bkur byas min/_/gang zhig tshul mchog zab mo yi/_/mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin byed pa/_/'di ni 'jig mgon skyob rnams la/_/bkur sti byed pa dam pa yin/_/
[\[292a.4\]]gang gis 'jig rten mgon po yi/_/mchod rten rin chen rgyu las bsgrubs/_/ri rab 'dra ba byas kyang ni/_/des ni sangs rgyas bkur byas min/_/gang zhig mdo sde 'di 'dzin cing /_/'dzin par yang ni mi blta na/_/de ni bsnyen bkur mchog yin te/_/mchod pa kun 
[\[292a.5\]]gyi nang na mchog_/gang zag gang zhig bskal pa brgya/_/tshang bar tshul khrims srung byed la/_/mdo sde 'di ni mi 'dzin na/_/tshul khrims de ni mchog ma yin/_/gang zhig mdo sde 'di 'dzin cing /_/'dzin par rlom sems med na ni/_/
[\[292a.6\]]tshul khrims de ni bsngags pa ste/_/tshul khrims de ni bla na med/_/tshul 'di kun du bzung ba'i phyir/_/mkhas pa tshul khrims chen po dang /_/bsam gyis mi khyab dpag med pa/_/tshul khrims gang yin de de tshol/_/nga yis ji skad bshad pa yi/_/mdo 'di la ni gang slob pa/_/mnyam mthong de 
[\[292a.7\]]la tshul khrims dang /_/ngang tshul ngan pa yod ma yin/_/gang zhig mdo 'dir mi slob pa/_/de ni byang chub phyir mi slob/_/byang chub de dang bslab pa mnyam/_/de ni sus kyang bslabs pa med/_/gang zhig mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa/_/de ni mdo 'dir bshad pa yi/_/tshul 
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]khrims de 'dra de dag gi/_/tshul khrims phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/_/bzod dang ldan pa'i mi gang zhig_/'dir ni bskal pa brgyar tshang bar/_/sems can dag ni thams cad kyis/_/mi snyan brjod dang spyos bzod cing /_/rkang lag dag kyang gtubs pa na/_/de yi sems ni 
[\[292b.2\]]'gyur med cing /_/de ni gang du'ang tha ba dang /_rab tu zhe sdang mi skyed la/_/bzod pa smra ba'i mi gang zhig_/bzod pa rnam pa de lta bus/_/bskal pa bye ba zad byed kyang /_/bzod pa de ni bsngags ma yin/_/gang zhig mdo 'di thos nas ni/_/mos pas 'di ni 'dzin byed pa/_/de ni bzod pa rnams kyi mchog_/
[\[292b.3\]]de ni bzod pa shin tu bzang /_/gang zhig mdo sde 'di 'dzin cing /_/gang du'ang chags par mi byed pa/_/bzod pa de ni khyad par 'phags/_/bzod pa de ni bla na med/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas ye shes mchog_/chags med ye shes 'dod pa des/_/
[\[292b.4\]]mdo sde 'di la mi chags par/_/myur du 'di ni gzung bar bya/_/gang zhig bskal pa brgya tshang bar/_/brtson 'grus ldan pa mi 'dug cing /_/gnyid kyis ma non bdag nyid can/_/rtag tu 'da' bar byed pa bas/_/mkhas pa gang zhig lung mnod phyir/_/mdo sde 'di la 
[\[292b.5\]]sbyor byed na/_/brtson 'grus de ni de bas mchog_/brtson 'grus 'di ni khyad par 'phags/_/gang zhig bskal pa brgya tshang bar/_/drang srong mngon shes lnga ldan gyur/_/mdo sde 'di ni mi nyan na/_/mngon shes mchog ces mi bya'o/_/gang zhig don shes mi gnas par/_/
[\[292b.6\]]mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin byed pa/_/de ni mngon shes thams cad kyi/_/mngon par shes pa'i mchog yin no/_/mi gang bskal pa brgya tshang bar/_/shes rab dang ni ldan gyur la/_/'jig rten pa yi shes rab ldan/_/'jig rten bya ba rnams la nges/_/gang zhig tshul 'di mi 
[\[292b.7\]]slob na/_/de ni shes rab tshul shes min/_/gang zhig tshul 'di 'dzin byed pa/_/dpa' bo de nyid shes rab ldan/_/gang zhig mdo sde dam pa 'di/_/thos nas mos shing rtogs byed pa/_/brtan pa de ni shes rab ldan/_/de ni shes rab mkhas pa yin/_/gang zhig 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]chos kun shes rab kyis/_/shes par 'dod pa ji ltas kyang /_/mdo sde 'di ni lung nod la/_/de ni shes rab 'di 'thob 'gyur/_/mdo sde 'dir ni rab bshad pa/_/de ni shes rab spyod yul yin/_/de yi phyir na mdo sde 'di/_/gzung bar brtson 'grus 
[\[293a.2\]]brtsam par gyis/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dpag tshad rangs pa'am 'on tam ni/_/dpag tshad brgyar yang brgyugs nas ni/_/'bras bu sna tshogs sel ba yi/_/mdo sde 'di ni mnyan par bgyi/_/kha tshon 
[\[293a.3\]]dpag tshad rangs pa yi/_/me mdag ga gang ba rgal nas ni/_/gang na mdo sde 'di gnas par/_/mkhas pas myur du mchi bar bgyi/_/bsam gtan kun gyi dam pa la/_/bsam gtan pa gang bsam gtan 'tshal/_/des ni nyon mongs kun sel ba/_/mdo sde 'di 
[\[293a.4\]]ni lung mnod bgyi/_/gang zhig 'di ni 'jig rten khams/_/grags pa mngon dga' zhes bgyi ba/_/shin tu mdzes der mchi 'tshal ba/_/des ni mdo sde 'di bshad bgyi/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa/_/thub pa bla med mthong 'tshal ba/_/des ni 
[\[293a.5\]]mdo 'di lung mnod cing /_/mang du bklag cing gzung bar bgyi/_/gang zhig byang chub sems dpa'i gnas/_/bde ba can du mchi 'tshal ba/_/des ni mdo 'di lung mnos na/_/myur ba nyid du mchi bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yi/_/mdo sde 'di ni bton bgyis 
[\[293a.6\]]nas/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med/_/bsam gyis mi khyab de mthong 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' ma smad pa/_/yon tan 'di dag mngon 'tshal bas/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yi/_/mdo sde 'di ni gzung bar bgyi/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[293a.7\]]ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo legs sa legs so/_/kun dga' bo ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/_/kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig gang gi tshe sems kyi g.yeng ba dang mtshan ma thams cad dang bral 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]ba'i yid kyis mdo 'di klog gam kha ton byed na de de'i tshe/_sangs rgyas gang dang gang mthong bar 'dod pa de dang de mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/ji ste sems g.yengs nas mi klog gam/_kha ton mi byed na 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mig lam du mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de 
[\[293b.2\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lung nod dam/_'dzin tam/_'don tam/_klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas gzhon nur gyur ma seng ges gzhon nu ma lnga brgya dang lhan 
[\[293b.3\]]cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bud med du gyur pas mdo 'di lung mnos sam/_bzung ngam/_bton tam bklags na yon tan ci zhig tu 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[293b.4\]]stsal pa/_seng ge gal te bud med bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lung nod tam/_'dzin tam/_'don tam/_klog gam/_'chang na de'i bud med kyi dngos po de nyid tha mar gyur pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos kyi rnam 
[\[293b.5\]]grangs 'di lung mnos pa dang /_bzung ba dang /_bton pa dang /_bcangs pa dang /_bklags pas nyon mongs pa gang dag gis bud med bud med kyi dngos po yongs su 'dzin pa'i bud med kyi nyon mongs pa rnams bud med la 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_gzhon nur gyur ma 
[\[293b.6\]]seng ges bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa gang dag dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po yongs su 'dzin pa'i bud med kyi nyon mongs pa de dag gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_seng ge 'di la bud med kyis bud med gzugs 
[\[293b.7\]]bzang ba/_mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/_rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_bde ba dang ldan pa/_gzhan mthong na de de la 'dod pa skyed de/_'di ni ngan skyugs kyi gong bu la tshon gyis bris pa/_byis pa 'drid pa/_dri nga ba/_ngan skyugs kyis sbags pa yin pa de ltar mi rtog na/_de de la de ltar mi rtog cing 
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]sdug par mthong ste/_de la 'dod pa skyed pas bud med bud med kyi dngos po yongs su 'dzin to/_/seng ge gzhan yang 'di la bud med phrag dog can dang /_ser sna can dang /_g.yo dang ldan par gyur la/_de bzhin du tshig tu smra zhing gzhan du sems kyis 'phrog pa dang /_gzhan du tshig 
[\[294a.2\]]tu mngon sum du sma zhing gzhan du gsang bar sems pa dang /_nyams su myong bar bya ba'i phyir dge slong gi gan du 'gro ba'i chos kyi phyir ma yin pa dang /_khro bas zil gyis non pa dang /_rmugs pa dang /_gnyid che ba dang /_'du 'dzi la mngon par dga' ba dang /_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta 
[\[294a.3\]]bu'i lung mnod pa don du mi gnyer ba dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sems kyis nyin mtshan zad par byed kyang rnam par byang ba'i sems kyis ma yin na/_nyon mongs pa de dag gis bud med de bud med kyi dngos po yongs su 'dzin te zad par mi byed do/_/de bas na seng ge mdor na bud med kyis bdag gi nyon 
[\[294a.4\]]mongs pa thams cad mi skye ba dang mi 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lung nod par bya/_gdon par bya/_kun chub par bya/_gzung bar bya/_bklag par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni bud med kyi nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'o/_/gzhon nur gyur ma seng ges gsol 
[\[294a.5\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te bud med bud med kyi dngos po las bsgyur bar mi 'tshal la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni lung nod cing 'dzin/_'don/_'chang /_klog_/kun chub par bgyid na/_de ji ltar lta bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_seng ge bud med kyi dngos po las bsgyur 
[\[294a.6\]]bar mi 'dod du zin kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni lung nod dam sems na/_de nyid bud med kyi dngos po'i tha ma yin par shes par bya ste/_rdzu 'phrul gyi ston pa ni ma gtogs so/_/seng ge 'di lta ste dper na skyes pa'am/_bud med la la zhig me'i phung po chen po kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar 
[\[294a.7\]]ba me lce dang bcas par bdag nyid kyi lus mchongs te tshig 'di skad du bdag gi lus 'tshig par ma gyur cig_/bdag gi pags pa'i mdog ma gyur cig ces smras na/_seng ge 'di la ji snyam du sems/_skyes pa'am/_bud med de tshig de skad smras pas bsam pa de 'thob par 'gyur ram/_gsol 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das zhugs kyi phung po chen po ni sreg pa'i bdag nyid lags te/_pags pa'i mdog ma mchis par bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_seng ge de bzhin du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang nyon mongs pa thams cad sel 
[\[294b.2\]]ba'o/_/seng ge de bas na bud med bud med kyi dngos po mi 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams myur du sgrub par 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas grangs med pa mthong bar 'dod pa dang /_spobs pa chags pa med pa thob par 'dod pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid gzung bar bya/_kun chub par bya/_
[\[294b.3\]]gdon par bya/_bklag par bya/_bcang bar bya/_kha ton du bya'o/_/de nas gzhon nur gyur ma seng ge gzhon nu ma lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[294b.4\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad las mnos te/_de slan chad 'di srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po 'dzin du stsal to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_gzhon nur 
[\[294b.5\]]gyur ma seng ges bud med kyi dngos po ma bsgyur lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod ci gzhon nur gyur ma seng ge bud med yin snyam du sems sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de 
[\[294b.6\]]skad ma smra shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo 'di ni gzhon nur gyur ma seng ge dang /_gzhon nu ma lnga brgya po 'di dag gi cho 'phrul yin te/_phyi ma'i skye bo mthong nas bud med la snying brtse ba dang /_bud med bud med kyi dngos po las rnam par dgrol ba'i phyir gzhon nur gyur ma seng ges cho 'phrul 'di 
[\[294b.7\]]bstan to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di dag ni skyes pa mi 'jug cing 'jug tu mi dbang ba'i khyim thams cad du zhugs nas cho 'phrul gyis bud med 'dul lo/_/kun dga' bo gzhon nur gyur ma seng ge la ni bud med kyi chos med skyes pa'i chos med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad 
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]mi dmigs pa'i phyir 'dis bud med mi dmigs skyes pa mi dmigs so/_/gzhon nur gyur ma seng ges chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rtogs par khong du chud do/_/snang ba thob bo/_/kun dga' bo de lta bas na gzhon nur gyur ma seng ge'i rjes su slob par 'dod pa'i bud med kyis chos kyi rnam 
[\[295a.2\]]grangs 'di gzung bar bya/_kun chub par bya/_gdon par bya/_bcang bar bya/_bklag par bya/_kha ton du bya'o/_/de nas dge slong ma lnga stong stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[295a.3\]]'das bdag cag deng slan chad chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bgyid/_kun chub par bgyid/_'don par bgyid/_'chang bar bgyid/_klog par bgyid/_kha ton du bgyid do/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni bud med kyi dngos po don du gnyer ba ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[295a.4\]]'das bdag cag ni bud med kyi dngos po la smod lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag deng slan cad chos kyi rnam grangs 'di kun chub par ma gyur gyi bar du mchis par mi bgyid do/_/rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par mi bgyid do/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[295a.5\]]kyis dge slong ma de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/che zhe dag khyed kyis tshig 'di la legs par smras te/_go cha chen po bgos shing khyed ci nas kyang bud med kyi dngos po ni don du mi gnyer la/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni don du gnyer ba'i phyir brtson 'grus chen po 'di brtsams pa legs 
[\[295a.6\]]so legs so/_/de bas na khyod chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung ba'i phyir brtson 'grus de bas kyang rtsoms shig_/de nas dge slong ma de dag gis 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu nas yi rangs te rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/_so sa nas bla gos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 
[\[295a.7\]]bkab bo/_/bkab nas kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/_/skyes pa'i dngos po'i ched du ni/_/de ring bdag cag dbugs rnyed do/_/rgyal ba gzhan du mi gsung bas/_/bdag cag 'jig rten mchog tu 'gyur/_de nas khyim bdag gi chung ma lnga brgyas dge slong ma de dag gi 
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]tshigs su bcad pa 'di thos nas stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang deng slan cad chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par bgyid/_kun chub par bgyid/_'don par 
[\[295b.2\]]bgyid/_'chang bar bgyid/_klog par bgyid/_kha ton du bgyid do/_/bdag cag slan cad gzhan gyi dbang du 'gyur ba dang /_gzhan gyi gdong du blta bar 'gyur ba dang /_mjal bar ma gyur cig_/dgung zla dgu'am bcur mngal na 'dzin par ma gyur cig_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom 
[\[295b.3\]]ldan 'das bud med du gyur pa slan cad rgyal po'i khyim du skyes kyang /_gzhan gyi dbang du 'gyur te/_ji srid 'tsho'i bar du khyim thab la bsnyen bkur bgyi 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag deng slan cad ma gum gyi bar du brtson 'grus brtsam par bgyi'o/_/za gcig tu 
[\[295b.4\]]'tshal bar yang dag pa blang bar bgyi'o/_/blos dbab par mi bgyi'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lus la gnas par bgyis par ma gyur gyi bar du khyim thab kyang sug pa nas 'dzin du mi stsal to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu mo khyed kyis tshig 'di legs 
[\[295b.5\]]par smra ba legs so legs so/_/da ni khyed gzhan gyi dbang du mi 'gyur ro/_/gzhan gyi ngor blta bar mi 'gyur ro/_/zla ba dgu'am bcur mngal na 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing bud med med par skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 
[\[295b.6\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sring mo 'di dag gang du skye bar 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i ming ci zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 'di dag gang du skye bar 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i ming ni rin po che'i pad ma lta bur snang ba zhes bya'o/_/de 
[\[295b.7\]]nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ji skad ces bgyi ba zhig bzhugs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la 
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]nor bu rin po che rnam par 'thor bar snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs shing chos kyang ston te/_khyim bdag gi chung ma 'di dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'don bzhin du de mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas khyim bdag gi chung ma dge bsnyen ma de dag gis 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_
[\[296a.2\]]rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/_mu tig gi do shal nor bu rin po ches spras pa khri mgul nas bkrol te/_de bzhin gshegs pa la gtor/_mngon par gtor to/_/gtor nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/bu med dngos po bsgyur ba la/_/de ring bdag cag 
[\[296a.3\]]dbugs rnyed do/_/sangs rgyas gzhan du mi gsung ste/_/bden pa'i gsung du bka' stsal pa/_/nyon mongs shin tu sdig pa'i lus/_/bud med lus ni spang bar bgyi/_/yang dag ji bzhin ma 'tshal bas/_/byis pa dag ni mkhas la rmongs/_/bdag cag slan chad mngal gyi gnas/_/'jigs pa chen 
[\[296a.4\]]por mi 'gyur ro/_/dge ba dam pa thob pas na/_/bdag cag mngal gyi gnas dang bral/_/de nas khyim bdag gi chung ma de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas mig mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[296a.5\]]kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du lha'i me tog rnams kyis gtor nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di kun chub par bgyis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[296a.6\]]stsal pa/_kau shi ka de'i phyir khyod da phyin chad lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul ngor 'jug par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas srog chags brgya stong mang po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang tshun chad bdag 
[\[296a.7\]]gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma bskor ba de srid du/_de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub tu thugs ma bskyed do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal khyod de'i phyir phyogs bcur snang bas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig mang po rnams kyi mchog tu gyur te/_'di lta ste/_dper na nyi 
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin no/_/de nas de'i tshe sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te lha'i me tog rnams kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor kun du pus mo nub tsam du khyab par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sa chen po g.yos 
[\[296b.2\]]pa 'jig rten du byung ba'i rgyu gang lags/_rkyen gang lags/_me tog 'di dag ni sus gtor/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo lha bye ba khrag khrig phrag mang pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bshad pa thos nas dga' ba'i sems kyis me tog 'di dag gtor te/_gtor 
[\[296b.3\]]nas kyang tshig 'di skad du bdag cag kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin to/_/kun chub par byed do/_/'don to/_/bcang ngo /_/bdag cag kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar gyur cig ces smras te/_tshig 'di smras ma thag tu de dag la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mngon du gyur nas de dag 
[\[296b.4\]]thams cad tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_nga dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal to/_/de nas sa g.yos pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ngo /_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam 
[\[296b.5\]]grangs 'di ni yon tan chen po dang ldan pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i yon tan dang ldan pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag gi rna lam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grags par 'gyur ba de dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma 
[\[296b.6\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan la thos nas kyang mos pa dang /_yid ches pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_'don pa dang /_'chang ba'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni 
[\[296b.7\]]sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no/_/de dag ni ngan song ngan 'gror rnam par ltung ba thams cad dang /_mi khom par skye ba thams cad las grol ba'o/_/de dag gis bdud sdig can bcom mo/_/de dag gis chos kyi tog bsgreng ngo /_/de dag gis chos kyi sgron ma rab tu 'bar bar byas so/_/de dag 
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]gis mun pa mun nag bsal to/_/de dag gis byang chub kyi snying por phyin to/_/kun dga' bo gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos ma thag tu mos pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_'don pa dang /_'chang ba de dag nga dang nye ba yin no/_/kun dga' bo gang dag chos kyi rnam 
[\[297a.2\]]grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_'don pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa de dag ni nga'i bu chos kyi sku las skyes pa dag go/_/de dang de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal zas za bar 'dod pa dag go/_/de dang de dag ni ji ltar da lta nang 'dug pa bzhin du byang chub kyi shing drung du 'dug 
[\[297a.3\]]par 'dod pa dag go/_/de dang de dag ni ji ltar da lta na nga ston pa de bzhin du chos ston par 'dod pa dag go/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na kha cig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos 
[\[297a.4\]]par 'gyur ba dang /_'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /_kun chub par bgyid par 'gyur ba dang /_'don par 'gyur ba dang /_'chang bar 'gyur ba dang /_'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /_klog par 'gyur ba mchis sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo gang dag da lta na mos pa de dag phyi ma'i dus 
[\[297a.5\]]na mos par 'gyur ro/_/gang dag da lta na 'dzin pa de dag phyi ma'i dus na 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/gang dag da lta na klog pa de dag phyi ma'i dus na klog par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gang gis da ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma thos pa de phyi ma'i dus na 'di thos par 'gyur ba de ni ngas lha dang bcas pa dang /_bdud dang 
[\[297a.6\]]bcas pa dang /_tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na ma mthong ste de ni gnas ma yin no/_/kun dga' bo 'di da ltar gang dag gi nor yin pa phyi ma'i dus na yang de dag gi nor du 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na 'dir khyim bdag gam khyim bdag gi bu 
[\[297a.7\]]'ga' zhig phyug cing nor che la longs spyod che zhing nor dang yo byad mang bar gyur la/_des gter dag gter du bcug nas yul gzhan du song na kun dga' bo de la ji snyam du sems/_de slar 'ongs ma thag tu des gang gter du bcug pa de rnyed par 'gyur ram/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das rnyed lags so/_/de ci'i 
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]slad du zhe na/_nor de de nyid kyi lags pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de bzhin du 'di da ltar gang dag gi nor yin pa ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang de dag gi nor du 'gyur te/_de dag ji ltar da lta nang yang dag par bged pa bzhin du chos kyi nor bla na med pa 'di gzhan dag 
[\[297b.2\]]dang yang dag par bged par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gang dag phyi ma'i dus na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos par 'gyur ba dang /_'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /_kun chub par byed par 'gyur ba dang /_'don par 'gyur ba dang /_'chang bar 'gyur ba dang /_klog par 'gyur ba rnams kyang ngas sangs rgyas kyi spyan 
[\[297b.3\]]gyis dper na da ltar de bzhin du mthong ngo /_/gang dag spong bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang mthong ngo /_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang dag mos par mi 'gyur ba dang /_spong ba dang /_mi snyan pa brjod 
[\[297b.4\]]pa dang /_sun 'byin pa de dag gi 'gro ba ci lta bu zhig tu 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis 'di dris pas ci zhig bya kha rog shig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol/_gang dag mos par mi 'gyur ba dang /_yid ches par 
[\[297b.5\]]mi 'gyur ba de dag kyang mos par 'gyur zhing rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo mtshams med pa lnga dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba gang yin pa de de dag gi 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo 'di la ji snyam du sems/_gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[297b.6\]]khams kyi sems can thams cad kyi srog bcad na de'i 'gro ba ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sdig pa can lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ni de'i 'gro ba yin par shes par bya'o/_/kun dga' bo gang zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan 
[\[297b.7\]]las 'das pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi mchod rten bshig ste mes kyang btang na/_ci de gzhi de las bsod nams ma yin pa mang du skyed par 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/_/de gzhi de las bsod nams ma lags pa mang 
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]du skyed par 'gyur te/_de ni mnyam par mi bgyi'o/_/blta bar mi bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ni de'i 'gro ba yin par shes par bya'o/_/kun dga' bo gang zhig 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi tshul 
[\[298a.2\]]'gag par byed na de'i 'gro ba ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sdig pa can lags te/_/de ni tshig tu brjod par sla ba ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_de ni de'i 'gro ba yin par shes par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das yang gang zhig 
[\[298a.3\]]sems can gzhan yang zlog par bgyid na/_de'i 'gro ba ji lta bu zhig tu 'tshal bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[298a.4\]]chub la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyi mig phyung na de'i 'gro ba ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur/_gsol pa/_bskal pa mang por dmus long du 'gyur zhing sems can dmyal ba pa'i zhugs kyis sreg pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba yang myong bar 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[298a.5\]]kun dga' bo ngas khyod la bsgo'o khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o/_/gang gis sems can gcig cig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las bzlog na de'i 'gro ba ni de yin par shes par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[298a.6\]]pa'i byang chub la zhugs pa gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la the tsom ni 'tshal la mi spong na de ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo ji snyed du the tsom gyi sems bskyed pa de tsam du sangs rgyas mnyes par byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bskal pa de snyed du byang chub ring du byed do/_/
[\[298a.7\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das yang gang zhig mos shing rtogs la the tsom 'tshal bar gyur na de'i lus gang gis sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba ci tsam zhig tu 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis de'i lus dris pas ci zhig bya kha rog shig_/gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]ldan 'das 'khor bzhi po 'di dag kyang skrag par 'gyur/_slad ma'i skye bo rnams kyis thos na yang skrag par 'gyur lags kyis bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de'i lus gang gis sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba ni dpag tshad khrir 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol 
[\[298b.2\]]pa/_gang des tshig ma bsrungs pa'i de'i lce ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de'i lce ni dpag tshad stong yod par 'gyur te/_de la thong gshol sa ya phrag brgyas rmod par 'gyur/_lcags kyi thu lum 'bar ba rab tu 'bar ba sa ya phrag brgya 'bar 
[\[298b.3\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ci nas tshig 'di ma bsrungs pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas 'khor bzhi po de dag dngangs shing spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas/_gdong nas mchi ma zag par ngu ba'i bzhin gyis de'i tshe sa la 'gyel te/_'gyel nas kyang thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu tshig tu smras 
[\[298b.4\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de 'dra ba'i tshig smras pas lus de 'dra ba'i rnam pa de lta bu myong bar 'gyur ba de'i ched du bdag cag 'gyod tshangs 'tshal lo/_/de nas der sems can gzhan dag gcig gdong las mchi ma zag par ngu zhing tshig 'di skad ces smras 
[\[298b.5\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis tshe 'di dang skye ba gzhan dag tu the tsom gang bskyed par 'gyur ba de dag bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gang dag mthong ba de dag kyang dpang du gsol te/_bdag cag gis las kyi sgrib pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan 
[\[298b.6\]]sngar so sor bshags par 'tshal lo/_/so sor dor bar 'tshal lo/_/nongs pa la nongs par so sor bshags shing nongs pa la nongs par mthong bas/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag cag gi nongs pa yongs su gzung du gsol/_/
[\[298b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag khyed gang gi phyir nyes pa la nyes par mthong ste/_sa sor 'chags pa dang /_so sor 'dor ba legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu dag gang nyes pa la nyes par mthong nas so sor 'chags pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba la ni 'phel bar 'gyur 
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di'i nang nas gang dag gis the tsom bskyed pa de dag kyang /_bcom ldan 'das 'di 'dra ba'i sems can dmyal bar mchi bar 'gyur ram/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[299a.2\]]kun dga' bo 'di'i nang nas gang dag gis the tsom bskyed pa de dag gis kyang so sor bshags shing so sor bor bas de dag gis myong bar 'gyur ba chung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das myong bar 'gyur ba ji tsam zhig tu chung bar 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[299a.3\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/_/spu'i khung bu re re nas kyang tshor ba grangs med dpag tu med pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/_'di ni mdor bsdus te smras pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nga dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs 
[\[299a.4\]]med pa gzhan dag la yang ci nas so sor bshags pa'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo de lta bas na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mos bdag gi lus 'di lta bur 'gyur du 'ong ngo /_/bdag gi tshor ba 'di lta bu myong bar 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa bskyed par bya'o/_/mos nas kyang som nyi 
[\[299a.5\]]med pa dang /_the tsom med par bya'o/_/gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su ma btang ba dang /_'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongs su ma btang ba dang /_chos yongs su ma btang ba dang /_dge 'dun yongs su ma btang ba dang /_'das pa dang /_ma 
[\[299a.6\]]byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi tshul yongs su ma btang ba des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos par bya/_gzung bar bya/_kun chub par bya/_gdon par bya/_bcang bar bya/_bklag par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' 
[\[299a.7\]]bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo'i chos bstan pa mdzad pa ni/_gang gis dge 'dun yongs su ma btang ba zhes bgyi ba/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ci la dgongs te de skad bka' stsal/_de 
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]bzhin gshegs pas dge 'dun du yongs su bstan pa ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pas phyir mi ldog pa la dge 'dun du yongs su bstan to/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa de dag ni phyir mi 
[\[299b.2\]]ldog pa'i dge 'dun la yang dag par gzhol ba ma lags/_grangs su mchi ba yang ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo gang dag bsam pa thag pa nas byang chub tu sems bskyed la/_sems de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog 
[\[299b.3\]]pa'i dge 'dun la yang dag par gzhol ba'o/_/de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun gyi grangs su 'gro ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams thabs mkhas pa dang ldan te/_thabs mkhas pas don 'di yongs 
[\[299b.4\]]su bstan pa ngo mtshar to/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i me tog man dA ra ba rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te/_mngon par gtor nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyang thabs mkhas pa 'dis chos ston 
[\[299b.5\]]par gyur cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ji ltar da lta na nga bzhin du thabs mkhas pa 'dis chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha'i bu stong phrag mang pos bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog rnams kyis gtor 
[\[299b.6\]]te/_tshig 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thob par gyur cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/slad ma'i skye bo rnams kyi ched du bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 
[\[299b.7\]]byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo gal te rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo rgya mtsho'i dbus su son par gyur pa gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan na yang /_des gdon mi za bar thos par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo chos kyi 
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]rnam grangs 'di ni sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs su lags kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang da byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_de nas sa chen po rnam pa drug tu 
[\[300a.2\]]g.yos te/_g.yos/_rab tu g.yos so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dzam bu'i klung gi gser gyi pad ma chen po 'dab ma bye ba brgya stong du ma yod pa/_'od kyis phyogs bcu kun du snang bar byed pa mngon du byung ngo /_/'od des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bar byas 
[\[300a.3\]]so/_/de nas 'khor bzhi po de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed thams cad kyi spyan snga na/_'dzam bu'i klung gi gser gyi pad ma chen po 'dab ma brgya stong du ma yod pa 'od kyis phyogs bcu kun du snang bar byed pa mngon du byung ba mthong ngo /_/de 
[\[300a.4\]]nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin khyim bdag gi cha byad kyis me tog rnam pa sna tshogs 'khor bzhi po de dag la byin te/_tshig 'di skad du khyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag dang /_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa'i phyir mngon par gtor cig_/mngon 
[\[300a.5\]]par gtor cig ces smras so/_/de nas 'khor bzhi po de dag gis me tog de dag blangs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la gtor ba dang /_me tog de dag de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi dbu'i steng gi drang thad na gdugs su 'dug par mthong ngo /_/de 
[\[300a.6\]]nas 'khor bzhi po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du sa chen po g.yos pa 'di byung ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag gi spyan sngar 'di lta bu'i pad ma chen po 'di byung ba 'di su'i snga ltas lags/_bcom ldan 
[\[300a.7\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_grogs po dag 'di ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la byin gyis rlob pa'i ltas te/_ltas 'dis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la byin gyis rlob par shes par gyis shig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni byin gyis brlabs 
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de de bzhin te/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_bcom ldan 'das nyag gcig gis byin gyis brlabs sam/_'on te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[300b.2\]]pa'i sangs rgyas 'di dag gis kyang byin gyis brlabs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[300b.3\]]kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de lta bas na khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'bras bu la mngon par zhen pa med pa zhes bya bar zung shig_/'di 
[\[300b.4\]]'bras bu sna tshogs dang bral ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/'di dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang /_chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_brgyad pa dang /_rigs kyis dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs 
[\[300b.5\]]rgyas bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/'di bdud slar btang ba bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/'di de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das dang /_sangs rgyas bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/'di pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe 
[\[300b.6\]]na/_kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos sam/_'dzin tam/_klog gam/_kun chub par byed na pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos sam/_'dzin tam/_klog gam/_kun chub par bgyid pa'i pha 
[\[300b.7\]]rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo gang gi tshe rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa de ni de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la the tsom mi za ba de ni de'i 
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bzod cing 'dod pa de ni de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la sems ma zhum pa de ni de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la sems yeng yeng 
[\[301a.2\]]por mi 'gyur ba de ni de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la rnam par mi rtog cing chos thams cad yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/kun dga' bo de lta bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang 
[\[301a.3\]]ldan pa zhes bya bar zung shig_/'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mtshungs par bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/'di phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo ye shes chen po bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[301a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming yang mnyan par bgyi na thog ma dang /_bar ma dang /_tha ma lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de de lta'o/_/kun dga' bo de de lta'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang zhig 
[\[301a.5\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming thos pa des 'khor ba las bskal pa du zhig bsnyil bar bgyis par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo ye shes chen po bstan pa zhes bya ba thos la/_thos nas kyang mos 
[\[301a.6\]]par 'gyur ba des 'khor ba las bskal pa stong bsnyil bar byas par 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos nas byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba de ji ltar blta bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun 
[\[301a.7\]]dga' bo gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos nas byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba de nyid de'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'o/_/de nas 'khor bzhi po de dag gi mdun du pad ma kha dog sna tshogs pa/_kha dog du ma yod pa/_kha dog dpag tu med/_'dab 
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]ma bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma yod pa so sor byung ngo /_/de nas 'khor bzhi po de dag tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes te/_pad ma de dag blangs nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to/_/mngon par gtor nas kyang tshig 'di skad du bdag 
[\[301b.2\]]cag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de ltar bstan par bgyi'o/_/de ltar rab tu dbye bar bgyi'o zhes smras so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad ma thag tu de nas sil snyan thams cad kyang ma dkrol bar sgra byung ngo /_/
[\[301b.3\]]spos thams cad kyi ngad kyang langs so/_/lha brgya stong mang po dag gis kyang lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang /_lha'i 'dzam bu'i klung gi gser phye dang /_lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dang /_lha'i na bza' rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan 
[\[301b.4\]]pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rgyu ma mchis/_rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/_bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/_rkyen gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 'khor bzhi po 
[\[301b.5\]]'di dag thams cad dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa dang /_gang dag phyi ma'i dus na thos par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang ji ltar da lta na nga ston pa de bzhin du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lhag chad med par ston par 'gyur ro/_/bcom 
[\[301b.6\]]ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_'khor bzhi po de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa phyir mi ldog 
[\[301b.7\]]pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_da na shI la dang /_mu ne bar ma dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]{D241}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sa mA d+hi tsakra nA ma ma hA ya na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod 
[\[302a.2\]]kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun tshad med grangs med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/gzhan yang lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin la sogs pa'i 'khor sna tshogs pas bskor nas chos ston par gyur te/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das ting 
[\[302a.3\]]nge 'dzin gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rab tu g.yos par gyur to/_/snang ba chen pos kyang thams cad gsal bar gyur te/_de nas 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dug par gyur te/_stan las 
[\[302a.4\]]langs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin gyi 'khor lo la snyoms par zhugs pa ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/_/bde bar gshegs pa shin tu ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal khyod kyis yang dag pa'i mtha' 
[\[302a.5\]]shes sam/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'tshal lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal yang dag pa'i mtha' gang na 'dug_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha' ni gang na ma mchis pa de na mchis lags so/_/bka' 
[\[302a.6\]]stsal pa/_'jam dpal gang na med pa de gang yin/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das yul thams cad dang bral ba'o/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal sgom pa gang yin/_bcom ldan 'das sgom pa ni sgom pa ma mchis pa'i don to/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas chos ji ltar 
[\[302a.7\]]ston par mdzad/_bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal nga ni gzugs rnam par 'jig pa med pa dang /_skye ba med par chos ston to/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa rnam par 'jig pa med pa dang /_skye ba med par chos ston to/_/'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug rnams 
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]rnam par 'jig pa med pa dang /_skye ba med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor ro/_/ngas ni 'di ltar chos gang yang ma bshig_/ma bskyed pa de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gsungs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' 
[\[302b.2\]]stsal to/_/'jam dpal khyod kyis chos kyi dbyings shes sam/_gsol pa/_gal te bdag gis dmigs na 'tshal lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal khyod kyis 'jig rten gang la spyod pa shes sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten na sgyu ma sprul pa'i mi gang kho na la spyod pa de la 
[\[302b.3\]]spyod pas so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten zhes bgyi ba ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa chos gsan par ni bzhed kyi/_khyod spobs par gyis shig_/gsol pa/_ci las brtsams te spobs par bgyid pa lags/_
[\[302b.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal khyod chos kyi dbyings las rtsoms shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang bdag gis chos kyi dbyings ma lags pa'i chos de bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams rab tu skrag par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[302b.5\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te yang dag pa'i mtha' skrag par gyur na/_de'i slad du mngon pa'i nga rgyal can skrag par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_mngon pa'i nga rgyal can gnyis gcig cing dbyer med pa'i phyir ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[302b.6\]]'jam dpal khyod ni rdo rje'i gzhi yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mi phyed cing bsam gyis mi khyab pas na rdo rje'i gzhi lags so/_/de ci'i slad du rdo rje'i gzhi zhes bgyi na sems can ma mchis pa dang /_dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du rdo rje'i gzhi lags so/_/
[\[302b.7\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags pa'i yang dag pa'i mtha' ni ma mchis pa lags te/_de lta bu'i mtha' gang lags pa de ni tshur mchi ba dang /_phar mchi ba ma mchis te/_bcom ldan 'das de lta bu'i mtha' can gyi don la gnas nas rang bzhin med pa'i don sgom par byed do/_/dben pa sten 
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]par yang byed do/_/'du 'dzi spong ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal khyod kyis chos bstan pa ni rab tu ngo mtshar to/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu ngo mtshar mi che ste/_dgra bcom pa zag pa 
[\[303a.2\]]med pa ni chos ston pa'i snod ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos bstan pa 'di ni so so'i skye bo'i chos la zhugs pa ma yin/_dgra bcom pa'i chos la zhugs pa ma yin/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos la zhugs pa ma yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos la zhugs pa ma yin pa'i phyir te/_'di 
[\[303a.3\]]ni chos dmigs pa'i phyir yang zhugs pa ma yin no/_/'di ni gang du yang zhugs pa dang ldog pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/chos thams cad shin tu dben pa'i phyir ro/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ci la bsams te smra/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu dgra bcom pa nyid ni 'dod chags dang /_
[\[303a.4\]]zhe sdang dang /_gti mug zad pa yin na de dag gang gi snod yin zhing de gang ji lta bu zhig gi snod du 'gyur snyam ste/_de las bsams nas dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_chos bstan pa'i snod ma yin par kho bo de skad smra'o/_/smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod 'chi 'pho ba dang /_skye ba med pa'i chos yin 
[\[303a.5\]]par mos sam/_smras pa/_'jam dpal bdag mos so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal legs so legs so/_/chos zab mo'i don la khyod rab tu mkhas par bsngags par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces 
[\[303a.6\]]bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi 
[\[303a.7\]]'khor lo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//[ {D242}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya pa ri Na ta tsakra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa yongs su bsngo ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i ri'i zom la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje rin po che la bka' 
[\[303b.2\]]stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu gang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub chen po don du gnyer bar 'dod pa dang /_sems can thams cad sgrol bar 'dod cing byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa 'dzin par 'dod pa dang /_byang chub chen por sems bskyed cing snying rje chen po dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[303b.3\]]la rim gro dang bkur sti bya bar 'dod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs yangs shing rgya che ba sogs par 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bsgrub par 'dod pa dang /_thogs pa med pa'i gzungs dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang /_rdzu 'phrul dang /_
[\[303b.4\]]mngon par shes pas rnam par rol par 'dod pa dang /_nam mkha' la bang ba dang mdzod chen po bsgrub par 'dod pa dang /_rang gi lag nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu bzhin du gtong zhing 'bul bar 'dod pas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/_phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[303b.5\]]'das thams cad dang /_sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang dag pa'i lam la bde bar gnas pa ma thob pas deng byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_bdag gi lus dang sems 'di dus 
[\[303b.6\]]thams cad dang /_rnam pa thams cad du dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag lus 'bul gyis/_mthu chen po mnga' ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /_sa chen po la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bdag bzhes su 
[\[303b.7\]]gsol/_bdag gi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po dang /_brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang /_sems kyi rgya bskyed pa dang /_rab tu zhi zhing dul ba dang /_dbang dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa myur du yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig_/yang bcom ldan 'das 
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'khor ba na 'khor zhing bcing ba chen pos bcings par gyur pa/_btson ra na gnas pa/_yang dag pa'i lam dang bral ba/_nyon mongs pa'i dgra'i dbang du gyur pa/_mgon med pa/_skyabs med pa/_
[\[304a.2\]]mig med pa/_rten med pa/_gtso bo med pa/_'dren pa med par gyur pa/_lam gol bar song ba/_'khor ba la gzhol ba/_mya ngan las 'das pa chen po la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/_ngan 'gro la phyogs pa/_lam ngan pa la bsten pa/_lam ngan par lhung bar gyur pa/_rtag tu bshes gnyen ngan pas 
[\[304a.3\]]zin cing dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral ba/_yang dag pa dang yang dag pa ma yin pa dang /_phan par 'gyur ba dang /_phan pa med pa dang /_don yod pa dang don med pa la rmongs par gyur pa/_dge ba'i chos dang bral zhing mi dge ba chen po bsgrubs pa/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[304a.4\]]dang 'phags pa rnams la rtag tu rgyab kyis phyogs pa/_skye rga na 'chi'i sdug bsngal gyis gzir cing mi bde ba chen po bsgrubs pa/_'jigs pa med pa/_bag tsha ba med pa/_sems rtag tu g.yengs par gyur pa/_sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_zhi zhing dben pa dang bsgrubs pa dang 
[\[304a.5\]]bag yod pa dang bral bar gyur pa/_gzungs dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang /_sa bcu'i chos kyi bzod pa la bde bar gnas pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo dang mnyam pa nyid las ring du gyur pa/_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms tshad med pa bzhi mi sgrub pa dang /_
[\[304a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang mi ldan par gyur pa dang /_chags pa med pa dang /_thogs pa med pa'i ye shes chen po las ring du gyur pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyu dge ba'i chos sgrub pa la bde bar gnas pa ma thob pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul dang /_stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang 
[\[304a.7\]]bral bar gyur pa dang /_yang dag pa'i dran pa la mi gnas pa dang /_bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid la spyod cing gzhol bar 'jug pa mi 'grub pa dang /_bsod nams byed pa la g.yel zhing lta ba snyems pa dang the tsom gyi sgrib pas byang chub kyi yan lag bdun mngon par mi rtogs pa dang /_de bzhin du 
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad mi sgrub pa dang /_nyon mongs pa brgya stong tshad med pas zil gyis non cing sdug bsngal rnam pa mang pos sdug bsngal zhing yongs su mnar te/_rtag tu gdung ba bsam pa zhan pas khro zhing rtag tu g.yeng ba/_nyon mongs pa brgya stong la rgyun du gzhol bar gyur pa de bzhin 
[\[304b.2\]]gshegs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje chen po la gnas pa rnams kyis bdag gi skyabs mdzad par gsol/_bdag gi rten mdzad par gsol/_bdag gi 'dren pa mdzad par gsol/_bdag myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lam dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[304b.3\]]dpa' chen po'i lam dang /_byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs sogs pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig_/bdag myur du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos spobs pa thogs pa 
[\[304b.4\]]med pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs dang /_rnam par grol ba'i yon tan dang /_rdzu 'phrul dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig_/yang bdag bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang ldan par gyur cig_/mchod pa rgya chen po byed pa'i dus su 
[\[304b.5\]]yang 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/_yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthu chen po mnga' ba thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/_deng bdag sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mchod pa dang /_rim gro chen po bgyis te lus 
[\[304b.6\]]'bul lo/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na ji snyed rgyan dang /_yo byad bzang po thams cad rin po che'i gzhal med khang rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang /_rin po che'i rgyan thams cad dang /_rin po che'i shing dang /_rin po che'i ri dang /_rin po che'i ba dan dang /_rin po che'i dkyil 'khor dang /_rin po che'i 
[\[304b.7\]]dbyig rnam par bkram pa dang /_rin po che'i gdugs dang /_rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /_rin po che'i do shal gyi rgyan dang /_mu tig gi dra ba dang /_rin po che'i snod dang /_rin po che'i phung po dang /_rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba dang /_rin po che'i gling dag na nor bu rin po che chen po rnam par dag pa'i mar me'i sdong 
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]bu dang /_rin po che dril bu'i sgra 'khrol ba la nor bu rin po che 'od 'phro ba gser btso ma'i spar khab can gyi dom dom pho long dpyangs pas yongs su khebs pa/_gser btso ma'i me tog 'dzam bu'i gser gyi ze ba can/_gser gyi shing ljon pas dkris pa/_gser gyi pho brang sna tshogs rin po che'i 
[\[305a.2\]]sprin chags pa/_rin po che'i thigs pa char du 'bab pa/_rin po che rnam pa mang po'i mdzod kyi pho brang /_lha rdzas kyi nor bus rtsig ngos spras pa/_rin po che'i shing thams cad rig 'dzin chen po'i skyed mos tshal gyi ra ba yid du 'ong ba/_rin po che'i pho brang dang /_gnas dang /_shing dang /_nags tshal la 
[\[305a.3\]]sogs pa thams cad kyang yid du 'ong ba de lta bu bdag po med pa 'dzin pa med pa thams cad sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yongs su bsngo zhing dbul lo/_/'dzam bu'i gling na sman bzang po ring du 'tsho bar byed pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa ji snyed yod pa dang /_nor bu rin po che sems 
[\[305a.4\]]can thams cad kyi re ba yongs su skong ba dang /_ma g.yos par rang bzhin gyis bda' ba'i zhal zas bzang po dang /_spos kyi shing ljon pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_tsan dan gyi shing dang /_a ga ru dang /_tsan dan dmar po dang /_lo ma che zhing me tog rtag par bsung gis gzi bar byed pa'i shing 
[\[305a.5\]]rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang /_yid du 'ong ba'i lha rdzas kyi spos ma bzung ba yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_dpag bsam gyi shing rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang /_rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas 'byung ba nor bu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che la sogs pa dang /_ri rab lhun po dang /_
[\[305a.6\]]ri ti se dang /_spos kyi ri dang /_ri ma la ya dang /_ri btang bzung dang /_ri ma ha la dang /_rdo rje'i ri la sogs te ri chen po rnam pa de dag gi rin po che'i zom sna tshogs dang /_rin po che'i stegs dang /_rdo ba rin po che dang /_rin po che'i phug dang /_rin po che'i pho brang dang /_rin po che'i rgyan dang /_rin po 
[\[305a.7\]]che'i zhogs ma dang /_rin po che'i lam srang mang po dang /_nor bu rin po che'i ka ba mang po dang /_rin po che'i sgron me'i 'khor lo mang po dang /_bai dUr+ya la sogs te/_nor bu'i rigs rnam pa mang po dang /_ji tsam du gnam gyi steng na bdag po med pa'i lha'i pho brang dang lha'i nor rnam pa mang po 
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]yid du 'ong zhing blta bar 'os pa dang /_lha'i rol mo'i yo byad rnam pa mang po rlung gi ngad kyis bskyod pa tsam gyis sgra snyan pa 'byin pa dang /_nam mkha' la gnas pa'i pho brang nas rol mo'i sgra snyan pa 'byin pa dang /_lha'i rol mo rnam pa mang po ma bskyod par sgra snyan par 'byin pa dang /_lha'i bya sna tshogs nam mkha'i pho 
[\[305b.2\]]brang nas snyan pa'i sgra sna tshogs 'byin pa dang /_rin po che'i sprin sna tshogs las sgra snyan pa chen po 'byung ba dang /_lha'i nor bu rin po che dbyangs snyan pa'i sgra sgrogs pa dang /_gzhan yang lha'i dri'i shing dang /_me tog gi shing mang po dang /_phreng ba'i shing dang /_byug pa mang po dang /_bdug pa'i spos kyi shing 
[\[305b.3\]]dang /_sgron ma'i shing dang /_rgyal mtshan gyi shing dang /_ba dan gyi shing dang /_rin po che'i shing la sogs pa de dag thams cad ma bzung ba yongs su ma bzung ba de dag thams cad kun kyang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dbul lo/_/ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[305b.4\]]kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na mchod pa'i sprin chen po me tog gi sprin dang /_spos kyi sprin dang /_phreng ba'i sprin dang /_bdug spos kyi sprin dang /_byug spos kyi sprin dang /_rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin dang /_rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin dang /_rin po che'i ba dan gyi sprin dang /_rin po che'i gos kyi 
[\[305b.5\]]sprin dang /_rin po che'i rnam pa'i sprin dang /_rin po che'i phung po'i sprin la sogs te/_rin po che chen po'i sprin rnam pa de dag dang /_gzhan yang spos kyi 'bru mar gyis mar me'i snod chen po bkang ba stong gi 'jig rten gyi tshad dang mnyam pa/_mar me'i snying po ri rab kyi tshad tsam pa sgron mar byas te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[305b.6\]]'das de dag thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams la mchod cing dbul lo/_/de bzhin du mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa'i bsod nams dam pa ji tsam pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/_/gang 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 
[\[305b.7\]]dge ba mang po brtsams te/_dmigs su med pa'i tshul gyis byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bsod nams de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/_/yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi snying por mngon par rdzogs par sangs 
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo chen po ni bskor/_bdud kyi sde rnams ni pham par byas nas mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs par dgongs pa la sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir bskal pa chen po gcig tshang bar bzhugs par gsol zhes gsol ba gdab bo/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[306a.2\]]dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_sems can thams cad kyis bsod nams ci bsgrubs pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo /_/dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis sdig pa dang mi dge ba'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad bshags pa de bzhin du bdag 
[\[306a.3\]]gis kyang yongs su bshags shing yongs su sbyong ngo /_/de bzhin du mchod pa dang bshags pa la sogs pa byas nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mngon sum du dmigs pa'i spyan sngar gsang sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/_/oM sam+b+ha ra sam+b+ha ra/_b+hi ma na sa ra/_ma hA dzA bA hUM/_
[\[306a.4\]]gang gsang sngags de bzlas pas ci dang ci 'dod pa de thams cad 'grub cing lha'i mchod pa'i sprin chen po dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mngon du 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byed cing nyin mo yang rung mtshan mo yang rung 
[\[306a.5\]]yongs su bsngo ba'i 'khor lo chen po 'di klog cing 'don na/_de'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las 'byang zhing nyon mongs pa thams cad khad kyis sbyong bar 'gyur ba dang /_bsod nams kyi tshogs snga ma de dag thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/_/lan cig bklags pa tsam gyis kyang tshangs pa brgya'i dpal dang ldan 
[\[306a.6\]]zhing rmi lam na yang rtag tu sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'das nas kyang yongs su dag pa'i zhing du skye'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs mang po de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/
[\[306a.7\]]yongs su bsngo ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//li'i dge slong sde snod gsum dang ldan pa shI la d+harmas/_rgya gar gyi d+harma rgya'i yi ge las ban de rnam par mi rtog gis bsgyur ba//_//mang+ga laM//_//
